data.source_sentence: 혐기성 소화공정은 미생물에 기반한 생물학적 유기성 폐기물 처리 기술로 유기성 오염 물질 처리와 동시에 에너지원인 메탄가스 생산을 달성할 수 있어 지속 가능한 처리 방법으로 세계적으로 각광 받고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Anaerobic digestion process is a microorganism-based biological and organic waste treatment technology that can simultaneously process organic pollutants and produce methane gas, an energy source, in the spotlight as a sustainable treatment method worldwide.
data.target_sentence: Anaerobic digestion process is a microorganism-based biological and organic waste treatment technology that can simultaneously process organic pollutants and produce methane gas, an energy source, and is attracting attention as a sustainable treatment method worldwide.

data.source_sentence: 희석하지 않은 액상 돈분뇨 상층액을 그대로 사용했을 경우 standard를 초과하였기 때문에 액상 돈분뇨를 40배 희석하여 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When the undiluted liquid pig manure supernatant was used as it was, it exceeded the standard, so the liquid pig manure was diluted 40 times and analyzed.
data.target_sentence: When the pig manure supernatant of the stock solution was used as it is, the liquid pig manure was diluted 40-fold to exceed the standard value and analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 폭기 처리한 액상 돈분뇨 2 ml에 질산을 가하여 12시간 실온에 방치한 후 노란색의 맑은 용액이 나올 때까지 100℃에서 24시간 이상 가열하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Nitric acid was added to 2 ml of aerated liquid pig manure, left at room temperature for 12 hours, and then heated at 100° C. for more than 24 hours until a clear yellow solution came out.
data.target_sentence: Nitric acid was added to 2 ml of aerated liquid pig manure, left at room temperature for 12 hours, and then heated at 100° C. for more than 24 hours until a transparent yellow solution came out.

data.source_sentence: 반응이 끝나면 질산을 다시 가하여 산이 완전히 증발할 때까지 반응시켜 유기질을 제거하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When the reaction was completed, nitric acid was added again to react until the acid completely evaporated to remove the organic material.
data.target_sentence: When the reaction was completed, nitric acid was added again to react until the acid was completely evaporated to remove organic matter.

data.source_sentence: BOD는 배양 전 용존산소량과 20℃에서 5일간 배양한 후 용존산소량을 측정하여 두 값의 차를 이용해서 분석하였으며 COD는 산성 과망간산칼륨 실험법을 이용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: BOD was analyzed by measuring the amount of dissolved oxygen before incubation and the amount of dissolved oxygen at 20°C for 5 days, and COD was analyzed using the difference between the two values, and the acidic potassium permanganate test method was used.
data.target_sentence: BOD was analyzed by measuring the amount of dissolved oxygen before incubation and the amount of dissolved oxygen at 20°C for 5 days. COD was analyzed using the difference between the two values, and an acidic potassium permanganate test method was used.

data.source_sentence: 가열반응을 통해서 소비된 과망간산칼륨량으로부터 이에 상응하는 산소의 양을 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The amount of oxygen corresponding thereto was measured from the amount of potassium permanganate consumed through the heating reaction.
data.target_sentence: From the amount of potassium permanganate consumed by the heating reaction, the corresponding amount of oxygen was measured.

data.source_sentence: 돈분 액비를 제외한 실험 결과들은 일반선형모형linear model)의 반복측정 분산분석(repeated-measures ANOVA)을 통해 가설을 검정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Experimental results excluding pig manure ratio were tested hypotheses through repeated-measures ANOVA of a general linear model.
data.target_sentence: Experimental results excluding the pig manure ratio were tested hypotheses through repeated measures ANOVA of the general linear model.

data.source_sentence: 돈분 액비는 양돈 농가에서 6개월 동안 폭기하여 부숙을 완료한 것으로서 본 연구에서 수행한 결과와 비교하기 위하여 화학적 성분을 분석하고 그 결과를 표에 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Pork manure liquid fertilizer was completed by aeration for 6 months at a pig farm. In order to compare with the results of this study, the chemical composition was analyzed and the results are shown in the table.
data.target_sentence: Pig manure liquid fertilizer was completed by aeration for 6 months in a pig farm. To compare with the results of this study, the chemical composition was analyzed and the results are shown in the table.

data.source_sentence: 액상 돈분뇨의 폭기 처리 후 주차별 pH는 Table 2에 나타내었다.

data.target_sentence: Table 2 shows the weekly pH after aeration of liquid pig manure.

data.source_sentence: 실험구별 액상 돈분뇨의 pH는 8.89~9.25로 측정되었으며 유의적인 차이는 없었다.
data.mt_sentence: The pH of liquid pig manure for each experimental group was measured to be 8.89 to 9.25, and there was no significant difference.
data.target_sentence: The pH of liquid pig manure in each experimental group was measured to be 8.89-9.25, and there was no significant difference.

data.source_sentence: 인과 칼륨 함량의 경우 T1와 T2보다 대조구에서 마지막 7주차에 유의적으로 높았다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of phosphorus and potassium content, it was significantly higher in the last 7 weeks in the control than in T1 and T2.
data.target_sentence: The phosphorus and potassium contents were significantly higher in the control group than in T1 and T2 over the past 7 weeks.

data.source_sentence: Ammonia-N의 농도는 시간이 경과함에 따라서 크게 변화하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The concentration of Ammonia-N changed significantly over time.
data.target_sentence: The concentration of ammonia-N changed significantly over time.

data.source_sentence: 폭기 처리 전 액상 돈분뇨와 비교했을 때 T1 실험구에서 96%나 감소하였으며 T2 88%, 대조구에서도 66%로 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Compared with liquid pig manure before aeration treatment, it was reduced by 96% in T1 experimental group, 88% in T2 and 66% in control group.
data.target_sentence: Compared with liquid pig manure before aeration, it was reduced by 96% in the T1 experimental group, 88% in T2, and by 66% in the control group.

data.source_sentence: 폭기 처리 전 액상 돈분뇨와 비교했을 때 T1 58%, T2 52%, 대조구 47% 순으로 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Compared with the liquid pig manure before aeration treatment, it decreased in the order of T1 58%, T2 52%, and control group 47%.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 S. griseus를 돈분에 첨가하였을 때 생성된 효소에 의해 악취 유발 물질이 분해되거나 VFA를 이용하는 과정에서 강력한 탈취효과가 있음을 보고하였다.

data.source_sentence: 폭기 처리 전 액상 돈분뇨의 ammonia-N 농도는 2,963 mg/L로 모든 실험구에서 주차가 경과할수록 유의적으로 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The ammonia-N concentration of liquid pig manure before aeration treatment was 2,963 mg/L, which decreased significantly as parking progressed in all experimental groups.
data.target_sentence: The ammonia-N concentration of liquid pig manure before aeration treatment was 2,963 mg/L, which was significantly decreased per week in all experimental groups.

data.source_sentence: 이 결과는 유용 미생물을 첨가하여 VFA가 감소했던 논문은 찾을 수 없었으나 폭기만을 처리했을 때 VFA가 현저히 감소했던 AAA의 결과와 일치하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This result was consistent with the results of AAA, which found no paper that reduced VFA by adding useful microorganisms, but significantly reduced VFA when only aeration was treated.

data.source_sentence: 이상의 결과들을 토대로 유용 미생물 첨가는 BOD, COD 감소 및 액상 돈분뇨 악취 저감에 효과를 주는 것으로 조사되었다.

data.source_sentence: 농촌진흥청에서는 가축분뇨 액비를 ‘가축분뇨를 액체상태로 발효시켜 만든 비료 성분이 있는 물질’로 정의하고 있으며 농림축산식품부령으로 비료공정규격 기준을 N-P-K 성분의 총합계가 0.3% 이상 그리고 그중 질소성분의 최소함유량은 0.1% 이상으로 규정하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The Rural Development Administration defines livestock manure as "a substance with fertilizer ingredients made by fermenting livestock manure in a liquid state," and the Ministry of Agriculture, Food and Rural Affairs stipulates that the total of N-P-K ingredients is more than 0.3%, and the minimum content of nitrogen is more than 0.1%.
data.target_sentence: The Rural Development Administration defines livestock manure as 'a substance containing fertilizer components made by fermenting livestock manure in liquid form'. % That is all.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 칼륨 함량은 0.073%~0.097%로 범위 내로 측정되었으며 인의 함량은 폭기 처리 전 0.031%에서 폭기 처리 후 0.011~0.036%로 앞서 발표된 연구 결과와 비교할 때 더 낮은 수치였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the potassium content was measured within the range of 0.073% to 0.097%, and the phosphorus content was lower than the previously published research results, ranging from 0.031% before the anaerobic treatment to 0.011 to 0.036% after the anaerobic treatment.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the potassium content was measured in the range of 0.073% to 0.097%, and the phosphorus content was in the range from 0.031% before anaerobic treatment to 0.011 to 0.036% after anaerobic treatment, which was lower than the results of previously published studies.

data.source_sentence: AAA에 의하면 돈분뇨의 부숙을 촉진시키는 요인으로 원활한 미생물의 생육조건이 충족되어야 한다고 언급하였으며 부숙이 진행되면 액비의 pH가 9 이상이 되고 병원균, 악취 등이 감소한 유동성이 좋은 흑갈색액체로 변화한다고 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: According to AAA, it was mentioned that smooth microbial growth conditions should be satisfied as a factor that promotes the aging of money manure, and when the aging progresses, the pH of the liquid ratio becomes 9 or higher, and the pathogens and odors decrease, turning into a well-fluid dark brown liquid.
data.target_sentence: According to AAA, it is mentioned that the conditions for smooth microbial growth must be met as a factor that accelerates the aging of pig manure. As aging progresses, the pH of the liquid fertilizer becomes 9 or higher, reducing pathogens and odors, and it turns into a dark brown liquid with good fluidity.

data.source_sentence: 본 실험에서는 액상 돈분뇨에 3.5일 간격으로 20ml의 유용 미생물을 첨가하여 액상 돈분뇨의 18.7%에 해당하는 양을 첨가하였다.

data.target_sentence: In this experiment, 20 ml of useful microorganisms were added to liquid pig manure at intervals of 3.5 days, and an amount corresponding to 18.7% of liquid pig manure was added.

data.source_sentence: 이는 목적한 미생물 수를 첨가하기 위해 부피가 증가한 것으로 목적한 미생물 수를 1 ml와 2 ml로 농축하게 되면 총 24 ml와 48 ml가 주입되며 이는 각각 액상 돈분뇨의 1.6%와 3.2%에 해당하는 첨가량이다.
data.mt_sentence: This is an increase in volume to add the desired number of microorganisms, and when the desired number of microorganisms is concentrated to 1 ml and 2 ml, a total of 24 ml and 48 ml are injected, which is 1.6% and 3.2% of liquid money manure, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 추후 미생물 균수를 농축하여 첨가하는 방법을 통해 첨가량의 부피를 조정 및 개선할 수 있을 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is believed that the volume of the added amount can be adjusted and improved by concentrating and adding microbial bacteria later.

data.source_sentence: 추후 연구에서는 미생물 첨가에 따른 액상 돈분뇨의 부숙이 완료되는 시점까지의 화학 성분 중 질소 변화에 관한 연구도 필요할 것으로 판단된다.

data.source_sentence: 결과적으로 지방자치단체의 농업기술센터에서 배양하여 양축가에 보급하는 유용 미생물의 추가적인 효과를 증명하고 미생물의 응용 범위를 확대할 수 있음을 시사하는 것으로 또한 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result, it is also believed to suggest that the additional effect of useful microorganisms grown at local government's agricultural technology centers and distributed to livestock can be proved and the scope of application of microorganisms can be expanded.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 생물전환된 인삼농축액에서 얻은 compoundK를 이용해 항염증 및 독성을 조사하였다.

data.source_sentence: 이 생성물은 향후 여드름 완화용 화장품 개발에 사용할 수 있는 매우 우수한 기능성 소재가 될 수 있을 것으로 기대된다.

data.source_sentence: 최근 많은 젊은 계층의 소비자들이 고통을 겪고 있는 여드름을 저해할 수 있는 기능성 화장품 개발에 적용할 수 있는 신소재에 대한 연구가 활발하다.

data.source_sentence: 이후 배양상등액을 모두 제거하고 SFM 200 μL를 분주하여 24시간 동안 재배양하였다.

data.source_sentence: T+I로 염증이 유도된 HaCaT 세포의 시료에 의한 독성평가는 상기 기재된 MTT assay를 이용하여 평가되었으며 T+I 유도군에 대한 세포 생존율로 나타냈다.

data.target_sentence: Toxicity assessment by samples of T+I-induced HaCaT cells was assessed using the MTT assay described above and expressed as cell viability for the T+I-induced group.

data.source_sentence: 10~100 μg/mL의 농도 범위에서 LPS 유도군 대비 17.6~59.9%의 세포 생존율이 확인되었으며 비색법을 통한 세포독성 평가에서 세포 생존율이 80% 이하로 나타나면 세포독성이 나타나는 것으로 판단하기 때문에 상기 농도 범위에서는 유의적인 세포독성이 나타나는 것으로 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the concentration range of 10 to 100 μg/mL, the cell survival rate of 17.6 to 59.9% compared to the LPS-derived group was confirmed, and cytotoxicity was determined to appear if the cell survival rate was less than 80% in the colorimetric cytotoxicity evaluation.
data.target_sentence: In the concentration range of 10-100 μg/mL, cell viability of 17.6-59.9% compared to the LPS-derived group was confirmed, and when the cell viability was less than 80% in colorimetry, cytotoxicity was determined. Cytotoxicity Assessment.

data.source_sentence: 반면 0.1~1 μg/mL의 농도 범위에서는 97.6~99.3%의 세포 생존율이 확인되어 본 농도 범위에서는 유의적인 세포독성이 나타나지 않는 것으로 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, in the concentration range of 0.1 to 1 μg/mL, the cell viability of 97.6 to 99.3% was confirmed, and it was confirmed that significant cytotoxicity did not appear in this concentration range.

data.source_sentence: 유해 세균은 알맞은 배지 안에서 배양되었고 한국전통식품에서 분리한 균주는 MRS에 접종시켜 35℃에서 48시간 동안 배양하였다.

data.source_sentence: 유산균과 prebiotics의 혼합(synbiotics)은 용혈성과 인공 위액 및 담즙액에서 안전성을 가진 균주를 선별하여 실험에 사용되었다.

data.source_sentence: 유산균은 일반적인 식품을 제조하는 데 유통 기한을 늘리기 위한 화학적 물질을 대신하여 bacteriocin과 같은 천연 생체 활성 peptide로서 식품 부패와 병원균을 예방하고 품질 유지를 도모한다.

data.source_sentence: 인체 같은 경우 구강에 700종 이상의 세균이 서식하고 있는데 이들 중 생태계 불균형을 막기 위해 probiotics가 유용하게 사용될 수 있다고 알려져 있다.

data.source_sentence: 양식업에서는 수생 생물의 질병 치료 및 예방에 있어 오랜 시간 동안 항생제를 사용해 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: The aquaculture industry has long used antibiotics in the treatment and prevention of aquatic diseases.

data.source_sentence: 그 결과 염색체의 돌연변이에 의해 plasmid의 매개 저항성을 지닌 내성균주가 증가하게 되었고 이를 대체할 만한 안전요법으로 probiotics를 이용한 방법을 넙치, 돌돔 및 가자미 등의 여러 수생 생물에게 적용하였다.

data.source_sentence: 나머지 균주는 5% 미만 또는 인공 위액에서 생존하지 못했다.

data.source_sentence: 식물은 생장하는 동안 건조, 염분, 기온 변화와 같은 환경 및 다양한 질병에 의해 생물학적 스트레스와 비생물학적 스트레스를 받는다.

data.source_sentence: 이와 관련하여 식물은 토양 내 존재하는 PGPR을 활용하는데 PGPR은 유기산 등을 생성하여 불용성 미네랄을 가용화함으로써 식물에 미네랄을 공급하여 식물 생장에 도움을 주는 것으로 알려져 있다.

data.source_sentence: 그중에서도 Bacillus sp.의 미네랄 가용화능과 관련된 연구들에 의하면 옥수수 생장 촉진과 수확량 증대, 세포벽 강화와 질병 감소 등을 보고하였다.

data.target_sentence: Among them, a study on the mineral solubilization ability of Bacillus sp. It has been reported to promote maize growth, increase yield, strengthen cell walls and reduce disease.

data.source_sentence: 이후 분리 균주를 이용하여 식물 병원성 곰팡이에 대한 항진균 활성, 식물 생장 촉진 활성 및 미네랄 가용화능을 조사하였다.

data.target_sentence: Then, the antifungal activity against plant pathogenic fungi, the plant growth promoting activity and the mineral solubilization ability were investigated using the isolated strain.

data.source_sentence: 식물 병원성 곰팡이와 미생물 간의 거리를 측정하여 억제율로 환산하였다.

data.source_sentence: NFB 배지에 loop을 이용하여 전배양된 균주를 접종하여 30℃에서 4일간 배양하면서 배지 색이 푸른색으로 변한 경우를 양성으로 판정하였다.

data.source_sentence: 표준물질로서는 IAA를 이용하여 검량선을 작성한 뒤 시료의 농도를 환산하였다.

data.source_sentence: 이후 분광광도계를 이용하여 600 nm에서 흡광도를 측정하였으며 분리 균주의 생장 정도를 통해 ACC deaminase 생성을 확인하였다.

data.source_sentence: 고체 배지 중앙에 cork borer를 이용하여 잘라낸 뒤 선별된 균주의 상등액을 10 μl씩 접종하여 30℃에서 4일간 배양하면서 균체 주위의 clear zone 형성 유무를 조사하여 규소 가용화능을 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After cutting using a corkborer in the center of the solid medium, 10μl of the selected strain supernatant was inoculated and incubated at 30°C for 4 days to investigate the formation of clear zones around the fungus to measure silicon solubility.
data.target_sentence: After cutting using a cork borer in the center of the solid medium, 10 μl of the selected strain supernatant was inoculated and cultured at 30 °C for 4 days to investigate the formation of a transparent area around the fungus and measure the silicon solubility.

data.source_sentence: 이후 각 species마다 활성이 높은 1균주씩 선정하여 미네랄 가용화능을 확인한 결과 대부분의 Bacillus sp.에서 인산과 탄산칼슘 가용화능을 확인할 수 있었다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 분리한 Bacillus sp.의 항진균 활성, 식물 생장 촉진 활성 및 미네랄 가용화능 결과를 통해 다목적 기능을 가진 미생물 제제로서 활용이 가능할 것으로 판단된다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 자생식물 추출물을 첨가하여 개발된 항균용기(KAPP)에 저장된 김치의 발효 및 품질 특성을 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study compared the fermentation and quality characteristics of kimchi stored in an antibacterial container (KAPP) developed by adding a native plant extract.
data.target_sentence: In this study, fermentation and quality characteristics of kimchi stored in an antibacterial container (KAPP) developed by adding native plant extracts were compared.

data.source_sentence: 실험에 사용된 저장 용기는 개발된 항균 용기(KAPP)와 기존 시판 용기인 폴리프로필렌 용기(KPP), 스테인레스 스틸 용기(KST), 포세린 용기(KPC)로 총 4가지를 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The storage containers used in the experiment were developed antibacterial containers (KAPP), polypropylene containers (KPP), stainless steel containers (KST), and pocerin containers (KPC), which are existing commercial containers.
data.target_sentence: For storage containers used in the experiment, existing commercial containers such as antibacterial containers (KAPP), polypropylene containers (KPP), stainless steel containers (KST), and porcelain containers (KPC) were developed.

data.source_sentence: 김치를 저장하는 동안 총균수의 증가와 감소는 4가지 용기 모두 비슷했으나 KAPP의 경우 가장 낮은 증가를 보였고 대장균군의 경우에는 저장 15일 이후부터 50일까지 가장 낮은 수준을 유지하는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: The increase and decrease of the total number of bacteria during storage of kimchi was similar in all four containers, but the KAPP showed the lowest increase and the coliform group maintained the lowest level from 15 days to 50 days after storage.
data.target_sentence: The amount of increase and decrease of the total number of bacteria during storage of kimchi was similar in all four containers, but KAPP showed the lowest increase rate, and coliform group maintained the lowest level from 15 to 50 days after storage.

data.source_sentence: 저장 40일의 김치를 관능 검사한 결과 KAPP 용기에 저장된 김치가 시판 KPP, KST, KPC 용기의 김치에 비하여 전반적으로 외관, 냄새, 맛 및 전반적인 기호도 항목에서 관능적인 점수가 높았다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of sensory testing of kimchi stored for 40 days, kimchi stored in KAPP containers generally showed higher sensory scores in appearance, smell, taste, and overall preference compared to kimchi in commercially available KPP, KST, and KPC containers.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the sensory test of kimchi stored for 40 days, kimchi stored in a KAPP container showed a higher overall sensory score in appearance, smell, taste, and overall preference compared to kimchi dipped in commercially available KPP, KST, and KPC containers.

data.source_sentence: 이를 통해 자생 식물의 추출물을 첨가하여 개발한 항균 용기가 시판 3가지 저장 용기와 비교했을 때 젖산 발효에 효과적임을 확인하였으며 관능적인 면에서도 우수함을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this, it was confirmed that the antibacterial container developed by adding the extract of the native plant was effective in lactic acid fermentation compared to the three commercially available storage containers, and it was also confirmed that it was excellent in the sense of sensuality.
data.target_sentence: Through this, it was confirmed that the antibacterial container developed by adding a native plant extract was effective for lactic acid fermentation compared to the three commercially available storage containers, and it was also confirmed that the sensory feeling was excellent.

data.source_sentence: 특히 발효, 숙성되면서 풍미는 저하되는데 그러므로 김치의 풍미 변화를 최소화하기 위해서 김치의 발효 속도 및 저장성에 관한 연구들이 많이 진행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, the flavor decreases as it is fermented and aged, and therefore, many studies have been conducted on the fermentation rate and storage properties of kimchi to minimize changes in the flavor of kimchi.
data.target_sentence: In particular, a lot of research on the fermentation rate and storage characteristics of kimchi is being conducted in order to minimize the change in flavor of kimchi because the flavor decreases through fermentation and aging.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 김치의 풍미 변화는 발효 숙성 과정에서의 pH, 산도, 환원당 등의 이화학적 변화와 미생물학적 변화에 기인하며 이러한 변화를 통해서 김치의 숙성도를 알수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This change in flavor of kimchi is due to physicochemical changes and microbiological changes such as pH, acidity, and reducing sugar during fermentation and maturation, and through these changes, the degree of ripeness of kimchi can be known.
data.target_sentence: These changes in the taste of kimchi are due to physicochemical changes and microbiological changes such as pH, acidity, and reducing sugar during fermentation and maturation, and the degree of ripening of kimchi can be known through these changes.

data.source_sentence: 김치의 적숙기는 발효 정도와 관계가 있고 발효 온도와 발효 시간에 따라 관여하는 균이 달라지며 발효 양상과 김치의 맛도 담그는 방법과 발효 온도와 저장 온도에 따라 더 영향을 받는다고 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was reported that the ripening period of kimchi is related to the degree of fermentation, the bacteria involved depend on the fermentation temperature and fermentation time, and the fermentation pattern and the taste of kimchi are more affected by the fermentation temperature and storage temperature.
data.target_sentence: It has been reported that the ripening period of kimchi is related to the degree of fermentation, the bacteria involved depend on the fermentation temperature and fermentation time, and the fermentation pattern and taste of kimchi are more affected by the fermentation temperature and storage temperature.

data.source_sentence: 김치의 발효와 맛은 김치의 재료와 제조 방법, 보관 온도는 물론 저장 용기에 의해서도 크게 좌우되는 것으로 판단되었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was judged that the fermentation and taste of kimchi was greatly influenced by the material, manufacturing method, storage temperature, and storage container of kimchi.
data.target_sentence: It was judged that the fermentation and taste of kimchi were greatly affected by the ingredients, manufacturing method, storage temperature, and storage container of kimchi.

data.source_sentence: 김치 발효 및 저장 용기는 미생물학적 측면에서 김치의 품질과 발효 과정에 큰 영향을 줄 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Kimchi fermentation and storage containers can have a great influence on the quality and fermentation process of kimchi in terms of microbiology.
data.target_sentence: Kimchi fermentation and storage containers can have a significant impact on the quality and fermentation process of kimchi from a microbiological point of view.

data.source_sentence: 즉, 김치는 저온에서 숙성 및 저장시키는 과정을 거치므로 젖산균과 같은 유용 미생물의 증식과 그 대사산물이 용기의 재질적 특성과 통기성에 영향을 미칠 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In other words, since kimchi undergoes a process of aging and storing at low temperatures, the proliferation of useful microorganisms such as lactic acid bacteria and their metabolites can affect the material characteristics and breathability of the container.
data.target_sentence: That is, since kimchi is aged and stored at a low temperature, the growth of useful microorganisms such as lactic acid bacteria and their metabolites may affect the material properties and air permeability of the container.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 김치의 저온 발효 및 저장 중 품질을 최적화할 수 있는 조건 중의 하나로 개발된 김치 저장 용기의 활용 가능성을 알아보기 위하여 진행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: This study was conducted to investigate the possibility of using a kimchi storage container developed as one of the conditions for optimizing the quality during low-temperature fermentation and storage of kimchi.
data.target_sentence: This study was conducted to investigate the possibility of using the kimchi storage container developed as one of the conditions for optimizing the quality of kimchi during low-temperature fermentation and storage.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 선행 연구에서 천연 자생식물을 항균 소재로 선발하고 그 추출물을 첨가한 식품 저장 용기를 개발하여 항균활성을 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: First, in a previous study, natural native plants were selected as antibacterial materials, and food storage containers containing the extract were developed to compare antibacterial activity.
data.target_sentence: First, in a previous study, a food storage container containing an extract was developed in order to select a native plant as an antibacterial material and compare the antibacterial activity.

data.source_sentence: AAA가 개발한 저장 용기에 저장된 김치의 이화학적인 변화 특성을 살펴본 결과 개발된 저장 용기에 저장된 김치는 장기간 pH와 산도, 염도가 유지되었으며 Vit C의 잔존율이 시판 용기보다 높게 유지되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of examining the chemical change characteristics of kimchi stored in a storage container developed by AAA, the pH, acidity, and salinity of kimchi stored in the storage container were maintained for a long time, and the residual rate of VITC was higher than that of commercial containers.
data.target_sentence: As a result of investigating the chemical change characteristics of kimchi stored in a storage container developed by AAA, the pH, acidity, and salinity of the kimchi stored in the storage container were maintained for a long time, and the residual rate of VITC was that of a commercial container.

data.source_sentence: 본 실험에 사용된 배추는 가을 배추로 포기당 평균 2.5 kg 정도 크기의 것이며 2017년 9월 아산시 소재 N마트에서 구입하여 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The Chinese cabbage used in this experiment is an autumn cabbage, with an average size of about 2.5 kg per bag, and was purchased from N Mart in Asan City in September 2017.
data.target_sentence: The cabbage used in this experiment is an autumn cabbage, and the average size per bag is about 2.5 kg, and it was purchased at N Mart in Asan City in September 2017.

data.source_sentence: 절임에 사용된 소금은 천일염이며 김치 담금 재료로써 고춧가루, 무, 쪽파, 마늘, 생강, 멸치액젓, 설탕, 홍고추, 청고추, 찹쌀풀 등은 BBB에서 구입하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The salt used for pickle is sea salt, and red pepper powder, radish, chives, garlic, ginger, anchovy sauce, sugar, red pepper, green pepper, and glutinous rice paste were purchased from BBB as ingredients for kimchi soaking.
data.target_sentence: The salt used for pickled pickles is sea salt, and the ingredients for making kimchi are red pepper powder, radish, chives, garlic, ginger, anchovy paste, sugar, red pepper, green pepper, and glutinous rice paste purchased from BBB.

data.source_sentence: 김치의 제조 방법 및 배합비는 아름다운 한국 음식 300선의 방법을 일부 변형하여 본 실험에 사용하였다.

data.target_sentence: In this experiment, 300 methods of beautiful Korean food were partially modified and the method and mixing ratio of kimchi were used.

data.source_sentence: 배추는 약 12% 염수에서 12시간 절인 후 [Tabel 1]과 같은 배합비로 김치를 제조하여 저장 실험에 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Cabbage was pickled in about 12% salt water for 12 hours, and then kimchi was prepared at the same mixing ratio as in [Tabel 1] and used in a storage experiment.
data.target_sentence: After pickling cabbage in 12% brine for 12 hours, kimchi was prepared in the same proportion as in [Table 1] and used for storage experiments.

data.source_sentence: 실험에 사용된 배추김치는 총 15 kg을 생산하여 50일간 저장하면서 저장 중의 발효 특성을 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A total of 15 kg of cabbage kimchi used in the experiment was produced and stored for 50 days, and the fermentation characteristics during storage were compared.
data.target_sentence: A total of 15 kg of cabbage kimchi used in the experiment was produced and stored for 50 days, and fermentation characteristics were compared during storage.

data.source_sentence: 저장 기간동안 5일 간격으로 시료를 채취 후 분석하였기 때문에 각 시료별로 250±1.5 g씩 담아 10개의 용기에 저장하였고 총 40개 통의 김치시료는 1±1℃에서 저장하면서 매 실험에 통을 1개씩 무작위로 택해서 실험에 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Since samples were collected and analyzed every 5 days during the storage period, 250±1.5 g of each sample was put in 10 containers, and a total of 40 kimchi samples were stored at 1±1℃, and one container was randomly selected for each experiment.
data.target_sentence: Since samples were collected and analyzed every 5 days during the storage period, 250±1.5 g of each sample was placed in 10 containers, and a total of 40 kimchi samples were stored at 1±1°C, and one container for each container was randomly placed. was selected. Experiment.

data.source_sentence: 즉 용기 표면에 접촉하는 김치 시료의 양을 최대한으로 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: That is, the amount of the kimchi sample in contact with the surface of the container was maximized.
data.target_sentence: That is, the amount of kimchi sample in contact with the surface of the container was maximized.

data.source_sentence: 자생식물 추출물을 첨가한 용기는 선행연구에서 개발된 것으로 항균활성과 열 안정성이 우수한 어성초, 유근피, 솔잎, 녹차, 황련의 추출물을 첨가하여 제조하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The container with native plant extracts was developed in previous studies and was prepared by adding extracts of eoseongcho, whey skin, pine needles, green tea, and yellow lotus with excellent antibacterial activity and thermal stability.
data.target_sentence: The container containing the native plant extract was developed in a previous study and was manufactured by adding the extracts of Eosongcho, whey, pine needles, green tea, and yellow yew, which have excellent antibacterial activity and thermal stability.

data.source_sentence: 김치 시료는 4가지의 저장 용기에 50일간 저장하면서 5일마다 채취하여 김치의 총 균수와 대장균군수의 변화 특성을 비교 관찰하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Kimchi samples were stored in four storage containers for 50 days and collected every 5 days to compare and observe the characteristics of changes in the total number of bacteria and the number of E. coli groups of kimchi.
data.target_sentence: Kimchi samples were stored in 4 storage containers for 50 days and collected every 5 days to compare and observe the characteristics of changes in the total number of bacteria and E. coli in kimchi.

data.source_sentence: 김치는 각각의 용기에서 30 g씩 채취하여 hand blender로 마쇄한 뒤 3겹의 거즈로 걸러내어 시료로 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: 30 g of kimchi was collected from each container, ground with a hand blender, and filtered through three layers of gauze to use as a sample.
data.target_sentence: 30 g of kimchi was collected from each container, ground with a hand blender, filtered through 3 layers of gauze, and used as a sample.

data.source_sentence: 35℃에서 48시간 배양한 후 형성된 colony 수를 계수하고 동일한 방법으로 계수시험을 2번 반복하여 평균치를 산출하는 방법으로 총균수를 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After culturing at 35°C for 48 hours, the number of colonies formed was counted, and the counting test was repeated twice in the same way to calculate the average value.
data.target_sentence: After culturing at 35° C. for 48 hours, the number of colonies formed was counted, and the test was repeated twice in the same manner to calculate the average value.

data.source_sentence: 김치 시료의 대장균 군수는 단계별로 희석한 용액 1 mL씩을 무균적으로 대장균/대장균군 측정용 배지 3M 밥을 함께 제공하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For the E. coli group of the kimchi sample, 1 mL of each diluted solution was aseptically provided with 3M rice as a medium for E. coli/E. coli group measurement.
data.target_sentence: The coliform group of the kimchi sample was aseptically provided with 3M rice and 1 mL of the dilution as an E. coli/E. coli medium. E. coli group measurement.

data.source_sentence: 동일한 방법으로 계수시험을 2번 반복하여 평균치를 산출하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The average value was calculated by repeating the coefficient test twice in the same method.
data.target_sentence: The count test was repeated twice in the same way to calculate the average value.

data.source_sentence: 관능검사에 사용한 김치는 김치의 최적 숙기인 40일째의 저장 김치를 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As for the kimchi used for the sensory test, kimchi stored on the 40th day, which is the optimal ripening period for kimchi, was used.
data.target_sentence: For the kimchi used in the sensory test, kimchi stored for 40 days, which is the optimal ripening period for kimchi, was used.

data.source_sentence: 관능검사 항목은 붉은 정도, 숙성 정도와 같은 외관(Appearance), 냄새(odor; 신내, 군덕내), 맛(taste; 단맛, 신맛, 감칠맛, 탄산미, 전체적인 맛), 조직감(texture; 단단한 정도, 질긴 정도, 아삭아삭한 정도), 전반적인 기호도(overallpreference)이며 7점법(7-point scale)을 이용하여 평가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The sensory test items were red, ripening, appearance (Appearance), smell (Sinnae, Gundeoknae), taste (sweet, sour, savory, carbonic, overall taste), texture (tough, tough, crunchy), and overall preference (overallpreference), and 7 points (7-point scale) were evaluated.
data.target_sentence: The sensory test items were red, ripening, appearance (appearance), smell (sour taste, gundeok), taste (sweet, sour, flavor, carbonic acid, overall taste), texture (coarse, tough, crispy), overall preference (overall preference) ) was. , 7 points (7 points scale) were evaluated.

data.source_sentence: 시료를 1회용 흰색 폴리에틸렌 접시에 각각 20 g씩 나누어 담았으며 한 개의 시료를 먹고 난 다음 물로 헹군 뒤 평가하도록 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Each sample was divided into 20 g each in a disposable white polyethylene dish, and after eating one sample, it was rinsed with water and evaluated.
data.target_sentence: Each sample was divided into 20 g each in a disposable white polyethylene dish, and one sample was eaten and rinsed with water for evaluation.

data.source_sentence: 김치는 발효 과정에서 다양한 미생물의 증식과 사멸이 연속적으로 일어난다.
data.mt_sentence: During the fermentation process of kimchi, the proliferation and death of various microorganisms occur continuously.
data.target_sentence: During the fermentation process of kimchi, the proliferation and death of various microorganisms occur continuously.

data.source_sentence: 김치는 자체의 호기성 미생물들에 의해 김치 중의 산소가 제거되어 내염성 젖산균들이 자라나게 되고 그 젖산균들의 생성으로 인해 호기성균은 사멸하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The oxygen in kimchi is removed by its own aerobic microorganisms, causing inflammatory lactic acid bacteria to grow, and the production of the lactic acid bacteria kills the aerobic bacteria.
data.target_sentence: Oxygen in kimchi is removed by its own aerobic microorganisms to proliferate inflammatory lactic acid bacteria, and the production of lactic acid bacteria kills aerobic bacteria.

data.source_sentence: 이들 젖산균도 어느 정도 자라고 나면 자체 생산된 산에 의해 사멸되는데 그렇게 되면 김치는 시어지고 효모나 곰팡이 등에 의해 변색되며 군덕내를 생성하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: When these lactic acid bacteria grow to some extent, they are killed by their own produced acids, and if so, kimchi will wither, discolored by yeast or fungi, and create a gundeoknae.
data.target_sentence: When this lactic acid bacterium grows to a certain extent, it is killed by the acid it produces, and when that happens, the kimchi wilts and discolors by yeast or mold, making Gundeoknae.

data.source_sentence: 우리나라의 전통적인 김치 발효 과정 중에서 초기에 우점하는 미생물로서 Leuconostoc 속이 다수 보고된 바 있으며 이것은 젖산과 CO2를 많이 생성하여 국물을 산성으로 만들고 혐기상태로 해 줌으로써 호기성균의 생육을 억제한다.
data.mt_sentence: Among Korea's traditional kimchi fermentation processes, many Leuconostoc genus have been reported as dominant microorganisms in the early stages, which suppresses the growth of aerobic bacteria by producing a lot of lactic acid and CO2, making the soup acidic and anaerobic.
data.target_sentence: Among the traditional Korean kimchi fermentation process, many Leuconostoc genus are reported to be the predominant microorganisms in the early stage, which produce a large amount of lactic acid and CO2 to make the soup acidic and anaerobic, thereby inhibiting the growth of aerobic bacteria.

data.source_sentence: 발효 후기에는 Lactobacillus 속이 증식하고 젖산균의 증가 정도와 환원당 함량과 가장 관련이 높은 것으로 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the late fermentation period, it was reported that the genus Lactobacillus proliferates and is most related to the degree of increase in lactic acid bacteria and the content of reducing sugars.
data.target_sentence: It has been reported that the genus Lactobacillus grows in the late fermentation, and it is most related to the increase in lactic acid bacteria and the reducing sugar content.

data.source_sentence: 저장 용기를 달리하여 저장한 김치의 총 균수 변화는 Table 2와 같다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 2 shows the change in the total number of bacteria in kimchi stored in different storage containers.
data.target_sentence: Table 2 shows the change in the total number of bacteria in kimchi stored according to the storage container.

data.source_sentence: 김치 발효 중 총 균수는 발효 초기에 급증하여 적숙기에 최대가 된다.
data.mt_sentence: During kimchi fermentation, the total number of bacteria increases rapidly at the initial stage of fermentation, reaching the maximum during the ripening period.
data.target_sentence: During kimchi fermentation, the total number of bacteria increases rapidly at the beginning of fermentation, reaching a maximum during the ripening period.

data.source_sentence: 본 실험에서도 네 가지 용기 모두 저장 초기에 급격한 균수의 증가를 보였으며 총 균수의 증가와 감소 양상이 비슷하게 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: In this experiment, all four containers showed a rapid increase in the number of bacteria in the early stages of storage, and the pattern of increase and decrease in the total number of bacteria was similar.
data.target_sentence: In this experiment, all four containers showed a rapid increase in the number of bacteria in the early stage of storage, and the increase/decrease pattern of the total number of bacteria was similar.

data.source_sentence: KAPP 용기에 저장된 김치의 총 균수가 나머지 3개의 시판 용기보다 낮은 증가를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: The total number of kimchi stored in the KAPP container showed a lower increase than the other three commercial containers.
data.target_sentence: The total number of kimchi stored in KAPP containers showed a lower growth rate than the other three commercial containers.

data.source_sentence: 이는 KAPP 용기의 항균력 때문이라고 볼 수 있겠다.
data.mt_sentence: This can be attributed to the antibacterial activity of the KAPP container.
data.target_sentence: This can be attributed to the antibacterial activity of the KAPP container.

data.source_sentence: KAPP의 용기의 경우 김치의 숙성을 늦춤으로써 김치의 저장에 효과가 있는 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of KAPP container, it is judged that it is effective in storing kimchi by delaying the ripening of kimchi.
data.target_sentence: In the case of KAPP containers, it is judged to be effective for kimchi storage by delaying the ripening of kimchi.

data.source_sentence: 김치에 존재하는 미생물이 약 200여 가지로 다양한 미생물에 대한 제어와 저장 중 발효에 의해 항상 같은 저장 조건을 유지하고 있는가에 대한 깊이 있는 후속 연구가 필요할 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: An in-depth follow-up study will be needed on whether the microorganisms present in kimchi always maintain the same storage conditions by control of about 200 different microorganisms and fermentation during storage.
data.target_sentence: An in-depth follow-up study on whether the microorganisms present in kimchi maintain the same storage conditions by controlling fermentation during storage with about 200 types of microorganisms will be required.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 결과는 역시 KAPP 용기의 항균 특성과 이후 젖산균 수의 증가가 적절하게 이루어진 것으로 예상된다.
data.mt_sentence: These results are also expected to properly increase the antibacterial properties of the KAPP container and the subsequent increase in the number of lactic acid bacteria.
data.target_sentence: These results also appropriately increase the antibacterial properties of the KAPP container and expect an increase in the number of lactic acid bacteria accordingly.

data.source_sentence: 김치의 숙성은 미생물의 작용에 의해서 시작된다.
data.mt_sentence: The ripening of kimchi is initiated by the action of microorganisms.
data.target_sentence: The ripening of kimchi begins with the action of microorganisms.

data.source_sentence: 저장 45일째의 같은 기간에 KAPP 용기에 저장된 김치는 Leuconostoc spp.의 수가 6.66 logCFU/mL로 유지되었는데 이는 저장 중 김치 발효 초기 미생물이 유지되는 것이므로 숙성 속도를 지연시켜 저장기간을 연장시킬 것으로 보여진다.
data.mt_sentence: During the same period on the 45th day of storage, the number of Leuconostoc spp. was maintained at 6.66 logCFU/mL in the kimchi stored in the KAPP container. This is because the microorganisms in the early stage of kimchi fermentation are maintained during storage, so it is expected to prolong the storage period by delaying the ripening rate.
data.target_sentence: During the same period on the 45th day of storage, Leuconostoc spp. It was maintained at 6.66 logCFU/mL in kimchi stored in KAPP containers; This is expected to extend the storage period by delaying the ripening rate because the microorganisms in the early stage of kimchi fermentation are maintained during storage.

data.source_sentence: 젖산균은 김치의 당을 젖산으로 바꾸어 김치의 맛을 산뜻하게 해 주고 유해균을 사멸시켜 저장성과 위생성을 부여한다.
data.mt_sentence: Lactic acid bacteria convert the sugar of kimchi into lactic acid to freshen the taste of kimchi and kill harmful bacteria to provide storage and hygiene.
data.target_sentence: Lactobacillus converts the sugar in kimchi into lactic acid, refreshing the taste of kimchi, and killing harmful bacteria to provide storage and hygiene.

data.source_sentence: 저장 기간이 증가할수록 젖산균의 증가가 산도를 높이는 원인이 된다.
data.mt_sentence: As the storage period increases, the increase in lactic acid bacteria causes an increase in acidity.
data.target_sentence: As the storage period increases, the increase in lactic acid bacteria increases the acidity.

data.source_sentence: 시판 용기는 발효가 진행되면서 젖산균의 생육이 활발해져 젖산균이 생성하는 각종 유기산에 의해 미생물의 증식이 억제되므로 발효 후기에 미생물의 수가 감소한다.
data.mt_sentence: Commercial containers are active in the growth of lactic acid bacteria as fermentation proceeds, and the growth of microorganisms is suppressed by various organic acids produced by lactic acid bacteria, so the number of microorganisms decreases in the late stage of fermentation.
data.target_sentence: In commercial containers, the growth of lactic acid bacteria is active as fermentation proceeds, and the growth of microorganisms is suppressed by various organic acids produced by the lactic acid bacteria, so that the number of microorganisms decreases in the late fermentation.

data.source_sentence: 저장 용기의 종류에 따른 관능적 특성과 기호도에 대해 서술하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The sensual characteristics and preferences according to the type of storage container will be described.
data.target_sentence: Describe the sensory characteristics and preferences according to the types of storage containers.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 김치의 저온 발효 및 저장 중 품질을 최적화할 수 있는 조건 중의 하나로 김치 저장 용기의 개발과 활용 가능성을 알아보기 위하여 진행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: This study was conducted to investigate the possibility of developing and utilizing a kimchi storage container as one of the conditions for optimizing the quality of kimchi during low-temperature fermentation and storage.
data.target_sentence: This study was conducted to investigate the possibility of using a kimchi storage container as one of the conditions for optimizing the quality of kimchi during low-temperature fermentation and storage.

data.source_sentence: 김치의 최적 숙기인 저장 40일의 김치를 관능 검사한 결과 KAPP 용기에 저장된 김치가 시판 KPP, KST, KPC 용기의 김치에 비하여 전반적으로 외관, 냄새, 맛 및 전반적인 기호도 항목에서 관능적인 점수가 높았다.
data.mt_sentence: According to a sensual test of kimchi stored in a KAPP container for 40 days, the kimchi stored in the kimchi's optimal maturity had a higher sensual score in terms of appearance, smell, taste, and overall preference compared to kimchi in commercial KPP, KST, and KPC containers.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the sensory test for kimchi stored in KAPP containers for 40 days, KPP, KST, and KPC containers in which kimchi stored under optimal ripening conditions are sold in the market.

data.source_sentence: 이상의 결과 자생식물의 추출물을 첨가하여 개발된 저장 용기는 시판 저장 용기와 비교했을 때 젖산발효에 효과적이며 유익하지 않은 균에 대한 항균 효과가 우수하여 김치의 저장 기간을 연장시킴으로써 김치의 저장에 활용 가능한 용기로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result, the storage container developed by adding extracts of native plants is considered to be effective for lactic acid fermentation and has excellent antibacterial effect against unprofitable bacteria compared to commercial storage containers.
data.target_sentence: As a result, the storage container developed by adding the extract of the native plant is more effective for lactic acid fermentation than the commercial storage container, and it is judged that the antibacterial effect against useless bacteria is excellent.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 김치 저장 실험의 오차를 최소화하기 위해 저장일수에 맞추어 소량씩 소분하여 저장하였기에 미생물 발효 양상을 관찰하는 데 한계가 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, in order to minimize the error of the kimchi storage experiment, it was stored in small portions according to the number of days of storage, so there was a limitation in observing the microbial fermentation pattern.
data.target_sentence: In this study, there was a limitation in observing the microbial fermentation pattern by storing small amounts according to the number of days of storage to minimize errors in the kimchi storage experiment.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 다양한 상대습도(11~93%) 조건에서 해조류의 미생물 안정성 및 품질 특성에 미치는 영향을 조사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study investigated the effects of seaweed on microbial stability and quality characteristics under various relative humidity conditions (11-93%).
data.target_sentence: In this study, the effect of seaweed on the stability and quality of microorganisms under various relative humidity conditions (11-93%) was investigated.

data.source_sentence: 색도는 상대 습도가 높아질수록 L값과 b값이 감소하였고 a값이 증가하여 갈변 현상이 일어났다.
data.mt_sentence: As for chromaticity, the L and b values decreased as the relative humidity increased, and the a value increased, resulting in browning.
data.target_sentence: As for chromaticity, as the relative humidity increased, the L and b values decreased and the values increased, causing browning.

data.source_sentence: 일반세균, 효모 및 곰팡이의 성장 억제, 고결현상 방지, 갈변억제, 높은 총 페놀함량과 항산화 활성 유지를 위해서는 상대 습도 53% 이하의 조건에서 보관하는 것이 미생물 안정성 및 품질 특성 유지에 효과적일 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to inhibit the growth of general bacteria, yeast and mold, prevent caking, inhibit browning, and maintain high total phenol content and antioxidant activity, it is judged that storage at a relative humidity of 53% or less is effective in maintaining microbial stability and quality characteristics. .
data.target_sentence: In order to suppress the growth of general bacteria, yeast, and mold, prevent caking, inhibit browning, and maintain high total phenol content and antioxidant activity, it is judged that storage at a relative humidity of 53% or less is effective in maintaining the stability of microorganisms and quality characteristics.

data.source_sentence: 해조류(seaweed)는 아시아 국가를 중심으로 일반 및 건강 식품으로 주로 소비되어 왔으나 점차 유럽 및 북미지역에서도 해조류에 대한 건강 기능적 특성이 보고되면서 세계적으로 소비량이 크게 증가하고 있는 추세이다.
data.mt_sentence: Seawed has been mainly consumed as a general and health food in Asian countries, but consumption is increasing significantly worldwide as health functional characteristics of seaweed have been reported in Europe and North America.
data.target_sentence: Seaweed has been mainly consumed as a general and health food in Asian countries. However, as health and functional properties of seaweed have been reported in Europe and North America, its consumption is increasing significantly around the world.

data.source_sentence: 식품시장에서 가장 큰 소비를 차지하는 건제품의 경우 수분활성도, 저장 온도 등의 다양한 요인들의 영향을 받는데 수분활성도에 따라 비효소적 갈변반응, 지방산패, 미생물 발생 정도가 달라진다.
data.mt_sentence: Dry products, which account for the largest consumption in the food market, are affected by various factors such as moisture activity and storage temperature, and the degree of nonenzymatic browning, fatty acid failure, and microbial occurrence varies depending on moisture activity.
data.target_sentence: Dried products consumed the most in the food market are affected by various factors such as water activity and storage temperature, and the degree of non-enzymatic browning, fatty acid decomposition, and microbial generation varies depending on water activity.

data.source_sentence: 건조물은 유통과정 중 온도, 습도 등의 환경조건 하에서 품질이 저하되어 일정 시간이 경과하면 상품으로서의 가치를 잃을 뿐만 아니라 미생물 변패에 의한 독성의 발생으로 인간에게 위해를 가져올 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: During the distribution process, the quality deteriorates under environmental conditions such as temperature and humidity, and when a certain period of time elapses, not only does it lose its value as a product, but it can also bring harm to humans due to the occurrence of toxicity due to microbial decomposition.
data.target_sentence: In the course of distribution, the quality deteriorates due to environmental conditions such as temperature and humidity, and when a certain period of time elapses, it loses its value as a product and is toxic due to microbial decomposition.

data.source_sentence: 건조해조류의 경우 수분 함량이 저수분 식품으로 환경조건이 다습하거나 고온인 경우 주위로부터 흡습하게 되며 이로 인한 성분의 갈변으로 표면의 색이 나빠져 기호도가 크게 감소하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of dried seaweed, it is a low-water food that absorbs moisture from the surroundings when the environmental conditions are humid or high temperature, and the color of the surface deteriorates due to browning of the ingredients, greatly reducing the preference.
data.target_sentence: In the case of dried seaweed, it is a low-moisture food that absorbs moisture from the surroundings when the environmental conditions are humid or high temperature, and the color of the surface deteriorates due to the browning of the material, which greatly reduces the preference.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 상대습도에 따른 저장 기간별 미생물학적 및 이화학적 특성 변화를 분석하여 해조류의 저장 시 적합한 상대습도를 규명하고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, we tried to identify the suitable relative humidity for the storage of seaweeds by analyzing the changes in microbiological and physicochemical properties for each storage period according to the relative humidity.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the relative humidity suitable for the storage of seaweeds was identified by analyzing the changes in the microbial and physicochemical properties for each storage period according to the relative humidity.

data.source_sentence: 제품을 구매하여 3회 수세한 뒤 탈수 및 동결하여 동결건조를 진행하여 샘플을 -80℃에 저장하여 실험을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After purchasing the product, washing with water 3 times, dehydrating and freezing, freeze-drying, and storing the sample at -80 ° C.
data.target_sentence: After purchasing the product, wash 3 times with water, dehydrate, freeze, freeze-dry, and store the sample at -80℃

data.source_sentence: 연구에 사용된 시약 염화리튬(Lithium chloride), 초산칼륨(potassium acetate), 염화마그네슘(magnesium chlor-ide), 탄산칼륨(potassium carbonate), 질산마그네슘(magnesiumnitrate), 요오드화칼륨(potassium iodide), 황산암모늄(ammoniumsulfate), 질산칼륨(potassium nitrate)는 BBB에서 구입하여 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Reagents used in the study Lithium chloride, potassium acetate, magnesium chlor-ide, potassium carbonate, magnesium nitrate, potassium iodide, ammonium sulfate (ammoniumsulfate) and potassium nitrate were purchased from BBB and used.
data.target_sentence: The reagents used in the study were lithium chloride, potassium acetate, magnesium chloride, potassium carbonate, magnesium nitrate, potassium iodide, ammonium sulfate (ammonium sulfate) and potassium nitrate purchased from BBB.

data.source_sentence: 상대습도 11~96%의 조건의 챔버를 제조하기 위하여 각각의 염을 포화용액 이상의 농도로 용해하여 포화상태로 만든 용액(650 mL)을 데시게이터(1.5 L) 안에 넣어 상대습도를 조절하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to prepare a chamber having a relative humidity of 11 to 96%, a solution 650 mL prepared in a saturated state by dissolving each salt at a concentration of a saturated solution or more was added into a desiccator 1.5 L to adjust the relative humidity.
data.target_sentence: To prepare a chamber with a relative humidity of 11 to 96%, 650 mL of a saturated solution by dissolving each salt at a concentration greater than or equal to a saturated solution was placed in a desiccator 1.5L to adjust the relative humidity. .

data.source_sentence: 해초분말의 색도 변화를 살펴보기 위하여 시료를 0.07×10×15 mm 크기의 투명 진공삼면접착봉투에 진공 포장한 후 백색지 위에 놓고 중심부를 조건별로 동일한 위치에서 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to examine the chromaticity change of seaweed powder, the sample was vacuum-packed in a 0.07×10×15 mm transparent three-sided adhesive bag, placed on white paper, and the center was measured at the same location for each condition.
data.target_sentence: To determine the color change of seaweed powder, the sample was vacuum-packed in a 0.07×10×15 mm transparent three-sided adhesive bag, placed on a white paper, and the center was measured at the same location under each condition.

data.source_sentence: 해초분말의 미생물 안정성을 알아보기 위해서 일반세균, 대장균군, 효모 및 곰팡이 수를 3회 반복하여 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to find out the microbial stability of seaweed powder, the number of general bacteria, E. coli groups, yeast, and fungi was repeatedly measured three times.
data.target_sentence: In order to examine the microbial stability of the seaweed powder, the number of general bacteria, coliform group, yeast, and fungus was measured three times repeatedly.

data.source_sentence: 여과액 20 μL와 ABTS 용액 980 μL를 혼합 후 실온의 암실에서 6분 동안 정치한 다음 분광광도계를 이용하여 734 nm에서 흡광도를 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: 20 μL of the filtrate and 980 μL of the ABTS solution were mixed, left in a dark room at room temperature for 6 minutes, and then absorbance was measured at 734 nm using a spectrophotometer.
data.target_sentence: 20 μL of the filtrate and 980 μL of ABTS solution were mixed and left in a dark room at room temperature for 6 minutes, and then absorbance was measured at 734 nm using a spectrophotometer.

data.source_sentence: 여러 상대습도 조건에서 저장 기간에 따른 해초분말의 등온흡습곡선은 Fig. 1과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The isothermal absorption curve of seaweed powder according to the storage period under various relative humidity conditions is shown in Figure 1.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 1 shows the isothermal absorption curve of seaweed powder according to the storage period under various relative humidity conditions.

data.source_sentence: 식품이 대기 중에서 수분을 흡습함으로써 평형수분함량에 이르는 곡선을 등온흡습곡선(moisture adsorptionisotherm)이라고 부르고 반대로 식품이 수분을 대기 중에 방출함으로써 평형수분함량에 이르는 경우 얻어지는 곡선을 등온탈습곡선(moisture desoption isotherm)이라 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The curve that reaches equilibrium moisture content by absorbing moisture in the atmosphere is called a moisture adsorption curve, and on the contrary, when a food reaches equilibrium moisture content by releasing moisture into the atmosphere, the curve obtained is called a moisture desorption curve.
data.target_sentence: The curve that absorbs moisture from the atmosphere and reaches the equilibrium moisture content is called the moisture adsorption curve, and the curve obtained when food releases moisture into the atmosphere and reaches the equilibrium moisture ratio is called the moisture desorption curve.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 등온흡습곡선은 식품의 흡습성을 관찰할 때 필요한 것이고 등온탈습곡선은 건조과정을 연구하는 데 유용한 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, an isothermal hygroscopicity curve is necessary when observing the hygroscopicity of food, and an isothermal dehumidification curve is useful for studying the drying process.
data.target_sentence: In general, an isothermal hygroscopicity curve is required to observe the hygroscopicity of food, and the isothermal dehumidifying curve is useful in studying the drying process.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 해초분말을 25±2℃에 각각의 상대습도 조건에 저장하였을 때 2주 후 평형수분함량에 도달하였으며 전형적인 등온흡습곡선인 S-curve (Sigmoid curve) 형태를 보이는 것을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, when the seaweed powder was stored at 25±2℃ in each relative humidity condition, the equilibrium moisture content was reached after 2 weeks, and it was confirmed that the S-curve (Sigmoid curve) shape, a typical isothermal moisture absorption curve, was observed.
data.target_sentence: In this study, when seaweed powder was stored at 25±2℃ under each relative humidity condition, the equilibrium moisture content was reached after 2 weeks, and the S-curve (sigmoid curve) shape, which is a representative isothermal moisture, was confirmed. Absorption curves were observed.

data.source_sentence: 등온흡습곡선은 상대습도 11~69% 조건에서 완만하게 증가하였다가 69~93%까지 급격하게 증가하는 경향을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: The isothermal moisture absorption curve showed a tendency to increase gently in the 11~69% relative humidity condition and then rapidly increase to 69~93%.
data.target_sentence: The isothermal moisture absorption curve showed a tendency to increase gradually from 11 to 69% of relative humidity and then rapidly to 69 to 93%.

data.source_sentence: 제1형 영역은 매우 낮은 수분 함량을 가진 영역이기 때문에 제2형 영역에 해당하는 수분함량을 가진 식품보다 안정성이나 저장성이 높은 것으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the type 1 region is a region with a very low moisture content, it is known to have higher stability and storability than foods having a moisture content corresponding to the type 2 region.
data.target_sentence: Since the type 1 region has a very low moisture content, it is known that the stability and storage properties are higher than that of food having a moisture content corresponding to the type 2 region.

data.source_sentence: 저장 기간별 상대습도에 따른 해조류 분말의 고결현상 분석은 Table 1과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 1 shows the analysis of the solidification phenomenon of seaweed powder according to the relative humidity of each storage period.
data.target_sentence: Table 1 is an analysis of the coagulation phenomenon of seaweed powder according to the relative humidity of each storage period.

data.source_sentence: 이는 가공, 취급 및 보관 중에 발생하는 문제이며 주요 요인으로는 입자크기 및 분포, 온도, 상대습도, 당, 지방, 압력, 용해도 등에 의해 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: This is a problem that occurs during processing, handling and storage, and the main factors are particle size and distribution, temperature, relative humidity, sugar, fat, pressure, solubility, etc.
data.target_sentence: This is a problem that occurs during processing, handling and storage, and the main factors are particle size and distribution, temperature, relative humidity, sugar content, fat, pressure, and solubility.

data.source_sentence: 문제점으로는 제품 품질 및 기능 저하, 덩어리, 응집, 재수화 및 분산 불량, 관능 품질 저하 및 유통기한 단축을 유발한다.
data.mt_sentence: Problems include deterioration of product quality and function, lumps, agglomeration, poor rehydration and dispersion, deterioration of organoleptic quality, and shortened shelf life.
data.target_sentence: Problems include poor product quality and functionality, clumps, agglomeration, poor rehydration and dispersion, poor organoleptic quality, and shortened shelf life.

data.source_sentence: 저장 4주차의 해조류 분말의 고결 정도(caking index)는 상대습도 11~53% 조건에서는 일어나지 않았으나 69, 81, 93% 조건에서는 각각 86.9%, 99.45%, 99.98%로 높은 케이킹 현상이 나타나는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: The caking index of the seaweed powder at the 4th week of storage did not occur in the 11-53% relative humidity condition, but in the 69, 81, and 93% conditions, the caking index was 86.9%, 99.45%, and 99.98%, respectively. .
data.target_sentence: The caking index of the seaweed powder at the 4th week of storage did not occur in the 11-53% relative humidity condition, but was 86.9%, 99.45%, and 99.98 in the 69, 81, and 93% conditions. each %.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 고결현상을 방지하거나 최소화하기 위해서는 반드시 수분함량의 제어, 저온 보관, 낮은 상대습도, 수분이 차단되는 포장재를 사용하여야 한다고 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA reported that in order to prevent or minimize solidification, it is necessary to use packaging materials that control moisture content, store at low temperatures, low relative humidity, and block moisture.
data.target_sentence: The AAA reports the need to control moisture content, store at low temperatures, low relative humidity, and use moisture-repellent packaging to prevent or minimize clotting.

data.source_sentence: 생활 오폐수, 축산 폐수, 화학 비료 등으로 유발된 오염은 시기별로 다소 차이는 있으나 양식 수원인 지하 해수나 연안 해수의 오염 증가에 영향을 미치고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Pollution caused by domestic wastewater, livestock wastewater, chemical fertilizers, etc., although there is a slight difference by season, has an influence on the increase in pollution of underground seawater and coastal seawater, which are aquaculture water sources.
data.target_sentence: Pollution by domestic wastewater, livestock wastewater, chemical fertilizers, etc., affects the increase in contamination of groundwater and coastal seawater, which are aquaculture water sources, although there is a slight difference depending on the season.

data.source_sentence: 장기적인 면에서는 양식장 배출수의 처리 또는 재사용 등을 통해서 연안의 오염부하를 줄이고 양식장 사육수의 재사용 시 문제가 되는 양식 생물 질병 감염원의 관리와 통제가 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In the long-term, it is necessary to reduce the pollution load on the coast through treatment or reuse of farm effluent, and to manage and control the source of infectious diseases of aquaculture organisms, which is a problem when reusing farm water.
data.target_sentence: In the long term, it is necessary to reduce the pollution load on the coast through the treatment or reuse of farm effluent, and to manage and control the source of infectious diseases caused by aquaculture organisms that become a problem when the farm water is reused.

data.source_sentence: 양식장 운영의 많은 부분을 차지하는 질병 예방 비용의 감소로 생산 원가를 절감하게 되고 안정적인 양식장 운영이 가능할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The reduction in the cost of disease prevention, which accounts for a large part of the operation of the farm, may reduce production costs and enable stable operation of the farm.
data.target_sentence: Reducing the cost of disease prevention, which accounts for a large part of farm operations, can reduce production costs and enable stable operation of farms.

data.source_sentence: 하절기 오염 실태를 파악하고자 제주특별자치도에 위치한 넙치 양식장 중 양식장이 밀집된 양식 단지를 선정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to understand the pollution situation in the summer season, aquaculture complexes in which aquaculture farms are concentrated among halibut farms located in Jeju Special Self-Governing Province were selected.
data.target_sentence: In order to understand the pollution situation in summer, aquaculture complexes with a high concentration of fish farms among flounder farms located in Jeju Special Self-Governing Province were selected.

data.source_sentence: 채수는 2015년부터 2017년까지 매년 하절기(8월 말~9월 초의 고수온기)에 조사 양식장을 대상으로 채수하여 실시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Collection was carried out every summer from 2015 to 2017 (high water temperature from late August to early September) for survey fish farms.

data.source_sentence: 배출수의 TAN 양은 A~C 양식장에서 유입수 대비 2.7~4.6배 증가하여 양식장 내 자가오염이 심각하였다.

data.source_sentence: 이를 해결하기 위해 육상 수조식 양식장의 사육수의 순환율을 높인다 하더라도 양식생물 관리기준을 크게 상회하는 수질 농도를 보였다.

data.source_sentence: 양식생물의 생산성을 높이고 양식어민들의 경제적 손실을 줄이기 위해서는 친환경 순환여과 시스템과 같은 방식으로 양식장 주변 해역에 대한 오염정도를 조사한 자료를 이용한 양식장의 생물보안 시스템 활용 연구들이 앞으로 필요하다.

An eco-friendly circulation filtration system is needed in the future.

data.source_sentence: 각막이식은 여러 가지 원인으로 인하여 발생한 각막혼탁 환자에서 투명한 각막편을 이식하여 시력을 회복하는 시술이다.
data.mt_sentence: Corneal transplantation is a procedure that restores vision by implanting a transparent corneal piece in patients with corneal opacity caused by various causes.
data.target_sentence: Corneal transplantation is a procedure that restores vision by transplanting a transparent corneal piece to a patient with corneal opacity due to various causes.

data.source_sentence: 감염성 각막염은 각막이식술 후의 주요한 합병증으로 알려져 있으며 최대 교정시력의 감소 및 각막이식편 거부반응까지 유발할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Infectious keratitis is known to be a major complication after corneal transplantation, and may cause a decrease in the maximum corrected visual acuity and even rejection of the corneal graft.
data.target_sentence: Infectious keratitis is known to be a major complication after corneal transplantation, and can lead to reduced maximal corrected visual acuity and even rejection of the corneal transplant.

data.source_sentence: 수술 후의 감염성 각막염 발생 비율은 선진국에서는 1.8-7.4%, 개발도상국에서는 11.9-25.0% 정도 발생한다고 알려져 있다.

data.target_sentence: The incidence of postoperative infectious keratitis is known to be 1.8-7.4% in developed countries and 11.9-25.0% in developing countries.

data.source_sentence: 수술 후 안내염의 발생비율은 비록 매우 적으나 발생 시 이식편 거부반응 및 안전수지 이하의 불량한 시력 예후를 보이며 각막이식술 환자 중 약 0.018-0.68%에서 발생하는 것으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Although the incidence of postoperative inflammation is very small, it is known to occur in about 0.018-0.68% of corneal transplant patients with graft rejection and poor vision prognosis below the safety balance.
data.target_sentence: Although the incidence of postoperative inflammation is very low, it is known that it occurs in about 0.018-0.68% of corneal transplant patients with poor visual prognosis, less than the balance between transplant rejection and safety.

data.source_sentence: 따라서 수술 성공률을 높이고 좋은 시력 예후를 위해서는 감염성 각막염 및 안내염의 발생을 최소화하는 것이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Therefore, it is important to minimize the occurrence of infectious corneal inflammation and guided inflammation in order to increase the success rate of surgery and have a good vision prognosis.

data.source_sentence: 이에 저자들은 한국인 대상의 각막이식 수술 중 기증각막과 관련해 시행한 미생물학적 검사에서 동정된 균주의 종류 및 항생제 감수성 검사 결과에 대해 고찰하고자 하였다.

data.target_sentence: Accordingly, the authors attempted to examine the types of strains identified in microbiological tests and the results of antibiotic susceptibility tests in relation to corneas donated during corneal transplantation in Koreans.

data.source_sentence: 2008년 10월부터 2020년 12월까지 본원에서 각막이식을 받은 환자 중 기증각막 관련 미생물학적 검사를 시행한 94명 114안을 대상으로 의무기록을 후향적으로 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: From October 2008 to December 2020, we retrospectively analyzed the medical records of 114 eyes of 94 patients who underwent a corneal transplant at our hospital, who underwent a microbiological test related to the donor cornea.
data.target_sentence: From October 2008 to December 2020, we retrospectively analyzed the medical records of 114 eyes of 94 patients who underwent a donor corneal microbiological test at our hospital.

data.source_sentence: 이식 대상자의 선정은 본원의 각막이식 대기자 장부에 등재된 순서대로 연락하여 이식 수술을 받겠다는 의사를 밝힌 환자를 대상자로 선정하였고 각막은 48시간 이내에 이식되었다.
data.mt_sentence: For the selection of transplant recipients, patients who expressed their intention to undergo transplantation by contacting them in the order listed in the cornea transplant waiting list of our hospital were selected as recipients, and the cornea was transplanted within 48 hours.
data.target_sentence: For the selection of transplant recipients, we selected patients who expressed their intention to transplant by contacting them in the order on the waiting list for corneal transplantation at our hospital, and transplanted the cornea within 48 hours.

data.source_sentence: 모든 수술은 전신마취 하에 시행되었고 수술 시 기증각막편은 수여각막 절제보다 0.25 mm 크게 하거나 동일한 크기로 시행하는 것을 원칙으로 하였으며 단속봉합을 하거나 단속봉합과 연속봉합을 병행하여 시행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: All surgeries were performed under general anesthesia, and in principle, donated corneas were performed at the same size or 0.25 mm larger than the confluent corneal resection during surgery, and intermittent sutures were performed or continuous sutures were performed at the same time.

data.source_sentence: 도말 검사 및 배양 검사에서 양성인 경우 항생제 감수성 검사를 시행하였다.

data.target_sentence: If the smear test and culture test were positive, antibiotic susceptibility test was performed.

data.source_sentence: 모든 약제는 본원 안과의 각막이식 환자 프로토콜에 의해 투약되었다.

data.source_sentence: 수술 중 시행한 공여자 각공막 테두리 도말 검사는 114안 중 2012년에 1안, 2014년에 2안으로, 총 3안(2.6%)에서 그람음성 간균이 검출되었고 그람양성 및 진균은 검출되지않았다.

data.source_sentence: 균이 발견된 모든 증례에서 수술 후 입원 기간 중 각막염이나 안내염은 발생하지 않았다.

data.source_sentence: 각막이식 수술의 성공률을 높이기 위해서는 이식 거부반응의 예방과 더불어 감염성 각막염 및 수술 후 안내염의 발생을 최소화하는 것이 중요하다.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 각막이식술 후 감염성 각막염이 발생한 경우 각막 반흔 및 한 달 이상의 지속적인 상피결손이 각각 39%에서 나타났으며 각막 신생혈관, 이식거부, 재이식거부, 천공 등의 합병증이 생겼음을 보고하였다.

data.target_sentence: AAA reported that corneal scarring and epithelial defects lasting more than 1 month occurred in 39% of infectious keratitis after corneal transplantation, and complications such as corneal neovascularization, transplant rejection, re-graft rejection, and perforation occurred.

data.source_sentence: 각막염으로 진단된 41안에서, 9개월간 경과 관찰 시 11안(26.8%)에서 2회 이상의 각막염이 발생하였고 22안(53.7%)에서 이식 거부반응을 보였다.

data.target_sentence: Of the 41 eyes diagnosed with keratitis, keratitis occurred twice or more after 9 months in 11 eyes (26.8%), and graft rejection was observed in 22 eyes (53.7%).

data.source_sentence: AAA는 1999년부터 2006년까지 각막이식술을 받은 11,320안을 대상으로 수술 후 안내염 발생을 분석하여 안내염이 생긴 경우 이식편의 5년 생존율이 27%로 매우 낮음을 보고하였다.

data.source_sentence: 따라서 각막 적출, 재단 및 이식 시에 각막염이나 안내염을 야기할 수 있는 오염을 최소화하는 것이 수술 성공률을 높이는 데 중요하다고 생각된다.

data.source_sentence: 저자들의 연구에서는 균이 동정된 4안 모두 항생제 감수성 검사에서 colistin 외의 다른 항생제에 다약제 내성 소견을 보였으나 다행히 각막염 및 안내염이 발병하지 않아 기존 처방을 유지하였다.

data.source_sentence: 임상 경과에서 이러한 감염 소견이 있을 경우 항생제 감수성 검사 결과를 참고하여 적절한 항생제를 투여하는 치료가 필요하리라 생각된다.

data.source_sentence: 문헌들에 따르면 소독을 비롯한 다른 처치 없이 기증자 각공막 테두리에 대한 도말 검사를 하였을 경우 52-100%의 오염률을 보였다.

data.source_sentence: 이와 달리 기증자의 패혈증과 각막이식에서의 오염이 유의한 연관성이 없다는 연구 결과들도 있고 AAA는 오염된 보존액에서 동정된 균과 기증자에게서 패혈증을 유발한 균에 있어 유의한 연관성이 없음을 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In contrast, there are studies showing that there is no significant association between donor sepsis and contamination in corneal transplantation, and AAA reported that there is no significant association between the identified bacteria in the contaminated preservation solution and the bacteria that caused sepsis in the donor.

data.source_sentence: 각막이식술 후 진균 감염은 10,000안 중 1.4안에서 발생하는 것으로 보고될 정도로 매우 드물지만 심각한 합병증을 유발할 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 각막 내피 손상을 일으키지 않고 효과적으로 진균을 억제할 수 있는 적절한 농도에 대해서는 추가적인 연구가 필요할 것으로 생각한다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 단일 기관을 대상으로 한 후향적 연구라는 제한점이 있다.

data.target_sentence: This study has limitations in that it is a retrospective study targeting a single institution.

data.source_sentence: 균주가 동정되었을 경우 임상 소견 및 항생제 감수성 검사 결과를 고려하여 적절한 약제를 선택하여야 할 것이다.
