data.mt_sentence: The purpose of this study was to investigate the microorganisms identified in the microbiological tests performed on donor corneas and their clinical significance.
data.target_sentence: The purpose of this study is to investigate the microorganisms identified in the microbiological examination of donor corneas and their clinical significance.

data.source_sentence: 본 병원에서 2008년 10월부터 2020년 12월까지 각막이식을 받은 환자 중 기증각막 관련 미생물학적 검사를 시행한 94명 114안을 대상으로 의무기록을 후향적으로 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: We retrospectively analyzed the medical records of 114 eyes of 94 patients who underwent a donor cornea-related microbiological examination among patients who underwent corneal transplantation from October 2008 to December 2020 at this hospital.
data.target_sentence: We retrospectively analyzed the medical records of 114 eyes of 94 patients who underwent corneal transplantation at this hospital from October 2008 to December 2020 and underwent donor corneal microbiological testing.

data.source_sentence: 미생물 검사에서 균이 동정된 경우는 모두 국내 기증각막이었고 수입한 각막에서는 검출되지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: All cases in which bacteria were identified in microbial tests were domestic donated cornea, and were not detected in imported cornea.
data.target_sentence: All cases in which bacteria were identified in the microbiological test were donated corneas in Korea and were not detected in imported corneas.

data.source_sentence: 항생제 감수성 검사에서 Colistin 이외의 다른 항균제에 다약제 내성을 가지고 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: Antibacterial susceptibility tests showed multidrug resistance to antibacterial agents other than Colistin.
data.target_sentence: Antimicrobial susceptibility testing showed multidrug resistance to antimicrobial agents other than colistin.

data.source_sentence: 균이 발견된 모든 증례에서 각막이식 수술 후 각막염이나 안내염은 발생하지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: No keratitis or endophthalmitis occurred after corneal transplantation in all cases in which bacteria were found.
data.target_sentence: In all cases in which bacteria were found, no keratitis or endophthalmitis occurred after corneal transplantation.

data.source_sentence: 각막이식술 시 사용하는 기증각막 또는 보존액에서 드물지만 균이 동정되는 경우가 있으므로 기증각막을 다루는 모든 과정에서 오염에 주의하여야 하겠다.
data.mt_sentence: Although rare in the donated cornea or preservative solution used during corneal transplantation, bacteria may be identified, so contamination should be careful in all processes dealing with the donated cornea.
data.target_sentence: Although donated corneas or preservatives used for corneal transplantation are rare, bacteria can be identified, so care must be taken to avoid contamination during all handling of donated corneas.

data.source_sentence: 구강 질환은 전 세계적으로 심각한 건강 및 경제적 부담을 야기하여 사람들의 삶의 질을 크게 저하시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: Oral disease causes serious health and economic burdens around the world, greatly degrading people's quality of life.
data.target_sentence: Oral diseases cause serious health and economic burdens worldwide, significantly reducing people's quality of life.

data.source_sentence: 구강질환인 치아우식증은 S. mutans에 의해 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: Oral disease, dental caries, is caused by S. mutans.
data.target_sentence: Dental caries, an oral disease, is caused by S. mutans.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구의 목적은 구강 질환을 조절하기 위해서 대나무 잎 추출물(BLE)의 항산화 및 항균 효과를 조사하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The purpose of this study is to investigate the antioxidant and antibacterial effects of bamboo leaf extract (BLE) to control oral diseases.
data.target_sentence: The purpose of this study was to investigate the antioxidant and antibacterial effects of bamboo leaf extract (BLE) in modulating oral disease.

data.source_sentence: 그 결과 단핵세포주와 구강섬유아세포에서 BLE 농도에 따른 항산화 효과를 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result, the antioxidant effect according to the BLE concentration was confirmed in mononuclear cell lines and oral fibroblasts.
data.target_sentence: As a result, the antioxidant effect according to the BLE concentration was confirmed in mononuclear cell lines and oral fibroblasts.

data.source_sentence: BLE가 구강질환의 예방 또는 치료에 사용될 수 있음을 시사한다.
data.mt_sentence: It suggests that BLE can be used for the prevention or treatment of oral diseases.
data.target_sentence: This suggests that BLE could be used for the prevention or treatment of oral diseases.

data.source_sentence: 사람의 구강에는 약 700여 종의 미생물들이 서식하고 있으며 치아우식증 및 치주질환과 같은 다양한 구강질환과 밀접한 관련이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: About 700 types of microorganisms inhabit the human oral cavity and are closely related to various oral diseases such as dental caries and periodontal disease.
data.target_sentence: About 700 types of microorganisms inhabit the human oral cavity, and are closely related to various oral diseases such as tooth decay and periodontal disease.

data.source_sentence: 구강질환은 전 세계적으로 가장 만연한 질병 중 하나로 심각한 건강 및 경제적 부담을 야기하고 사람들의 삶의 질을 크게 저하시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: Oral disease is one of the most prevalent diseases in the world, causing serious health and economic burdens and significantly degrading people's quality of life.
data.target_sentence: Oral disease is one of the most prevalent diseases worldwide, causing serious health and economic burdens and significantly lowering the quality of life.

data.source_sentence: 치주질환을 일으키는 미생물은 Porphy 등과 관련이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The microorganisms that cause periodontal disease are related to Porphy and the like.
data.target_sentence: The microorganisms that cause periodontal disease are related to porphys and the like.

data.source_sentence: 이들 대부분의 병원성 미생물은 대식세포, 수지상세포 등의 면역 세포를 활성화할 수 있는 지질다당류(lipopolysaccharide, LPS)를 갖고 있어 면역반응이 일어나면서 구강 질환을 유발할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Most of these pathogenic microorganisms have lipopolysaccharide (LPS) that can activate immune cells, such as macrophages and dendritic cells, and thus can cause oral disease as an immune response occurs.
data.target_sentence: Most of these pathogenic microorganisms have lipopolysaccharide (LPS) that can activate immune cells, such as macrophages and dendritic cells, and thus can cause oral diseases as an immune response occurs.

data.source_sentence: 구강 질환을 예방 및 치료하는 방법으로는 스케일링이나 칫솔질을 이용하여 물리적으로 미생물을 제거하거나 화학제재를 이용하는 방법이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As a method of preventing and treating oral diseases, there is a method of physically removing microorganisms using scaling or brushing or using a chemical agent.
data.target_sentence: As a method of preventing and treating oral diseases, there is a method of physically removing microorganisms by using scaling or brushing or using chemicals.

data.source_sentence: 최근 들어 인체에 대한 위해작용 및 내성 등의 부작용에 대한 우려로 안전하게 사용할 수 있는 천연물에 대한 관심이 높아지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, interest in natural products that can be used safely is increasing due to concerns over side effects such as harmful effects and resistance to the human body.
data.target_sentence: Recently, interest in natural products that can be safely used is increasing due to concerns about side effects such as toxicity and tolerance to the human body.

data.source_sentence: 대나무(Bamboo)는 다년생 식물로 한국, 중국, 일본, 러시아를 비롯한 아시아 국가에 널리 분포되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Bamboo is a perennial plant that is widely distributed in Asian countries, including Korea, China, Japan, and Russia.
data.target_sentence: Bamboo is a perennial plant widely distributed in Asian countries such as Korea, China, Japan, and Russia.

data.source_sentence: 대나무 잎 추출물(bamboo leaves extract, BLE)은 플라보노이드, 폴리페놀 및 활성 다당류와 같은 활성 성분이 포함되어 있고 항염, 항지방생성, 항산화, 항염 및 항균 효과가 있는 것으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Bamboo leaves extract (BLE) contains active ingredients such as flavonoids, polyphenols, and active polysaccharides, and is known to have anti-inflammatory, anti-fat production, antioxidant, anti-inflammatory and antibacterial effects.
data.target_sentence: Bamboo leaf extract (BLE) contains active ingredients such as flavonoids, polyphenols, and active polysaccharides, and is known to have anti-inflammatory, anti-lipogenic, antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and antibacterial effects.

data.source_sentence: 이전 연구에서 BLE를 양치액으로 사용하면 구강 병원성미생물이 현저히 감소한 것으로 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In a previous study, it was reported that oral pathogenic microorganisms were significantly reduced when BLE was used as a gargle.
data.target_sentence: In a previous study, it was reported that oral pathogenic microorganisms were significantly reduced when BLE was used as a gargle.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 사람 유래 면역세포와 구강섬유모세포에 LPS를 자극해서 BLE의 항산화를 검증하고 치아우식증을 일으킨다고 알려진 대표 균주인 S. mutans에서 BLE의 항균 효과를 규명하고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, we tried to verify the antioxidant effect of BLE by stimulating LPS in human-derived immune cells and oral fibroblasts, and to investigate the antibacterial effect of BLE in S. mutans, a representative strain known to cause dental caries.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the antioxidant effect of BLE was verified by stimulating LPS in human-derived immune cells and oral fibroblasts, and the antibacterial effect of BLE was investigated in S. mutans, a representative strain known to induce tooth decay.

data.source_sentence: 여과된 추출물은 감압농축기를 이용하여 농축하고 동결건조 후 보관하였으며 인간 단핵세포주인 THP-1은 한국세포주은행에서 분양받았다.
data.mt_sentence: The filtered extract was concentrated using a vacuum concentrator, lyophilized, and stored. THP-1, a human mononuclear cell line, was sold from the Korea Cell Line Bank.
data.target_sentence: The filtered extract was concentrated using a vacuum concentrator, then lyophilized and stored. THP-1, a human mononuclear cell line, was sold at the Korea Cell Line Bank.

data.source_sentence: 단핵세포주에서의 추출물 농도에 따른 항산화 효과에 대해 서술하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The antioxidant effect according to the concentration of extracts in mononuclear cell lines is to be described.
data.target_sentence: The antioxidant effect according to the concentration of the extract in mononuclear cell lines is described.

data.source_sentence: hTERT-hNOF에서 댓잎추출물의 항산화 효과를 확인하기 위해서 세포에 LPS로 염증을 유도하고 댓잎추출물을 농도별로 처리하여 ROS 변화를 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to confirm the antioxidant effect of bamboo leaf extracts in hTER-hNOF, inflammation of cells with LPS was induced and bamboo leaf extracts were treated by concentration to confirm the ROS change.
data.target_sentence: To confirm the antioxidant effect of bamboo leaf extract in hTER-hNOF, cell inflammation was induced with LPS and ROS change was confirmed by concentrating the bamboo leaf extract.

data.source_sentence: 그 결과 LPS 자극에 의해 증가된 ROS의 발현이 댓잎추출물을 0.5, 1, 2%로 처리하였을 때 감소한 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result, it was found that the expression of ROS increased by LPS stimulation decreased when the bamboo leaf extract was treated at 0.5, 1, and 2%.
data.target_sentence: As a result, it was found that when the bamboo leaf extract was treated with 0.5, 1, or 2%, the expression of ROS increased by LPS stimulation was decreased.

data.source_sentence: 댓잎추출물이 치아우식증을 일으키는 대표 균주인 S. mutans에 대한 항균 효과에 영향을 미치는지 조사했다.
data.mt_sentence: It was investigated whether bamboo leaf extract affects the antibacterial effect on S. mutans, a representative strain that causes dental caries.
data.target_sentence: It was investigated whether bamboo leaf extract had an effect on the antibacterial effect on S. mutans, a representative strain that induces tooth decay.

data.source_sentence: S. mutans를 단독으로 배양했을 때보다 댓잎추출물과 같이 배양한 시료에서 균 성장이 유의적으로 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Compared to when S. mutans were cultured alone, bacterial growth was significantly reduced in samples cultured with bamboo leaf extracts.
data.target_sentence: Bacterial growth was significantly reduced in samples cultured with bamboo leaf extract compared to when S. mutans was cultured alone.

data.source_sentence: 사람들의 삶의 질이 향상되고 수명이 연장됨에 따라 구강 건강에 대한 관심도가 높아지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As people's quality of life improves and their lifespan is extended, interest in oral health is increasing.
data.target_sentence: As people's quality of life improves and their life expectancy increases, there is a growing interest in oral health.

data.source_sentence: 대부분의 구강질환은 구강 병원 미생물 감염에 의해 발생하며 전신 건강과도 밀접한 관련이 있는 것으로 보고되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Most oral diseases are caused by microbial infections in oral hospitals and are reported to be closely related to systemic health.
data.target_sentence: Most oral diseases are caused by microbial infection in oral hospitals and are reported to be closely related to general health.

data.source_sentence: LPS는 그람 음성세균의 핵심 병독력인자로 다양한 염증-매개물질을 유도하여 단핵구/대식세포, 림프구와 같은 면역세포를 질환 부위로 몰려오게 한다.
data.mt_sentence: LPS is a key virulence factor of Gram-negative bacteria and induces various inflammation-mediators to attract immune cells such as monocytes/macrophages and lymphocytes to the disease site.
data.target_sentence: LPS is a major virulence factor in Gram-negative bacteria and induces various inflammatory mediators to attract immune cells such as monocytes/macrophages and lymphocytes to the disease site.

data.source_sentence: ROS를 조절하는 방어기전으로 항산화 효소들이 존재하고 질병의 발생은 항상성이 이들 사이에서 깨지게 되면 증가하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Antioxidant enzymes exist as a defense mechanism that regulates ROS, and the occurrence of disease increases when homeostasis breaks between them.
data.target_sentence: Antioxidant enzymes exist as defense mechanisms regulating ROS, and when the homeostasis between them is disrupted, the incidence of disease increases.

data.source_sentence: 구강 섬유모세포인 hTERT-hNOF는 치주 조직의 치유와 재생에 중요하며 ROS에 의한 조직 파괴를 BLE가 억제할 수 있는지 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Oral fibroblasts, hTERT-hNOF, are important for the healing and regeneration of periodontal tissue, and it was confirmed whether BLE could inhibit tissue destruction by ROS.
data.target_sentence: Oral fibroblasts, hTERT-hNOF, are important for the healing and regeneration of periodontal tissue, and it was confirmed whether BLE could inhibit tissue destruction by ROS.

data.source_sentence: 구강질환 중에서 치아우식증을 일으키는 S. mutans을 대표해서 BLE의 항균 효과를 관찰하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Among oral diseases, the antibacterial effect of BLE was observed on behalf of S. mutans who cause dental caries.
data.target_sentence: The antibacterial effect of BLE was observed instead of S. mutans, which causes tooth decay among oral diseases.

data.source_sentence: 이전 연구에서 한국인 대상으로 BLE를 양치액을 사용해 본 결과 구강 병원 미생물의 수가 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In a previous study, the number of oral pathogenic microorganisms decreased as a result of using BLE as a mouthwash in Korean subjects.
data.target_sentence: In a previous study, as a result of using BLE as a mouthwash in Korean subjects, the number of oral pathogenic microorganisms decreased.

data.source_sentence: S.mutans를 단독으로 배양해서 BLE의 직접적인 항균효과를 보았을 때 유의적으로 박테리아 성장이 억제되는 것을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When S.mutans were cultured alone and the direct antibacterial effect of BLE was seen, it was confirmed that bacterial growth was significantly suppressed.
data.target_sentence: When S. mutans was cultured alone to see the direct antibacterial effect of BLE, it was confirmed that bacterial proliferation was significantly inhibited.

data.source_sentence: BLE 이외에도 오래전부터 천연 유래 물질을 이용하여 각종 질병을 예방하고 치료하기 위한 연구가 진행되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition to BLE, research has long been conducted to prevent and treat various diseases using natural substances.
data.target_sentence: In addition to BLE, research has been conducted for a long time to prevent and treat various diseases using natural products.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 BLE의 항산화 현상을 보여주었고 기전에 대한 연구가 부족하다.
data.mt_sentence: First, it showed the antioxidant phenomenon of BLE, and studies on the mechanism are lacking.
data.target_sentence: First, it shows the antioxidant phenomenon of BLE, and studies on its mechanism are lacking.

data.source_sentence: 이는 누에 추출물과 여주 추출물이 구강질병의 예방 및 치료들 위한 소재로 사용될 수 있는 가능성을 시사한다.
data.mt_sentence: This suggests the possibility that silkworm extract and bitter gourd extract can be used as materials for the prevention and treatment of oral diseases.
data.target_sentence: This suggests the possibility that silkworm extract and bitter gourd extract can be used as materials for preventing and treating oral diseases.

data.source_sentence: 구강 미생물에 의한 감염성 질환인 치아우식증과 치주질환은 가장 대표적인 구강질환으로 사람들의 삶의 질을 크게 저하시키며 건강과 경제적 부담을 야기시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: Dental amnias and periodontal diseases, which are infectious diseases caused by oral microorganisms, are the most representative oral diseases, greatly reducing people's quality of life and causing health and economic burdens.
data.target_sentence: Amniotic membrane disease and periodontal disease, which are infectious diseases caused by oral microorganisms, are the most representative oral diseases, significantly lowering the quality of life of the people and giving health and economic burdens.

data.source_sentence: S. mutans는 구강 내 상주균으로 치아 표면에 부착, 증식하여 젖산을 생성하고 치아의 법랑질을 탈회시켜 치아우식증을 유발한다.
data.mt_sentence: S. mutans is a resident bacteria in the oral cavity that attaches to and proliferates on the tooth surface to produce lactic acid and demineralize tooth enamel, causing dental caries.
data.target_sentence: S. mutans is a bacterium that resides in the oral cavity and attaches to and proliferates on the tooth surface to produce lactic acid and demineralize the tooth enamel to cause tooth decay.

data.source_sentence: 점액성분의 물에 녹지 않는 다당류를 합성하여 치아의 표면에 다른 세균과 공동으로 치면세균막을 형성한다.
data.mt_sentence: Polysaccharides that are not soluble in mucus-based water are synthesized and hit jointly with other bacteria on the surface of the tooth to form a bacterial membrane.
data.target_sentence: Polysaccharides that are insoluble in mucus water are synthesized and combined with other bacteria on the tooth surface to form a bacterial film.

data.source_sentence: 치주질환은 치은연상과 치은연하에 인접한 치아표면에 축적된 치면세균막에 서식하는 세균의 활동에 의해 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: Periodontal disease is caused by the activity of bacteria living in the dental plaque accumulated on the surface of the teeth adjacent to the supragingival and subgingival period.
data.target_sentence: Periodontal disease is caused by the activity of bacteria living in plaque accumulated on the surface of the teeth adjacent to the upper and lower gingiva.

data.source_sentence: 치면세균막에 서식하는 세균의 주요 내독소인lipolysaccharide(LPS)는 치주조직에서 염증 반응을 유발하고 이 염증 반응에 의해 치주조직에서는 면역세포들에 의한 면역 반응이 일어난다.
data.mt_sentence: Lipolysaccharide (LPS), a major endotoxin of bacteria living in the dental plaque, induces an inflammatory response in the periodontal tissue, and the immune response by immune cells occurs in the periodontal tissue by this inflammatory response.
data.target_sentence: Lipolysaccharide (LPS), a major endotoxin of bacteria living in plaque, induces an inflammatory response in the periodontal tissue, and an immune response by immune cells occurs in the periodontal tissue by this inflammatory response.

data.source_sentence: 염증매개인자들과 기질파괴효소들이 이러한 염증-면역 반응과정에서 다양하게 발현되어 치은조직 내부의 세포 외기질의 파괴가 나타나고 심화되면 치은염, 치주염과 같은 질환이 발생하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Inflammation mediators and substrate destruction enzymes are expressed in various ways during this inflammatory-immune reaction, resulting in the destruction of the extracellular matrix inside the gingivitis, and when it intensifies, diseases such as gingivitis and periodontitis occur.
data.target_sentence: During this inflammation-immune reaction, various inflammatory mediators and matrix-destroying enzymes are expressed to destroy the extracellular matrix inside gingivitis, and when this intensifies, diseases such as gingivitis and periodontitis occur.

data.source_sentence: F. nucleatum은 초기와 후기 사이의 colony 형성 집합체를 형성하고 혐기성 미생물의 치면세균막 발생에 필요한 조건들을 만들어 주며 중증의 치주질환의 원인이 되는 병원성 세균의 집합체 형성에 중요한 중재자 역할을 한다.

Development of new types of anticancer drugs.

data.mt_sentence: There are about 700 species of microorganisms in the human oral cavity, and it is known to directly or indirectly affect non-oral diseases such as diabetes as well as intra-oral diseases such as periodontal diseases.

data.source_sentence: 구강 미생물 균총은 다양한 종류의 암의 발생에 관여하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Oral microbial spasms are involved in the development of various types of cancer.
data.target_sentence: Oral microbial spasms are involved in the development of various types of cancer.

data.source_sentence: 구강암은 세계에서 여섯 번째로 흔한 암으로 개발도상국에서 높은 발병률을 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: Oral cancer is the sixth most common cancer in the world, with a high incidence in developing countries.
data.target_sentence: Oral cancer is the sixth most common cancer in the world, with a high incidence in developing countries.

data.source_sentence: 구강암 발생의 주된 원인으로 알려진 담배, 술, 빈랑(betel nut chewing) 등의 식이 및 생활 습관이 세계 흡연자의 80%가 살고 있는 개발도상국과 같은 일부 국가에서 나타나는 높은 OSCC 발병률을 설명할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Dietary and lifestyle habits such as cigarettes, alcohol, and betel nut chewing, which are known to be the main causes of oral cancer, can explain the high incidence of OSCC in some countries, such as developing countries, where 80% of the world's smokers live.
data.target_sentence: Dietary and lifestyle habits such as chewing tobacco, alcohol, and betel nut, known as major causes of oral cancer, may explain the high incidence of OSCC in some countries, including developing countries, where 80% of smokers worldwide smoke live.

data.source_sentence: 특히 구강암 발생에 있어서 구강 미생물 균총의 역할이 주목받고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, the role of oral microbial bacteria in the occurrence of oral cancer is drawing attention.
data.target_sentence: In particular, the role of oral bacteria in the development of oral cancer is attracting attention.

data.source_sentence: 이는 구강암 발생에 있어서 구강 미생물 균총이 주요한 요인으로 작용할 수 있음을 시사한다.
data.mt_sentence: This suggests that oral microbial bacteria can act as a major factor in the occurrence of oral cancer.
data.target_sentence: This suggests that oral bacteria may act as a major factor in the development of oral cancer.

data.source_sentence: P. gingivalis는 식도암, 대장암, 췌장암뿐만 아니라 만성 치주질환과 구강암 발생에 관여하는 주요한 병원균으로 알려져 있으며 특히 OSCC 환자의 낮은 생존율과 연관이 있는 것으로 확인된다.
data.mt_sentence: P. gingivalis is known to be a major pathogen involved in the development of chronic periodontal disease and oral cancer as well as esophageal cancer, colon cancer, and pancreatic cancer, and is particularly associated with low survival rates in OSCC patients.
data.target_sentence: P. gingivalis is known to be a major pathogen involved in the pathogenesis of esophageal, colon, and pancreatic cancer, as well as chronic periodontal disease and oral cancer, and is particularly associated with low survival rates in patients with OSCC.

data.source_sentence: 염증과 암 치료제의 타겟으로 고려되고 있는 P2X7과 ATP와의 결합을 방해하면 세포자살이 억제되고 세포성장, 신생혈관 생성, 전이(meta-stasis) 및 염증성 사이토카인의 분비가 촉진된다고 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Disrupting the binding of P2X7 and ATP, which are considered targets for inflammatory and cancer treatments, is known to inhibit apoptosis and promote cell growth, neovascular production, meta-stasis, and secretion of inflammatory cytokines.
data.target_sentence: Interfering with the binding of P2X7 to ATP, which is considered a target for inflammation and cancer therapy, is known to inhibit apoptosis and promote cell growth, angiogenesis, metastasis and inflammatory cytokine secretion.

data.source_sentence: 최근 연구들은 장내 미생물 균총이 전신 면역 반응의 조절과 환자에 대한 방사선 요법과 면역항암요법의 치료 효과에 중요한 영향을 미치고 있음을 보여주고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recent studies have shown that intestinal microbiota has an important effect on the control of systemic immune response and the therapeutic effect of radiation therapy and immuno-cancer therapy on patients.
data.target_sentence: Recent studies have shown that the gut microbiota has a significant impact on the modulation of the systemic immune response and the therapeutic effectiveness of radiation therapy and immunocancer therapy in patients.

data.source_sentence: 장내 미생물 균총 외에도 화학요법과 면역항암요법에 대한 내성에 구강 미생물 균총이 관여하고 있는 것으로 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition to intestinal microbial bacteria, oral microbial bacteria appear to be involved in resistance to chemotherapy and immuno-cancer therapy.
data.target_sentence: In addition to gut microbiota, oral microbes appear to be involved in resistance to chemotherapy and immunotherapy cancer treatments.

data.source_sentence: 방사선 치료는 항암 치료에 있어서 필수적이지만 치료 효과는 환자마다 상당한 차이를 보이는 것으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Radiation therapy is essential for anti-cancer treatment, but it is known that the treatment effect varies significantly from patient to patient.
data.target_sentence: Radiation therapy is essential for chemotherapy, but it is known that the therapeutic effect varies greatly from patient to patient.

data.source_sentence: 최근 연구는 장내 미생물 균총이 전신 면역 반응의 조절에 관여하고 있으며 결과적으로 환자의 방사선 화학요법(chemotherapy)과 표적치료제(targeted therapy) 화학요법은 미생물 균총의 불균형을 유발하며 이는 화학요법의 치료 효과와 부작용에 부정적으로 영향을 미친다.
data.mt_sentence: Recent studies have shown that intestinal microbiota is involved in the control of systemic immune responses, and as a result, radiation chemotherapy and targeted therapy in patients cause imbalance in microbiota, which negatively affects the treatment effect and side effects of chemotherapy.
data.target_sentence: Recent studies have shown that the gut microbiota is involved in the regulation of the systemic immune response, and as a result, radiation chemotherapy and targeted therapy in patients cause an imbalance in the microbiota, which negatively affects the therapeutic effect and side effects of chemotherapy. It turned out to be true.

data.source_sentence: 특히 미생물 균총의 불균형에 의해 야기된 특정균의 과도한 증식이 화학요법에 대해 내성을 유도하는 것으로 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, it has been shown that excessive proliferation of specific bacteria caused by imbalance of microbial flora induces resistance to chemotherapy.
data.target_sentence: In particular, it has been shown that excessive proliferation of certain bacteria due to imbalance of microflora induces resistance to chemotherapy.

data.source_sentence: 다양한 종류의 암의 성장과 전이 과정에 관여하고 있는 것으로 알려진 F. nucleatum이 자가포식과정을 활성화시킴으로써 화학요법에 의해 유도되는 암세포의 사멸을 억제하고 이를 통해 대장암에서 화학요법에 대한 내성을 유도하는 것으로 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: It has been confirmed that F. nucleatum, known to be involved in various types of cancer growth and metastasis processes, inhibits the death of chemotherapy-induced cancer cells by activating autophagy processes, thereby inducing resistance to chemotherapy in colon cancer.
data.target_sentence: F. nucleatum, known to be involved in the growth and metastasis of various types of cancer, has been shown to induce chemotherapy resistance in colorectal cancer by activating the autophagy process to inhibit chemotherapy-induced cancer cell death.

data.source_sentence: 흥미롭게도 장내 미생물 균총으로부터 생성된 SCFAs와 같은 대사 산물이 화학요법에 대한 치료 효과의 향상에 기여할 수 있는 것으로 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Interestingly, it has been reported that metabolites such as SCFAs generated from the intestinal microflora may contribute to the enhancement of the therapeutic effect on chemotherapy.
data.target_sentence: Interestingly, it has been reported that metabolites such as SCFAs produced in the gut microbiota may contribute to the enhancement of the therapeutic effect on chemotherapy.

data.source_sentence: 마찬가지로 유방암에서 HDAC2의 과발현이 암세포의 전이와 항암제 내성과 관련된 유전자(multidrug resistance gene)의 발현을 향상시키고 있으며 HDAC2 양성 유방암은 anthracyclines를 포함한 화학요법 치료를 받은 환자의 낮은 생존율과 관련이 있는 것으로 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Similarly, HDAC2 overexpression in breast cancer improves the expression of genes associated with metastasis of cancer cells and anticancer drug resistance, and HDAC2 benign breast cancer has been found to be associated with low survival rates in patients treated with chemotherapy, including anthracyclines.
data.target_sentence: Similarly, HDAC2 overexpression in breast cancer was found to improve the expression of genes associated with cancer cell metastasis and anticancer drug resistance, and HDAC2-positive breast cancer was found to be associated with lower survival rates in patients treated with anthracycline-containing chemotherapy.

data.source_sentence: 이렇게 화학요법의 치료 효과를 낮추는 데 관여하고 있는 HDAC2의 발현이 미생물 균총으로부터 생성된 SCFAs를 통해 억제되고 있으며 따라서 장내 미생물 균총이 손상된 암환자의 경우 HDAC 억제제의 투여가 제안되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The expression of HDAC2, which is involved in lowering the therapeutic effect of chemotherapy, is suppressed through SCFAs generated from microbial spores, and therefore, HDAC inhibitors are proposed for cancer patients with intestinal microbial spores damaged.
data.target_sentence: As the expression of HDAC2, which is implicated in lowering the therapeutic effect of chemotherapy, is inhibited via SCFAs produced by microbial spores, HDAC inhibitors are suggested for cancer patients with impaired intestinal microbial spores.

data.source_sentence: 미생물 균총의 불균형과 미생물 균총으로부터 숙주를 방어하기 위한 면역반응의 불균형이 만성 염증, 악성 변형과 같은 병리학적 결과를 초래할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Imbalance of the microbial flora and the immune response to defend the host from the microbial flora can lead to pathological consequences such as chronic inflammation and malignant transformation.
data.target_sentence: Imbalance of the microbiome and the immune response to defend the host against the microbiome can lead to pathological consequences such as chronic inflammation and malignant transformation.

data.source_sentence: 환자의 억제된 면역체계를 활성화하는 접근법은 혈액암과 고형암에서 유의미한 임상효과를 보여주었지만 암환자의 상당수가 ICI에 내성을 나타내거나, 일시적으로 반응하는 것으로 보고되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The approach to activating the patient's suppressed immune system has shown significant clinical effects in blood and solid cancers, but it has been reported that many cancer patients are resistant to ICI or respond temporarily.
data.target_sentence: Approaches to activate a patient's suppressed immune system have shown significant clinical efficacy in hematological and solid cancers, but many cancer patients are reported to be resistant or transiently responsive to ICI.

data.source_sentence: ICI에 대한 반응자(responder)와 비반응자(non-respon-der)는 장내 미생물 균총의 구성에 차이가 있으며 이를 통해 잠재적으로 ICI 치료 효과에 대한 유익균과 유해균을 분류할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Responders and non-responders to ICI differ in the composition of the intestinal microbiota, which can potentially classify beneficial bacteria and harmful bacteria for the therapeutic effect of ICI.
data.target_sentence: Responders and non-responders to ICI differ in the composition of their gut microbiome, which can classify potentially beneficial and harmful bacteria for the therapeutic effect of ICI.

data.source_sentence: 미생물 균총의 구성이 쥐 모델 연구 결과에서도 확인되었으며 항생제가 처리된 무균쥐는 ICI 치료에 반응하지 않는다는 연구결과가 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The composition of microbial sphincters was also confirmed in mouse model studies, and studies have reported that antibiotic-treated aseptic mice do not respond to ICI treatment.
data.target_sentence: The composition of the microbial sphincter was also confirmed in a mouse model study, where it was reported that antibiotic-treated sterile mice did not respond to ICI treatment.

data.source_sentence: 항생제, 프로바이오틱스(probiotics) 등을 이용하여 장내 미생물 균총의 조작을 통해 면역관문억제제의 효능을 높이고 부작용을 줄임으로써 면역항암요법의 내성 문제를 해결할 수 있는 새로운 돌파구가 마련될 것으로 기대된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is expected that a new breakthrough will be prepared to solve the resistance problem of immunotherapy by increasing the efficacy of immune checkpoint inhibitors and reducing side effects through manipulation of the intestinal microflora using antibiotics and probiotics.
data.target_sentence: Through manipulation of the intestinal microflora using antibiotics and probiotics, it is expected that a new breakthrough will be prepared to solve the problem of resistance to immunotherapy by increasing the efficacy of immune checkpoint inhibitors and reducing side effects.

data.source_sentence: 숙주간의 유전, 면역, 대사 등의 차이는 암의 진단, 치료, 예후에 이르기까지 개인 맞춤화된 의학(personalized medicine)의 필요성을 시사한다.
data.mt_sentence: Differences in genetics, immunity, metabolism, etc. between hosts suggest the need for personalized medicine ranging from cancer diagnosis, treatment, and prognosis.
data.target_sentence: Differences in genetics, immunity, and metabolism between hosts suggest the need for personalized medicine from cancer diagnosis to treatment and prognosis.

data.source_sentence: 미생물 균총의 불균형과 이에 따른 종양미생물 균총의 과도한 증식은 만성염증과 악성변형을 초래하고 면역작용을 조절함으로써 발암 과정에 관여한다.
data.mt_sentence: Imbalance of the microbial flora and consequent excessive proliferation of the tumor microbial flora cause chronic inflammation and malignant transformation, and are involved in the carcinogenesis process by regulating the immune function.
data.target_sentence: Imbalance of the microbiota and consequently excessive proliferation of the tumor microbiota are involved in the carcinogenic process by causing chronic inflammation and malignant transformation and modulating immune function.

data.source_sentence: 미생물 균총의 세포 구성 성분과 유전독성 물질이 순환계를 통해 이동하여 다양한 기관에서 암의 발생을 초래할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Cell components and genotoxic substances in microbial sponges can move through the circulatory system, leading to cancer in various organs.
data.target_sentence: Cellular components and genotoxic substances in the microbial sponge can travel through the circulatory system and cause cancer in various organs.

data.source_sentence: 박테리아 외에도 미생물 균총을 구성하는 바이러스와 기생충이 암의 발생에 영향을 미치고 있으며 앞서 설명한 위장관암 외에도 자궁경부암, 유방암, 백혈병 등 다양한 종류의 암과 유의미한 상관관계를 보이는 것으로 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition to bacteria, viruses and parasites that make up the microbial spasms affect the occurrence of cancer, and in addition to gastrointestinal cancer described above, there is a significant correlation with various types of cancer such as cervical cancer, breast cancer, and leukemia.
data.target_sentence: In addition to bacteria, viruses and parasites constituting microbial spasm affect the occurrence of cancer, and in addition to the gastrointestinal cancer described above, there is a significant correlation with various cancers such as cervical cancer, breast cancer, and leukemia.

data.source_sentence: 암 발생에 관여하는 종양 미생물 균총의 구성이 연구마다 일치하지 않는 부분들이 존재하며 종양 미생물 균총의 발암 기전과 관련된 정확한 인과 관계에 대해 아직 많은 부분이 규명되지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: There are inconsistencies in the composition of the tumor microbiota involved in cancer development in each study, and the exact causal relationship related to the carcinogenic mechanism of the tumor microbiota has not yet been elucidated.

data.source_sentence: 진단, 치료 효과, 부작용 측면에서 암치료를 위한 미생물 균총 기반 접근방식에 불확실성이 존재하기 때문에 추가적인 비임상, 임상 연구와 메타분석(meta-analysis) 결과가 필요한 상황이다.
data.mt_sentence: Additional non-clinical and clinical studies and meta-analysis results are needed because there are uncertainties in the microbiota-based approach for cancer treatment in terms of diagnosis, therapeutic effect, and side effects.
data.target_sentence: Microbiota-based cancer treatment approaches are uncertain in terms of diagnosis, treatment effectiveness, and side effects, so additional non-clinical and clinical studies and meta-analysis results are needed.

data.source_sentence: 인간 미생물 균총은 장, 구강, 피부와 같이 체내외 다양한 부위에 존재하는 박테리아, 균류, 바이러스 등을 포함하는 미생물 집단이다.
data.mt_sentence: The human microbial flora is a group of microorganisms including bacteria, fungi, and viruses that exist in various parts of the body and outside the body, such as the intestine, oral cavity, and skin.
data.target_sentence: The human microbiota is a group of microbes, including bacteria, fungi, and viruses, that exist outside and in various parts of the body, including the gut, mouth, and skin.

data.source_sentence: ribosomal RNA에 대한 대사체 분석 및 차세대 염기서열 분석기술의 개발과 함께 살아 있는 유기체 내에 존재하는 미생물 균총에 대한 많은 연구가 진행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Along with the development of metabolic analysis and next-generation sequencing techniques for ribosomal RNA, many studies have been conducted on microbial bacteria present in living organisms.
data.target_sentence: With the development of metabolic analysis and next-generation sequencing technology for ribosomal RNA, many studies on microorganisms present in living organisms are being conducted.

data.source_sentence: 이에 따라, 미생물 균총이 숙주의 대사 및 면역과정과 복잡하게 연관되어 있음이 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Accordingly, it was confirmed that microbial bacteria were complexly related to the host's metabolism and immune process.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, it was confirmed that the microbial bacteria are complexly related to the metabolic and immune processes of the host.

data.source_sentence: 최근 미생물 균총 중에서도 구강과 장내에 존재하는 박테리아가 위장관암의 발암 과정과 항암제의 치료 효과에 상당한 영향을 미치고 있음이 여러 논문을 통해 보고되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, it has been reported through several papers that, among the microbial flora, bacteria present in the oral cavity and intestine significantly affect the carcinogenic process of gastrointestinal cancer and the therapeutic effect of anticancer drugs.
data.target_sentence: Several recent papers have reported that the bacteria present in the oral cavity and intestine among the microflora have a significant effect on the carcinogenic process of gastrointestinal cancer and the therapeutic effect of anticancer drugs.

data.source_sentence: 미생물 균총-암-면역계 사이의 복잡한 연관성과 미생물 균총 기반 발암 메커니즘에 대한 규명은 암에 대한 이해와 새로운 항암제 개발에 중요한 단서를 제공할 것으로 기대된다.
data.mt_sentence: The complex association between microbial sponges and cancer-immunity systems and the identification of microbial sponges-based carcinogens are expected to provide important clues to the understanding of cancer and the development of new anticancer drugs.
data.target_sentence: The complex association between the microbial sponge and the cancer immune system and the identification of microbial sponge-based carcinogens are expected to provide important clues to the understanding of cancer and the development of novel anticancer drugs.

data.source_sentence: 비만은 남녀노소를 가리지 않고 여러 가지 건강 문제를 일으킬 수 있는 주요 인자로서 한국뿐 아니라 세계적으로 급격하게 증가하며 인간의 건강을 위협하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Obesity is a major factor that can cause various health problems, regardless of age or gender, and is rapidly increasing not only in Korea but also around the world, threatening human health.
data.target_sentence: Obesity is a major factor that can cause various health problems regardless of age or gender, and it is rapidly increasing in Korea as well as around the world, threatening human health.

data.source_sentence: 비만은 여러 문제를 일으킬 수 있으며 고혈압, 제2형 당뇨병, 이상지질혈증의 발병은 체질량 지수에 비례하여 증가하는 경향이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Obesity can cause several problems, and the incidence of hypertension, type 2 diabetes, and dyslipidemia tends to increase in proportion to body mass index.
data.target_sentence: Obesity can cause several problems, and the incidence of hypertension, type 2 diabetes, and dyslipidemia tends to increase in proportion to body mass index.

data.source_sentence: 비만은 단순히 비만으로 그치는 것이 아니라 각종 질병의 원인이 될 수 있으며 정신적 문제까지 유발할 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 세균은 자기가 처한 다양한 상황에 적응하고 특별한 기능을 발휘할 시기를 결정하기 위해 매우 정교한 조절체계를 사용한다.
data.mt_sentence: Bacteria use very sophisticated regulatory systems to adapt to their various situations and determine when to perform special functions.
data.target_sentence: Bacteria use very sophisticated regulatory systems to adapt to different situations and determine when to perform special functions.

data.source_sentence: 세균은 인관과는 물론이고 곤충을 포함하는 동물과 식물 등 모든 셍명체와 공생관계를 이루고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Bacteria form a symbiotic relationship with all living organisms such as animals and plants, including insects, as well as with humans.
data.target_sentence: Bacteria form symbiotic relationships with humans and all living things, such as plants and animals, including insects.

data.source_sentence: 감염병 생물학에서는 인류가 겪은 역병으로 흑사병과 페스트, 나병, 결핵, 백일해 등과 의료 관련 감염, 성병, 새로운 질병 등 과거와 현재의 주요 감염병을 다루고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The biology of infectious diseases deals with major infectious diseases, past and present, such as the plague, plague, leprosy, tuberculosis, pertussis, medical-related infections, sexually transmitted diseases, and new diseases.
data.target_sentence: Epidemiologic biology deals with major infectious diseases, past and present, such as infectious diseases, infectious diseases, leprosy, tuberculosis, whooping cough, medical-related infections, sexually transmitted diseases, and emerging diseases.

data.source_sentence: 분자생물학과 세포생물학의 결합으로 탄생한 '세포미생물학' 덕분에 병원성 세균이 감염을 일으킬 때 강력하고 다양한 무기를 사용한다는 것과, 숙주의 방어를 피하는 수단으로 매우 정교한 전략을 사용한다는 것이 밝혀졌다.
data.mt_sentence: Thanks to "cellular microbiology," which was created by the combination of molecular biology and cell biology, it has been found that pathogenic bacteria use powerful and diverse weapons to cause infection and use very sophisticated strategies as a means of avoiding host defense.
data.target_sentence: Thanks to "cell microbiology" created by the combination of molecular and cellular biology, it has been shown that pathogenic bacteria employ highly sophisticated strategies as a means to infect and evade host defenses using powerful and versatile weapons.

data.source_sentence: 세포미생물학'을 통해 세균은 포유류 세포를 분석하는 도구로 사용되기 시작했다.
data.mt_sentence: Through 'cell microbiology', bacteria began to be used as tools to analyze mammalian cells.
data.target_sentence: Through 'cell microbiology', bacteria began to be used as tools to analyze mammalian cells.

data.source_sentence: 곤충과 식물의 병원성 세균, 이들의 감염이 인간에게 미치는 영향을 고려해 볼 때, 국제적, 다학제적으로 서로 협력하는 것이 무엇보다도 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Considering the effects of insects and plant pathogenic bacteria and their infections on humans, it is of paramount importance to cooperate with each other internationally and multidisciplinary.
data.target_sentence: International and multidisciplinary cooperation is of paramount importance when considering the effects and infections of insects and phytopathogenic bacteria on the human body.

data.source_sentence: 사람의 감염병의 50%와 새로 발생한 감염병의 75%가 동물에서 기원한 인수공통 감염병이다.
data.mt_sentence: 50% of human infectious diseases and 75% of new infectious diseases are zoonotic diseases of animal origin.
data.target_sentence: 50% of human infectious diseases and 75% of emerging infectious diseases are zoonotic diseases derived from animals.

data.source_sentence: 최근에 시작된 "글로벌 헬스" 플랜은 세계 모든 사람의 건강을 함께 추구하고자 하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The recently launched "Global Health" plan aims to pursue the health of everyone in the world together.
data.target_sentence: The recently launched 'Global Health' plan aims to pursue the health of people around the world together.

data.source_sentence: 세계보건기구와 세계동물보건기구가 주창한 "원헬스 플랜"은 사람, 동물, 환경의 건강에 대한 협력적이고 전체적인 감시를 계획하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The "One Health Plan", advocated by the World Health Organization and the World Animal Health Organization, is a collaborative and holistic monitoring of the health of people, animals and the environment.
data.target_sentence: Advocated by the World Health Organization (WHO) and the World Organization for Animal Health (WHO), the “One Health Plan” is a collaborative and holistic monitoring of the health of people, animals and the environment.

data.source_sentence: 사람, 동물, 환경 이 모든 분야의 상호 협력에 중점을 두는 것이 "글로벌 헬스"와 "원헬스 플랜"의 취지를 잘 살리는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The emphasis on mutual cooperation in all areas, including people, animals, and the environment, is to make good use of the purpose of "global health" and "one-health plan."
data.target_sentence: Emphasizing mutual cooperation in all fields, such as people, animals, and the environment, is to make good use of the purpose of 'Global Health' and 'One Health Plan'.

data.source_sentence: 세균은 바이러스뿐만 아니라 때로는 다른 세균으로부터 자신을 방어한다.
data.mt_sentence: Bacteria defend themselves against viruses and sometimes other bacteria.
data.target_sentence: Bacteria defend themselves from viruses and sometimes other bacteria.

data.source_sentence: 매우 난폭하고 강력한 공격자들에 대응해서 세균들은 스스로를 방어하기 위한 면역단백지를 가지고 있고 이를 통해 '독소'들을 만들어낸다.
data.mt_sentence: In response to very violent and powerful attackers, bacteria have immune proteins to defend themselves and create 'toxins' through them.
data.target_sentence: In response to very violent and powerful attackers, bacteria have immune proteins to defend themselves and produce 'toxins' through them.

data.source_sentence: 이런 혁신적인 기본 원리들은 세균의 기초생리를 연구하는 과정에서 얻어진 것이지만 세균과 무관하게 인류의 삶을 극적으로 향상시켰다.
data.mt_sentence: Although these innovative basic principles were obtained in the process of studying the basic physiology of bacteria, they have dramatically improved human life regardless of bacteria.
data.target_sentence: These innovative basic principles were obtained in the course of studying the basic physiology of bacteria, but they have dramatically improved human life regardless of bacteria.

data.source_sentence: 세균의 '제한 효소'는 크리스퍼시스템이 없거나 파지를 만난 경험이 없는 경우에 사용하는 세균의 방어 체계이다.
data.mt_sentence: Bacterial 'restriction enzyme' is a defense system of bacteria that is used when there is no CRISPR system or no experience with phage.
data.target_sentence: Bacterial 'restriction enzyme' is a bacterial defense system used when there is no CRISPR system or no phage experience.

data.source_sentence: 또한 진핵세포의 유전자를 복제하여 세균에서 발현시켜 성장호르몬 인슐린 등과 그 외 의약품과 연구 목적으로 사용되는 단백질을 생산하는 데도 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is also used to clone the genes of eukaryotic cells and express them in bacteria to produce growth hormone insulin and other medicines and proteins used for research purposes.
data.target_sentence: It is also used to replicate genes in eukaryotic cells and express them in bacteria to produce growth hormone insulin and other pharmaceuticals and proteins used for research purposes.

data.source_sentence: 최근 들어 PM에 의한 대기질 저하 및 이로 인한 건강 위협 문제가 심화됨에 따라 PM과 더불어 PM에 부착되어 있는 AM에 대한 연구가 많이 진행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, as PM-induced air quality deterioration and health threats caused by PM have intensified, many studies on PM and AM attached to PM are in progress.
data.target_sentence: Recently, as air quality deteriorated by PM and health threats caused by PM intensified, studies on PM and AM attached to PM are in progress.

data.source_sentence: PM을 구성하고 있는 중요한 부분인 AM은 인간의 건강, 대기 화학, 핵 생성(nucleation) 및 생태계상호 작용에 영향을 미치며, 해양, 대기 및 육상 환경 사이 에서 생지화학적 순환을 하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: AM, an important part of PM, affects human health, atmospheric chemistry, nucleation, and ecosystem interactions, and has a biochemical cycle between marine, atmospheric, and terrestrial environments.
data.target_sentence: As an important part of PM, AM influences human health, atmospheric chemistry, nucleation and ecosystem interactions, and has biochemical cycles between marine, atmospheric and terrestrial environments.

data.source_sentence: PM의 입자 크기별로 인체에 미치는 위해성에 차이가 있기 때문에 최근에는 PM의 입자 크기에 따른 미생물 군집 구조와 특성에 관한 연구도 진행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since there is a difference in the risk to the human body according to the particle size of PM, research on the structure and characteristics of the microbial community according to the particle size of PM is in progress.
data.target_sentence: Since there is a difference in the risk to the human body depending on the particle size of ultrafine dust, research on the structure and characteristics of the microbial community according to the particle size of fine dust is in progress.

data.source_sentence: AM 농도 및 종 다양성에 미치는 기후적 인자와 대기오염 물질의 영향에 대한 연구 결과도 보고되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The results of studies on the effects of climatic factors and air pollutants on AM concentration and species diversity have also been reported.
data.target_sentence: Studies of the effects of climatic factors and air pollutants on AM concentrations and species diversity have also been reported.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 실외 대기 환경의 바이오에어로졸 혹은 PM 시료의 세균과 곰팡이 농도를 분석한 결과를 정리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper summarizes the results of analyzing the bacterial and fungal concentrations of bioaerosol or PM samples in the outdoor atmosphere.
data.target_sentence: This paper summarizes the results of analysis of bacterial and fungal concentrations in bioaerosol or PM samples in outdoor air.

data.source_sentence: AM 군집구조와 농도에 영향을 미치는 핵심 인자인 기후적 요인과 대기오염 물질의 영향을 종합적으로 고찰하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The effects of climate factors and air pollutants, which are key factors affecting AM cluster structure and concentration, were comprehensively examined.
data.target_sentence: The effects of climatic factors and air pollutants, which are major factors influencing the AM cluster structure and concentration, were comprehensively investigated.

data.source_sentence: 종합적인 고찰 결과는 대기권에서 미생물의 역할과 기능을 이해하고 이들 미생물에 의해 야기되는 환경 및 공중보건 문제를 해결하기 위한 전략 수립 및 저감 기술 개발에 활용될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The results of the comprehensive review can be used to understand the role and function of microorganisms in the atmosphere, establish strategies to solve environmental and public health problems caused by these microorganisms, and develop mitigation technologies.
data.target_sentence: The results of the review can be used to understand the role and function of airborne microbes, formulate strategies to address environmental and public health challenges posed by these microbes, and develop mitigation techniques.

data.source_sentence: 미생물은 너무 작아서 육안으로는 관찰할 수 없는 생물로 바이러스, 세균, 곰팡이, 미세조류 및 원생동물로 구분된다.
data.mt_sentence: Microorganisms are organisms that are too small to be observed by the naked eye and are classified into viruses, bacteria, fungi, microalgae, and protozoa.
data.target_sentence: Microorganisms are organisms that are too small to be seen with the naked eye and are classified as viruses, bacteria, fungi, microalgae, and protozoa.

data.source_sentence: 이 중 대기 환경에 서식하는 미생물인 AM은 주로 세균, 곰팡이 및 바이러스이다.
data.mt_sentence: Among them, AM, a microorganism living in the atmosphere, is mainly bacteria, fungi, and viruses.
data.target_sentence: Among them, AM, a microorganism that inhabits the atmosphere, is mainly bacteria, fungi, and viruses.

data.source_sentence: 기후적 특성과 대기오염 정도에 따라 AM의 조성은 매우 상이하지만 일반적으로 세균이 약 80% 정도로 가장 많고 그다음 곰팡이가 많은 경향이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The composition of AM is very different depending on the climatic characteristics and the degree of air pollution, but in general, bacteria are the most at about 80%, followed by mold.
data.target_sentence: The composition of AM varies greatly depending on climate characteristics and the degree of air pollution, but in general, bacteria account for the most at about 80%, followed by mold.

data.source_sentence: AM의 주요 발생원과 대기 중 외부 인자의 상호작용을 Fig.1에 도시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The interaction between the main sources of AM and external factors in the atmosphere is shown in Fig.1.
data.target_sentence: The interaction between the major sources of AM and external factors in the atmosphere is shown in Figure 1.

data.source_sentence: 미생물은 육상, 토양, 산림, 사막 먼지, 농업 활동, 도시 지역, 습지, 해안 및 해양 환경에서 대기 중으로 배출된다.
data.mt_sentence: Microorganisms are released into the atmosphere from terrestrial, soil, forest, desert dust, agricultural activities, urban areas, wetlands, coastal and marine environments.
data.target_sentence: Microbes are released into the atmosphere from terrestrial, soil, forest, desert dust, agricultural activities, urban areas, wetlands, coastal and marine environments.

data.source_sentence: 폐수처리장, 매립지, 퇴비화 설비, 축산단지 등에서도 미생물이 대기 중으로 방출된다.
data.mt_sentence: Microorganisms are also released into the atmosphere in wastewater treatment plants, landfills, composting facilities, and livestock complexes.
data.target_sentence: Microorganisms are also released into the atmosphere from wastewater treatment plants, landfills, composting plants, and livestock complexes.

data.source_sentence: 입자 재부유 과정 이론에 기초하여 지상의 미생물이 대기 중으로 방출되므로 지표면의 세균 농도와 지표면 근처 대기 중 세균 농도 사이에는 밀접한 상관관계가 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: There was a close correlation between the concentration of bacteria on the surface and the concentration of bacteria in the atmosphere near the surface, as ground microorganisms were released into the atmosphere based on the theory of particle restoration process.
data.target_sentence: Based on the particle restoration process theory, as the terrestrial microorganisms were released into the atmosphere, there was a close correlation between the bacterial concentration at the surface and the atmospheric bacterial concentration near the surface.

data.source_sentence: 사막과 산림 등의 자연생태기반 대륙, 인구 밀집 지역 및 해양에서 총입자상물질 중 생물학적 물질이 차지하는 비율(부피 기준)은 각각 28%, 22% 및 10%로 추정되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It is estimated that the proportion (by volume) of biological materials in total particulate matter (by volume) is 28%, 22%, and 10%, respectively, in natural ecology-based continents such as deserts and forests, in densely populated areas, and in the ocean.
data.target_sentence: The proportion of biological material (by volume) of the total particulate matter (by volume) is estimated to be 28%, 22% and 10%, respectively, in natural eco-based continents such as deserts and forests in populated areas. , and at sea.

data.source_sentence: 1차 에어로졸 질량의 16−80%가 생물학적 발생원 유래인 것으로 추정되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It is estimated that 16-80% of the primary aerosol mass is derived from biological sources.
data.target_sentence: It is estimated that 16-80% of primary aerosol mass is derived from biological sources.

data.source_sentence: 미생물은 에어로졸화되면 대류 공기 이동에 의해 위쪽으로 이동할 수 있으며 크기가 작기 때문에 상당한 기간 동안 대기 중에 남아 있을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When aerosolized, the microorganism can travel upward by convective air movement and remain in the atmosphere for a considerable period of time due to its small size.
data.target_sentence: When aerosolized, microorganisms can move upwards by convective air movement and, due to their small size, can stay in the atmosphere for a significant amount of time.

data.source_sentence: 사막과 가뭄 피해 지역에서 발생한 바이오에어로졸의 대륙간 이동이 관찰되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Intercontinental migration of bioaerosols in desert and drought-hit areas was observed.
data.target_sentence: Intercontinental movements of bioaerosols have been observed in deserts and drought regions.

data.source_sentence: 대기 중으로 유입된 AM의 생존은 1차 운반체인 PM에 주로 의존하게 되는데 AM은 PM에 부착하여 군집을 형성하고 생명을 유지한다.
data.mt_sentence: The survival of AM introduced into the atmosphere depends mainly on PM, which is the primary carrier, and AM attaches to PM to form a community and maintain life.
data.target_sentence: The survival of AM introduced into the atmosphere mainly depends on PM, which is the primary carrier, and AM attaches to PM to form a community and maintain life.

data.source_sentence: PM에 부착된 유기물질 및 무기물질은 AM의 생존에 필요한 영양소로 활용되어 AM의 기아를 예방하고 신진대사를 유지할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Organic and inorganic substances attached to PM are used as nutrients necessary for AM's survival, which can prevent AM starvation and maintain metabolism.
data.target_sentence: The organic and inorganic substances attached to the PM are used as nutrients necessary for the survival of the AM, which can prevent AM starvation and maintain metabolism.

data.source_sentence: PM은 AM에게 보호막을 제공하여 자외선에 의한 피해를 줄여 줄 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: PM can reduce the damage caused by UV rays by providing a protective film to the AM.
data.target_sentence: PM can provide a protective film to the AM to reduce damage from UV rays.

data.source_sentence: PM에 부착하지 않고 공기 중에 존재하는 AM은 PM부착 AM에 비해 생존 가능성이 낮은 것으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It is known that AM present in the air without attaching to PM is less likely to survive than AM attached to PM.
data.target_sentence: AMs that are not attached to PMs and are present in the atmosphere are known to be less likely to survive than AMs attached to PMs.

data.source_sentence: PM에 부착된 AM은 다양한 생물종으로 구성되고 AM 사이의 상호작용 및 외부 인자와의 작용, 반작용 등에 의해 다양해지면서 군집을 점차적으로 형성해 간다.
data.mt_sentence: AM attached to PM consists of various species and gradually forms clusters as they are diversified by interactions between AMs, interactions with external factors, and reactions.
data.target_sentence: AMs attached to PMs are composed of various species and gradually form clusters as they diversify by interactions between AMs, interactions with external factors, and reactions.

data.source_sentence: 대기 환경에서 AM은 중요한 역할을 담당하는데 AM은 대기의 물리적 및 화학적 과정에 기여하며 시간에 따른 대기 중 세균의 군집 변화와 대기의 물리적, 화학적 특성 사이에 강한 상관관계가 있다고 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: AM plays an important role in atmospheric environments, and AM contributes to the physical and chemical processes of the atmosphere, and it has been reported that there is a strong correlation between changes in the cluster of bacteria in the atmosphere over time and the physical and chemical properties of the atmosphere.
data.target_sentence: AM plays an important role in the atmospheric environment, and AM contributes to the physicochemical processes of the atmosphere, changes in the bacterial community in the atmosphere over time and the physicochemical properties of the atmosphere.

data.source_sentence: 바이오에어로졸은 주변 입자에 부착될 수 있고 강수량을 유발할 수 있는 구름 응결핵 및 얼음핵으로 작용하여 기후에 상당한 영향을 미칠 수 있음이 입증되었다.
data.mt_sentence: It has been demonstrated that bioaerosols can have a significant impact on climate by acting as cloud condensation nuclei and ice nuclei that can attach to surrounding particles and cause precipitation.
data.target_sentence: It has been demonstrated that bioaerosols can have significant climate impacts by acting as cloud condensation nuclei and ice nuclei that can attach to surrounding particles and cause precipitation.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 구름 응결핵과 얼음핵에 있는 얼음 결정 잔류물의 약 33%가 생물학적 입자라고 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA reported that about 33% of ice crystal residues in cloud condensation and ice nuclei are biological particles.
data.target_sentence: The AAA reports that about 33% of ice crystal residues in cloud condensation and ice cores are biological particles.

data.source_sentence: 건식 침적은 건물, 식물, 수면, 지면 및 공기와 접촉하는 기타 표면에 대한 부착 등에 의해 일어난다.
data.mt_sentence: Dry deposition is caused by adhesion to buildings, plants, water surface, ground, and other surfaces in contact with air.
data.target_sentence: Dry deposition occurs by adhering to buildings, plants, water surfaces, the ground, and other surfaces that come into contact with the air.

data.source_sentence: 습식 침적은 비, 눈 또는 우박의 강수에 의해 일어난다.
data.mt_sentence: Wet deposition is caused by precipitation from rain, snow or hail.
data.target_sentence: Wet deposition is caused by precipitation from rain, snow, or hail.

data.source_sentence: 대기 환경은 미생물 생육에는 혹독한 환경이지만 상당량의 미생물이 존재한다.
data.mt_sentence: The atmospheric environment is a harsh environment for microbial growth, but there is a significant amount of microorganisms.
data.target_sentence: The atmospheric environment is a harsh environment for microorganisms to reproduce, but a significant amount of microorganisms exist.

data.source_sentence: 대기 환경으로부터 에어로졸과 PM 시료를 채취하여 배양법 혹은 비배양법으로 세균의 개체수를 측정한 결과를 Table 1에 정리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 1 summarizes the results of collecting aerosols and PM samples from the atmospheric environment and measuring the number of bacteria by culture method or non-culture method.
data.target_sentence: Table 1 summarizes the results of measuring the number of bacteria according to the culture method or the non-culture method by collecting aerosol and PM samples in an atmospheric environment.

data.source_sentence: 미국의 산에서 채취한 에어로졸을 이용하여 분석한 세균 개체수는 103-105 cells/m3로 도시 및 산업지역의 대기보다는 적은 수의 세균이 존재함을 알 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: The number of bacteria analyzed using aerosols collected from mountains in the United States was 103-105 cells/m3, indicating that there were fewer bacteria than the air in urban and industrial areas.
data.target_sentence: The number of bacteria analyzed using aerosols collected from the American mountains was 103-105 cells/m3, which showed that there were fewer bacteria than air in urban and industrial areas.

data.source_sentence: 대기 오염도가 심해지면 대기 중 세균 개체수는 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As air pollution increased, the number of bacteria in the air decreased.
data.target_sentence: As air pollution has increased, the number of bacteria in the air has decreased.

data.source_sentence: 대기 시료 중에 함유된 곰팡이 개체수를 측정한 결과를 Table 2에 정리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 2 summarizes the results of measuring the number of fungi contained in the atmospheric sample.
data.target_sentence: Table 2 summarizes the results of measuring the number of molds contained in air samples.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 중국의 도심에서 연무가 없는 날에 비해 연무가 있는 날의 곰팡이 개체수가 많았다고 보고하였는데 이는 세균 개체수 결과와 일치하는 결과이다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA reported that there were more fungal populations on haze-free days in downtown China than on haze-free days, which is consistent with the results of the bacterial population.
data.target_sentence: AAA reported that there were more fungal populations on fog-free days than on fog-free days in downtown China, which is consistent with the results of bacterial populations.

data.source_sentence: 정보가 축적되면 대기 중 세균 및 곰팡이의 정량적인 거동 변화에 미치는 환경 인자의 영향에 대한 심도 있는 고찰이 가능해 질 것으로 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: Accumulation of information is thought to enable in-depth examination of the effects of environmental factors on quantitative behavioral changes of bacteria and fungi in the atmosphere.
data.target_sentence: Accumulation of information is thought to enable in-depth investigation of the influence of environmental factors on quantitative behavioral changes of atmospheric bacteria and fungi.

data.source_sentence: 에어로졸 형태로 채취할 수 있으며 다양한 시료채취기(sampler)를 이용할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be collected in the form of an aerosol, and various samplers can be used.
data.target_sentence: It can be collected in aerosol form and a variety of samplers are available.

data.source_sentence: 바이오에어로졸 채취기로는 주로 사이클론(cyclone), 임팩터(impactor), 임핀저(impinger), 포자 트랩(spore trap)이 이용된다.
data.mt_sentence: As a bioaerosol collector, a cyclone, an impactor, an impinger, and a spore trap are mainly used.
data.target_sentence: Cyclone, impactor, impinger, and spore trap are mainly used as bio-aerosol collectors.

data.source_sentence: 주로 사용되는 채취용 필터는 유리나 석영 등의 섬유 필터 및 폴리카보네이트(Polycarbonate)나 셀룰로스(cellulose) 등의 멤브레인이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The mainly used collection filters include fiber filters such as glass and quartz, and membranes such as polycarbonate and cellulose.
data.target_sentence: The most commonly used collection filters are fiber filters such as glass and quartz, and membranes such as polycarbonate and cellulose.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 2에 고용량 공기시료 채취기를 나타내었는데 TSP는 특별한 거름 장치 없이 필터에 바로 포집되고 PM은 포집하고자 하는 입자 크기에 따라 분류 구역(fractionation zone)에서 분리되어 필터에 포집된다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 2 shows a high-capacity air sample collector, and TSP is collected directly in the filter without a special filtering device, and PM is separated from the fractionation zone according to the size of the particle to be collected and collected in the filter.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2 is a large-capacity air sample collector. TSP is directly collected from the filter without a separate filtering device, and PM is separated from the fractionation zone according to the size of the collected particles and collected in the filter.

data.source_sentence: 공기시료채취기를 직접 제작 및 개조하거나 진공 펌프를 이용한 보틀 탑 여과장치(bottle top filtration)로 필터에 에어로졸을 포집한 연구도 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: There have also been studies of directly manufacturing and remodeling air samplers or collecting aerosols in filters using bottle top filtration using vacuum pumps.
data.target_sentence: In addition, there have been studies on directly manufacturing and remodeling an air sampler using bottle top filtration using a vacuum pump or collecting aerosols in a filter.

data.source_sentence: 필터를 이용한 샘플링은 채취하기가 쉽고 용이하여 가장 일반적으로 활용되는 AM 시료 채취 방법이다.
data.mt_sentence: Sampling using a filter is the most commonly used AM sampling method because it is easy and easy to collect.
data.target_sentence: Sampling with a filter is the most commonly used AM sampling method because it is easy and convenient to acquire.

data.source_sentence: 사이클론, 임팩터, 임핀저의 기본 원리는 공기 흐름의 급격한 방향 변화를 이용한 것으로 일정 크기와 무게 이상의 입자는 관성력으로 인해 공기 흐름의 방향을 따라가지 못하고 포집면으로 떨어져 채취된다.
data.mt_sentence: The basic principle of a cyclone, an impactor, and an impinger is to use a sudden change in the direction of the air flow. Particles over a certain size and weight cannot follow the direction of the air flow due to inertia and are collected by falling to the collecting surface.
data.target_sentence: The basic principle of cyclones, impactors and impingers is to use sudden changes in the direction of airflow. Therefore, particles over a certain size and weight cannot follow the direction of the airflow due to inertia and are collected by falling on the collecting surface.

data.source_sentence: 사이클론에 유입된 공기는 나선형으로 소용돌이치며 흐르고 그 원심력으로 인해 더 크고 무거운 입자가 벽에 부딪치며 분리되어 사이클론 아래쪽에 쌓인다.
data.mt_sentence: The air entering the cyclone swirls and flows in a spiral, and the centrifugal force causes larger and heavier particles to collide with the wall, separate and accumulate at the bottom of the cyclone.
data.target_sentence: The air entering the cyclone swirls and flows in a vortex, and the centrifugal force causes large and heavy particles to collide with the walls and separate and accumulate at the bottom of the cyclone.

data.source_sentence: 이렇게 사이클론 아래쪽에 1.5 mL 튜브를 설치하여 공기 시료를 포집한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this way, a 1.5 mL tube is installed under the cyclone to collect air samples.
data.target_sentence: In this way, a 1.5 mL tube is installed under the cyclone to collect the air sample.

data.source_sentence: 사이클론은 포집면으로 필터, 튜브, 액체 등을 다양하게 활용해 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: The cyclone has been using various filters, tubes, and liquids as a collection surface.
data.target_sentence: Cyclones use a variety of filters, tubes, and liquids as collection surfaces.

data.source_sentence: 임팩터는 바이오에어로졸 채취에 가장 일반적으로 쓰이며 한 펌프에 여러 개를 설치하거나 입자 크기에 따라 다층으로 분류하여 채취하는 것이 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: Impactors are most commonly used for bioaerosol collection, and can be installed in one pump or classified into multiple layers according to particle size.
data.target_sentence: Impactors are most commonly used for bio-aerosol collection and can be installed in one pump or classified into several layers based on particle size.

data.source_sentence: 임팩터의 포집면은 필터, 페트리 디쉬의 아가 배지, 윤활유 등을 바른 플레이트나 테이프 등 다양하다.
data.mt_sentence: The collection surface of the impactor is various, such as a filter, agar medium in a Petri dish, a plate or tape coated with lubricating oil, etc.
data.target_sentence: The collecting surface of the impactor varies, such as a filter, agar medium in a Petri dish, a plate or tape coated with lubricant, etc.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 5에 임팩터의 원리를 이용한 포자 트랩을 모식도로 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 5 shows the spore trap using the principle of impactor as a schematic diagram.
data.target_sentence: Figure 5 is a schematic diagram of a spore trap using the principle of an impactor.

data.source_sentence: 마지막으로 액체 포집면을 이용한 임핀저를 Fig. 6에 그림으로 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Finally, the impinger using the liquid collection surface is shown in Fig. 6.
data.target_sentence: Finally, a cyclone using a liquid collection surface is shown in Figure 6.

data.source_sentence: 임핀저는 임팩터와 같은 원리로 작동하며 1947년 AAA에 의해 처음으로 고안되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The impinger works on the same principle as the impactor and was first devised by the AAA in 1947.
data.target_sentence: The impinger works on the same principle as the impactor and was first devised by the AAA in 1947.

data.source_sentence: 액체 포집면에 채취되기 때문에 미생물들의 활성이 유지되기 용이하며 공기 채취기보다 비교적 포집 시간이 짧았다.
data.mt_sentence: Since it is collected on the liquid collection surface, it is easy to maintain the activity of microorganisms and the collection time was relatively shorter than that of the air collector.
data.target_sentence: Because it is collected on the liquid collecting surface, it is easy to maintain the activity of microorganisms and the collection time is relatively shorter than that of the air trap.

data.source_sentence: 위와 같이 채취기 종류가 다양하므로 분석 목적에 따라 다른 방법으로 시료를 채취할 수 있는데 어떤 종류와 크기의 미생물을 어떤 방법으로 연구할 것인지에 따라 채취기를 선택하고 조건을 결정해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Since there are various types of collectors as above, samples can be collected in different ways depending on the purpose of analysis, and the collectors should be selected and the conditions should be determined according to what type and size microorganisms to be studied.
data.target_sentence: As the types of collectors are diverse as described above, the method of collecting samples may differ depending on the purpose of analysis, and a collector should be selected and conditions determined according to the type and size of the microorganism to be studied.

data.source_sentence: 포집 효율은 시료채취기에 따라 다른데 관성력을 이용하는 바이오에어로졸 채취기의 포집 효율은 공기의 유량, 포집면의 크기와 양, 장치 내 공기 분출구와 포집면의 거리에 따라 결정되며 분리입경(cut-off diameter)과 함께 분석된다.
data.mt_sentence: The collection efficiency varies depending on the sample collector, and the collection efficiency of the bioaerosol collector using inertial force depends on the flow rate of air, the size and amount of the collection surface, and the distance between the air outlet and the collection surface in the device.
data.target_sentence: The collection efficiency depends on the sampling device, and the collection efficiency of the bio-aerosol collector using the inertial force depends on the air flow rate, the size and amount of the sampling surface, and the distance between the air outlet and the collection surface. Device.

data.source_sentence: 분리입경은 포집 가능한 최저 입경을 의미하며 분리 입경 이하의 작은 입자들은 포집되지 않고 채취기를 지나치므로 이상적으로는 분리입경 이상의 입자는 100% 포집되어야 하지만 실제로는 그렇지 않다.
data.mt_sentence: Separation particle size means the smallest particle size that can be collected, and since small particles less than the separation particle size are not collected and pass the collector, ideally, 100% of particles larger than the separation particle size should be collected, but in practice this is not the case.
data.target_sentence: Separation particle size refers to the smallest particle size that can be collected, and since small particles less than the separation particle size pass through the collector without being collected, ideally 100% of particles larger than the separation particle size should be collected, but in practice this is not the case.

data.source_sentence: 관성력을 이용한 채취기의 입자 직경에 따른 포집 효율 곡선에서 50%의 효율을 나타내는 입자의 직경을 분리입경(d50)으로 정의한다.
data.mt_sentence: The particle diameter showing 50% efficiency in the collection efficiency curve according to the particle diameter of the collector using the inertial force is defined as the separation particle diameter (d50).
data.target_sentence: The particle diameter showing 50% efficiency in the collection efficiency curve according to the particle diameter of the dust collector using the inertial force is defined as the separation particle diameter (d50).

data.source_sentence: 채취기의 유량이 클수록 분리입경은 작아지고 채취할 수 있는 입자가 많다.
data.mt_sentence: The larger the flow rate of the collector, the smaller the separation particle diameter and the more particles can be collected.
data.target_sentence: The higher the flow rate of the collector, the smaller the separation particle diameter and the more particles it can capture.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 세균은 1 µm 정도이지만 세균 덩어리(bacterial aggregates)를 이루거나 큰 입자에 붙어 있기 때문에 포집하기에 용이하고 곰팡이 입자는 보통 2-5 µm이므로 포집 효율이 더 높은 편이다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, bacteria are about 1μm, but they are easy to collect because they form bacterial aggregates or adhere to large particles, and mold particles are usually 2-5μm, so collection efficiency is higher.
data.target_sentence: In general, bacteria are about 1 μm, but they form an aggregate of bacteria or stick to large particles, so they can be easily collected, and mold particles are usually 2-5 μm, so the collection efficiency is high.

data.source_sentence: 최근에는 대기물리화학적 요인 및 PM 입경에 따른 AM 군집 차이 분석이 많이 진행됨에 따라 고용량 공기시료채취기(high-volume airsampler)를 이용하여 섬유 필터에 PM 2.5를 채취하여 사용하는 경우가 많았다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, as AM cluster differences according to atmospheric physicochemical factors and PM particle size have been analyzed a lot, PM 2.5 was often collected and used in fiber filters using high-volume air samplers.
data.target_sentence: Recently, as the difference between AM clusters according to the physical and chemical factors of the atmosphere and PM particle size has been analyzed, a lot of PM 2.5 has been collected and used in a fiber filter using a large-capacity air sampler.

data.source_sentence: 미생물 군집 분석에서 중요한 첫 번째 단계는 DNA 추출로 서로 다른 환경에서 다르게 나타나는 군집을 비교하기 위해서는 높은 수준의 DNA 추출이 관건이다.
data.mt_sentence: An important first step in microbial community analysis is DNA extraction, which is the key to high-level DNA extraction to compare clusters that appear differently in different environments.
data.target_sentence: An important first step in microbial community analysis is DNA extraction, which is key to high-level DNA extraction to compare clusters that appear differently in different environments.

data.source_sentence: 상용화된 DNA 추출 kit 또는 선행연구에서 제시한 추출 방법 한 가지만으로 수행된 DNA 추출 결과는 DNA 농도와 순도에 영향을 미쳐 메타게놈 분석 결과가 과대 또는 과소 평가될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The results of DNA extraction performed only with a commercially available DNA extraction kit or the extraction method suggested in previous studies may affect the DNA concentration and purity, so that the metagenome analysis results may be overestimated or underestimated.
data.target_sentence: DNA extraction results performed only with commercially available DNA extraction kits or extraction methods suggested in previous studies may affect DNA concentration and purity, resulting in overestimation or underestimation of metagenomic analysis results.

data.source_sentence: 특히 공기 시료와 같이 채취 시료에 따라 다량의 미생물이 서식 중이라는 보장이 어려운 경우에는 NGS(Next-Generation Sequencing) 분석에 적합할 정도의 질과 고농도로 추출된 DNA를 얻는 것이 쉽지 않다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, when it is difficult to guarantee that a large amount of microorganisms are inhabiting depending on the collected sample, such as an air sample, it is not easy to obtain the extracted DNA with sufficient quality and high concentration suitable for NGS (Next-Generation Sequencing) analysis.
data.target_sentence: In particular, next-generation sequencing (NGS) analysis when it is difficult to ensure that a large number of microorganisms are inhabited by the collected samples, such as air samples.

data.source_sentence: 공기시료는 포집면에 따라 테이프, 아가 배지, 액체 및 필터에 부착된 형태로 채취되며 그중 필터는 포집 효율이 높으며 보관이나 채취 과정에서 다루기에 용이하다.
data.mt_sentence: Air samples are collected in the form of tape, agar medium, liquid, and attached to a filter depending on the collection surface. Among them, the filter has high collection efficiency and is easy to handle during storage or collection.
data.target_sentence: Air samples are taken in the form of tape, agar medium, or liquid and attached to the filter according to the sampling side. Among them, the filter has high collection efficiency and is easy to handle during storage or collection.

data.source_sentence: Table 4에 그동안 사용된 DNA 추출 방법 및 추가 처리 과정을 정리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 4 summarizes the DNA extraction methods used so far and additional processing procedures.
data.target_sentence: Table 4 summarizes the DNA extraction methods used so far and additional processing steps.

data.source_sentence: 상용화된 DNA 추출 kit를 사용하는 경우가 대부분이었으며 토양 시료용 kit를 이용하는 경우가 많았고 식물 시료용 kit를 사용하는 경우도 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In most cases, commercially available DNA extraction kits were used, and in many cases, kits for soil samples were used, and in some cases, kits for plant samples were used.
data.target_sentence: In most cases, commercially available DNA extraction kits were used, in many cases a kit for soil samples was used, and in some cases, a kit for plant samples was used.

data.source_sentence: 시료 전처리의 경우 필터의 먼지를 긁어내거나 필터의 먼지 부분만 얇게 떠서 사용한 경우에는 다른 과정을 추가하지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of sample pretreatment, no other process was added when the dust of the filter was scratched or only the dust of the filter was used thinly.
data.target_sentence: In the case of sample pretreatment, no additional process was added when the filter dust was scraped or only the filter dust was used thinly.

data.source_sentence: 필터에서 시료만 분리하여 DNA 추출하기 위해 Tween 20 등의 세제를 추가한 PBS나 멸균수에 필터를 담그고 원심분리 등을 통해 씻어내는 전처리도 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to separate only the sample from the filter and extract DNA, the filter was immersed in PBS or sterile water, which added detergent such as Tween 20, and washed through centrifugation.
data.target_sentence: In order to extract DNA by separating only the sample from the filter, the filter was immersed in PBS or sterile water containing detergent such as Tween 20 and washed by centrifugation.

data.source_sentence: 그중 필터를 씻어낸 용액을 다른 필터에 거른 후 새로운 필터로 DNA 추출을 수행하기도 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Among them, DNA extraction was performed with a new filter after the solution washed with the filter was filtered through another filter.
data.target_sentence: Among them, the solution washed with the filter was filtered with another filter, and then DNA extraction was performed with a new filter.

data.source_sentence: 온도를 높여주는 과정(heating)은 세포 용해를 위한 용액을 넣은 후 65℃ 전후에서 수행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The process of increasing the temperature (heating) was carried out around 65 ℃ after adding the solution for cell lysis.
data.target_sentence: The temperature rise (heating) process was carried out at about 65° C. after adding a solution for cell lysis.

data.source_sentence: 화학적인 방법으로는 세포 용해 용액에 담그는 과정을 더 길게 수행하는 방법을 택하기도 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a chemical method, a method of performing the process of immersion in a cell lysis solution for a longer period of time was also selected.
data.target_sentence: As a chemical method, a method of long-term immersion in a cell lysate was also selected.

data.source_sentence: 이렇게 필터의 저해 작용 및 세포 파괴를 효율적으로 수행하기 위해 다양한 전처리 및 추가 처리과정이 요구됨에 따라 DNA 수율을 높이기 위한 추출 방법 비교 연구가 보고 되었다.

data.source_sentence: 미생물 시퀀싱에 활용되며 다양하게 적용되어 왔으나 상황에 따라 다른 프로토콜이 필요하므로 PCR 조건의 최적화 과정이 필요하다.

data.mt_sentence: In performing PCR, different primers must be selected according to the ribosomal DNA region to be sequenced, and the primer combination must be constructed in consideration of the gene region that can be analyzed according to the sequencing technology and the optimal nucleotide sequence length.

data.target_sentence: As the primer length is related to the specificity of the PCR reaction and the annealing temperature, different primers require different temperature conditions.

data.source_sentence: 특정 지역에서 계절 혹은 대기오염도별로 채취한 에어로졸 혹은 PM 시료를 대상으로 세균과 곰팡이 메타게놈의 종풍부도(richness) 및 다양성(diversity)을 분석한 결과를 Table 7에 정리하였다.

data.target_sentence: Temperature and precipitation can affect the microbial diversity of PMs.

data.mt_sentence: Although the results of the study on the seasonal effect of PM on the microbial metagenome diversity differ depending on the sampling area and the degree of air pollution, the existing research results were comprehensively analyzed to derive the overall trend.
data.target_sentence: Although the study results on the seasonal effect of fine dust on the microbial metagenome diversity differ depending on the sampling area and the degree of air pollution, the results of previous studies were comprehensively analyzed to derive the overall trend.

data.source_sentence: PM의 세균 메타게놈의 다양성에 미치는 계절의 영향을 살펴보면 종 풍부도 지표인 Chao 1과 ACE 지표는 겨울철이 가장 높고 그다음 봄, 가을 및 여름 순이었다.

data.target_sentence: Bacillus can produce endogenous spores to adapt to harsh environments and can survive for long periods of time in dormant conditions widely found in atmospheric dust and soil.

data.target_sentence: Climatic factors include humidity, temperature, wind direction, wind speed, precipitation and insolation while regional factors include geographic location, elevation, and land use.

data.mt_sentence: Sunlight intensity, temperature, and solar radiation affect the concentration of bioaerosol.
