data.target_sentence: In some regions, there was a significant negative or not statistically significant correlation between temperature and bacterial and fungal diversity in bioaerosols.

data.source_sentence: 춥고 건조한 환경은 미생물 특히 세균 생장에는 불리한 조건이므로 바이오에어로졸의 종 풍부도가 상대적으로 낮은 것으로 추정되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The cold and dry environment is disadvantageous to microbial growth, especially bacterial growth, so it is estimated that the species abundance of bioaerosol is relatively low.
data.target_sentence: The cold and dry environment is unfavorable to the growth of microorganisms, especially bacteria, so the species abundance of bioaerosols is estimated to be relatively low.

data.source_sentence: 겨울의 매우 낮은 온도는 세포막의 유동성을 감소시키고 세균의 활성을 저하시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: Very low temperatures in winter reduce cell membrane fluidity and decrease bacterial activity.
data.target_sentence: Very low temperatures in winter reduce cell membrane fluidity and reduce bacterial activity.

data.source_sentence: 세균의 최소 생장 온도는 세포막의 지방산 조성에 따라 크게 달라질 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The minimum growth temperature of bacteria may vary greatly depending on the fatty acid composition of the cell membrane.
data.target_sentence: The minimum growth temperature for bacteria can vary greatly depending on the fatty acid composition of the cell membrane.

data.source_sentence: 봄에 기온이 상승하게 되면 미생물의 증식이 촉진되지만 여름에는 고온과 강한 자외선으로 인해 세균의 생장이 저해되거나 사멸되기 때문에 고온과 자외선은 대기 중 세균 농도와 음의 상관관계를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Rising temperatures in spring promote microbial growth, but high temperatures and ultraviolet rays showed a negative correlation with the concentration of bacteria in the atmosphere because high temperatures and strong ultraviolet rays hinder or kill bacteria in summer.
data.target_sentence: The increase in temperature in spring promotes the growth of microorganisms, but since high temperature and strong UV inhibit or kill bacteria in summer, high temperature and UV showed a negative correlation with the concentration of bacteria in the atmosphere.

data.source_sentence: PM2.5 농도가 300 µg/m3 이상일 때 AM과 기온 사이에 음의 상관성을 보이는데 이는 고온이 독성 화합물의 방출을 촉진하고 PM 내에서 발생하는 화학 반응을 촉진하기 때문으로 추정되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When the PM2.5 concentration is above 300 gg/m3, there is a negative correlation between AM and temperature, which is estimated to be due to the high temperature facilitating the release of toxic compounds and the chemical reaction occurring within PM.
data.target_sentence: For PM2.5 concentrations above 300 gg/m3, there is a negative correlation between AM and temperature, which promotes the release of toxic compounds at high temperatures, presumably due to chemical reactions taking place within the PM.

data.source_sentence: 기온은 곰팡이 종 구성에 영향을 줄 수 있는 핵심 인자인데 고온은 전도성 공기의 이동을 가속화하고 곰팡이의 생장 및 대기로의 확산을 촉진할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Temperature is a key factor that can influence mold species composition, and high temperatures can accelerate the movement of conductive air and promote mold growth and diffusion into the atmosphere.
data.target_sentence: Temperature is a key factor that can influence mold species composition, and high temperatures can accelerate the movement of conductive air and promote mold growth and diffusion into the atmosphere.

data.source_sentence: 일부 연구에서는 포자 수준과 고온 사이에 양의 상관 관계가 있다고 보고 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Some studies have reported a positive correlation between spore levels and high temperature.
data.target_sentence: Some studies have reported a positive correlation between spore levels and high temperature.

data.source_sentence: 세균의 생장은 상대습도 65% 전후에서 최적이었고 상대습도가 너무 높으면(95% 이상) 대기 중 세균의 분산이 저해 받고 상대 습도가 너무 낮으면 세균 생장이 억제되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Bacterial growth was optimal around 65% relative humidity, and when the relative humidity was too high (95% or more), the dispersion of bacteria in the air was inhibited, and when the relative humidity was too low, the bacterial growth was inhibited.
data.target_sentence: Bacterial growth was optimal around 65% relative humidity, and when the relative humidity was too high (95% or more), the dispersion of bacteria in the air was suppressed, and when the relative humidity was too low, the bacterial growth was suppressed.

data.source_sentence: 곰팡이는 상대습도가 감소할 때 곰팡이 포자 방출이 증가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Fungi increased the release of mold spores when the relative humidity decreased.
data.target_sentence: The mold increased the release of mold spores when the relative humidity decreased.

data.source_sentence: 일부 연구에 의하면 곰팡이는 65-85% 상대습도에서 가장 높은 농도를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Some studies have shown that fungi have the highest concentration at 65-85% relative humidity.
data.target_sentence: Some studies have shown that fungi have their highest concentrations at 65-85% relative humidity.

data.source_sentence: 상대습도가 너무 높으면 대기 중 곰팡이의 분산이 억제되기 때문에 습도와 곰팡이 농도는 음의 상관관계를 보이기도 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: If the relative humidity is too high, the dispersion of mold in the air is suppressed, so humidity and mold concentration have a negative correlation.
data.target_sentence: Humidity and mold concentration have a negative correlation because too high relative humidity inhibits the dispersion of mold in the air.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 상대습도가 곰팡이 종 풍부도와 음의 상관관계를 보였다고 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA reported that relative humidity showed a negative correlation with fungal species abundance.
data.target_sentence: AAA reported that relative humidity was negatively correlated with fungal species abundance.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같이 상대습도가 미생물 방출에 미치는 영향은 명확하지 않으며 미생물 종류에 따라 차이가 있음을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As such, the effect of relative humidity on the release of microorganisms is not clear and it can be seen that there is a difference depending on the type of microorganism.
data.target_sentence: As such, the effect of relative humidity on the release of microorganisms is not clear and it can be seen that there is a difference depending on the type of microorganism.

data.source_sentence: 풍향과 풍속은 건조 포자의 방출 및 재현탁에 영향을 미칠 수 있고 미생물의 부유를 촉진하여 AM의 농도와 종 다양성을 증가시킬 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Wind direction and wind velocity can affect the release and reproduction of dry spores and promote the floating of microorganisms, increasing the concentration and species diversity of AM.
data.target_sentence: Wind direction and speed can influence the release and reproduction of dry spores and promote microbial suspension, increasing the concentration and species diversity of AMs.

data.source_sentence: 풍속과 AM의 상관관계에 대한 서로 상반된 결과들이 보고되고 있는데 이는 지역, 미생물 공급원 및 기타 요인 등의 영향에 기인한 것으로 추정된다.
data.mt_sentence: Conflicting results on the correlation between wind speed and AM have been reported, which is presumed to be due to the influence of regions, microbial sources, and other factors.
data.target_sentence: Conflicting results have been reported for the correlation between wind speed and AM, presumably due to local, microbial sources and other factors.

data.source_sentence: 강우는 바이오에어로졸의 생장, 크기 및 농도에 가장 중요하게 영향을 미치는 인자 중의 하나이다.
data.mt_sentence: Rainfall is one of the factors that most importantly affect the growth, size, and concentration of bioaerosol.
data.target_sentence: Rainfall is one of the most important influencing factors on the growth, size and concentration of bio-aerosols.

data.source_sentence: 비가 내리고 있는 중이나 내린 직후에는 대기 중 PM의 크기가 감소하여 구름 응결핵으로 작용하거나 얼음 핵이 되어 PM 형성이 더욱 더 활성화된다.
data.mt_sentence: During or immediately after rain, the size of PM in the atmosphere decreases, acting as cloud condensation nuclei or becoming ice nuclei, further activating PM formation.
data.target_sentence: During or immediately after rain, the size of PM in the atmosphere decreases, acting as cloud condensation nuclei or becoming ice nuclei, further activating PM formation.

data.source_sentence: 크기가 작아진 PM은 더 먼 지역으로 이동할 수 있으므로 대기 중에서 체류하는 시간이 길어진다.
data.mt_sentence: The smaller PM can move to a farther area, resulting in a longer stay in the atmosphere.
data.target_sentence: Smaller PMs can travel to more remote areas and stay in the atmosphere longer.

data.source_sentence: 강수 현상으로 인해 지상으로부터 대기로 바이오에어로졸의 방출이 활발해질 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Due to precipitation, the release of bioaerosols from the ground to the atmosphere can be active.
data.target_sentence: Precipitation may activate the release of bio-aerosols from the ground into the atmosphere.

data.source_sentence: 비가 내리면 바이오에어로졸의 습식 침적으로 인해 대기 중 바이오에어로졸 감소 효과를 가져 올 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When it rains, wet deposition of bioaerosols can have the effect of reducing bioaerosols in the atmosphere.
data.target_sentence: Wet deposition of bioaerosols when it rains can have the effect of reducing atmospheric bioaerosols.

data.source_sentence: 대기질이 우수하거나 양호할 때는 대기오염이 아주 심하지 않을 때보다 미생물 활성이 높았으나 대기질이 악화되면 미생물 활동이 급격히 증가하는 경향이 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: When the air quality was excellent or good, the microbial activity was higher than when the air pollution was not very severe, but when the air quality deteriorated, the microbial activity tended to increase rapidly.

data.source_sentence: 일산화탄소, 이산화황, 이산화질소 및 오존 등과 같은 대기오염 물질은 농도에 따라 바이오에어로졸에 영향을 미친다.
data.mt_sentence: Air pollutants such as carbon monoxide, sulfur dioxide, nitrogen dioxide, and ozone affect bioaerosol depending on the concentration.
data.target_sentence: Air pollutants such as carbon monoxide, sulfur dioxide, nitrogen dioxide and ozone affect bio-aerosols depending on their concentration.

data.source_sentence: 이산화질소는 다른 대기환경 요인보다 세균 농도에 더 많은 영향을 미쳤다.
data.mt_sentence: Nitrogen dioxide had a greater effect on bacterial concentrations than other atmospheric factors.

data.mt_sentence: Ozone is another important factor influencing the species abundance and diversity of fungi.
data.target_sentence: Ozone is another important factor influencing the species abundance and diversity of fungi.

data.source_sentence: 산화능이 강한 오존 농도와 AM 농도 사이에 음의 상관관계가 있지만 일부 연구에서는 오존 농도와 세균의 OTU 수 사이에 양의 상관관계를 보이기도 하였다.

data.target_sentence: The behavior and metagenomic properties of AMs are strongly influenced by the size and concentration of PMs in the atmosphere.

data.target_sentence: There is no consistent correlation between PM concentration and fungal cluster diversity, which may inhibit or promote the growth of some microorganisms, leading to changes in cluster composition.

data.source_sentence: 수용성 이온 물질인 SO4 생존과 생장에 필요하지만 Zn, Pb, As 및 Cu 등과 같은 중금속은 미생물에게 독성이 될 수 있다.

data.target_sentence: Although it is necessary for the survival and growth of SO4, a water-soluble ionic substance, heavy metals such as Zn, Pb, As, and Cu can be toxic to microorganisms.

data.mt_sentence: Excessive growth of other microbial populations on foggy days can inhibit the growth of other fungal clusters.
data.target_sentence: Excessive growth of different microbial populations on a foggy day can inhibit the growth of other fungal clusters.

data.source_sentence: 안개가 없는 날에는 다른 종류의 미생물 사이 경쟁이나 저해 작용이 낮아져 군집 내에서 다양한 종이 공존할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: On a fog-free day, competition or inhibition between different types of microorganisms is lowered, allowing different species to coexist within a community.
data.target_sentence: On fog-free days, there is less competition or inhibition between different types of microorganisms, allowing different species to coexist within a community.

data.source_sentence: 공기 중 PM의 독성 화학 성분이 공기 중 곰팡이 다양성에 미치는 영향은 향후 연구에서 규명되어야 한다.

data.target_sentence: The effect of the toxic chemical composition of atmospheric PM on atmospheric fungal diversity should be confirmed in future studies.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 실외 대기 환경의 바이오에어로졸 혹은 PM 시료의 세균과 곰팡이 메타게놈 특성을 정리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, the bacterial and fungal metagenome characteristics of bioaerosol or PM samples in outdoor atmospheric environment are summarized.

data.source_sentence: 세균과 곰팡이의 메타게놈 특성과 다양성 및 특성에 미치는 환경 인자의 영향을 고찰하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The effects of environmental factors on the metagenomic characteristics, diversity, and characteristics of bacteria and fungi were examined.
data.target_sentence: The influence of environmental factors on the genetic characteristics, diversity, and characteristics of bacteria and fungi was investigated.

data.source_sentence: 강우 기간 동안과 그 이후에는 지상으로부터 바이오에어로졸의 방출이 촉진되고 생장도 증가되며 풍속과 풍향은 바이오에어로졸의 대기 중 이동에 크게 영향을 미친다.

data.target_sentence: During and after rainfall, the release of bio-aerosols from the ground is stimulated, growth is also increased, and wind speed and wind direction have a great influence on the movement of bio-aerosols into the atmosphere.

data.source_sentence: 오존, 이산화황, 이산화질소 및 일산화탄소 등과 같은 대기오염 물질과 미생물의 종 다양성은 상당한 상관관계를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Species diversity of microorganisms and air pollutants such as ozone, sulfur dioxide, nitrogen dioxide and carbon monoxide showed a significant correlation.
data.target_sentence: There was a significant correlation between microbial species diversity and air pollutants such as ozone, sulfur dioxide, nitrogen dioxide, and carbon monoxide.

data.source_sentence: 환경요인들의 영향 메커니즘은 완전히 명확하지 않으므로 향후 AM에 대한 상대적인 연구가 더 많이 수행되어야 더 많은 정보를 얻을 수 있을 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the impact mechanism of environmental factors is not completely clear, more relative research on AM will be conducted in the future to obtain more information.
data.target_sentence: Since the mechanisms of influence of environmental factors are not completely clear, more relative studies on AM will be conducted in the future to gain more information.

data.source_sentence: 비배양 의존 방법을 이용한 AM의 메타게놈 특성 연구를 위해서 에어로졸 혹은 PM 시료를 채취하고 DNA를 추출하여 증폭하고 염기서열을 분석하는 등의 다양한 방법이 이용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Various methods such as collecting aerosols or PM samples, extracting DNA, amplifying them, and analyzing the sequence are used to study the metagenomic properties of AM using the non-culture dependent method.
data.target_sentence: Various methods such as collecting aerosol or PM samples, extracting DNA, amplifying, and sequencing are used to study the metagenomic properties of AMs using non-culture-dependent methods.

data.source_sentence: 기존 대기 오염 물질과 함께 바이오에어로졸에 대한 정기적인 모니터링 및 평가는 지속 가능한 사회 및 도시의 발전을 이끌 정책 수립을 위한 중요한 자료로 이용될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Regular monitoring and evaluation of bioaerosols along with existing air pollutants can be used as important data for policy making that will lead to sustainable social and urban development.
data.target_sentence: The regular monitoring and evaluation of bio-aerosols along with existing air pollutants can be used as important data for policy decisions that will lead to sustainable social and urban development.

data.source_sentence: 특히 PM2.5 농도와 PM2.5 중 미생물 메타게놈 분석 정보는 이들로 인한 건강 위해성을 예측하고 예방하는 데 활용될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, the information on microbial metagenome analysis during PM2.5 concentration and PM2.5 can be used to predict and prevent health risks caused by them.
data.target_sentence: In particular, it is possible to predict and prevent health risks caused by microbial metagenome analysis information among PM2.5 and PM2.5 concentrations.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 실외 대기 환경의 바이오에어로졸 혹은 입자상물질의 미생물 메타게놈 특성과 이에 영향을 미치는 기후 및 환경 인자의 영향을 고찰하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, the microbial metagenome characteristics of bio-aerosols or particulate matter in the outdoor atmospheric environment and the effects of climate and environmental factors that affect them were investigated.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, the microbial metagenome characteristics of bio-aerosols or particulate matter present in the outdoor air environment and the influence of climatic and environmental factors affecting it were investigated.

data.source_sentence: 시료 채취 지역 및 환경 조건 특성별 대기 중 세균과 곰팡이 농도를 요약하고 에어로졸과 PM 시료의 세균과 곰팡이의 메타게놈 특성을 조사하기 위한 비배양법 기반 분석방법과 메타게놈 특성을 정리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The concentration of bacteria and fungi in the atmosphere by sampling area and environmental condition characteristics was summarized, and the non-culture method-based analysis method and metagenomic characteristics were summarized to investigate the metagenomic characteristics of bacteria and fungi in aerosols and PM samples.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 팥의 부산물인 팥 껍질에 대한 미백 실험을 통해 그 효능을 확인하고자 한다.

data.source_sentence: 시료의 추출은 팥으로부터 껍질만을 채취하여 70% 에탄올을 이용해 추출을 실시하였다.

data.target_sentence: Extraction of the sample was performed by collecting only the skin of the red bean using 70% ethanol.

data.source_sentence: 건조된 팥 껍질에 70% 에탄올을 10배의 양으로 가하여 실온에서 24시간 침지 후 상등액과 침전물을 나누어 추출하였으며 여과지를 이용하여 시료 추출물을 여과하였다.
data.mt_sentence: 70% ethanol was added to the dried red bean shell in an amount of 10 times, immersed at room temperature for 24 hours, and extracted by dividing the supernatant and precipitate, and the sample extract was filtered using a filter paper.
data.target_sentence: After 10 times of 70% ethanol was added to the dried red beans and immersed at room temperature for 24 hours, the supernatant and the precipitate were separated and extracted, and the sample extract was filtered using filter paper.

data.source_sentence: 이하 세포 관련 실험을 위해 팥 껍질 추출물의 멜라노마 세포(B16F10) 생존율을 확인한 결과는 Fig. 2와 같다.

data.source_sentence: 100 μg/ml의 농도에서 팥 껍질 추출물은 100%에 가까운 우수한 세포 생존율을 보였다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 한국, 중국 등 극동아시아의 온대지역에서 재배되고 우리나라에서는 콩 다음으로 수요가 많은 팥 껍질(Phaseolus angularis shell)의 미백 효과를 검증하여 화장품 소재로서의 가능성을 확인하고자 하였다.

data.source_sentence: 그 결과 팥 껍질 추출물의 미백 활성이 우수하다는 것을 확인할 수 있었으며 이는 미백 기능성 화장품 소재로서 활용 가능성이 있을 것으로 사료된다.

data.source_sentence: H. pylori는 수십 년 동안 사람의 위 점막에 집락을 이루면서 지속적으로 감염을 일으킬 수 있으며 수많은 연구들을 통해 위염, 소화성 궤양, 위암과 H. pylori 감염이 관련있다는 사실이 밝혀졌다.
data.mt_sentence: H. pylori colonizes the human gastric mucosa for decades and can cause persistent infections, and numerous studies have shown that gastritis, peptic ulcer, gastric cancer and H. pylori infection are related.
data.target_sentence: H. pylori can colonize the human gastric mucosa for decades and cause persistent infections, and numerous studies have shown that gastritis, peptic ulcer, gastric cancer, and H. pylori infection are implicated.

data.source_sentence: 전 세계 국가들 중 한국, 일본, 중국 등 동아시아 국가에서 위암 발생률이 높은데 다른 국가들에 비해 상대적으로 높은 H. pylori 보균율이 주요 원인으로 여겨진다.
data.mt_sentence: Among countries around the world, the incidence of gastric cancer is high in East Asian countries such as Korea, Japan, and China, and the relatively high rate of H. pylori is considered to be the main cause.
data.target_sentence: Among countries around the world, the incidence of gastric cancer is high in East Asian countries such as Korea, Japan, and China, and the relatively high rate of H. pylori is considered to be the main cause.

data.source_sentence: 세계적으로 건강증진을 위해서는 H. pylori 감염을 억제하기 위한 공동의 노력이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: For global health promotion, joint efforts to control H. pylori infection are needed.
data.target_sentence: For global health promotion, joint efforts to control H. pylori infection are needed.

data.source_sentence: 제럼본이 다량 함유된 뿌리줄기는 2세기 초부터 동남아시아에서 항염증 민간요법으로 사용되었다.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 H. pylori에 대한 제럼본의 항균 효과를 보고하였으나 최소억제농도에 대한 결과만을 보고하였다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구팀은 이전 연구에서 2차원 전기영동(2-DE) 분석을 통해 H. pylori에서 CagA를 포함한 독성 인자들의 단백질 발현에 대한 제럼본의 영향을 조사하였다.

data.target_sentence: In a previous study, this team investigated the effect of gerambon on protein expression of virulence factors, including CagA, in H. pylori by two-dimensional electrophoresis (2-DE) analysis.

data.source_sentence: 유전자 발현은 다양한 환경 자극에 따라 반응하여 변화하며 수많은 세포 기능을 조절한다.
data.mt_sentence: Gene expression changes in response to various environmental stimuli and regulates numerous cellular functions.
data.target_sentence: Gene expression changes in response to various environmental stimuli and regulates numerous cellular functions.

data.source_sentence: NextGeneration Sequencing (NGS)은 대용량의 염기서열 정보를 분석할 수 있는 방법으로 처음에는 유전체 염기서열 정보 확인에 주로 사용되었으나 나중에는 전사체(transcriptome)의 정보 등 다양한 영역으로 확장되어 오믹스(omics) 연구의 핵심 기술이 되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) is a method that can analyze large amounts of sequence information, and was initially used to verify genome sequence information, but later expanded to various areas such as transcriptome information, becoming a key technology for omics research.
data.target_sentence: NGS (Next Generation Sequencing) is a method that can analyze a large amount of sequencing information. Initially, it was used to verify genome sequencing information, but it has since been expanded to various areas such as transcript information and is a key technology for omics research. has been

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 최신 기법인 NGS에 기초한 RNA-Seq 기법과 기존에 널리 이용되고 있는 기법인 RT-PCR을 사용하여 H. pylori의 다양한 병원성과 관련된 유전자 발현에 대한 제럼본의 영향을 비교 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, we compared and analyzed the effects of Jerumbon on gene expression related to various pathogenicity of H. pylori using RNA-Seq techniques based on the latest technique, NGS, and RT-PCR, a widely used technique.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the effect of Jerumbon on gene expression related to various pathogenicity of H. pylori was compared and analyzed using RNA-Seq technology based on the latest technology, NGS, and RT-PCR, a widely used technology.

data.source_sentence: 약물 비처리 대조군의 경우 최고 농도의 약물처리군에 들어가는 에탄올 용매와 동일한 양의 에탄올을 처리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of the drug-free control group, the same amount of ethanol as the ethanol solvent entering the drug-treated group at the highest concentration was treated.
data.target_sentence: In the case of the no-drug control group, the same amount of ethanol as the ethanol solvent that entered the drug-treated group was treated at the highest concentration.

data.source_sentence: 모든 약물처리 실험은 동일한 배치의 H. pylori를 사용하였으며 동일한 실험을 3회 반복적으로 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: All drug treatment experiments were performed using the same batch of H. pylori, and the same experiment was repeated three times.
data.target_sentence: All drug treatment experiments were performed using the same batch of H. pylori, and the same experiment was repeated three times.

data.source_sentence: 최소억제농도를 판정하기 위하여 분광광도계를 이용하여 600 nm의 파장으로 배양액의 흡광도를 측정하고 약물 비처리 대조군의 흡광도 값을 기준(100%)으로 하여 약물처리군의 세균 성장률을 퍼센트로 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: To determine the minimum inhibitory concentration, the absorbance of the culture solution was measured at a wavelength of 600 nm using a spectrophotometer, and the bacterial growth rate of the drug-treated group was expressed as a percentage based on the absorbance value of the drug-free control group (100%).
data.target_sentence: To determine the minimum inhibitory concentration, the absorbance of the culture medium was measured at a wavelength of 600 nm using a spectrophotometer, and the bacterial growth rate of the drug-treated group was expressed as a percentage based on the absorbance value of the drug-treated group. free control (100%).

data.source_sentence: 발현량 측정을 위해서 해당 종의 유전자 정보를 사용하였으며 non-coding 유전자 영역은 -mask 옵션을 이용하여 발현량 측정에서 제외하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Genetic information of the species was used to measure expression, and the non-coding gene region was excluded from expression measurement using the -mask option.
data.target_sentence: Expression was measured using the genetic information of the species, and non-coding gene regions were excluded from expression measurement using the -mask option.

data.source_sentence: 최소억제농도보다 낮은 농도인 50 μM에서도 약간의 생장 억제가 나타났으므로 후속 실험에서는 H. pylori의 생장을 억제하지 않는 안전한 농도인 20 μM을 최고 농도로 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Even at a concentration of 50 μM, which is lower than the minimum inhibitory concentration, slight growth inhibition was observed, so in the subsequent experiment, 20 μM, a safe concentration that does not inhibit the growth of H. pylori, was used as the highest concentration.
data.target_sentence: A slight growth inhibition was observed even at a concentration of 50 μM lower than the minimum inhibitory concentration, so a safe concentration of 20 μM that does not inhibit the growth of H. pylori was used in subsequent experiments. highest concentration.

data.source_sentence: NGS를 이용한 제럼본 처리에 의한 전사체 변화를 분석하기 위하여 H.pylori 표준균주에 제럼본을 처리한 배지와 처리하지 않은 배지로부터 H. pylori의 RNA를 분리한 뒤 각각의 전사체를 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to analyze the change in the transcriptome caused by the treatment with xerambone using NGS, RNA of H. pylori was isolated from the medium treated with xerambone and the untreated medium to the standard H. pylori strain, and then each transcript was identified.
data.target_sentence: In order to analyze the change of the transcriptome according to the gerambon treatment using NGS, RNA of H. pylori was isolated from the zerambon-treated medium and the untreated medium with a standard H. pylori strain, and each transcript was identified.

data.source_sentence: NGS를 이용한 분석에서 제럼본 처리에 의해 H. pylori의 DNA 복제와 전사 관련 인자, 주요 병원성 인자, T4SS 구성인자들의 발현이 유의하게 감소 또는 증가하는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: In the analysis using NGS, it was found that the expression of H. pylori's DNA replication and transcription-related factors, major pathogenic factors, and T4SS constituent factors was significantly reduced or increased by Xerumbone treatment.
data.target_sentence: In analysis using NGS, it was confirmed that the expression of DNA replication and transcription-related factors, major pathogenic factors and T4SS constituent factors of H. pylori was significantly reduced or increased by the treatment with xerumbon.

data.source_sentence: 가장 먼저 DNA 복제와 전사 관련 유전자의 발현을 RT-PCR로 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: First, DNA replication and expression of transcription-related genes were analyzed by RT-PCR.
data.target_sentence: First, DNA replication and expression of transcription-related genes were analyzed through RT-PCR.

data.source_sentence: rpoD 유전자의 발현은 제럼본 농도 의존적으로 유의미하게 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The expression of the rpoD gene was significantly reduced depending on the concentration of Xerumbone.
data.target_sentence: The expression of rpoD gene was significantly decreased according to the concentration of Xerumbone.

data.source_sentence: CagA 단백질과 VacA 단백질은 숙주 세포의 세포 내 신호 전달을 방해하여 세포의 통제되지 않은 성장과 염증 반응을 유발하는 것으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: CagA and VacA proteins are known to interfere with intracellular signal transduction of host cells, causing uncontrolled growth and inflammatory responses of cells.
data.target_sentence: CagA and VacA proteins are known to interfere with intracellular signal transduction in host cells, resulting in uncontrolled growth and inflammatory responses of cells.

data.source_sentence: H. pylori는 위 점막에서 집락을 형성하고 병리학적 변화를 유도하는 데 필요한 다양한 독성 인자를 가지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: H. pylori has various virulence factors required to colonize the gastric mucosa and induce pathological changes.
data.target_sentence: H. pylori has various virulence factors required to colonize gastric mucosa and induce pathological changes.

data.source_sentence: 그중 편모는 세균이 집락을 형성하기 위해 위 상피 쪽으로 이동하는 데 꼭 필요한 구조이다.
data.mt_sentence: Among them, flagella is a necessary structure for bacteria to move toward the gastric epithelium to form colonies.
data.target_sentence: Of these, flagella is a structure required for bacteria to migrate towards the gastric epithelium and form colonies.

data.source_sentence: FlgE는 편모 필라멘트를 기저체에 연결하는 역할을 하고 FlhA는 플라젤린 단백질의 발현을 조절한다.
data.mt_sentence: FlgE is responsible for linking flagellated filaments to the basal body, and FlhA regulates the expression of the plaseline protein.
data.target_sentence: FlgE plays a role in linking flagellar filaments to the basal body, and FlhA regulates expression of the placerin protein.

data.source_sentence: 제럼본 처리에 의해 T4SS 유전자들의 발현이 변화하고 그로 인해 T4SS이 정상적인 기능을 하지 못하게 된다면 H. pylori의 주요 병원성 인자인 CagA를 숙주세포로 전달시키는 데 어려움을 겪게 될 것이라 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: If the expression of T4SS genes is changed by Xerombon treatment and T4SS does not function normally, it is thought that it will be difficult to deliver CagA, a major pathogenic factor of H. pylori, to the host cell.
data.target_sentence: If the expression of T4SS gene is changed by Xerombon treatment and T4SS does not function normally, it is thought that it will be difficult to deliver CagA, a major pathogenic factor of H. pylori, to the host cell.

data.source_sentence: 결론적으로 제럼본은 H. pylori의 다양한 병원성 인자들의 발현을 대부분 감소시켰으며 일부는 증가시켰다.
data.mt_sentence: In conclusion, xerambone mostly decreased the expression of various pathogenic factors of H. pylori, but increased some.
data.target_sentence: In conclusion, xerambone mostly decreased the expression of various pathogenic factors of H. pylori, but increased some.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구의 결과들을 종합해 보면 제럼본이 H. pylori를 제균하기 위한 치료제 또는 H. pylori 감염 억제제로 사용될 수 있음을 시사한다.
data.mt_sentence: Taken together, the results of this study suggest that Jerumbone can be used as a treatment for eradicating H. pylori or as an inhibitor of H. pylori infection.
data.target_sentence: Taken together, the results of this study suggest that Jerumbone can be used as an H. pylori eradication agent or H. pylori infection inhibitor.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 제럼본에 처리에 의해 유도된 H. pylori 유전자의 전사적 변화를 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the transcriptional change of H. pylori gene induced by the treatment of xerambone was analyzed.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the transcriptional change of H. pylori gene induced by gerambon treatment was analyzed.

data.source_sentence: NGS를 사용하여 RNA 발현 변화를 분석한 다음 그 결과를 검증하기 위해 RT-PCR을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: RNA expression changes were analyzed using NGS, and then RT-PCR was performed to verify the results.
data.target_sentence: After analyzing changes in RNA expression using NGS, RT-PCR was performed to confirm the results.

data.source_sentence: NGS 분석 결과 1,632개의 유전자 중 총 23개가 제럼본 처리에 의해 유의하게 발현이 변화된 특이발현 유전자로 분석되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of NGS analysis, a total of 23 out of 1,632 genes were analyzed as specific expression genes whose expression was significantly changed by Jerumbone treatment.
data.target_sentence: As a result of NGS analysis, a total of 23 genes out of 1,632 genes were analyzed as specific expression genes whose expression was significantly changed by the treatment with Zerumbon.

data.source_sentence: DNA 복제와 전사, 병원성 인자 및 T4SS 성분과 관련된 유전자 중 10개는 현저하게 하향 조절되었고 5개는 상향 조절되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Of the genes involved in DNA replication and transcription, pathogenic factors and T4SS components, 10 were significantly down-regulated and 5 were up-regulated.
data.target_sentence: Of the genes involved in DNA replication and transcription, pathogenic factors and T4SS components, 10 were significantly down-regulated and 5 were up-regulated.

data.source_sentence: 발현 수준을 재확인하였고 그 결과 14개 유전자에서 NGS와 동일하게 발현 양상이 변화하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The expression level was reconfirmed, and as a result, the expression pattern of 14 genes was changed in the same way as in NGS.
data.target_sentence: As a result of reconfirming the expression level, the expression pattern of 14 genes was changed in the same way as in NGS.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구의 결과는 제럼본이 다양한 H. pylori의 병원성과 관련된 인자들을 조절함으로써 H. pylori 감염의 잠재적인 치료제가 될 수 있음을 시사한다.

data.source_sentence: 비정상적 식이(diets)는 장내 미생물의 변화로 군집 형성에 부정적인 영향을 미치고 대사 산물이 비정상적으로 형성되어 비만과 전신 면역에 변화를 초래한다.

data.target_sentence: Abnormal diet negatively affects colonization due to changes in intestinal microflora, and abnormal formation of metabolites leads to obesity and changes in systemic immunity.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 개는 반려동물로서 건강을 유지하기 위해서는 균형된 에너지 요구량과 안정적인 장내 미생물(gut microbiomes) 변화가 필수적이다.

data.source_sentence: 최근 화학농약의 잔류 문제 및 지속성에 대한 문제로 인해 그 대안으로 생물농약에 관한 관심과 연구가 많아지고 있다.
