data.source_sentence: Paenibacillus jamilae는 여러 토양 매개 병원체에 대한 높은 활성을 나타냈으며 질소 고정, 인산염 및 칼륨 가용화, 사이드로포어 및 인돌아세트산를 생산하여 근권의 유익한 세균이 증가하는 결과를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Paenibacillus jamilae showed high activity against several soil-borne pathogens, and resulted in an increase in beneficial bacteria in the rhizosphere by nitrogen fixation, phosphate and potassium solubilization, and production of siderophores and indoleacetic acid.
data.target_sentence: Paenibacillus jamilae showed high activity against several soil-borne pathogens and increased beneficial bacteria in the rhizosphere by nitrogen fixation, phosphate and potassium solubilization, and siderophore and indoleacetic acid production.

data.source_sentence: 전국 12개 지역의 94곳의 수박 재배지에서 수박 식물체(잎, 꽃, 뿌리) 및 토양을 수집하였으며 전국 25곳의 대형 원예 육묘장에서 접목 상태의 어린 수박 모종을 수집하여 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Watermelon plants (leaves, flowers, roots) and soil were collected from 94 watermelon cultivation sites in 12 regions nationwide, and grafted young watermelon seedlings were collected and used at 25 large horticultural seedlings nationwide.
data.target_sentence: Watermelon plants (leaf, flower, root) and soil were collected from 94 watermelon plantations in 12 regions across the country, and grafted young watermelon seedlings were collected from 25 large horticultural seedlings nationwide.

data.source_sentence: 수집한 수박 식물체는 각각 2 g씩 채취한 후 멸균수 5 ml와 섞어 마쇄한 후 1 ml을 뽑아 멸균수에 희석하였으며 토양은 각각 1 g씩 채취하여 멸균수에 10-4까지 희석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The collected watermelon plants were collected by 2 g each, mixed with 5 ml of sterilized water, ground, 1 ml was extracted, diluted in sterilized water, and the soil was collected by 1 g each and diluted to 10-4 in sterilized water.
data.target_sentence: 2 g each of the collected watermelon plants were collected, mixed with 5 ml of sterile water, ground and extracted 1 ml each, diluted in sterile water, and 1 g of each soil was collected and diluted 10-4 in sterile water.

data.source_sentence: 배지 위에 나타난 colony의 형태와 색, 크기로 육안 검정하여 서로 다른 미생물을 분리하였으며 2‒3회 반복 streaking하여 미생물을 순수 분리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Different microorganisms were separated by visual inspection by the shape, color, and size of colonies that appeared on the medium, and the microorganisms were isolated purely by repeated streaking 2–3 times.
data.target_sentence: Different microorganisms were visually separated according to the shape, color, and size of the colonies displayed in the medium, and the microorganisms were isolated purely by ship 2-3 times in a row.

data.source_sentence: 샘플에서 분리된 총 2,794종의 미생물은 선발한 A. citrulli에 대한 길항성 검정에 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A total of 2,794 species of microorganisms separated from the sample were used for the antagonistic test for the selected A. citrulli.
data.target_sentence: A total of 2,794 microorganisms isolated from the sample were used for the antagonist test against the selected A. citrulli.

data.source_sentence: 샘플에서 분리된 2,792종의 미생물과 선발한 BFB (A. citrulli)에 대한 1차 길항성 검정 결과 38종의 길항 후보 균주가 선발되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the primary antagonistic assay against 2,792 microorganisms isolated from the sample and the selected BFB (A. citrulli), 38 types of antagonistic candidate strains were selected.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the primary antagonistic analysis on 2,792 microorganisms isolated from the sample and the selected BFB (A. citrulli), 38 kinds of antagonistic candidate strains were selected.

data.source_sentence: 질소는 식물생육에 있어서 필요한 원소 중 하나로 식물의 신장, 엽면적 확장 및 분열 촉진에 영향을 주는 것으로 알려져 있어 식물생육에 가장 중요한 필수 원소 중 하나이다.
data.mt_sentence: Nitrogen is one of the most important essential elements for plant growth, as it is known to affect plant elongation, leaf area expansion and division promotion as one of the elements necessary for plant growth.
data.target_sentence: Nitrogen is one of the most important essential elements for plant growth as it is known to affect plant elongation, leaf area expansion, and promotion of division as one of the elements necessary for plant growth.

data.source_sentence: AAA에 따르면 암모니아의 생산은 식물 성장의 간접적인 촉진 특성 중 하나로 간주된다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the AAA, the production of ammonia is considered to be one of the indirect facilitating properties of plant growth.
data.target_sentence: According to the AAA, ammonia production is considered as one of the indirectly promoting properties of plant growth.

data.source_sentence: 질산환원효소는 질소고정세균에서 NH3에 고정된 N2를 환원시키는 데 중요한 역할을 하며 고정된 암모니아는 glutamate와 glutamine으로 동화되어 세포에서 아미노산, 핵산 및 단백질의 형성에 중요한 역할을 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Nitric acid reductase plays an important role in reducing N2 fixed to NH3 in nitrogen-fixing bacteria, and the fixed ammonia is assimilated into glutamate and glutamine, which plays an important role in the formation of amino acids, nucleic acids, and proteins in cells.
data.target_sentence: Nitrate reductase plays an important role in reducing N2 immobilized on NH3 in nitrogen-fixing bacteria, and immobilized ammonia is assimilated into glutamate and glutamine, and plays an important role in the formation of amino acids, nucleic acids, and proteins in cells.

data.source_sentence: 박테리아 및 용해 후 이러한 화합물은 환경으로 방출되어 식물 등의 유기체에 의해 질소 공급원으로 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: After bacteria and dissolution, these compounds are released into the environment and used as nitrogen sources by organisms such as plants.
data.target_sentence: After dissolution with bacteria, these compounds are released into the environment and used as a nitrogen source by organisms such as plants.

data.source_sentence: 암모니아를 생산하는 미생물로 토마토식물에 접종하였을 경우 줄기 길이, 잎 수, 잎 면적 등의 명확한 성장 개선을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: When tomato plants were inoculated with ammonia-producing microorganisms, there was a clear improvement in growth such as stem length, number of leaves, and leaf area.
data.target_sentence: When tomato plants were inoculated with ammonia-producing microorganisms, there was a clear improvement in growth such as stem length, leaf number and leaf area.

data.source_sentence: Phosphate는 식물 성장에 필요한 영양소 중에서 질소 다음으로 중요한 영양 요소이며 식물의 거의 모든 주요 대사 과정에서 중요한 역할을 담당하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Phosphate is the second most important nutrient after nitrogen among nutrients required for plant growth and plays an important role in almost all major metabolic processes of plants.
data.target_sentence: Phosphate is the second most important nutrient for plant growth after nitrogen and plays an important role in almost all major metabolic processes in plants.

data.source_sentence: 인산 분해 미생물은 식물의 대표적인 생장 호르몬인 지베렐린과 인돌아세트산을 생성하여 식물 생장을 촉진한다고 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Phosphoric acid-degrading microorganisms have been reported to promote plant growth by producing zibereline and indolecetic acid, the representative growth hormones of plants.
data.target_sentence: It has been reported that microorganisms that decompose phosphoric acid promote plant growth by producing gibberellin and indolesic acid, which are representative growth hormones of plants.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 인산 가용화 미생물이 유기물을 합성하고 식물 바이오매스를 증가시키기 위한 영양소의 효율적인 흡수 및 사용을 촉진하여 식물 성장을 촉진하고 뿌리줄기와 잎 바이오매스를 증가시킬 수 있음을 입증하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA demonstrated that phosphate soluble microorganisms can promote the efficient absorption and use of nutrients to synthesize organic matter and increase plant biomass, thereby promoting plant growth and increasing root stem and leaf biomass.
data.target_sentence: AAA demonstrated that phosphate-soluble microorganisms can promote efficient absorption and use of nutrients to synthesize organic matter and increase plant biomass to promote plant growth and increase rhizome and leaf biomass.

data.source_sentence: 유용 미생물을 토양에 접종하여 유용 미생물의 인산 분해 능력이 땅콩의 성장 촉진에 영향을 주는 것을 입증하였다.
data.mt_sentence: By inoculating useful microorganisms into the soil, it was demonstrated that the phosphate-decomposing ability of useful microorganisms affects the growth promotion of peanuts.
data.target_sentence: By inoculating the soil with useful microorganisms, it was found that the phosphorus-degrading ability of useful microorganisms affects the growth promotion of peanuts.

data.source_sentence: 수박 재배지에서 선발한 11종의 세균 모두 전분 가수분해 효소를 생성하지 않았으나 육묘장에서 선발한 17종의 세균은 모두 전분 가수분해 효소를 생성하였다.
data.mt_sentence: All 11 types of bacteria selected from watermelon cultivation did not produce starch hydrolase, but all 17 types of bacteria selected from nurseries produced starch hydrolase.
data.target_sentence: All 11 strains selected from watermelon cultivation did not produce starch hydrolase, but all 17 strains selected from seedlings produced starch hydrolase.

data.source_sentence: 전분은 식물의 생장 과정에서 중요한 역할을 하며 에너지 대사를 위해 잎의 엽록체에서 합성되고 성장 단계를 유지하기 위해 줄기, 뿌리, 종자 등의 비광합성기관에서도 합성된다.
data.mt_sentence: Starch plays an important role in plant growth and is synthesized in chloroplasts of leaves for energy metabolism and is also synthesized in non-photosynthetic organs such as stems, roots, and seeds to maintain the growth stage.
data.target_sentence: Starch plays an important role in plant growth, is synthesized in the chloroplast of leaves for energy metabolism, and is also synthesized in non-photosynthetic organs such as stems, roots and seeds to maintain the growth phase.

data.source_sentence: 전분 가수분해 효소의 생산은 박테리아가 다른 미생물의 성장을 억제하는 데 사용하는 일반적인 메커니즘으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The production of starch hydrolase is known as a common mechanism used by bacteria to inhibit the growth of other microorganisms.
data.target_sentence: The production of starch hydrolase is known to be a common mechanism used by bacteria to inhibit the growth of other microorganisms.

data.source_sentence: Siderophore는 킬레이 트화 반응을 통해 중금속에 의해 유발되는 철 결핍을 감소시켜 식물이 헴 및 엽록소와 같은 광합성 화합물을 합성하는 데 도움을 주는 것으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Siderophore is known to help plants synthesize photosynthetic compounds such as heme and chlorophyll by reducing iron deficiency caused by heavy metals through chelation reactions.
data.target_sentence: Siderophores are known to help plants synthesize photosynthetic compounds such as heme and chlorophyll by reducing iron deficiency due to heavy metals through chelation reactions.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 선발한 28종의 길항 미생물은 실험 결과 chitinase 효소를 생성하지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: The 28 types of antagonistic microorganisms selected in this study did not produce chitinase enzymes as a result of the experiment.
data.target_sentence: The 28 antagonistic microorganisms selected in this study did not produce the chitinase enzyme as a result of the experiment.

data.source_sentence: 전국 26개 지역의 94곳의 수박재배지와 25곳의 대형 원예 육묘장에서 수박 식물체(잎, 꽃, 뿌리) 및 토양을 수집하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Watermelon plants (leaves, flowers, roots) and soil were collected at 94 watermelon cultivation sites and 25 large horticultural cemeteries in 26 regions across the country.
data.target_sentence: Watermelon plants (leaf, flower, root) and soil were collected from 94 watermelon cultivation sites and 25 large horticultural cemeteries in 26 regions across the country.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 선발한 28종의 길항 세균은 배지에서 A. citrulli를 효과적으로 억제하였으며 사이안화 수소와 단백질분해효소 생산 능력 검정을 통해 길항 활성을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The 28 kinds of antagonistic bacteria selected in this study effectively inhibited A. citrulli in the medium, and their antagonistic activity was confirmed through hydrogen cyanide and protease production capacity assays.
data.target_sentence: The 28 kinds of antagonistic bacteria selected in this study effectively inhibited A. citrulli in the medium, and their antagonistic activity was confirmed by analysis of hydrogen cyanide and protease production capacity.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구결과는 향후수박 과실썩음병 방제제 및 성장촉진제 등의 친환경 농자재 개발에 유용한 기초 자료가 될 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: The results of this study are expected to be useful basic data for the future development of eco-friendly agricultural materials such as watermelon fruit rot control agents and growth promoters.
data.target_sentence: The results of this study are expected to be useful basic data for the development of eco-friendly agricultural materials such as watermelon fruit spoilage inhibitors and growth promoters in the future.

data.source_sentence: 반추 동물의 급여 단백질 효율성은 반추위 내 미생물 발효에 따른 우회 단백질, 미생물체의 단백질, 사료 및 미생물체의 아미노산 구성 등에 의해 결정된다.
data.mt_sentence: The efficiency of feeding protein in ruminants is determined by bypass protein according to the fermentation of microorganisms in the rumen, protein of microorganisms, feed and amino acid composition of microorganisms.
data.target_sentence: The protein supply efficiency of ruminants is determined by the bypass protein according to the microbial fermentation of the ruminant, the protein of the microorganism, the feed of the microorganism and the amino acid composition.

data.source_sentence: 캐뉼라를 장착한 한우 암소를 이용하여 in situ 실험을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: An in situ experiment was performed using a cannula-mounted Korean cattle cow.
data.target_sentence: Field experiments were performed using cannulated Hanwoo cattle.

data.source_sentence: 우회 단백질 함량은 타피오카가 59.98%로 가장 높았다.
data.mt_sentence: The bypass protein content was highest in tapioca at 59.98%.
data.target_sentence: The bypass protein content was highest in tapioca at 59.98%.

data.source_sentence: 미생물의 총 아미노산 함량은 대두박이 52.07%로 높았으며, 아미노산 조성은 모든 시험 사료에서 Glu가 높았다.
data.mt_sentence: The total amino acid content of microorganisms was high as 52.07% in soybean meal, and the amino acid composition was high in Glu in all test feeds.
data.target_sentence: The total amino acid content of microorganisms was high as 52.07% in soybean meal, and the amino acid composition was high in Glu in all test feeds.

data.source_sentence: 단백질은 근육을 구성하고 성장과 조직 복구, 에너지 수송 및 저장에 관여하기 때문에 성장과 유지에 필수적이다.
data.mt_sentence: Proteins are essential for growth and maintenance because they make up muscle and are involved in growth and tissue repair, transport and storage of energy.
data.target_sentence: Proteins are essential for growth and maintenance because they build muscle and are involved in growth and tissue repair, transport and storage of energy.

data.source_sentence: 반추 가축의 대사 단백질은 소장에서 흡수되어 근육과 결합 조직 등의 체내 단백질 합성에 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: Metabolic proteins from ruminants are absorbed in the small intestine and used for protein synthesis in the body, such as muscles and connective tissues.
data.target_sentence: Metabolic proteins in ruminants are absorbed in the small intestine and used for protein synthesis in the body, such as muscle and connective tissue.

data.source_sentence: 반추 가축의 급여 단백질 사료원은 반추위 내 미생물 분해에 의해 비단백태질소화합물로 전환된다.
data.mt_sentence: The protein feed source for ruminant livestock is converted into non-protein nitrogen compounds by microbial degradation in the rumen.
data.target_sentence: Protein sources in ruminants are converted to non-protein nitrogenous compounds by microbial degradation in the rumen.

data.source_sentence: 반추위 미생물 단백질은 반추 가축의 에너지 효율과 단백질 생산에 중요한 우회 단백질의 역할을 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The ruminant microbial protein acts as a bypass protein that is important for the energy efficiency and protein production of ruminant livestock.
data.target_sentence: Ruminant microbial proteins act as bypass proteins that are important for energy efficiency and protein production in ruminants.

data.source_sentence: 반추 가축의 급여 사료 품질과 사료원은 반추위 내 미생물 단백질 합성량에 영향을 미친다.
data.mt_sentence: The feed quality and feed source of ruminants affect the amount of microbial protein synthesis in the ruminants.
data.target_sentence: The feed quality and feed source of ruminants affects the amount of microbial protein synthesis in ruminants.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 이유로 반추 동물의 유지와 성장 및 축산물 생산에 필요한 단백질 요구량을 적절하게 공급하기 위해서는 사료원의 우회 단백질과 우회 아미노산 함량, 반추위 미생물의 발효 양상 그리고 미생물체의 아미노산 조성 등이 중요한 작용을 한다.
data.mt_sentence: For this reason, in order to properly supply the protein requirements required for the maintenance and growth of ruminants and the production of livestock products, the bypass protein and bypass amino acid content of the feed source, the fermentation pattern of the rumen microorganism, and the amino acid composition of the microorganism play an important role.
data.target_sentence: For this reason, it adequately supplies the protein requirements necessary for the maintenance and growth of ruminants and the production of livestock products. To this end, the content of bypass proteins and bypass amino acids in feed sources, the fermentation pattern of rumen microorganisms, and the amino acid composition of microorganisms play an important role.

data.source_sentence: 한우에 대한 실증 관련 데이터는 전무한 상태이며 연구의 다양성이 필요한 실정이다.
data.mt_sentence: There is no empirical data on Korean beef, and there is a need for diversity in research.
data.target_sentence: There are no empirical data on Korean beef and there is a need for diversity in research.

data.source_sentence: 한우 반추위에서의 단백질 우회율 측정을 위한 in situ 실험을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: An in situ experiment was conducted to measure the protein bypass rate in the rumen of Korean beef.
data.target_sentence: An in situ experiment was performed to measure the protein bypass rate in the rumen of Korean beef.

data.source_sentence: 실험 1에서는 한우의 단백질 사료 원료의 우회율을 측정하기 위하여 in situ 실험을 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In Experiment 1, an in-situ experiment was conducted to measure the bypass rate of the protein feed raw material of Korean beef.
data.target_sentence: In Experiment 1, a field experiment was performed to measure the bypass rate of Korean beef protein feed.

data.source_sentence: dacron bag은 24시간 후 꺼내 농장에서 흐르는 물로 1차 세척을 바로 진행하였으며 30분 이내로 실험실로 운반하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The dacron bag was taken out after 24 hours, and the first washing was carried out immediately with running water from the farm, and it was transported to the laboratory within 30 minutes.
data.target_sentence: After 24 hours, the dacron bag was taken out, and the first washing was performed immediately under running water from the farm, and it was transported to the laboratory within 30 minutes.

data.source_sentence: 2차 세척은 실험실에서 흐르는 증류수를 이용하여 반추위액을 제거한 후 60℃로 가열해 놓은 drying oven에 서 72시간 동안 건조시켰다.
data.mt_sentence: The second washing was performed using distilled water flowing in the laboratory to remove the rumen, and then dried in a drying oven heated to 60°C for 72 hours.
data.target_sentence: Second washing was dried in a drying oven heated to 60 ℃ after removing the rumen with distilled water flowing through the laboratory for 72 hours.

data.source_sentence: 한우에서의 반추위 발효 특성과 미생물체 아미노산의 분석을 위한 in vistro 실험을 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: An in-vistro experiment was conducted for the analysis of rumen fermentation characteristics and microbial amino acids in Korean beef.
data.target_sentence: In vitro experiments were performed to analyze the rumen fermentation characteristics and microbial amino acids of Korean beef.

data.source_sentence: 접종액 제조는 캐뉼라가 장착된 한우의 반추위에서 아침 사료 급여 전인 오전 7시경 채취한 내용물을 4겹의 거즈로 여과하고 혐기성 상태로 유지한 후 30분 이내 실험실로 운반하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For the preparation of the inoculum, the contents collected from the rumen of Korean cattle equipped with a cannula at around 7 am before morning feed were filtered through 4 layers of gauze, maintained in an anaerobic state, and then transported to the laboratory within 30 minutes.
data.target_sentence: For the preparation of the inoculum, the contents collected from the rumen of Korean cattle equipped with a cannula at around 7 am before breakfast were filtered through 4 layers of gauze, maintained in an anaerobic state, and then transferred to the laboratory within 30 minutes.

data.source_sentence: 반추위 내 발효 특성을 분석하기 위해 배양하면서 0, 3, 6, 9, 12, 24시간대에 배양액을 10 mL씩 채취하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to analyze the fermentation characteristics in the rumen, 10 mL of the culture medium was collected at 0, 3, 6, 9, 12, and 24 hours during culture.
data.target_sentence: To analyze the fermentation characteristics of the rumen, 10 mL of culture medium was collected at 0, 3, 6, 9, 12, and 24 hours during culture.

data.source_sentence: 체내 아미노산을 흡수율은 반추위 내 미생물에 의해 이용되는 양보다는 소장에서 직접 흡수될 수 있는 단백질의 양이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: For the absorption rate of amino acids in the body, the amount of protein that can be absorbed directly from the small intestine is more important than the amount used by microorganisms in the rumen.
data.target_sentence: For the absorption rate of amino acids, the amount of protein that can be absorbed directly from the small intestine is more important than the amount used by microorganisms in the rumen.

data.source_sentence: 대두박은 사료의 조단백질 수준이 11.0%와 14.5%일 때 우회되는 단백질의 함량은 68.8%와 72.7%을 나타내었으며, 조단백질 함량의 증가는 우회 단백질 양이 증가한다는 연구와 일치하는 결과를 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Soybean meal showed 68.8% and 72.7% of bypass protein when the crude protein level of the feed was 11.0% and 14.5%, and the increase in crude protein content was consistent with the study that the amount of bypass protein increased.
data.target_sentence: Soybean meal had 68.8% and 72.7% bypass protein content when the crude protein content of the feed was 11.0% and 14.5%, consistent with the study that the increase in crude protein content increased the bypass protein content.

data.source_sentence: Table 2의 결과와 이전 연구와의 우회 단백질 함량 차이는 시험 원료, 가공 방법 등의 차이 때문인 것으로 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: The difference in bypass protein content between the results in Table 2 and previous studies is thought to be due to differences in test raw materials and processing methods.
data.target_sentence: The difference in bypass protein content between the results in Table 2 and previous studies is thought to be due to differences in test raw materials and processing methods.

data.source_sentence: 실험 2에서는 단백질 사료 원료의 반추위 발효 특성과 미생물체 아미노산 분석을 위한 in vitro 실험을 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In Experiment 2, an in vitro experiment was conducted for the analysis of rumen fermentation characteristics and microbial amino acids of protein feed ingredients.
data.target_sentence: In Experiment 2, an in vitro experiment was performed for the analysis of rumen fermentation characteristics and microbial amino acids of protein feed ingredients.

data.source_sentence: 본 실험을 통해 얻은 반추위 발효액의 pH 수치는 Table 3에 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: The pH values of the ruminant fermentation liquid obtained through this experiment are shown in Table 3.
data.target_sentence: Table 3 shows the pH values of the ruminant fermentation broth obtained through this experiment.

data.source_sentence: 발효에 따른 전체 배양시간 동안 pH는 점차 감소하였으며 그 결과, 모든 시료는 24시간대에서 반추위 적정 pH인 5.5~7.0 수준을 유지하였다.
data.mt_sentence: During the total culture time following fermentation, the pH gradually decreased, and as a result, all samples maintained an appropriate pH of 5.5 to 7.0, which is the proper pH for rumination, in the 24-hour period.
data.target_sentence: After fermentation, the pH gradually decreased during the entire incubation time, and all samples maintained an appropriate pH of 5.5 to 7.0, which is a pH suitable for rumination for 24 hours.

data.source_sentence: 미국산 대두박, DDGS, 주정박, 타피오카의 경우 접종 후 9시간에 pH가 급격히 증가했지만 이내 안정화되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of American soybean foil, DDGS, gourd, and tapioca, the pH increased rapidly at 9 hours after inoculation, but soon stabilized.
data.target_sentence: In the case of US soybean meal, DDGS, gourd, and tapioca, the pH increased rapidly 9 hours after inoculation, but was soon stabilized.

data.source_sentence: 원산지가 다른 2개의 옥수수 시료와 원산지가 다른 3가지의 단백피 시료의 경우 pH 차이가 두드러지지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of two corn samples of different origin and three protein samples of different origin, the pH difference was not noticeable.
data.target_sentence: For two corn samples from different origins and three protein samples from different origins, the pH difference was not noticeable.

data.source_sentence: 미국산 대두박은 배양 후 9시간에 pH가 증가한 후 이내 감소하는 양상을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the US soybean meal, the pH increased at 9 hours after incubation and then decreased within minutes.
data.target_sentence: In US soybean meal, the pH increased at 9 hours after incubation and decreased within minutes.

data.source_sentence: MPS의 양은 0시간부터 시료 간 큰 차이를 보였으며, 시료의 수용성 단백질 함량이 본 실험의 MPS 분석 방법에 영향을 미치는 것으로 예상된다.
data.mt_sentence: The amount of MPS showed a large difference between samples from 0 hours, and the water-soluble protein content of the sample is expected to affect the MPS analysis method of this experiment.
data.target_sentence: The amount of MPS showed a large difference between samples from time 0, so it is expected that the water-soluble protein content of the sample will affect the MPS analysis method of this experiment.

data.source_sentence: 배양 전 시간에 걸쳐 국산 단백피의 MPS가 가장 높았으며, 타피오카가 가장 낮았다.
data.mt_sentence: Over the time before incubation, the MPS of domestic protein was the highest, and tapioca was the lowest.
data.target_sentence: During the whole incubation time, the MPS of domestic protein was highest and that of tapioca was lowest.

data.source_sentence: 미국산 대두박은 다른 시료들과 비교했을 때 배양 0시간대의 MPS는 높지 않았으나, 배양 시간이 경과함에 따라 다른 시료에 비해 가장 많이 증가하여 미생물 단백질 합성에 가장 큰 영향을 미치는 것으로 예상된다.
data.mt_sentence: Compared to other samples, the MPS of US soybean meal was not high during the 0 culture time period, but as the incubation time elapsed, it increased the most compared to other samples, which is expected to have the greatest effect on microbial protein synthesis.
data.target_sentence: The MPS of US soybean meal was not high during 0 hours of incubation compared to other samples, but as the incubation time elapsed, it increased the most compared to other samples, which is expected to have the greatest effect on microbial protein synthesis.

data.source_sentence: 타피오카는 배양 전 시간에 걸쳐 가장 적은 양의 미생물 단백질 합성량을 나타냈는데 시료의 조단백질 함량(Table 1)이 2.80%로 가장 낮기 때문으로 추정된다.
data.mt_sentence: Tapioca showed the lowest amount of microbial protein synthesis throughout the entire culture period, presumably because the crude protein content of the sample (Table 1) was the lowest at 2.80%.
data.target_sentence: Tapioca showed the lowest amount of microbial protein synthesis during the entire culture period, presumably because the crude protein content of the sample (Table 1) was the lowest at 2.80%.

data.source_sentence: 백피 사료의 경우 같은 중국 내에서도 지역에 따라 품질 차이가 크며, 모든 배양 시간마다 차이를 나타내기 때문에 지역에 따른 품질 차이가 있다는 기존의 연구 결과를 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of white skin feed, there is a big difference in quality depending on region even within the same China, and since it shows a difference at every incubation time, it was possible to confirm the results of previous studies that there was a difference in quality by region.
data.target_sentence: In the case of white skin feed, there is a big difference in quality depending on the region even within the same China. It was possible to confirm the previous research result that there is a difference in quality depending on the region because it shows a difference at every incubation time.

data.source_sentence: 옥수수(남미산, 우크라이나산), 단백피(국산, 중국산1, 중국산2), 대두박(국산, 브라질산, 미국산)은 원산지는 다르지만 발효 시간에 따라 유사한 양상을 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Corn (from South America, Ukraine), protein (domestic, Chinese 1, Chinese 2), and soybean gourds (domestic, Brazilian, and US) were of different origin, but they showed similar patterns depending on the fermentation time.
data.target_sentence: Corn (South American, Ukrainian), protein (Korean, Chinese 1, Chinese 2), and soybean meal (Korean, Brazilian, American) had different origins, but showed similar patterns depending on the fermentation time.

data.source_sentence: 옥수수(남미산, 우크라이나산), 단백피(국산, 중국산1, 중국산2), 대두박(국산, 브라질산, 미국산) 사료의 경우 원산지에 따라 발생하는 NH3-N의 농도에 차이가 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of corn (South America, Ukraine), protein skin (Korea, China 1, China 2), and soybean meal (Korean, Brazilian, American) feed, there was a difference in the concentration of NH3-N depending on the country of origin.
data.target_sentence: In the case of corn (South American, Ukrainian), protein hulls (Korea, China 1, China 2), soybean meal (Korea, Brazil, USA), there was a difference in the concentration of NH3-N depending on the country of origin.

data.source_sentence: NH3-N 농도의 차이는 각 사료에 대한 반추위 우회율과 미생물 단백질 합성량의 차이에서 기인하는 것을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was confirmed that the difference in NH3-N concentration was caused by the difference in the ruminant bypass rate and the amount of microbial protein synthesis for each feed.
data.target_sentence: It was confirmed that the difference in NH3-N concentration was due to the difference in the ruminant bypass rate and the amount of microbial protein synthesis by feed.

data.source_sentence: 특히 팜박, 미강, 주정박 및 타피오카의 경우 MPS가 낮고 배양 시간에 따른 증가폭이 적었던 것은 NH3-N 발생량이 부족하여 미생물합성에 필요한 질소를 공급받지 못해 발생한 현상으로 보여진다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, Palm Park, Migang, Jujeong Park, and Tapioca have low MPS and low increase in incubation time due to insufficient NH3-N generation, which is believed to be caused by the lack of nitrogen required for microbial synthesis.
data.target_sentence: In particular, night palm, rice bran, brewer's sake, tapioca, etc. lack of nitrogen necessary for microbial synthesis and lack of NH3-N production, resulting in low MPS and little increase in incubation time.

data.source_sentence: 모든 시료는 배양하면서 0시간대에 비해 24시간에서 총 VFA가 증가하는 경향을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: While culturing all samples, the total VFA tended to increase at 24 hours compared to the 0 hour period.
data.target_sentence: During incubation of all samples, total VFA showed a tendency to increase at 24 h compared to 0 h.

data.source_sentence: 배양하면서 24시간에서 우크라이나산 옥수수의 농도가 가장 높았고 주정박이 가장 낮았다.
data.mt_sentence: During incubation, Ukrainian corn had the highest concentration at 24 hours and liquor gourds had the lowest concentration.
data.target_sentence: During the hatching period, Ukrainian maize had the highest concentration at 24 hours and gourd had the lowest concentration.

data.source_sentence: MPS 분석 결과에서 알 수 있듯이 타피오카는 미생물 단백질 합성량이 극히 적어 아미노산 분석이 불가능했다.
data.mt_sentence: As can be seen from the MPS analysis results, tapioca was unable to analyze amino acids due to the extremely small amount of microbial protein synthesis.
data.target_sentence: As can be seen from the MPS analysis results, amino acids could not be analyzed in tapioca because the amount of microbial protein synthesis was extremely low.

data.source_sentence: 미생물체의 총 아미노산 함량은 쌀겨의 경우 29.78%로 가장 낮았고, 미국산 대두박의 경우 52.07%로 가장 높았다.
data.mt_sentence: The total amino acid content of microorganisms was the lowest at 29.78% in the case of rice bran, and the highest at 52.07% in the case of American soybean gourds.
data.target_sentence: The total amino acid content of microorganisms was the lowest at 29.78% in rice bran and the highest at 52.07% in US soybean meal.

data.source_sentence: 모든 시료의 미생물체 개별 아미노산 중 Glu는 가장 높은 함량을 나타냈다.
data.mt_sentence: Of the individual amino acids of microorganisms in all samples, Glu showed the highest content.
data.target_sentence: In all samples, Glu showed the highest content among the individual amino acids of microorganisms.

data.source_sentence: 미생물 단백질은 반추 가축의 대사 단백질에서 중요한 요소이다.
data.mt_sentence: Microbial proteins are important components of metabolic proteins in ruminant livestock.
data.target_sentence: Microbial proteins are important components of metabolic proteins in ruminants.

data.source_sentence: 미생물 단백질 합성량을 증가시키기 위한 연구 중 반추위 내 단백질과 탄수화물의 분해 속도의 동기화(synchronization)는 미생물 단백질 합성량을 증가시킬 수 있다고 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Among studies to increase the amount of microbial protein synthesis, synchronization of the decomposition rates of proteins and carbohydrates in the rumen could increase the amount of microbial protein synthesis.
data.target_sentence: Synchronizing the degradation rate of protein and carbohydrate in the rumen during research to increase the amount of microbial protein synthesis can increase the amount of microbial protein synthesis.

data.source_sentence: 현재 한우의 미생물체 아미노산에 대한 독립적인 연구는 다양하게 이루어지지 않은 상태이다.
data.mt_sentence: Currently, independent research on microbial amino acids of Korean beef has not been conducted in a variety of ways.
data.target_sentence: Currently, independent research on microbial amino acids in domestic cattle has not been conducted in various ways.

data.source_sentence: 한우에게 적용할 수 있는 풍미 증진 사료와 단백질 공급 시스템을 개발하기 위해서 본 자료는 기초 자료로써 활용할 수 있을 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: This data can be used as basic data to develop a flavor enhancing feed and protein supply system applicable to Korean beef.
data.target_sentence: This data can be used as basic data for the development of flavor-enhancing feed and protein supply system applicable to Korean beef.

data.source_sentence: 연구1, 2에서 사용된 단백질 사료인 원료 15종들은 한우에서 단백질 공급원과 에너지 공급원으로 사용될 수 있다는 것을 입증하였으며, 상호보완적인 관계로 사용하면 그 효과를 더욱 높일 수 있는 것으로 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: The 15 kinds of protein feed ingredients used in studies 1 and 2 proved that they can be used as a protein source and an energy source in Korean beef, and it is thought that the effect can be further enhanced when used in a complementary relationship.
data.target_sentence: It has been proven that the 15 protein feed ingredients used in studies 1 and 2 can be used as a protein source and energy source in Korean cattle, and it is thought that the effect can be further enhanced when used in a complementary relationship.

data.source_sentence: 해당 연구 결과를 바탕으로 우회 단백질, 우회 아미노산, 반추위 내 발효 특성, 그리고 미생물체 아미노산의 결과를 이용해 한우의 대사 단백질 공급에 관한 지속적인 연구가 이루어져야 할 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the results of this study, continuous research on the supply of metabolic protein of Korean beef using bypass proteins, bypass amino acids, fermentation characteristics in the rumen, and microbial amino acids should be conducted.
data.target_sentence: Based on the results of this study, continuous research on the supply of metabolic proteins of Korean beef using bypass proteins, bypass amino acids, rumen fermentation characteristics, and microbial amino acids should be conducted.

data.source_sentence: 연구 대상이 되는 부지는 농경지역으로 북쪽은 하천이 서쪽에서 동쪽으로 흐르며 하천 경계를 형성하고, 남쪽은 불투수 경계로 이루어져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The site to be studied is an agricultural area, with a river flowing from west to east in the north to form a river boundary, and an impervious boundary to the south.
data.target_sentence: The study site is agricultural land, where rivers flow from west to east to the north and form a river boundary, and an impervious boundary to the south.

data.source_sentence: 질산성질소는 전반적으로 지하수 흐름과 유사하게 하천으로 흐르는 것으로 분석되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Nitrate nitrogen was analyzed to flow into rivers similar to the flow of groundwater in general.
data.target_sentence: Nitrate nitrogen was generally analyzed to flow into rivers similar to the flow of groundwater.

data.source_sentence: 모델링 결과, 약 3년에서 5년 정도 경과 후 안정된 상태로 도달하는 것으로 판단되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of modeling, it was judged that a stable state was reached after about 3 to 5 years.
data.target_sentence: As a result of modeling, it is judged that a stable state has been reached after about 3 to 5 years.

data.source_sentence: 이는 추가적인 오염원 유입이 없는 현재 상태만 고려한 것으로 만약 지속적 오염이 유입된다면 오염 범위와 안정화 기간이 증가할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This is only considering the current state of no additional pollutant inflow, and if continuous pollution is introduced, the pollution range and stabilization period may increase.
data.target_sentence: This is only considering the current state of no additional pollutant inflows, and the continuous inflow of pollutants may increase the contamination range and stabilization period.

data.source_sentence: 질산성질소는 PRB를 설치하여 42일 차까지는 5 mg/L보다 낮은 농도가 유지되었으나 84일 차부터는 PRB 내부의 질산성질소를 제거하는 유효 기간이 끝나 원래의 농도를 회복하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The concentration of nitrate nitrogen was maintained lower than 5 mg/L until the 42nd day after the PRB was installed, but from the 84th day, the effective period for removing the nitrate nitrogen inside the PRB was over, and the original concentration was restored.
data.target_sentence: Nitrate nitrogen concentration was maintained at 5mg/L or less until the 42nd day after PRB installation, but from the 84th day, the effective period for removing nitrate nitrogen inside the PRB was over and it was restored to the original concentration.

data.source_sentence: 2017년 환경부의 전국 지하수 수질 측정망 운영 결과에 의하면, 지하수의 수질 기준을 초과한 지점이 총조사 지점의 8.9%로 최근 5년간 평균 8.0%보다 기준 초과율이 높았다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the Ministry of Environment's operation of the nationwide groundwater quality measurement network in 2017, 8.9% of the total survey points exceeded the standard water quality standard, higher than the average of 8.0% over the past five years.
data.target_sentence: According to the operation of the National Groundwater Quality Monitoring Network by the Ministry of Environment in 2017, 8.9% of the total survey points exceeded the standard water quality standard, exceeding the average of 8.0% for the past five years.

data.source_sentence: 전체 수질 기준 초과 항목 중 수소이온농도, 염소이온, 질산성질소가 대부분을 차지했다.
data.mt_sentence: Hydrogen ion concentration, chlorine ion, and nitrate nitrogen accounted for most of the items exceeding the total water quality standards.
data.target_sentence: Most of the items had hydrogen ion concentration, chlorine ion, and nitrogen nitrate exceeding the overall water quality standards.

data.source_sentence: 수중에 존재하는 질산성질소는 물리적(음이온교환, 역삼투, 전기투석), 화학적(환원, 침전), 생물학적(미생물에 의한 탈질) 공정으로 제거할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Nitrate nitrogen present in water can be removed by physical (anion exchange, reverse osmosis, electrodialysis), chemical (reduction, precipitation), and biological (denitrification by microorganisms) processes.
data.target_sentence: Nitrate nitrogen present in water can be removed through physical (anion exchange, reverse osmosis, electrodialysis), chemical (reduction, precipitation) and biological (denitrification by microorganisms) processes.

data.source_sentence: 대표적으로 나노 크기 영가철 또는 활성탄 기반 촉매를 이용한 방법, 생물 벽체를 이용한 방법 등이 연구되었으며, 해외에서는 미생물 탈질 반응을 이용한 질산성질소 정화 연구가 시행되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: Representatively, methods using nano-sized zero-valent iron or activated carbon-based catalysts and methods using biological walls have been studied, and research on nitrate nitrogen purification using microbial denitrification has been conducted abroad.
data.target_sentence: Typically, a method using a nano-sized zero-valent iron or activated carbon-based catalyst and a method using a biological wall are being studied, and overseas studies on nitrate nitrogen purification using microbial denitrification are being conducted.

data.source_sentence: 질산성질소로 오염된 지하수의 지중정화 기술은 지상 인프라가 필요 없고 운용에 따른 추가 소요 비용이 낮기 때문에 비원위치 정화 기술보다 저비용 고효율의 기술 적용이 가능하나 국내에서의 현장 적용 사례는 많지 않다.
data.mt_sentence: The underground purification technology of groundwater contaminated with nitric nitrogen does not require ground infrastructure and the additional cost of operation is low, so it is possible to apply low-cost and high-efficiency technology than non-original purification technology, but there are not many cases of field application in Korea.
data.target_sentence: The underground purification technology of groundwater contaminated with nitrate nitrogen does not require ground infrastructure and has a low additional cost for operation. Therefore, it is possible to apply a low-cost and high-efficiency technology than a non-in-situ purification technology, but there are not many cases of field application in Korea.

data.source_sentence: 이렇듯 대상 부지의 수리지질 및 오염 특성에 따른 최적의 공법을 제시하는 것은 경제성뿐만 아니라 지속 가능한 개발을 위해서도 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: As such, it is necessary not only for economic feasibility but also for sustainable development to suggest the optimal construction method according to the hydrogeology and pollution characteristics of the target site.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, for economical as well as sustainable development, it is necessary to present the optimal construction method according to the hydrogeology and pollution characteristics of the site.

data.source_sentence: 연구 대상 부지는 예산군에 위치해 있으며, 서쪽에서 동쪽으로 하천이 흐르고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The research site is located in Yesan-gun, and a river flows from west to east.
data.target_sentence: The research site is located in Yesan-gun, and the river flows from west to east.

data.source_sentence: 2016년 수질 개선 시범사업을 위한 수질 검사 결과, 42개의 조사 관정 중 질산성질소 수질 기준이 초과된 관정은 22개로 52%의 초과율이 조사되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the water quality test for the water quality improvement pilot project in 2016, 22 wells exceeded the nitrate nitrogen water quality standard out of 42 surveyed wells, and an excess rate of 52% was investigated.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the water quality test for the water quality improvement pilot project in 2016, 22 out of 42 survey wells exceeded the nitrogen nitrate water quality standard, and the excess rate was 52%.

data.source_sentence: 대상 지역 내 음용 관정을 대상으로 한 수질 검사 결과, 수질 기준 초과율은 88%로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the water quality test on drinking tubes in the target area, the excess rate of the water quality standard was 88%.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the water quality test of the target area, the rate of exceeding the water quality standard was 88%.

data.source_sentence: 지하수 관측정 설치 및 관련 자료에 따르면, 연구 대상 부지의 지층은 지표로부터 붕적층, 충적층, 풍화토, 풍화암, 연암 순으로 분포된 것으로 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the installation of groundwater observation wells and related data, it was reported that the stratum of the research site was distributed in the order from the surface of the study site to the stratum lamination, alluvium, weathered soil, weathered rock, and soft rock.
data.target_sentence: According to the installation of groundwater pipe measurement and related data, it was reported that the strata of the survey area were distributed in the order of lamination, alluvial layer, weathered soil, weathered rock, and soft rock on the surface of the survey area.

data.source_sentence: 연구 대상의 부지는 약 60 m.EL의 남부 산지, 중심부고도 20~40 m.EL의 주거 지구, 0~20 m.EL의 농경 지역으로 구성되어 있으며 남쪽 구릉에서 북쪽 하천으로 유출이 일어나는 지형이다.
data.mt_sentence: The site of the study is about 60 meters.EL's southern mountainous area, central elevation of 20 to 40 m.Residential District of EL, 0-20 m.It is composed of an agricultural area of EL and is a topography that flows from the southern hill to the northern river.
data.target_sentence: The study site consists of a mountainous area in the south at about 60 m.EL, a residential area at a central elevation of 20-40 m.EL, and agricultural land at an altitude of 0-20 m.EL, from the southern hill to the north river.

data.source_sentence: 북쪽은 하천이 서쪽에서 동쪽으로 흐르며 하천 경계를 형성하고 남쪽은 불투수 경계로 이루어져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the north, a river flows from west to east to form a river boundary, and in the south, it is composed of an impermeable boundary.
data.target_sentence: In the north, the river flows from west to east to form a river boundary, and in the south is an impervious boundary.

data.source_sentence: FEFLOW 프로그램을 이용한 모델링 결과, 약 3년에서 5년 정도 경과 후 안정 상태로 도달하는 것으로 판단되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of modeling using the FEFLOW program, it was determined that it reached a stable state after about 3 to 5 years.
data.target_sentence: As a result of modeling using the FEFLOW program, it is judged that a stable state has been reached after about 3 to 5 years.

data.source_sentence: EHC 소재는 탈질 미생물의 생장에 필요한 영양 물질을 포함하고 있어 현장 지하수 및 토양에 존재하는 탈질 미생물의 생장을 촉진시킬 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since EHC material contains nutrients necessary for the growth of denitrification microorganisms, it can promote the growth of denitrification microorganisms present in groundwater and soil in the field.
data.target_sentence: The EHC material contains nutrients necessary for the growth of denitrification microorganisms, so it can promote the growth of denitrification microorganisms present in groundwater and soil in the field.

data.source_sentence: 현장 모니터링 및 지하수 수질 분석은 신규 4개의 관측정과 기존 관정 1개소, 음용수로 사용하는 관정을 이용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For on-site monitoring and groundwater quality analysis, four new observation wells, one existing well, and a well used for drinking water were used.
data.target_sentence: Four new observation wells, one existing well, and drinking water wells were used for on-site monitoring and groundwater quality analysis.

data.source_sentence: 모니터링 관정을 통해 현장 측정 및 채수 후 실험실 분석을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Laboratory analysis was performed after field measurements and collection through monitoring wells.
data.target_sentence: Laboratory analyzes were performed after collection through in situ measurement and monitoring wells.

data.source_sentence: 정화용 소재(EHC)는 투수성과 미생물의 생장 향상을 위해 물과 혼합하여 슬러리 형태로 주입하고, 시멘트를 제조하는 데 사용하는 그라우트 믹서(groutmixer)를 현장에서 이용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The material for purification (EHC) was mixed with water to improve water permeability and growth of microorganisms and injected in the form of a slurry, and a groutmixer used to manufacture cement was used in the field.
data.target_sentence: A material for purification (EHC) was mixed with water to improve water permeability and growth of microorganisms, and was injected in the form of a slurry, and a grout mixer used for cement production was used in the field.

data.source_sentence: 목표 심도까지 고압 기액 분사 천공을 하여 토양 파쇄·절삭 공극을 확보하고 약액(EHC 슬러리)을 고압으로 연속 주입하여 목표 심도까지 주입을 완료하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The high-pressure gas-liquid injection drilling was made to the target depth to secure the soil crushing and cutting voids, and the chemical solution (EHC slurry) was continuously injected at high pressure to complete the injection to the target depth.
data.target_sentence: High-pressure gas-liquid injection drilling was performed to the target depth to secure soil crushing and cutting voids, and the chemical solution (EHC slurry) was continuously injected at high pressure to complete the injection to the target depth.

data.source_sentence: MW-01은 PRB를 설치하고 12일 차부터 28일까지 초기 농도보다 낮은 농도를 보였는데 이는 슬러리의 지중 주입 과정에서 주입된 물로 인해 질산성질소의 농도가 일시적으로 희석되었기 때문으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: MW-01 showed a lower concentration than the initial concentration from the 12th to the 28th after installing PRB, which is believed to be due to the temporary dilution of nitric nitrogen due to water injected during the underground injection process of slurry.
data.target_sentence: MW-01 showed a lower concentration than the initial concentration from 12 to 28 days after PRB installation, which is presumed to be due to the temporary nitrogen dilution by the water injected during the slurry underground injection process.

data.source_sentence: PRB의 유효 기간이 감소함에 따라 질산성질소 농도가 서서히 증가하여 98일 차에는 25.1 mg/L의 질산성질소농도를 회복하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As the effective period of PRB decreased, the nitric nitrogen concentration gradually increased, and on the 98th day, the nitric nitrogen concentration of 25.1 mg/L was recovered.
data.target_sentence: As the effective period of PRB decreased, the nitrate concentration gradually increased, and the nitrate concentration of 25.1 mg/L was recovered on the 98th day.

data.source_sentence: MW-02, 03 관정과 다른 경향성을 보이는 것으로 보아 PRB에 의해 정화된 지하수의 흐름 방향이 예상과 다르며 MW-04로 외부 지하수가 유입된 것을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As it shows a different tendency from the MW-02 and 03 tubes, it can be seen that the flow direction of the groundwater purified by PRB is different from expected, and external groundwater has flowed into MW-04.
data.target_sentence: As it shows a different trend from the MW-02 and 03 tubes, it can be seen that the flow direction of groundwater purified by PRB is different from the expected and external groundwater flows into MW-04.

data.source_sentence: EHC 소재에 의해 질산성질소가 환원되어 아질산성질소가 생성된 것을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that nitrite nitrogen is reduced by the EHC material to produce nitrite nitrogen.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that nitrite nitrogen is reduced by the EHC material to produce nitrite nitrogen.

data.source_sentence: 이후 모니터링에서는 0.2 mg/L보다 낮은 농도가 유지되어 아질산성질소가 암모니아성질소나 질소가스로 환원된 것을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the subsequent monitoring, the concentration was maintained lower than 0.2 mg/L, indicating that nitrite was reduced to ammonia nitrogen or nitrogen gas.
data.target_sentence: In subsequent monitoring, the concentration remained below 0.2 mg/L, indicating that nitrite was reduced to ammonia nitrogen or nitrogen gas.

data.source_sentence: 유입되는 과정에서 환원이 진행되어 MW-02에서보다는 낮은 농도가 검출되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the inflow process, reduction proceeded, and a lower concentration was detected than in MW-02.
data.target_sentence: Reduction proceeded during the inflow process, and a concentration lower than that of MW-02 was detected.

data.source_sentence: 이는 아질산성질소가 유입 도중 환원되었거나 지하수의 흐름이 MW-04로 향하지 않기 때문인 것으로 원인을 분석할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This can be analyzed because nitrite nitrogen was reduced during inflow or the flow of groundwater did not head to MW-04.
data.target_sentence: This can be analyzed either because nitrous oxide decreased in the inflow or the flow of groundwater was not directed to MW-04.

data.source_sentence: 암모니아성질소도 아질산성질소와 마찬가지로 PRB로부터 유입된 지하수에 의해 MW-01 관정에서 검출된 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is judged that ammonia nitrogen was also detected in the MW-01 well by groundwater flowing in from the PRB, like nitrite nitrogen.
data.target_sentence: It is judged that ammonia nitrogen was also detected in the MW-01 well by groundwater flowing in from the PRB, such as nitrite.

data.source_sentence: EHC 소재에 의해 질산성질소가 아질산성질소를 거쳐 암모니아성질소로 환원된 것을 알 수 있으며, MW-02가 PRB 내부의 관정이기 때문에 다른관정에 비해 높은 암모니아성질소가 검출되었다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that nitric nitrogen was reduced to ammonia nitrogen through nitrite nitrogen by the EHC material, and higher ammonia nitrogen was detected compared to other tubes because MW-02 is a tube inside the PRB.
data.target_sentence: Nitrate nitrogen was reduced to ammonia nitrogen through nitrite by EHC material, and since MW-02 is a tube inside PRB, it can be seen that higher ammonia nitrogen was detected compared to other tubes.

data.source_sentence: 불검출까지 도달하기 위해서는 시간이 더 소요될 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is judged that it will take more time to reach non-detection.
data.target_sentence: It is judged that it will take more time for it to become undetected.

data.source_sentence: 암모니아성질소가 아질산성질소 다음 단계의 환원 부산물이기 때문에 더 늦게 검출된 것으로 해석된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is interpreted that ammonia nitrogen was detected later because it is a reduction by-product of the next step of nitrite nitrogen.
data.target_sentence: Ammonia nitrogen is interpreted as a later detection because it is a reduction by-product of the next step of nitrite nitrogen.

data.source_sentence: PRB를 설치한 후 98일 차에는 0.07 mg/L의 농도가 검출되어 MW-02와 마찬가지로 불검출까지는 시간이 더 소요될 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: The concentration of 0.07 mg/L was detected on the 98th day after the PRB was installed, and it is judged that it will take more time for non-detection as in MW-02.
data.target_sentence: A concentration of 0.07 mg/L was detected on the 98th day after PRB installation, and it is judged that it will take more time until undetected, like MW-02.

data.source_sentence: 암모니아성질소의 이동 반경이 아질산성질소에 비해 작은 것을 알 수 있고 암모니아성질소가 0.5 mg/L로 낮은 먹는 물의 수질 기준을 고려했을 때 긍정적인 결과로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that the moving radius of ammonium nitrogen is smaller than that of nitrite, and it is judged as a positive result when considering the water quality standard for drinking water with a low ammonia nitrogen of 0.5 mg/L.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that the moving radius of ammonium nitrogen is smaller than that of nitrite, and it is judged to be a positive result when considering the water quality standard of drinking water with a low ammonia nitrogen of 0.5 mg/L.

data.source_sentence: PS-MM3은 아질산성질소와 마찬가지로 PRB를 설치한 이후 98일까지 불검출되어 음용 지하수 및 먹는 물의 공동시설 수질 기준(0.5 mg/L)을 충족하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Like nitrous nitrogen, PS-MM3 was not detected until 98 days after PRB was installed and met the water quality standard (0.5 mg/L) of the common facilities of drinking groundwater and drinking water.
data.target_sentence: Like nitrous oxide, PS-MM3 was detected only 98 days after PRB installation, and it met the water quality standards (0.5mg/L) of public facilities for groundwater and drinking water.

data.source_sentence: PRB를 설치한 49일 이후에는 4 mg/L 미만의 낮은 농도가 검출되어 철 이온 유출이 멈춘 것을 보아 EHC 내 영가 철의 반응성이 소진된 것을 알 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: After 49 days of installing the PRB, a low concentration of less than 4 mg/L was detected and the iron ion leakage was stopped, indicating that the reactivity of the zero-valent iron in the EHC was exhausted.
data.target_sentence: A low concentration of less than 4 mg/L was detected 49 days after the PRB was installed, and the leakage of iron ions stopped, indicating that the reactivity of zero-valent iron in the EHC was exhausted.

data.source_sentence: PRB를 설치한 후 42일까지의 철 이온 유출을 통해 영가철이 질산성질소, 산소 및 지하수 내 다양한 물질들과 반응한 것을 간접적으로 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Through the iron ion leakage up to 42 days after the PRB was installed, it can be indirectly confirmed that the zero-valent iron reacted with nitrate nitrogen, oxygen, and various substances in groundwater.
data.target_sentence: It can be confirmed indirectly that zero-valent iron reacted with nitrate nitrogen, oxygen, and various substances in groundwater through iron ion leakage for up to 42 days after PRB installation.

data.source_sentence: 컬럼 실험 결과와 마찬가지로 철 이온의 유출이 지속적이지 않았으며, 예상대로 철 이온이 대수층 내 토양에 흡착되거나 산화철 형태로 침전되었음을 짐작할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As with the column experiment results, the effluent of iron ions was not continuous, and as expected, it can be inferred that iron ions were adsorbed to the soil in the aquifer or precipitated in the form of iron oxide.
data.target_sentence: As shown in the column experiment results, the iron ion outflow was not continuous, and as expected, it can be inferred that iron ions were adsorbed to the soil in the aquifer or precipitated in the form of iron oxide.

data.source_sentence: MW-04는 일관적으로 0.5 mg/L 미만의 저농도가 검출되어 철 이온의 짧은 이동 반경이 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: MW-04 was consistently detected at a low concentration of less than 0.5 mg/L, confirming a short migration radius of iron ions.
data.target_sentence: MW-04 was consistently detected at concentrations as low as 0.5 mg/L, confirming the short migratory radius of iron ions.

data.source_sentence: PS-MM3은 지속적으로 불검출되어 음용지하수 및 먹는 물 공동시설의 수질 기준을 충족하였으며, 음용수 관정에서 철 이온의 검출 가능성은 낮을 것으로 예상된다.
data.mt_sentence: PS-MM3 was continuously undetected to meet the water quality standards of drinking groundwater and drinking water communities, and the possibility of detecting iron ions in drinking water pipes is expected to be low.
data.target_sentence: PS-MM3 has not been consistently detected to meet the water quality standards of groundwater and drinking water communities, and the likelihood of iron ion detection in drinking water pipes is expected to be low.

data.source_sentence: 총 924 kg의 EHC 소재를 주입했기 때문에 EHC 소재의 영양 물질이 유출되어 고농도의 TOC가 검출된 것을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since a total of 924 kg of EHC material was injected, it can be seen that a high concentration of TOC was detected due to the outflow of nutritional substances from the EHC material.
data.target_sentence: Since a total of 924 kg of EHC material was injected, it can be seen that a high concentration of TOC was detected due to the leakage of nutrients from the EHC material.

data.source_sentence: 잘 침전되지 않는 영양물질의 이동성이 철 이온에 비해 높은 것을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that the mobility of nutrients that do not precipitate well is higher than that of iron ions.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that the mobility of poorly precipitated nutrients is higher than that of iron ions.

data.source_sentence: PRB를 설치한 6일 이후 저농도의 TOC가 검출된 것으로 보아 영양 물질에 의해 탁도가 증가하였다고 판단하기는 어렵다.
data.mt_sentence: Since low concentration of TOC was detected after 6 days of PRB installation, it is difficult to determine that turbidity has increased due to nutritional substances.
data.target_sentence: Low TOC concentration was detected 6 days after PRB installation, so it is difficult to judge that the turbidity increased due to nutrients.

data.source_sentence: 미생물은 고형물 입자를 형성해 탁도를 증가시키지만 TOC에 포함되지 않을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Microorganisms form solid particles to increase turbidity, but may not be included in TOC.
data.target_sentence: Microorganisms form solid particles to increase turbidity, but may not be included in the TOC.

data.source_sentence: 탁도가 증가한 주요 원인은 EHC에 의해 미생물이 증가했기 때문으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: The main cause of the increase in turbidity is thought to be due to the increase of microorganisms by EHC.
data.target_sentence: The main cause of the increase in turbidity is thought to be an increase in microorganisms caused by EHC.

data.source_sentence: 탁도 값을 통해 미생물의 생장이 유지되지 못했음을 알 수 있고 이는 감소한 질산성질소 제거 효율과 일치하는 결과였다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that the growth of microorganisms was not maintained through the turbidity value, which was consistent with the reduced nitrate nitrogen removal efficiency.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that the growth of microorganisms was not maintained through the turbidity value, which was consistent with a decrease in nitrate nitrogen removal efficiency.

data.source_sentence: EHC 내 영양 물질이 미생물을 충분히 생장시키기에 충분하지 않아 생물학적 탈질 반응이 유지되지 못하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The biological denitrification reaction could not be maintained because the nutrients in the EHC were not sufficient to sufficiently grow microorganisms.
data.target_sentence: The nutrients in the EHC could not sustain the biological denitrification reaction because the microorganisms did not grow sufficiently.

data.target_sentence: It is expected to increase the globalization and value of traditional soy sauce by enhancing the excellence of traditional soy sauce through future research and contributing to the development of new soy sauce.

data.source_sentence: 어떠한 경우에는 수막염, 바이러스성 폐렴, 뇌염, 급성 이완성 마비 현상을 동반하기도 하며, 심할 경우에는 신경원성 폐부종으로 인해 사망을 일으킬 수 있다.

data.target_sentence: In some cases, it is accompanied by meningitis, viral pneumonia, encephalitis, and acute diastolic paralysis, and in severe cases, neurogenic pulmonary edema can lead to death.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 해양 미생물 배양액 추출물의 EV71의 증식 억제 효능을 검증하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the anti-proliferation efficacy of EV71 was verified by extracts from marine microorganisms.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the anti-proliferative efficacy of EV71 was verified through the extract of marine microorganisms.

data.source_sentence: 바이러스 증식 억제 효과는 여러 해양 미생물 추출물을 HeLa 세포에 처리한 후 EV71 바이러스를 염 시키고 MTT assay를 수행하여 세포의 생존율을 비교 검증하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The virus proliferation inhibitory effect was verified by comparing and verifying the cell viability by treating the HeLa cells with several marine microorganism extracts, saline the EV71 virus, and perform the MTT assay.
data.target_sentence: The virus proliferation inhibitory effect was confirmed by treating HeLa cells with several marine microorganism extracts, treating the EV71 virus with physiological saline, and then performing MTT assay to compare and verify cell viability.

data.source_sentence: 여러 물질 중 바이러스 증식 억제 효능이 우수한 B물질을 선정하였으며 농도에 따른 바이러스 증식 억제 효능을 검증하고 세포 독성의 유무를 동일한 방법으로 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Material B, which has excellent anti-viral efficacy among various substances, was selected, and the anti-viral efficacy according to the concentration was verified, and the presence or absence of cytotoxicity was confirmed by the same method.
data.target_sentence: Substance B having excellent antiviral efficacy among various substances was selected and the antiviral efficacy according to the concentration was confirmed, and the presence or absence of cytotoxicity was confirmed by the same method.

data.source_sentence: 바이러스 증식 억제 활성은 western blot analysis를 통해 바이러스 막 단백질의 생산량과 세포 단백질 파괴의 검증과 바이러스 증식을 조절하는 세포신호 물질 p38 인산화(pP38)와 NF-kB의 인산화(p NF-Kb) 변화를 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Viral proliferation inhibitory activity was confirmed through western blotanalysis to verify the production of viral membrane proteins and the verification of cellular protein destruction, as well as changes in the phosphorylation (pNF-Kb) of cell signaling substances p38 (pP38) and NF-kB that control viral proliferation.
data.target_sentence: The virus proliferation inhibitory activity was verified through western blot analysis to verify the production of virus membrane protein and destruction of cell proteins, and changes in the phosphorylation of p38 phosphorylation (pP38) and NF-kB (p NF-Kb), the cell signaling substances that control virus proliferation (p NF-Kb) did.

data.source_sentence: 바이러스 막단백질 VP1과 바이러스 효소 protease2A의 생산 감소는 세포 단백질 eIF4G1의 절단을 유의하게 감소시켰으며 바이러스 복제와 관련이 있는 pP38은 해양 추출물 처리 농도에 따라 의존적으로 감소하였고 p NF-KB는 유의한 증가를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Reduced production of viral membrane protein VP1 and viral enzyme protease2A significantly decreased cleavage of cellular protein eIF4G1, and pP38, which is associated with viral replication, decreased in a dependent manner with the concentration of marine extract treatment, and p NF-KB significantly increased. seemed
data.target_sentence: Reduced production of viral membrane protein VP1 and viral enzyme protease2A significantly reduced cleavage of cellular protein eIF4G1, virus replication-related pP38 decreased depending on the concentration of marine extract treatment, and p NF-KB significantly increased.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구를 통해 해양 미생물 추출물의 처리는 세포 신호 물질을 억제하여 바이러스 복제를 효과적으로 억제한다는 것을 증명하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, it was demonstrated that the treatment of marine microbial extracts effectively inhibited viral replication by inhibiting cell signaling substances.
data.target_sentence: In this study, it was demonstrated that the treatment of marine microorganism extract effectively inhibits virus replication by inhibiting cell signaling substances.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 연구를 통해 검증된 해양 미생물 추출물은 향후 수족구병에 관한 항바이러스 치료제로 개발될 수 있을 것으로 기대한다.
data.mt_sentence: It is expected that the marine microorganism extract verified through these studies can be developed as an antiviral treatment for hand, foot and mouth disease in the future.
data.target_sentence: The marine microorganism extract verified through this study is expected to be developed as an antiviral treatment for hand, foot and mouth disease in the future.

data.source_sentence: EV71은 수족구병을 일으키는 대표적인 enterovirus 종으로 미국 캘리포니아에서 무균성 수막염에 걸린 2개월 된 영아로부터 분리된 후 북미와 유럽에서 호주와 아시아에 이르기까지 전 세계적으로 수많은 EV71 발병이 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: EV71 is a leading enterovirus species that causes hand-foot-and-mouth disease, and numerous EV71 outbreaks have been reported worldwide, from North America and Europe to Australia and Asia, after being separated from a two-month-old infant with sterile meningitis in California, the United States.
data.target_sentence: EV71, a representative enterovirus species causing hand, foot and mouth disease, was isolated from a 2-month-old infant with aseptic meningitis in California, USA. Since then, numerous EV71 outbreaks have been reported worldwide, from North America and Europe to Australia and Asia.

data.source_sentence: 지난 몇 년 동안 이 바이러스는 아시아 태평양 지역에 심각한 영향을 미쳐 지역의 여러 국가에서 공중 보건문제가 되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the past few years, the virus has severely affected the Asia-Pacific region, making it a public health problem in many countries in the region.
data.target_sentence: In the past few years, the virus has had a serious impact in the Asia Pacific region, making it a public health problem in many countries in the region.

data.source_sentence: 바이러스의 1차 복제 부위는 편도선과 장 림프 조직에 있는 것으로 추정된다.
data.mt_sentence: The primary sites of replication of the virus are presumed to be in the tonsils and intestinal lymphoid tissues.
data.target_sentence: The main sites of replication of the virus are believed to be in the tonsils and intestinal lymphoid tissues.

data.source_sentence: 복제 주기의 몇 가지 주요 단계가 중요한 대상으로 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Several major steps in the replication cycle have been identified as important targets.
data.target_sentence: Several key steps in the replication cycle have been identified as important targets.

data.source_sentence: 바이러스 진입을 차단하는 것은 이상적인 항바이러스의 전략이다.
data.mt_sentence: Blocking viral entry is an ideal antiviral strategy.
data.target_sentence: Blocking the entry of viruses is an ideal antiviral strategy.

data.source_sentence: 과거 연구에 따르면 바이러스 캡시드 단백질 중에서 중화 에피토프는 VP1 단백질에 위치했다.
data.mt_sentence: According to past studies, neutralizing epitopes among viral capsid proteins were located in VP1 proteins.
data.target_sentence: Past studies have shown that a neutralizing epitope among viral capsid proteins was located on the VP1 protein.

data.source_sentence: 대부분의 단백질 kinase의 완전한 활성화는 활성화 루프로 알려진 유연한 모티프에서 인산화가 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Full activation of most protein kinases requires phosphorylation in flexible motifs known as activation loops.
data.target_sentence: Full activation of most protein kinases requires phosphorylation in flexible motifs known as activation loops.

data.source_sentence: 세포 내 감염, 심근 허혈 또는 수지상 세포는 성숙 신호에서 p38α 신호 전달에 기여하는 것으로 본다.
data.mt_sentence: Intracellular infection, myocardial ischemia, or dendritic cells are believed to contribute to p38α signaling in maturation signaling.
data.target_sentence: Intracellular infection, myocardial ischemia, or dendritic cells are believed to contribute to p38α signaling in maturation signaling.

data.source_sentence: 해양 미생물은 아직도 잘 알려지지 않은 다양한 종이 분포하고 있으며 이러한 해양 미생물이 만들어내는 물질들은 기존의 물질들과 다르게 아직 그 기능의 연구가 되어 있지 않은 미지의 분야라고 할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Various species of marine microorganisms are still not well known, and the substances produced by these marine microorganisms, unlike existing substances, are an unknown field whose function has not yet been studied.
data.target_sentence: Various marine microorganisms are not well known yet, and materials produced by these marine microorganisms, unlike existing substances, are an unknown field whose functions have not yet been studied.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구를 통해 해양 미생물 추출물의 새로운 기능을 검증하고자 하였으며, 특히 아직까지 치료제가 개발되지 않은 질병을 유발하는 수족구병 바이러스에 대한 강력한 증식억제 효과를 검증하였다.

data.target_sentence: The purpose of this study is to verify the new function of the marine microorganism extract, especially the strong anti-proliferative effect against the hand, foot and mouth disease virus, which causes diseases for which no treatment has been developed.

data.source_sentence: 지속적인 연구를 통해 추출물에서 주요 성분 물질을 검증 분리할 것이 며, 분리된 주요 성분 물질은 EV71 유발 수족구병을 치료하기 위한 항바이러스 제의 개발에 적용될 수 있을 것으로 기대가 된다.

data.source_sentence: 바이러스의 농도는 조직 배양 감염 용량 50(TCID50)에 의해 결정되었다.

data.target_sentence: The concentration of virus was determined by tissue culture infection dose 50 (TCID50).

data.source_sentence: 소의 태아 혈청은 진핵 세포의 시험관 내 세포 배양을 위해 가장 많이 사용되는 혈청 보충제이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fetal serum in cattle is the most commonly used serum supplement for cell culture in vitro of eukaryotic cells.
data.target_sentence: Fetal bovine serum is the most commonly used serum supplement for in vitro cell culture of eukaryotic cells.

data.source_sentence: 세포와 바이러스는 모두 -80℃에서 보관하였으며 장기간 보관을 위해 6개월에 한번 새롭게 증식하여 유지하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Both cells and viruses were stored at -80°C, and for long-term storage, they were newly proliferated and maintained once every 6 months.
data.target_sentence: Both cells and viruses were stored at -80 °C, and for long-term storage, they were newly grown and maintained once every 6 months.

data.source_sentence: 바이러스 감염(positive), 또는 미감염(negative) 세포의 흡광도 값과 비교하여 50% 이상의 세포 생존을 보이는 물질을 유효 물질로 선택하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A material showing 50% or more of cell viability compared to the absorbance value of virus-infected (positive) or non-infected (negative) cells was selected as an active material.
data.target_sentence: Substances having a cell viability of 50% or more compared to the absorbance values of virus-infected (positive) or non-infected (negative) cells were selected as active substances.

data.source_sentence: 바이러스 유전자의 복제는 바이러스 증식과 함께 증가한다.
data.mt_sentence: Replication of viral genes increases with viral propagation.
data.target_sentence: Replication of viral genes increases with viral spread.

data.source_sentence: 바이러스의 증식과 유전자의 증식을 직접적으로 비교하여 물질의 처리에 따른 바이러스 증식의 억제와 바이러스의 유전자 복제의 감소를 함께 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: By directly comparing the proliferation of viruses and the proliferation of genes, the inhibition of viral proliferation due to the treatment of substances and the reduction of gene replication of viruses were confirmed.
data.target_sentence: A direct comparison of virus proliferation and gene proliferation confirmed the inhibition of virus proliferation and reduction of viral gene replication due to material treatment.

data.source_sentence: 세포의 활성은 negative와 비교하여 물질을 처리하였을 때 농도가 높은 약물일수록 세포의 활성이 높았고 세포의 독성은 가지고 있지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: Compared to negative, the higher the concentration of the drug, the higher the cell activity and no cellular toxicity.
data.target_sentence: The higher the concentration of the drug compared to the negative, the higher the cellular activity and no cytotoxicity.

data.source_sentence: 고농도의 약물에 의해 처리된 세포에서는 세포 사멸의 감소가 관찰되었다.
data.mt_sentence: A decrease in apoptosis was observed in cells treated with high concentrations of the drug.
data.target_sentence: A decrease in apoptosis was observed in cells treated with high concentrations of the drug.

data.source_sentence: 세포 생존율이 70% 이상으로 뛰어난 항바이러스 활성을 나타냈다.
data.mt_sentence: The cell viability was more than 70%, indicating excellent antiviral activity.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that the cell viability is 70% or more, indicating that the antiviral activity is excellent.

data.source_sentence: 세포 독성 실험에서도 각각의 농도에서 세포에 대한 독성을 보이지 않아 추출물이 비교적 안전한 물질임을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the cytotoxicity test, it did not show toxicity to cells at each concentration, confirming that the extract was a relatively safe material.
data.target_sentence: In the cytotoxicity test, it was confirmed that the extract was relatively safe because it did not show toxicity to cells at each concentration.

data.source_sentence: 수족구병 바이러스 증식을 억제하는 해양 미생물 추출물을 선별하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Extracts of marine microorganisms that inhibit the growth of hand, foot and mouth disease virus were selected.
data.target_sentence: A marine microorganism extract that inhibits the proliferation of hand, foot and mouth disease virus was selected.

data.source_sentence: 다양한 해양 미생물 추출물 중에서 수족구병 바이러스 증식 효능 물질을 MTT assay를 통해 검증하고 선별하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Among the extracts of various marine microorganisms, substances effective in propagation of hand, foot and mouth disease virus were verified and selected through MTT assay.
data.target_sentence: Among the extracts of various marine microorganisms, substances effective for the proliferation of hand, foot and mouth disease virus were verified and selected through MTT assay.

data.source_sentence: 농도에 따른 세포의 생존을 fold induction으로 표현하였으며, 약 70% 이 상의 세포 생존을 나타낸 물질을 선택하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The cell survival according to the concentration was expressed as fold induction, and a material showing more than about 70% cell survival was selected.
data.target_sentence: The cell viability according to the concentration was expressed as fold induction, and a material exhibiting a cell viability of about 70% or more was selected.

data.source_sentence: 처리 후 바이러스로 인해 발생된 세포 괴사를 관찰하고 positive 샘플이 60 % 이상 감염되어 세포 독성을 나타낼 때 단백질을 추출하여 western blot을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After the treatment, the cell necrosis caused by the virus was observed, and when the positive sample was infected more than 60% and showed cytotoxicity, the protein was extracted and western blot was performed.
data.target_sentence: After treatment, cell necrosis by virus was observed, and when the positive sample was infected with more than 60% and showed cytotoxicity, protein was extracted and Western blot was performed.

data.source_sentence: 바이러스의 증식 또한 1 mg/ml 대표 추출물 처리로 바이러스만을 감염시킨 샘플과 비교해 보니 유의하게 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The proliferation of the virus was also significantly reduced when compared to the sample infected with virus only by treatment with 1 mg/ml of the representative extract.
data.target_sentence: The virus proliferation was also significantly reduced compared to the sample infected with the virus only by treatment with 1 mg/ml of the representative extract.

data.source_sentence: EV71에 의한 수족구병 바이러스 막단백질과 효소를 생산하는 능력을 검증할 필요가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It is necessary to verify the ability of EV71 to produce hand-foot-and-mouth disease virus membrane proteins and enzymes.
data.target_sentence: It is necessary to verify the ability of EV71 to produce hand-foot-and-mouth disease virus membrane proteins and enzymes.

data.source_sentence: 해양 미생물 추출물의 EV71에 의한 유전자 증폭 억제를 효능을 검증하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The efficacy of gene amplification inhibition by EV71 of marine microorganism extracts was verified.
data.target_sentence: The effect of inhibiting gene amplification by EV71 of the marine microorganism extract was verified.

data.source_sentence: RT-PCR을 통해 바이러스의 positive strandRNA의 증폭을 확인하였으며 해양 미생물 추출물 농도에 따라 바이러스 유전자의 증폭을 유의하게 억제하여 뛰어난 바이러스 증식 억제 활성을 보여주었다.
data.mt_sentence: The amplification of the positive strand RNA of the virus was confirmed through RT-PCR, and the amplification of the virus gene was significantly inhibited according to the concentration of the marine microorganism extract, showing excellent virus proliferation inhibitory activity.
data.target_sentence: The amplification of the positive strand RNA of the virus was confirmed through RT-PCR, and the amplification of the viral gene was significantly inhibited depending on the concentration of the marine microorganism extract, showing excellent virus proliferation inhibitory activity.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같은 수족구병 바이러스 유전자 증식의 억제는 직접적인 바이러스 증식의 감소를 의미하며 바이러스 감염 초기부터 바이러스의 세포 내에서의 증식을 효과적으로 유도하고 있음을 보여주는 것으로 매우 중요한 결과이다.
data.mt_sentence: Inhibition of this hand, foot and mouth disease virus gene proliferation means a direct reduction in virus proliferation, and it is a very important result as it shows that the virus effectively induces the proliferation of the virus from the initial stage of infection.
data.target_sentence: This hand-and-mouth disease virus gene suppression means a direct reduction in virus proliferation, and is a very important result in that the virus effectively induces virus proliferation from the early stage of infection.

data.source_sentence: 해양 미생물 추출물의 처리에 따른 EV71에 의한 바이러스 유전자 증폭 억제에 대한 효능을 검증하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The efficacy on inhibition of viral gene amplification by EV71 according to the treatment of the marine microorganism extract was verified.
data.target_sentence: The efficacy of EV71 in inhibiting viral gene amplification according to the treatment of the marine microorganism extract was verified.

data.source_sentence: 추출물 B를 농도에 따라 처리하고 세포에서 RNA를 분리하여 RT-PCR을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Extract B was treated according to concentration and RNA was separated from cells to perform RT-PCR.
data.target_sentence: B extract was treated according to the concentration and RNA was isolated from the cells, followed by RT-PCR.

data.source_sentence: 해양 미생물 추출물 처리를 통한 세포 활성 신호 억제에 대해 연구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Inhibition of cell activation signal through treatment with marine microorganism extract was studied.
data.target_sentence: Inhibition of cell activation signal through treatment with marine microorganism extract was studied.

data.source_sentence: EV71의 증식에 있어 세포 신호 조절은 매우 밀접한 관계를 가지고 있다.

data.source_sentence: 이용 인구 수가 가장 많고 수원이 지표수이며 살균 시설의 전원 공급장치로 태양광을 이용하고 있어 전원 공급이 불안정하므로 수질오염 가능성이 높을 것으로 판단되고 현재 관리 등급은 4로 가장 주의가 필요한 것으로 나타난다.
