data.target_sentence: The power supply is unstable because the number of users is the largest, the water source is surface water, and solar power is used as the power supply for the sterilization facility. Therefore, it is judged that the possibility of water pollution is high, and the current management level is 4, which appears to require the most attention.

data.source_sentence: 주로 발견되는 균은 토양 및 수계에서 발견되는 균으로 자연적인 오염원으로 대부분 이루어진 것으로 판단되고 먹는 물로 이용함에서는 문제가 없다고 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: Bacteria mainly found in soil and water systems are judged to be mostly made up of natural pollutants, and it is judged that there is no problem in using it as drinking water.
data.target_sentence: Bacteria mainly found in soil and water systems are judged to be mostly composed of natural pollutants, so it is judged that there is no problem in using them as drinking water.

data.source_sentence: 현재 관리 등급은 3으로 광촉매 시설이 전기로 공급하는 방식이어서 태양광 타입보다는 안정적인 전기 공급이 이루어졌지만, 이용 인구가 많고 지표수를 수원으로 하는 곳이기 때문에 쉽게 오염될 수 있는 장소이다.
data.mt_sentence: Currently, the management level is 3, and the photocatalytic facility supplies electricity more stably than the solar type, but it is a place that can be easily contaminated because it has a large population and uses surface water as a source.
data.target_sentence: The current management level is 3, and the photocatalytic facility supplies electricity more stably than the solar power generation method, but it is easily polluted because it has a large population and uses surface water as a water source.

data.source_sentence: 비지정 약수터인 st8은 가장 이용에 유의해야 하는 장소로 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: St8, an undesignated mineral spring, seems to be the place to pay the most attention to use.
data.target_sentence: St8, an unspecified mineral water, seems to be the place that pays the most attention to its use.

data.source_sentence: 현장 조사 진행 시 7개의 지점 약수터와 마찬가지로 이용객 수가 많은 지점이기 때문에 보건위생학적으로 취약한 시설로 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: When conducting an on-site investigation, it seems to be a vulnerable facility in terms of health and hygiene because it is a point with a large number of users, like the mineral springs of seven branches.
data.target_sentence: According to a field survey, it appears to be a weak facility in terms of health and sanitation because it is a point with many users like the mineral waters of the seven tributaries.

data.source_sentence: 광주지역의 먹는 물 공동 시설 10개소를 대상으로 지표 세균인 일반세균, 총대장균군, 분원성대장균군 및여시니아균 그리고 수계에서 발견되는 균의 분포를 조사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The distribution of bacteria found in surface bacteria, general bacteria, total coliforms, bifurcular coliforms, leucinia, and water systems was investigated in 10 drinking water facilities in Gwangju.
data.target_sentence: The distribution of surface bacteria, general bacteria, total coliform group, binary coliform group, leucinia group, and bacteria found in the water system was investigated at 10 drinking water facilities in Gwangju.

data.source_sentence: 총대장균군과 분원성대장균군의 부적합률은 봄에는 16.7, 11.1%, 여름에는 14.7, 11.8%로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: The nonconformity rates of total coliform and branching coliforms were 16.7 and 11.1% in spring and 14.7 and 11.8% in summer.
data.target_sentence: The nonconformity rates of the total coliform group and the basin general group were 16.7 and 11.1% in spring and 14.7 and 11.8% in summer.

data.source_sentence: 비지정 약수터 중 시설이 개방되어 시민들이 자주 이용하는 곳에서는 분변 및 인위적 오염원에서 유래된 다양한 균종이 검출되는 것으로 보아 이용 중지 및 완전한 시설 폐쇄 등의 제도적 보완이 필요할 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: Among non-designated mineral springs, where facilities are open and frequently used by citizens, various types of bacteria derived from fecal and artificial pollutants are detected.
data.target_sentence: Since the facility has been opened, various bacteria and artificial pollutants derived from feces have been detected in non-designated mineral water frequently used by citizens.

data.source_sentence: 식생활 패턴의 변화로 제과 제빵류가 식생활에서 차지하는 비중이 높아져 제빵 산업이 발달하고, 빵을 주식으로 하는 인구가 증가함에 따라 식품 소비자들은 식생활에서 편리성과 기능성을 동시에 확보하려는 경향을 나타내고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As the baking industry develops as the proportion of confectionery and bakery products in the diet increases due to changes in eating patterns, and the population who eats bread as a staple food increases, food consumers are showing a tendency to secure convenience and functionality in their diet at the same time.
data.target_sentence: As the proportion of confectionery and confectionery food increases due to changes in eating habits and the number of people who eat bread as a staple food increases, as the baking industry develops, food consumers are showing a tendency to secure convenience and functionality of their diet at the same time.

data.source_sentence: 베이커리 카페 산업의 급속한 성장과 함께 베이커리 분야에서도 이러한 소비자의 요구에 부합하는 조건을 가장 우선적으로 고려하여 제품을 차별화, 고급화시키려는 노력을 기울이고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Along with the rapid growth of the bakery and cafe industry, the bakery sector is also making efforts to differentiate and upgrade products by considering the conditions that meet the needs of these consumers first.
data.target_sentence: With the rapid growth of the bakery and cafe industry, the bakery sector is also striving to differentiate and upgrade its products, taking into account the condition of first meeting these consumer needs.

data.source_sentence: 기호도가 높은 맛과 많은 양으로 인기를 끄는 것 보다는 맛과 함께 기능성을 부여한 제품들이 베이커리 시장을 주도하게 되었고, 생리 활성을 나타내는 부재료가 첨가된 빵의 수요가 늘어나게 된 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Rather than gaining popularity due to its high taste and large quantity, products with taste and functionality came to lead the bakery market, and the demand for bread with supplementary ingredients showing physiological activity increased.
data.target_sentence: Rather than gaining popularity due to its high taste and large quantity, products that combine taste and functionality have led the bakery market, and the demand for bread with additives that exhibit physiological activity has increased.

data.source_sentence: 이에 따라 소비자들은 제품의 선택에 있어서도 맛과 건강을 함께 고려하고 있으며, 저지방, 저열량 제품의 선호가 늘어나고 있고, 우수한 기능성을 가진 다양한 식품 소재를 발견하여 이를 재료로 한 식품에 관한 연구도 증가하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Accordingly, consumers are considering taste and health together in choosing products, and the preference for low-fat and low-calorie products is increasing, and research on foods using them is also increasing by discovering various food materials with excellent functionality.
data.target_sentence: Accordingly, consumers are considering both taste and health in product selection, preference for low-fat, low-calorie products is increasing, and research on foods using them by discovering various food materials with excellent functionality is increasing.

data.source_sentence: 브로콜리새싹 분말을 첨가한 제과 제빵에 관해서는 아직 연구가 거의 없는 실정이다.
data.mt_sentence: There are still few studies on baking and baking with broccoli sprout powder added.
data.target_sentence: There is still very little research on baking and baking with the addition of broccoli sprout powder.

data.source_sentence: 이에 본 연구에서는 다양한 생리 활성 물질을 함유한 브로콜리새싹 분말을 식빵에 접목하여 이화학적 특성과 항산화성, 품질 특성 및 저장 중의 변화를 관찰하며, 브로콜리새싹 분말의 최적 첨가량을 찾아보고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Therefore, this study observed changes in chemical properties, antioxidant properties, quality properties, and storage by grafting broccoli sprout powder containing various physiologically active substances to bread, and sought to find the optimal addition amount of broccoli sprout powder.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, in this study, broccoli sprout powder containing various physiologically active substances was grafted onto bread, and physicochemical properties, antioxidant properties, quality properties, and changes during storage were observed, and the optimal amount of broccoli sprout powder added was to be found.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 실험적 연구에서 나타난 결과를 기초로 하여 다른 종류의 제과 제빵류의 신제품 개발에도 도움을 주고자 하는 데 목적이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The purpose of this study is to help develop new products for other types of confectionery and bakery products based on the results of experimental studies.
data.target_sentence: The purpose of this study is to help develop new products for other confectionery and bakery products based on the results of experimental studies.

data.source_sentence: 브로콜리새싹 분말을 첨가한 유기농 우리밀 식빵의 배합은 Table 1과 같으며, 식빵 제조법은 스트레이트법으로 AAA의 방법을 변형하여 제조하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The combination of organic Korean wheat bread with broccoli sprout powder is as shown in Table 1, and the bread preparation method was prepared by modifying the method of AAA by the straight method.
data.target_sentence: The combination of organic wheat bread and broccoli sprout powder is shown in Table 1, and a bread manufacturing method was prepared by modifying the AAA method to a straight method.

data.source_sentence: 식빵의 반죽은 모든 재료를 각각의 비율로 혼합하여 반죽기에서 1단으로 재료를 혼합한 후에, 클린업 단계에서 버터를 넣고 최종 단계까지 섞었다.
data.mt_sentence: For the dough of the bread, all the ingredients were mixed in each ratio, and the ingredients were mixed in one stage in the kneader, then butter was added in the clean-up step and mixed until the final step.
data.target_sentence: For bread dough, mix all the ingredients in each ratio and mix in the first step in the kneader, then add butter in the cleanup step and mix until the last step.

data.source_sentence: 그 후 27℃ 상온에서 2시간 방냉한 후 실험에 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After that, it was allowed to cool at room temperature at 27° C. for 2 hours and then used in the experiment.
data.target_sentence: Thereafter, after cooling at room temperature of 27° C. for 2 hours, it was used in the experiment.

data.source_sentence: 식빵의 무게, 부피, 비용적 및 굽기 손실율을 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The weight, volume, specific volume, and baking loss rate of the bread were measured.
data.target_sentence: The weight, volume, specific volume, and plastic loss rate of the bread were measured.

data.source_sentence: 식빵의 부피는 Campbell의 종자 치환법으로 좁쌀을 이용하여 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The volume of bread was measured using millet by Campbell's seed replacement method.
data.target_sentence: The volume of bread was measured using millet by Campbell's seed replacement method.

data.source_sentence: 비용적은 식빵의 무게에 대한 식빵의 부피 비(mL/g)로 측정하여 표시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The specific volume was measured and expressed as the ratio of the volume of the bread to the weight of the bread (mL/g).
data.target_sentence: The specific volume was measured and expressed as the ratio of the volume of the bread to the weight of the bread (mL/g).

data.source_sentence: 각각의 샘플 10 g을 멸균 플라스틱 파우치에 90 mL의 식염수와 함께 첨가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: 10 g of each sample was added with 90 mL of saline to a sterile plastic pouch.
data.target_sentence: To a sterile plastic pouch, 10 g of each sample was added with 90 mL of saline.

data.source_sentence: 그후 균질화 된 샘플을 식염수로 연속 희석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After that, the homogenized sample was continuously diluted with saline.
data.target_sentence: The homogenized sample was then serially diluted with saline.

data.source_sentence: 식빵 추출물은 AAA의 방법에 따라 제조되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Bread extract was prepared according to the method of AAA.
data.target_sentence: Bread extract was prepared according to the method of AAA.

data.source_sentence: Whatman 여과지를 통해 여과한 후, 추출물을 사용하여 항산화 활성을 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After filtration through Whatman filter paper, the extract was used to measure antioxidant activity.
data.target_sentence: Antioxidant activity was measured using the extract after filtration through Whatman filter paper.

data.source_sentence: 혼합물을 마이크로센트리퓨즈에 넣고 5분 동안 격렬하게 진탕한 후, 어두운 실온에서 30분 동안 배양하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The mixture was placed in a microcentrifuge, shaken vigorously for 5 minutes, and then incubated for 30 minutes at dark room temperature.
data.target_sentence: The mixture was placed in a microcentrifuge and shaken vigorously for 5 minutes and then incubated for 30 minutes at dark room temperature.

data.source_sentence: 혼합물을 나일론 주사기 필터 (0.45μm)로 여과하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The mixture was filtered through a nylon syringe filter (0.45 μm).
data.target_sentence: The mixture was filtered through a nylon syringe filter (0.45 μm).

data.source_sentence: 각 샘플의 항산화 활성 능력을 측정하기 위하여 ABTSradical 양이온 소거 활성을 처리된 샘플에 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: ABTSradical cation scavenging activity was used in the treated samples to measure the antioxidant activity capacity of each sample.
data.target_sentence: ABTSradical cation scavenging activity was used on the treated samples to determine the antioxidant activity capacity of each sample.

data.source_sentence: 반응 혼합물을 사용하기 전에 실온에서 12~16시간 동안 암실에서 유지시켰다.
data.mt_sentence: The reaction mixture was maintained in a darkroom at room temperature for 12 to 16 hours before use.
data.target_sentence: The reaction mixture was kept in the dark at room temperature for 12 to 16 hours before use.

data.source_sentence: 실온에서 10분 동안 인큐베이션한 후, 734 nm의 파장에서 흡광도를 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After incubation at room temperature for 10 minutes, absorbance was measured at a wavelength of 734 nm.
data.target_sentence: After incubation at room temperature for 10 minutes, absorbance was measured at a wavelength of 734 nm.

data.source_sentence: ABTS 라디칼 소거 활성에서 Ao는 브로콜리새싹 분말이 없는 대조군의 흡광도이고, A1은 브로콜리 새싹분말이 첨가된 샘플의 흡광도이다.
data.mt_sentence: In the ABTS radical scavenging activity, Ao is the absorbance of the control group without broccoli sprout powder, and A1 is the absorbance of the sample to which broccoli sprout powder was added.
data.target_sentence: In the ABTS radical scavenging activity, Ao is the absorbance of the control group without addition of broccoli sprout powder, and A1 is the absorbance of the sample to which broccoli sprout powder was added.

data.source_sentence: 관능 검사는 7점 기호 척도법를 사용하여 실시하였으며, 각 조건별로 식빵의 관능 평가를 위해 사전에 관능 평가에 대한 교육을 받은 외식조리전공 학부 및 대학원생 남녀 30명을 패널 요원으로 선발하여 실시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The sensory test was conducted using the 7-point symbol scale method, and 30 men and women majoring in restaurant cooking who were trained in sensory evaluation in advance were selected as panel agents to evaluate the sensuality of bread under each condition.
data.target_sentence: For the sensory test, 30 men and women majoring in restaurant culinary education who had received sensory evaluation education in advance were selected as a panel using the 7-point preference scale method, and the sensory properties of bread were evaluated according to each condition.

data.source_sentence: 선정된 관능검사 요원들에게 실험 목적 및 평가 항목에 대하여 설명하고 훈련시킨 후 실험의 객관성을 위하여 10가지의 시료에 무작위 숫자인 3자리의 난수표를 접시에 부착하여 관능검사를 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After explaining the purpose of the experiment and the evaluation items to the selected sensory test personnel and training them, for the objectivity of the experiment, a 3-digit random number table, which is a random number, was attached to a plate for a sensory test for 10 samples.
data.target_sentence: The purpose of the experiment and evaluation items were explained and trained to the selected sensory test personnel. Afterwards, for the objectivity of the experiment, a sensory test was performed by attaching a 3-digit random number table, which is a random number, to 10 samples.

data.source_sentence: 평가는 7점 기호 척도법을 사용하여 평가하였으며, 선호도가 낮을수록 1점, 높을수록 7점에 가까운 점수를 주도록 하고, 관능 평가의 항목은 색(color), 외관(apperance), 향(smell), 맛(taste)과 질감(texture) 및 전체적인기호도(overall acceptability)를 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The evaluation was evaluated using the 7-point symbol scale method, and the lower the preference, one point, and the higher the preference, the closer to seven points, and the items of the functional evaluation were measured for color, appearance, smell, texture, and overall acceptability.
data.target_sentence: The evaluation was evaluated using a 7-point preference scale method. The lower the preference, the closer to 1 point, and the higher the preference, the closer to 7 points. The functional evaluation items were color, appearance, smell, texture, and overall acceptability.

data.source_sentence: 분말 4.5% 첨가구에서 pH가 6.423으로 가장 높은 값을 나타내었고, 브로콜리새싹 분말 첨가량 3.0%>1.5%>대조구 순으로 유의적으로 감소하는 결과를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: The pH of the powder 4.5% additive showed the highest value at 6.423, and the result was a significant decrease in the order of the broccoli sprout powder addition amount of 3.0%>1.5%>control sphere.
data.target_sentence: The pH of the powder 4.5% additive showed the highest value of 6.423, and as a result, the amount of broccoli sprout powder added was significantly decreased in the order of 3.0% > 1.5% > control.

data.source_sentence: 굽기 후에 pH는 브로콜리새싹 분말 4.5 % 첨가구가 5.978로 가장 높았고, 대조구가 가장 낮은 결과를 나타났으며, 시료 간 유의적인 차이를 나타냈다.
data.mt_sentence: After baking, the pH of the broccoli sprout powder with 4.5% additive was the highest at 5.978, the control was the lowest, and a significant difference was shown between the samples.
data.target_sentence: After baking, the pH of the broccoli sprout powder with 4.5% additive added was the highest at 5.978 and the lowest in the control group, showing a significant difference between samples.

data.source_sentence: 빵의 품질에 있어서 pH는 빵의 조직감과 부피에 큰 영향을 주고, 빵의 가스 보유력과 발효를 결정하는 요인 중 하나이다.
data.mt_sentence: In the quality of bread, pH greatly affects the texture and volume of bread, and is one of the factors determining the gas retention and fermentation of bread.
data.target_sentence: In the quality of bread, pH has a great effect on the texture and volume of bread and is one of the factors determining the gas retention and fermentation of bread.

data.source_sentence: 이는 본 연구 결과와 브로콜리 분말을 첨가한 쌀 식빵의 품질 특성에서 브로콜리 분말 첨가량이 증가할수록 반죽의 pH가 높아지는 결과로 나타나, 브로콜리의 알칼리성이 식빵의 pH에 영향을 준 것으로 판단된다.

data.source_sentence: 부피의 경우, 대조구에서 1,880.67 mL로 가장 큰 부피를 나타냈고, 분말 4.5% 첨가구에서 가장 낮은 1,314.67 mL로 나타내었으며, 첨가량이 증가함에 따라 유의적으로 감소하는 경향을 보였다.

data.target_sentence: Specific volume is an important criterion for evaluating the volume of bread, and represents the volume to volume and weight.

data.source_sentence: 이는 브로콜리새싹 분말 수준이 증가함에 따라 ABTS free radical소거 활성이 유의하게 증가함을 나타낸다.

data.source_sentence: 향(flavor), 색도(color), 맛(taste)과 전체적인 선호도(overall preference) 측정 결과에서 3.0% 첨가구의 선호도가 가장 좋았으며, 4.5% 첨가구의 선호도가 가장 낮음을 알 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 브로콜리새싹 분말의 첨가량이 3.0%인 식빵의 색, 향, 맛의 평가 항목에서 가장 높은 선호도를 보였고, 전체적인 선호도에서도 높은 평가를 얻었다.

data.source_sentence: 30m3 크기의 반응 시스템을 5개월 동안 운영한 결과, FBBC의 부착 미생물은 탈질-유기 산화 미생물(무산소조), 질산화-유기 산화 미생물의 분포도가 높게 나타났다.

data.source_sentence: 시스템의 방류수는 관련 법적 기준에 적합하였으며, 하수 온도에 따른 암모니아성 질소 제거 효율의 차이가 나지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: The effluent from the system met the relevant legal standards, and there was no difference in the ammonia nitrogen removal efficiency according to the sewage temperature.
data.target_sentence: The effluent discharged from the system met the relevant legal standards, and there was no difference in the ammonia nitrogen removal efficiency according to the sewage temperature.

data.source_sentence: 이는 C/N의 비율이 저수온 조건에서 상대적으로 높게 나타났기 때문이다.
data.mt_sentence: This is because the C/N ratio was relatively high in the low water temperature condition.
data.target_sentence: This is because the C/N ratio is relatively high in the low water temperature condition.

data.source_sentence: 최근 총인 및 총질소의 방류수 기준이 강화되는 추세에 있으며, 특히 총인의 기준 강화는 잉여 슬러지 발생이 높아지는 문제점으로 이어져 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, standards for discharged water for total phosphorus and total nitrogen have been strengthened, and in particular, strengthening standards for total phosphorus has led to a problem of increasing the generation of surplus sludge.
data.target_sentence: Recently, effluent standards for total phosphorus and nitrogen have been strengthened, and in particular, as the standards for total phosphorus have been strengthened, the amount of surplus sludge generated is increasing.

data.source_sentence: 국내 대부분의 공공하수 처리시설은 과다하게 발생되는 슬러지 처리를 위하여 많은 예산이 들어가고 있는 실정이다.
data.mt_sentence: Most public sewage treatment facilities in Korea are spending a large budget to treat excessive sludge.
data.target_sentence: Most of the public sewage treatment facilities in Korea spend a huge amount of money on the treatment of surplus sludge.

data.source_sentence: 한편으로 예산이 부족한 지자체에서는 외부로 처리되지 않고 발생되는 잉여 슬러지를 시스템 내에서 순환시키는 방법을 사용하고 있으며, 시스템 내에서 슬러지가 순환됨으로써 방류수 수질 기준을 맞추기 어려워지는 문제가 발생하는 이중고를 겪고 있는 실정이다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, local governments with insufficient budgets are using a method of circulating surplus sludge generated without being treated externally, and it is difficult to meet the water quality standards of discharged water due to the circulation of sludge in the system.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, local governments with insufficient budget use a method of circulating the surplus sludge generated without external treatment, and the sludge is circulated within the system, making it difficult to meet the water quality standards for effluent.

data.source_sentence: 기존 총질소 유입부 하량으로 설계된 하수고도 처리시설의 경우 질소 제거에 어려움을 겪을 수 있는 실정이다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of sewage treatment facilities designed with the load of the existing total nitrogen inflow, it may be difficult to remove nitrogen removal may be difficult.
data.target_sentence: In the case of sewage treatment facilities designed to load the existing total nitrogen inflow, removal may be difficult and nitrogen removal may be difficult.

data.source_sentence: 기존의 질소 및 인 제거를 위한 하수고도 처리시설에서도 고농도 질소 유입 및 슬러지 저감이라는 문제점을 해결하기 위한 개량 방안이 도출되어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: An improvement plan to solve the problems of high concentration nitrogen inflow and sludge reduction in the existing advanced sewage treatment facility for nitrogen and phosphorus removal should be derived.
data.target_sentence: Improvements should be drawn up to solve the problems of high-concentration nitrogen inflow and sludge reduction in the existing nitrogen and phosphorus removal advanced sewage treatment facilities.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 하수 등을 포함하는 하폐수 처리시 물리·화학적 방법은 처리수량이 적은 공정에서는 효율적이지만 비용적 측면 등으로 실제 규모 공정 적용에 비효율적이다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, when treating wastewater including sewage, physical and chemical methods are efficient in a process with a small amount of treated water, but are inefficient in applying a real-scale process due to cost considerations.
data.target_sentence: In general, when treating wastewater including sewage, the physicochemical method is effective in a process with a small amount of treated water, but it is inefficient to apply to an actual process considering the cost.

data.source_sentence: 현실적으로 고농도 질소 유입 및 슬러지 증가를 해결하기 위하여 시설 개량을 통한 비용증가 문제보다 운전인자의 조작을 통한 처리 효율의 안정성을 우선적으로 적용해야 하는 실정이다.
data.mt_sentence: In reality, in order to solve the high-concentration nitrogen inflow and increase in sludge, the stability of treatment efficiency through manipulation of operating factors should be prioritized over the problem of cost increase through facility improvement.
data.target_sentence: In fact, in order to solve the high-concentration nitrogen inflow and increase in sludge, the stability of treatment efficiency through manipulation of operating factors should be prioritized over cost increase through facility improvement.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구의 목적은 동절기 생물반응조 시스템에 유동상생물 담체를 충전하여 침전 슬러지 반송 없이도 유기물 및 질소의 안정적인 처리가 가능한 하수 처리 공정 적용성을 파악하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The purpose of this study is to identify the applicability of a sewage treatment process that enables stable treatment of organic matter and nitrogen without returning sediment sludge by filling the bioreactor system in winter with a fluidized bed bioreactor.
data.target_sentence: The purpose of this study is to confirm the applicability of a sewage treatment process that can stably treat organic matter and nitrogen without returning sediment sludge by filling a fluidized bed bioreactor in a winter bioreactor system.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에 적용된 대상수는 국내 BBB의 최초 침전지 월류수를 이용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For the water applied in this study, the overflow water from the first settling basin of BBB in Korea was used.
data.target_sentence: The water applied in this study was the overflow water from the first BBB sedimentation pond in Korea.

data.source_sentence: 유입수의 오염 물질 특성은 Table 1과 같이 요약하였으며, 특성 분석 기간은 총 5개월간 55회 시료 채취 및 특성 분석을 실시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The characteristics of pollutants in the influent are summarized in Table 1, and sample collection and characterization were carried out 55 times for a total of 5 months for the characterization period.
data.target_sentence: The characteristics of contaminants in the influent are summarized in Table 1, and during the characterization period, sampling and characterization were performed 55 times for a total of 5 months.

data.source_sentence: FBBC의 투입 조건 중 무산소조 및 포기조에 투입하는 담체의 양은 시스템 운영 전 무산소조와 포기조 내 유동성 실험(등간격 채취된 시료내 담체량 분석)을 통하여 충전율을 결정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Among the input conditions of FBBC, the amount of carrier input to the anaerobic tank and the aeration tank was determined through a fluidity test in the anaerobic tank and the aeration tank (analysis of the amount of carrier in samples collected at equal intervals) before system operation.
data.target_sentence: Among the input conditions of FBBC, the amount of carrier input to the anoxic tank and aeration tank was determined through fluidity tests in the anaerobic tank and aeration tank (analysis of the amount of carrier in samples collected at equal intervals) before system operation.

data.source_sentence: 무산소조 및 포기조 내 담체의 원활한 유동과 미생물의 적정한 활동을 위해 DO 3 mg/L이상을 유지하였으며, 담체의 유실을 방지하기 위해 수조 간벽에 여재 유실 방지망을 설치하였다.
data.mt_sentence: DO was maintained at 3 mg/L or higher for smooth flow of carriers in anaerobic and aeration tanks and proper activity of microorganisms, and a filter media loss prevention net was installed on the wall of the tank to prevent carrier loss.
data.target_sentence: DO was maintained at 3 mg/L or more for the smooth flow of carriers and the proper activity of microorganisms in the anaerobic tank and aeration tank, and a filter medium loss prevention net was installed on the tank wall to prevent carrier loss.

data.source_sentence: FBBC 내 부착된 미생물의 양을 파악하기 위하여 기간별 총 3회에 걸쳐 무산소조와 포기조에서 임의적으로 30개씩의 담체를 채취하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to determine the amount of microorganisms attached to the FBBC, 30 carriers were arbitrarily collected from the anaerobic tank and the aeration tank over a total of 3 times per period.
data.target_sentence: In order to check the amount of microorganisms attached to the FBBC, 30 carriers were randomly collected from an anaerobic tank and an aeration tank for a total of 3 times per period.

data.source_sentence: FBBC 반응 시스템은 크게 5단계로 구성되었으며, 1단계로 3 m3 용량의 원수저장조와 유량균등화조, 2단계로 무산소조로 이루어져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The FBBC reaction system consists of five stages. The first stage consists of a raw water storage tank with a capacity of 3 m3, a flow equalization tank, and an anaerobic tank as the second stage.
data.target_sentence: The FBBC reaction system consists of five steps. The first stage consists of a raw water storage tank with a capacity of 3m3, an equalization tank, and an anaerobic tank, the second stage.

data.source_sentence: 3단계로 포기조는 유기물의 산화와 안정적인 질산화를 위해 연속흐름 혼합된 반응조 형태로 포기조의 산소 공급 및 교반을 위해 산기 장치를 반응조 내에 균등하게 분배하여 배치하였으며, 미생물을 안정적으로 유지하기 위해 담체를 충전하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the third step, the abandonment tank was distributed evenly in the reaction tank for oxygen supply and stirring of the abandonment tank in the form of a reaction tank mixed with continuous flow for oxidation and stable nitrification of organic matter, and the carrier was filled to keep microorganisms stable.
data.target_sentence: In step 3, the aeration tank is in the form of a continuous flow mixed reaction tank for the oxidation and stable nitrification of organic matter, and an aeration device is evenly distributed in the reaction tank for oxygen supply and agitation of the aeration tank, and a carrier is charged to keep microorganisms stable did.

data.source_sentence: 4단계는 총인(T-P) 및 유기물의 제거를 위해 응집제 투입 및 교반을 목적으로 설치되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Step 4 was installed for the purpose of adding and stirring a flocculant to remove the total phosphorus (T-P) and organic matter.
data.target_sentence: Step 4 was installed to remove total phosphorus (TP) and organic matter by adding a coagulant and stirring.

data.source_sentence: 마지막 5단계로 슬러지를 고액 분리하고, 처리수 유출과 슬러지를 배출 목적으로 침전조가 설치되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the last five stages, the sludge was separated in a solid-liquid manner, and a precipitation tank was installed for the purpose of discharging treated water and discharging the sludge.
data.target_sentence: In the last step 5, the sludge was separated into solid and liquid, and a sedimentation tank was installed for the purpose of discharging treated water and sludge.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서의 분석은 수질오염 공정시험법을 적용하여 분석을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The analysis in this study was performed by applying the water pollution process test method.
data.target_sentence: The analysis of this study was performed by applying the water pollution process test method.

data.source_sentence: 유동상 생물 담체 특성 분석 운영 기간 내 무산소조와 포기조 내 충진된 FBBC 내 부착된 미생물의 양을 분석한 결과는 Table 3과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 3 shows the results of analyzing the amount of attached microorganisms in the FBBC filled in the anaerobic tank and the aeration tank during the fluidized bed biological carrier characterization operation period.
data.target_sentence: Table 3 shows the results of analyzing the amount of microbial adhesion of FBBC filled in the anaerobic tank and the aeration tank during the characterization of the fluidized bed biological carrier.

data.source_sentence: 무산소조는 시스템 운영 기간이 길어질수록 수온이 낮은 동절기임에도 불구하고 반응조 생물 활성화에 따라 FBBC 부착 미생물의 양이 증가하였으며, 포기조의 경우 포기와 FBBC의 미생물 부착능에 따라 부착미생물의 양이 유지되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Although the water temperature of the anaerobic group was low in winter as the system operation period increased, the amount of microorganisms attached to the FBBC increased due to activation of the reaction tank, and in the case of the abandon group, the amount of microorganisms was maintained according to the microbial adhesion of the FBBC.
data.target_sentence: In the anaerobic tank, the longer the operating period of the system, the more the amount of FBBC-attached microorganisms increased according to the activation of the reaction tank, despite the low water temperature in the winter season. And in the case of aeration tank, the amount of adherent microorganisms was maintained according to the microbial adhesion ability of agar and FBBC.

data.source_sentence: 포기조의 경우 연구 종료 후 무산소조에서 탈질 효율이 증가됨에 따라 포기조로 유입되는 유기물의 농도가 감소하였으며, 이에 따라 Nitrosomonas, Nitrospira 등과 같은 질산화 미생물의 분포가 2배 이상 증가하는 경향을 나타냈다.

data.source_sentence: 황색포도상구균(S. aureus)은 화농성 질환 및 독소형 식중독의 대표적 원인균으로써 환경에 대한 저항성이 강하며 이 세균이 생성하는 enterotoxin은 100°C에서 30분간 가열로도 완전히 파괴되지 않는 내열성을 가지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Staphylococcus aureus is a representative causative agent of purulent diseases and toxic food poisoning and is resistant to the environment, and the enterotoxin produced by this bacteria has heat resistance that is not completely destroyed even by heating at 100°C for 30 minutes.
data.target_sentence: Staphylococcus aureus (S. aureus) is a representative causative agent of purulent diseases and toxin-type food poisoning, and has strong resistance to the environment. The enterotoxin produced by this S. aureus has heat resistance that is not completely destroyed by heating at 100°C for 30 minutes.

data.source_sentence: Salmonella spp.는 적절한 세척, 가공 온도 및 저장 조건이 지켜지지 못한다면 번식할 가능성이 매우 높으며, 이렇게 오염된 식품을 통하여 다른 식품과 교차 오염될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Salmonella spp. is highly likely to reproduce if proper cleaning, processing temperature and storage conditions are not observed, and can be cross-contaminated with other foods through such contaminated foods.
data.target_sentence: Salmonella spp. If proper cleaning, processing temperature and storage conditions are not followed, they are more likely to reproduce, and these contaminated foods may cross-contaminate other foods.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 살모넬라균의 존재 여부가 인근 가금류 농장이나 가축 분뇨의 오염, 양식장 등과 같은 몇 가지 요인에 따라 달라진다고 보고하였다.

data.target_sentence: The AAA reported that the presence of Salmonella depends on several factors, such as contamination of nearby poultry farms or livestock manure and farms.

data.source_sentence: 실제로 어류, 패류 및 수생 환경에서도 식중독 발생과 연관성이 있으며 이 경우에는 수산물 원료 자체의 오염보다는 생산 가공 과정, 식품의 부적절한 요리 및 보관에서 오염이 주요 원인일 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In fact, it is also associated with the occurrence of food poisoning in fish, shellfish, and aquatic environments, and in this case, contamination may be the main cause of contamination in the production and processing process, improper cooking and storage of food rather than contamination of the raw material itself.
data.target_sentence: In fact, it is also related to the occurrence of food poisoning in fish and shellfish and aquatic environments. In this case, contamination is contamination of the raw material itself rather than contamination during food production and processing, improper cooking and storage.

data.source_sentence: 배경 하에 Salmonella의 오염 정도를 측정한 결과 한치에서 50%로 가장 높은 검출률을 보였으며 광어, 연어, 새우에서도 25%의 검출률을 보였다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구와 비교했을 때 새우에서 공통적으로 검출되었으며, 이는 전부 수입 수산물이었기 때문에 AAA의 수입 수산물 및 가공 수산물에서 Salmonella가 검출되었다고 보고한 연구와 일치하였다.

data.source_sentence: 식품 공전의 기준 규격에 따르면 리스테리아는 ‘음성’을 기준으로 하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the standards of the Food Standards Code, Listeria is based on 'negative'.
data.target_sentence: According to the standards of the Food Standards Act, Listeria is based on 'negative'.

data.source_sentence: 식품을 보존하는 경우에는 저온을 많이 이용하지만, 식품의 미생물 생육을 저지하고 동시에 그 식품 자체가 가지고 있는 효소의 작용을 억제하기 위해서이다.
data.mt_sentence: When preserving food, low temperatures are used a lot, but at the same time, it is to prevent the microbial growth of food and at the same time to suppress the action of enzymes in the food itself.
data.target_sentence: Low temperature is often used to preserve food, but at the same time, it is to suppress the growth of microorganisms in food and at the same time suppress the action of enzymes in the food itself.

data.source_sentence: 비록 냉장 방법이 식품의 변질, 특히 다수의 병원성 미생물의 성장과 증식을 억제하는 데 효과적인 방법이긴 하지만 Listeria spp.과 같은 식중독 세균은 저온에서도 증식이 가능하여 냉장 식품에서도 종종 발견되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Food poisoning bacteria such as Listeria spp. can grow at low temperatures and are often found in refrigerated foods, although refrigeration is an effective way to curb food deterioration, especially the growth and proliferation of many pathogenic microorganisms.
data.target_sentence: Although refrigeration is an effective method for inhibiting food spoilage, especially the growth and proliferation of many pathogenic microorganisms. However, food poisoning bacteria such as Listeria spp. can proliferate even at low temperatures, so they are often found in refrigerated foods.

data.source_sentence: 토양 미생물은 질소 순환, 탄소 순환 등 토양 생태계에서 중요한 역할을 하고 있으며, 작물의 생육과 밀접한 관련이 있으므로 농업에서 토양 미생물은 작물 생산성과 관련하여 많은 연구가 이루어지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Soil microorganisms play an important role in soil ecosystems such as nitrogen circulation and carbon circulation, and since they are closely related to the growth of crops, many studies on soil microorganisms are being conducted on crop productivity in agriculture.
data.target_sentence: Soil microorganisms play an important role in the soil ecosystem, such as the nitrogen cycle and carbon cycle. Since it is closely related to the growth of crops, a lot of research on soil microbes in agriculture has been conducted in relation to crop productivity.

data.source_sentence: 최근에는 토양 미생물군집 분석을 병행하여 토양 내 미생물의 상태를 자세하게 분석하여 농업에서의 토양 미생물의 활용을 적극적으로 고려하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, in parallel with soil microbiome analysis, the state of microorganisms in the soil is analyzed in detail, and the utilization of soil microbes in agriculture is being actively considered.
data.target_sentence: Recently, in parallel with the analysis of the soil microbial community, a method for analyzing the state of microorganisms in the soil in detail and using the soil microorganisms for agriculture is being actively considered.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구의 시험 포장은 강원도 대관령에 위치하고 있으며, 토성은 사양토이고, 시험구의 크기는 4 ×6 m2 크기로 2015년 4월에 조성되어 2020년 11월까지 시험을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The test packaging of this study is located in Daegwallyeong, Gangwon-do, Saturn is sandy soil, and the size of the test tool is 4×6 m2, which was created in April 2015 and was conducted until November 2020.
data.target_sentence: The test pavement for this study is located in Daegwallyeong, Gangwon-do, and the soil is sandy soil. And the size of the test sphere is 4 × 6 m2, was created in April 2015 and the test was performed until November 2020.

data.source_sentence: 작물 처리는 감자, 배추, 콩의 세 종류의 작물로, 각 처리는 매년 동일 작물을 재배하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The crop treatment consisted of three types of crops: potato, Chinese cabbage, and soybean, and each treatment cultivated the same crop every year.
data.target_sentence: Crop treatment consisted of three crops: potato, Chinese cabbage, and soybean, and each treatment cultivated the same crop every year.

data.source_sentence: 토양 시료 채취 및 토양 분석 방법에 대해 연구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Soil sampling and soil analysis methods were studied.
data.target_sentence: Soil sampling and soil analysis methods were studied.

data.source_sentence: 시험포장의 토양 화학성은 6년 동안 경운 전의 4월과 작물 수확 후인 11월을 포함하여 작물이 생육하고 있는 기간 중에도 4-5회, 0-15 cm 깊이의 표토를 채취하여 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The soil chemistry of the test field was analyzed by collecting topsoil at a depth of 0-15 cm 4-5 times during the crop growth period, including April before tillage and November after crop harvest for 6 years.
data.target_sentence: During the crop growth period including April before tillage and November after harvest for 6 years, topsoil at a depth of 0-15cm was collected 4-5 times and the soil chemistry of the test site was analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 조사 시기를 봄, 여름, 가을로 나누어 계절별로 자료를 정리하여 분석을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The survey period was divided into spring, summer, and autumn, and the data were organized by season and analyzed.
data.target_sentence: The survey period was divided into spring, summer, and autumn, and the data were organized and analyzed by season.

data.source_sentence: 작물 및 생육과 관련된 지표는 작물 효과, 생육기, 재배 효과로 정리하여 평가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The indicators related to crops and growth were evaluated by organizing them into crop effects, growth periods, and cultivation effects.
data.target_sentence: Indices related to crops and growth were evaluated in terms of crop effect, growth period, and cultivation effect.

data.source_sentence: 모든 조사 자료는 통계 분석을 통해 유의성 검정을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: All survey data were tested for significance through statistical analysis.
data.target_sentence: All survey data were tested for significance through statistical analysis.

data.source_sentence: 토양 화학성 분석은 동일 처리에서 3반복으로 시험을 수행하여 평균과 표준 편차 값을 표시하였으며, 토양 화학성에 재배 작물이 미치는 영향은 R (x64, 3.5.3) 프로그램을 이용하여 분산 분석을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For soil chemistry analysis, the test was performed three times in the same treatment, and the mean and standard deviation values were displayed, and the effect of cultivated crops on soil chemistry was analyzed using the R (x64, 3.5.3) program for ANOVA.
data.target_sentence: For soil chemistry analysis, three tests were performed with the same treatment to indicate the mean and standard deviation values, and the effect of cultivated crops on soil chemistry was analyzed using the R(x64, 3.5.3) program for ANOVA.

data.source_sentence: 토양 미생물 효소 활성 실험과 토양 미생물 군집 분석도 처리에 따라 3반복으로 실험을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The experiment was performed in triplicate according to the soil microbial enzyme activity test and soil microbial community analysis.
data.target_sentence: The experiment was performed in triplicate according to the soil microbial enzyme activity test and soil microbial community analysis.

data.source_sentence: 2015년부터 2020년까지의 토양 미생물 효소 활성 측정 기간인 4월부터 1월까지의 기상 개황을 Table 1에 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 1 shows the weather conditions from April to January, the period for measuring soil microbial enzyme activity from 2015 to 2020.
data.target_sentence: Table 1 shows the weather conditions from April to January, the measurement period for soil microbial enzyme activity from 2015 to 2020.

data.source_sentence: 시험 기간 동안의 평균 기온은 최저 12.8℃에서 최고 13.6℃로 전반적으로 13℃ 전후의 평균 기온을 나타내었으며, 연차 간의 차이가 크지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: The average temperature during the test period ranged from the lowest 12.8℃ to the highest 13.6℃, showing the average temperature around 13℃ overall, and there was no significant difference between the years.
data.target_sentence: During the test period, the average temperature ranged from the lowest 12.8℃ to the highest 13.6℃, and the overall average temperature was around 13℃, so there was no significant difference by year.

data.source_sentence: 시험 기간 동안의 강수량은 최저 216.6 mm에서 최대 1590.0 mm로 연차 간의 차이가 컸음을 알 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was found that the precipitation during the test period was from a minimum of 216.6 mm to a maximum of 1590.0 mm, indicating a large difference between the annual periods.
data.target_sentence: During the test period, the precipitation amount varied from a minimum of 216.6 mm to a maximum of 1590.0 mm.

data.source_sentence: 재배 작물에 따른 토양 화학성 변화에 대해 연구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Changes in soil chemistry according to cultivated crops were studied.
data.target_sentence: Changes in soil chemistry according to cultivated crops were studied.

data.source_sentence: 농경지에서 토양 화학성 조사는 토양 내 교란이 가장 적다고 판단되는 경운 작업 전에 수행하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In agricultural fields, soil chemistry surveys are conducted prior to tillage operations that are considered to have the least disturbance in the soil.
data.target_sentence: In agriculture, soil chemistry surveys are performed prior to tillage operations that are considered to have the least disturbance of the soil.

data.source_sentence: 콩, 감자, 배추 세 종류의 작물 재배가 토양 화학성에 영향을 주는지 분석하기 위하여 매년 4월 경운 작업 전에 조사한 토양 화학성 자료를 토대로 분석을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: To analyze whether the cultivation of three types of crops, soybean, potato, and Chinese cabbage, affects soil chemistry, analysis was performed based on soil chemistry data surveyed before tillage in April every year.
data.target_sentence: In order to analyze the effect of the cultivation of three crops of soybean, potato, and Chinese cabbage on soil chemistry, the analysis was conducted based on soil chemistry data surveyed before tillage in April every year.

data.source_sentence: 작물 재배 시 퇴비의 투입은 토양 유기물과 유효 인산 함량을 증진시키는데 본 시험에서는 퇴비를 넣지 않고 재배하였기 때문에 유기물(O.M.), 유효 인산(P2O5), K+, Ca2+ 함량은 작물과 관계 없이 감소한것으로 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: The input of compost during crop cultivation increases the content of soil organic matter and effective phosphoric acid, and in this test, the content of organic matter (O.M.), effective phosphoric acid (P2O5), K+, and Ca2+ is considered to have decreased regardless of crops.
data.target_sentence: The input of compost during crop cultivation enhances soil organic matter and effective phosphoric acid content. In this test, no compost was added. Therefore, organic matter (O.M.), effective phosphoric acid (P2O5), K+, Ca2+ contents are thought to have decreased regardless of crops.

data.source_sentence: ANOVA 분석 결과 재배 작물이 토양의 pH, 유기물, 유효인산, Ca2+ 함량과 관련이 있다는 것을 알 수 있으며, 특히 pH 와 Ca2+은 재배 작물과 고도의 유의성을 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: ANOVA analysis shows that cultivated crops are related to soil pH, organic matter, effective phosphoric acid, and Ca2+ content, especially pH and Ca2+ showed high significance with cultivated crops.
data.target_sentence: As a result of ANOVA analysis, cultivated crops were related to soil pH, organic matter, effective phosphoric acid, and Ca2+ content. In particular, pH and Ca2+ showed high significance in cultivated crops.

data.source_sentence: 콩의 검정 시비량은 배추와 감자보다 적기 때문에 작물에 따른 검정 시비량의 차이가 재배 작물이 토양 화학성에 유의한 영향을 주는 것과 관련이 클 것으로 추측된다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the amount of soybean test fertilizer is smaller than that of cabbage and potatoes, it is estimated that the difference in the amount of test fertilizer according to the crop is largely related to the significant influence of cultivated crops on soil chemistry.
data.target_sentence: Since the amount of soybean test fertilizer is smaller than that of cabbage and potatoes, it is estimated that the difference in the amount of test fertilizer depending on crops is mainly related to the significant effect of cultivated crops on soil chemistry.

data.source_sentence: 재배 작물에 따른 토양 미생물 효소 활성 및 요인에 대해 연구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The soil microbial enzyme activity and factors according to cultivated crops were studied.
data.target_sentence: Soil microbial enzyme activity and factors according to cultivated crops were studied.

data.source_sentence: DHA값과 토양 화학성, 기온과 강수량, 토양 내 세균 및 곰팡이 군집의 다양성을 나타내는 지표들 간의 상관 관계를 분석한 결과는 Table 3에 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 3 shows the results of analyzing the correlation between the DHA value and soil chemistry, temperature and precipitation, and indicators indicating the diversity of bacterial and fungal communities in the soil.
data.target_sentence: Table 3 shows the indicators of the diversity of bacterial and fungal communities in the soil as a result of analyzing the correlation between DHA values, soil chemistry, temperature and precipitation.

data.source_sentence: 전반적으로 토양 화학성 성분과는 유의한 상관 관계를 보이지 않고 Mg2+과 약한 양의 상관 관계를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Overall, there was no significant correlation with the soil chemical composition, but a weak positive correlation with Mg2+.
data.target_sentence: Overall, there was no significant correlation with soil chemical composition, but showed a weak positive correlation with Mg2+.

data.source_sentence: 기온과 DHA값과의 관계는 연 평균 기온과는 약한 음의 상관 관계를 보였으며, 측정 시점의 기온과는 약한 양의 상관 관계를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: The relationship between the temperature and the DHA value showed a weak negative correlation with the annual average temperature, and a weak positive correlation with the temperature at the time of measurement.
data.target_sentence: The relationship between temperature and DHA value showed a weak negative correlation with the average annual temperature, and a weak positive correlation with the temperature at the time of measurement.

data.source_sentence: DHA값은 재배 기간 중 누적 강수량, 세균 및 곰팡이의 다양성, 재배 작물, 생육기, 재배 유무, 계절 등에 대한 영향을 종합적으로 받는 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is judged that the DHA value is comprehensively affected by the accumulated precipitation during the cultivation period, the diversity of bacteria and fungi, the cultivated crop, the growing season, the presence or absence of cultivation, and the season.
data.target_sentence: It is judged that the DHA value is comprehensively affected by the accumulated precipitation during the cultivation period, the diversity of bacteria and fungi, the cultivated crops, the cultivation period, the presence or absence of cultivation, and the season.

data.source_sentence: 토양 미생물 군집의 다양성을 나타내는 Shannonindex는 세균 군집의 경우 콩, 감자, 배추의 순이었고, 곰팡이 군집의 경우 그 반대인 배추, 감자, 콩의 순서로 세균과 곰팡이 군집의 다양성이 음의 상관 관계를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: The Shannonindex, which indicates the diversity of soil microbial communities, showed a negative correlation between the diversity of bacterial and fungal communities in the order of soybean, potato, and Chinese cabbage in the case of bacterial community, and in the reverse order of Chinese cabbage, potato, and soybean in the case of fungal community. .
data.target_sentence: The Shannonindex, which indicates the diversity of soil microbiome, was in the order of soybean, potato, and Chinese cabbage in the case of bacterial community. In the case of fungal communities, in the reverse order of cabbage, potatoes, and beans, the diversity of bacterial and fungal communities showed a negative correlation.

data.source_sentence: 토양 내 곰팡이와 세균 군집의 다양성이 음의 상관관계를 보이고, 콩 재배 시 세균 군집의 다양성이 증가한다는 보고가 있어 본 연구의 결과와 일치하는 경향을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: There was a report that the diversity of the fungal and bacterial communities in the soil showed a negative correlation, and that the diversity of the bacterial community increased during soybean cultivation, showing a trend consistent with the results of this study.
data.target_sentence: The diversity of fungal and bacterial communities in the soil showed a negative correlation, and there was a report that the diversity of the bacterial community increased during soybean cultivation, which was consistent with the results of this study.

data.source_sentence: 농경지에서 작물의 DHA 값이 세균의 다양성과 양의 상관 관계를 보여 각 재배 작물 토양에서 높은 abundance를 보인 세균 군집은 DHA 값과 관련이 있을 것으로 추측된다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the DHA value of crops in agricultural fields was positively correlated with the diversity of bacteria, it is presumed that the bacterial community with high abundance in the soil of each cultivated crop is related to the DHA value.
data.target_sentence: Since the DHA value of crops in agricultural land is positively correlated with the diversity of bacteria, it is estimated that the bacterial community abundantly present in the soil of each cultivated crop is related to the DHA value.

data.source_sentence: 곰팡이 군집의 다양성은 DHA 값과 강한 음의 상관 관계를 보이며, 재배 작물에 따라 다른 구성을 보이고 있으므로 이와 관련해서는 추가적인 연구가 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: The diversity of the fungal community showed a strong negative correlation with the DHA value and showed a different composition depending on the cultivated crop, so additional research is needed in this regard.
data.target_sentence: The diversity of the fungal community shows a strong negative correlation with the DHA value, and the composition is different depending on the cultivated crop, so additional research is needed.

data.source_sentence: 농경지에서 토양 건전성을 나타내는 지표 중 하나로 활용되고 있는 토양 미생물 효소 활성은 토양 화학성, 재배 작물, 기후 등의 영향을 받는 것으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It is known that soil microbial enzyme activity, which is used as one of the indicators of soil health in agricultural fields, is affected by soil chemistry, cultivated crops, and climate.
data.target_sentence: Soil microbial enzyme activity, used as one of the indicators of soil health in agriculture, is known to be affected by soil chemistry, cultivated crops and climate.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 토양 미생물 효소 활성과 생물적·비생물적 환경 요인들의 상관 관계를 분석하여 농경지에서 토양 미생물 효소 활성에 영향을 주는 요인들을 종합적으로 평가하여 분석하고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, by analyzing the correlation between the enzyme activity of soil microorganisms and biotic and abiotic environmental factors, the factors affecting the enzyme activity of soil microorganisms in agricultural land were comprehensively evaluated and analyzed.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the factors affecting the enzyme activity of soil microorganisms in agricultural land were comprehensively evaluated and analyzed by analyzing the correlation between the enzyme activity of soil microorganisms and biotic and abiotic environmental factors.

data.source_sentence: 우리 나라에서는 CMV 항체 양성률이 3세에 80%, 6세에 90%, 9세 이상에서는 약95 - 98%로 매우 높으나, 신장 이식 후에는 CMV 관련 질병이 약 5-13%, 간을 이식한 후에는 14%에서 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: In Korea, the positive rate of CMV antibodies is very high, 80% at the age of 3, 90% at the age of 6, and about 95-98% at the age of 9, but after kidney transplantation, CMV-related diseases occur in about 5-13%, and 14% after liver transplantation.
data.target_sentence: In Korea, the CMV antibody positive rate is very high at 80% at 3 years old, 90% at 6 years old, and about 95 - 98% in 9 years old or older. However, CMV-related diseases occur in about 5-13% after kidney transplantation and in 14% after liver transplantation.

data.source_sentence: 특히 장기 이식 후나 림프성 종양과 관련된 경우 및 후천성 면역결핍 상태 등 T림프구-매개성 면역 기능이 저하되는 경우 CMV 재활성 증후군이 발현되는 경우가 많다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, CMV reactivation syndrome is often expressed after organ transplantation, in cases associated with lymphoid tumors, and when T lymphocyte-mediated immune function is reduced, such as in acquired immunodeficiency conditions.
data.target_sentence: In particular, CMV reactivation syndrome is often expressed when T lymphocyte-mediated immune function is reduced, such as after organ transplantation, cases associated with lymphoid tumors, and acquired immunodeficiency conditions.

data.source_sentence: CMV-특이적 T 세포 면역 모니터링은 이식 전 및 이식 후 CMV 감염, CMV 질환의 위험을 예측하여 적절한 치료 방침을 결정할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: CMV-specific T-cell immune monitoring can predict the risk of CMV infection and CMV disease before and after transplantation to determine an appropriate treatment plan.
data.target_sentence: CMV-specific T-cell immune monitoring can predict the risk of CMV infection and CMV disease before and after transplantation to determine an appropriate treatment plan.

data.source_sentence: 다양한 분석법이 있으며, IL-2, TNF-α, CD107, programmed death-1 (PD-1), CD154 외에도 인터페론-감마(IFN-γ)가 유용한 바이오 마커로 사용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Various assays exist, and interferon-gamma (IFN-γ) is used as a useful biomarker in addition to IL-2, TNF-α, CD107, programmed death-1 (PD-1), and CD154.
data.target_sentence: A variety of assays exist and interferon-gamma (IFN-γ) serves as a useful biomarker in addition to IL-2, TNF-α, CD107, programmed death-1 (PD-1) and CD154.

data.source_sentence: 중재검사(index test)는 거대 세포바이러스 특이 항원 자극 인터페론-감마 효소결합 면역흡착 점적법, 거대세포바이러스 특이 항원 자극 인터페론-감마 효소결합 면역흡착 측정법으로 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The index test was performed by cytomegalovirus-specific antigen-stimulated interferon-gamma enzyme-linked immunosorbent instillation method and cytomegalovirus-specific antigen-stimulated interferon-gamma enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay method.
data.target_sentence: The index test was performed by cytomegalovirus-specific antigen-stimulated interferon-gamma enzyme-linked immunosorbent injection method and cytomegalovirus antigen-stimulated interferon-gamma enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay.

data.source_sentence: 1차적으로 초록을 중심으로 문헌을 선택하였고, 평가자 간 문헌 선택에 이견이 있는 경우 전문을 확인하거나 전문가의 자문을 통해 최종적으로총 25편의 임상시험 연구를선택하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The literature was primarily selected based on the abstract, and if there was a disagreement between the reviewers in the selection of the literature, the full text was checked or a total of 25 clinical trial studies were finally selected through expert advice.
data.target_sentence: First, literature was selected based on the abstract, and if there was a disagreement among reviewers in the selection of literature, a total of 25 clinical trials were finally selected after confirming the full text or consulting with experts.

data.source_sentence: SIGN의 질 평가 도구는 연구 유형에 따라 필수 항목을 선정하고, 질 평가항목에 거의 모든 또는 모든 기준이 충족되는 경우 ‘++’, 몇 가지 기준이 충족된 경우 ‘+’,거 의 모든 또는 모든 기준이 충족되지 않는 경우 ‘-’ 로 평가하였으며, 평가자간에 질 평가 결과에 이견은 없었으며, 관련 문헌의 질 평가 결과는 모두 ‘2+’ 였다.
data.mt_sentence: SIGN's quality evaluation tool selects the required items according to the type of study, '++' if almost all or all of the criteria for quality evaluation items are met, '+' if some criteria are met, almost all or all of the criteria If the criteria were not met, it was evaluated as '-', there was no disagreement among the evaluators on the quality evaluation result, and the quality evaluation result of the related literature was all '2+'.
data.target_sentence: SIGN's quality evaluation tool selects the required items according to the type of study and selects '++' if almost all or all of the criteria for the quality criteria are met, '+' if some criteria are met, and almost all or all criteria. If this was not met, it was evaluated as '-', there was no disagreement among the evaluators on the quality evaluation result, and the quality evaluation result of the related literature was all '2+'.

data.source_sentence: 자료 추출은 시범적 검토를 거친 후, 임상 전문가의 의견을 반영하여 서식을 확정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After the data extraction went through a pilot review, the format was confirmed by reflecting the opinions of clinical experts.
data.target_sentence: Data extraction went through a pilot review and the format was confirmed by reflecting the opinions of clinical experts.

data.source_sentence: 이식 환자별로는 신장이식 환자 13편, 고형장기이식 환자 3편, 간이식 환자 5편, 조혈모세포이식 환자 3편, 혈액투석 환자 1편으로 84%가 고형장기 이식환자였다.
data.mt_sentence: By transplantation patients, 13 kidney transplant patients, 3 solid organ transplant patients, 5 liver transplant patients, 3 hematopoietic stem cell transplant patients, and 1 hemodialysis patient, 84% were solid organ transplant patients.
data.target_sentence: Among transplant patients, 13 kidney transplant patients, 3 solid organ transplant patients, 5 liver transplant patients, 3 hematopoietic stem cell transplant patients, and 1 hemodialysis patient, 84% were solid organ transplant patients.

data.source_sentence: 인종은 주요 3개 인종인 아시아인, 흑인, 백인으로구분하였고, 아시아인 5편을 제외한 연구는 모두 백인이었다.
data.mt_sentence: Race was divided into three major races, Asian, Black, and White, and all studies except for 5 Asians were white.
data.target_sentence: Ethnicity was divided into three main races: Asians, Blacks, and Whites, and all studies except for five Asians were white.

data.source_sentence: 추적 관찰 기간은 1-55개월까지이었고, CMV 세포면역 반응에 대한 임계치는 언급되지 않거나, 20SFU/2×105, 3×105 PBMCs, spot수가 2, 3배 증가한 경우 등 다양하게 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The follow-up period was from 1-55 months, and the threshold for CMV cellular immune response was not mentioned, and various reports such as 20SFU/2×105, 3×105 PBMCs, and a case where the number of spots increased by 2 or 3 times were reported.
data.target_sentence: The follow-up period ranged from 1 to 55 months, and the threshold of CMV cellular immune response was not mentioned and was reported for 20 SFU/2×105, 3×105 PBMCs, 2-3 times.

data.source_sentence: 예측 진단정확성을 확인한 연구는 12편이었고, 민감도 0.08-1.00, 특이도 0.14-1.00, 양성 예측도 0.21-1.00, 음성 예측도 0.48-1.00, 검사 정확도 0.36-0.92, AUC 0.69-0.85였다.
data.mt_sentence: There were 12 studies that confirmed the predictive diagnostic accuracy, and the sensitivity was 0.08-1.00, specificity 0.14-1.00, positive predictive value 0.21-1.00, negative predictive value 0.48-1.00, test accuracy 0.36-0.92, and AUC 0.69-0.85.
data.target_sentence: There were 12 studies that confirmed the predictive diagnostic accuracy, with sensitivity 0.08-1.00, specificity 0.14-1.00, positive predictive value 0.21-1.00, negative predictive value 0.48-1.00, test accuracy 0.36-0.92, and AUC 0.69-0.8.

data.source_sentence: The Transplantation Society 가이드라인에서는 CMV 특이적 세포 면역 모니터링이 다수의 연구에서 고형장기 이식 전 및 이식 후 환경에서 CMV 감염을 예측하고, 모니터링을 통해 CMV 질환의 위험을 층화하여, 선제적 예방적 치료 시 약제 중단과 사용 여부를 결정하고, 약제 중단 후 CMV 질환 재발에 대하여 철저한 감시여부를 확인할 수 있는 검사로 권고했다.
data.mt_sentence: According to The Transplantation Society guidelines, CMV-specific cellular immunity monitoring predicts CMV infection in the pre-transplant and post-transplant environments in a number of studies, and stratifies the risk of CMV disease through monitoring. It was recommended as a test that can determine whether to stop and use the drug, and whether or not to closely monitor the recurrence of CMV disease after discontinuation of the drug.
data.target_sentence: According to The Transplantation Society guidelines, CMV-specific cellular immunity monitoring predicts CMV infection in the pre-transplant and post-transplant environments in a number of studies, and stratifies the risk of CMV disease through monitoring. It was recommended as a test that can determine whether to stop and use the drug, and whether or not to closely monitor the recurrence of CMV disease after discontinuation of the drug.

data.source_sentence: 다른 선택된 연구들에서도 이식 전 예후 예측, 예방적/선제적 치료 후 예후 예측(late onset CMV)에 대하여 예후 관련 결과 발생의 위험도, 카플란-마이어 생존분석 결과가 활성 대비 비활성인 경우에 사건 발생률이 유의하게 높게 보고 되고 있어 동 검사가 진료 방침을 결정할 수 있는 검사로 가치가 있었으나, 임계치가 다양하였고, 예측 정확도의 범위가 넓게 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In other selected studies, the risk of prognosis-related outcomes for prognosis prediction before transplantation, prognosis prediction after prophylactic/preemptive treatment (late onset CMV), and the event rate were significant when Kaplan-Meier survival analysis results were inactive versus active. It was reported that the test was highly valued as a test that can determine the treatment policy, but the thresholds were varied and the range of predictive accuracy was widely reported.
data.target_sentence: In another screened study, the risk of prognostic outcomes for pre-transplant prognosis, prognostic prognosis after prophylactic/preemptive treatment (late onset CMV), and incidence of events was significant when Kaplan-Meier survival analysis results were inactive versus active. It has been reported to have high value as a test that can determine a treatment policy, but the threshold is varied and the range of predictive accuracy has been widely reported.

data.source_sentence: 또한, 조혈모세포이식 환자를 대상으로 한 연구는 3편이 확인되었으나, 조혈모세포 이식 환자는 T림프구의 측정, CMV에 대한 예방적 항바이러스제 약제 사용이 필요하지 않아 동 검사의 유용성이 낮았다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, three studies targeting hematopoietic stem cell transplantation patients were confirmed, but hematopoietic stem cell transplantation patients did not require T lymphocyte measurement or use of prophylactic antiviral drugs for CMV, so the usefulness of the test was low.
data.target_sentence: In addition, three studies targeting hematopoietic stem cell transplantation patients were confirmed, but the usefulness of the test was low because hematopoietic stem cell transplantation patients did not require T lymphocyte measurement or use of prophylactic antiviral drugs for CMV.

data.source_sentence: 문헌 검색은 MEDLINE, EMBASE 및 Cochrane library를 포함한 전자 데이터베이스를 통해 수행되었으며, 884편이 검색되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Literature search was performed through electronic databases including MEDLINE, EMBASE and Cochrane library, and 884 articles were searched.
data.target_sentence: Literature search was conducted through electronic databases such as MEDLINE, EMBASE, and Cochrane library, and 884 articles were searched.

data.source_sentence: 거대 세포바이러스 특이 항원 자극 인터페론 감마 효소결합 면역흡착 점적법/ 효소결합 면역흡착 측정법은 고형 장기이식 환자에서는 CMV 감염/질환의 위험을 층화하여 예방적/선제적 치료의 방침을 결정할 수 있는 잠재성이 있는 검사이나, 임계치 확립과 검사의 표준화를 위하여 추가적인 문헌적 근거가 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: The cytomegalovirus-specific antigen-stimulated interferon gamma enzyme-linked immunosorbent instillation method/enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay has the potential to stratify the risk of CMV infection/disease in solid organ transplant patients and determine the policy of prophylactic/preemptive treatment. However, additional literature evidence is needed to establish thresholds and standardize tests.
data.target_sentence: The cytomegalovirus-specific antigen-stimulated interferon gamma enzyme-linked immunosorbent instillation/enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay stratifies the risk of CMV infection/disease in solid organ transplant patients. It is a test with the potential to determine the policy of preventive/preemptive treatment, but additional literature evidence is needed to establish a threshold and standardize the test.

data.source_sentence: 결론적으로, 거대 세포바이러스 특이 항원 자극 인터페론-감마 효소결합 면역흡착 점적법/ 효소결합 면역흡착 측정법은 CMV 질환의 위험을 층화하여 고형장기 이식환자의 예방적/선제적 치료의 방침을 결정할 수 있는 잠재성이 있는 검사이나, 임계치 확립과 검사의 표준화를 위하여 추가적인 문헌적 근거가 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In conclusion, the cytomegalovirus-specific antigen-stimulated interferon-gamma enzyme-linked immunosorbent instillation method/enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay has potential to stratify the risk of CMV disease and determine the policy of prophylactic/preemptive treatment of solid organ transplant patients. Although it is a valid test, additional literature evidence is needed to establish a threshold and standardize the test.
data.target_sentence: In conclusion, the cytomegalovirus-specific antigen-stimulated interferon-gamma enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay/enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay has the potential to stratify the risk of CMV disease and determine prophylactic/preemptive treatment policies for solid organ transplant patients. This is a valid test and additional literature evidence is needed to establish a threshold and standardize the test.

data.source_sentence: 표현형 검사에서 CPE로 분류된 균주는 수기 PCR, CPO, Carba5를 사용하여 carbapenemase 생성 여부와 형별 분류를 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For strains classified as CPE in the phenotypic test, the generation of carbapenemase and classification by type were confirmed using manual PCR, CPO, and Carba5.
data.target_sentence: In the case of strains classified as CPE in the phenotypic test, the generation and classification of carbapenemases were confirmed using manual PCR, CPO, and Carba5.

data.source_sentence: Carba5와 CPO의 검사 결과가 수기 PCR과 일치하지 않은 경우 수기 PCR을 재검하였고 Carba-R 검사를 추가로 시행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: If the test results of Carba5 and CPO did not match the manual PCR, the manual PCR was reexamined and the Carba-R test was additionally performed.
data.target_sentence: If the test results of Carba5 and CPO did not match the manual PCR, the manual PCR was retested and the Carba-R test was additionally performed.

data.source_sentence: IMP 위양성 2주는 추가로 시행한 검사에서 IMP에 양성으로 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Two weeks of IMP false-positive was confirmed as positive for IMP in an additional test.
data.target_sentence: A two-week IMP false-positive was confirmed as positive for IMP in an additional test.

data.source_sentence: 2019년 질병관리청의 국내 CRE 내성 경향분석 자료에 의하면 5가지 주요 형별은 주요 CPE의 99.8%를 차지하였다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's domestic CRE tolerance trend analysis data in 2019, the five major types accounted for 99.8% of the major CPEs.
data.target_sentence: According to the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's 2019 analysis of CRE resistance trends in Korea, the five major types accounted for 99.8% of major CPEs.

data.source_sentence: Carba5는 20분이면 결과 판독이 가능하고, 복잡한 수기나 고가의 장비 없이 검사를 할 수 있는 것이 장점이다.
data.mt_sentence: The advantage of Carba5 is that the result can be read in 20 minutes and the test can be performed without complicated manuals or expensive equipment.
data.target_sentence: The advantage of Carba5 is that results can be read in 20 minutes and tests can be performed without complicated manuals or expensive equipment.

data.source_sentence: 두 번째로는 Carba5가 NDM에 대해 약양성 밴드를 보이는 경우 판독 경험이 많지 않은 검사자는 위음성으로 판독할 수 있다는 보고가 있었으나, 이에 대해 제대로 평가하지는 못하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Second, when Carba5 shows a weakly positive band for NDM, it was reported that an examiner with little experience in reading could read it as a false negative, but it was not evaluated properly.
data.target_sentence: Second, it has been reported that when Carba5 shows a weak positive band for NDM, it can be read as false negative by testers with little reading experience, but it has not been properly evaluated.

data.source_sentence: 결론적으로 Carba5는 국내 CRE 분리주의 검출과 형별 분류에 우수한 민감도와 특이도를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: In conclusion, Carba5 showed excellent sensitivity and specificity for detection and classification of domestic CRE isolates.
data.target_sentence: In conclusion, Carba5 showed excellent sensitivity and specificity for detection and classification of domestic CRE strains.

data.source_sentence: Enterococcus 속은 사람과 동물의 장관 공생균으로 알려져 있으며, 대장균과 더불어 분변오염의 지표균으로 이용된다.
data.mt_sentence: The genus Enterococcus is known as a symbiotic bacteria of the intestinal tract between humans and animals, and is used as an indicator of fecal contamination along with E. coli.
data.target_sentence: The genus Enterococcus is known as an intestinal symbiotic between humans and animals, and is used as an indicator of fecal contamination along with E. coli.

data.source_sentence: 치즈나 절임 과채류와 같은 식품에서의 검출이 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Detection in foods such as cheese and pickled fruits and vegetables has been reported.
data.target_sentence: Detection has been reported in foods such as cheese, pickled fruits and vegetables.

data.source_sentence: Enterococcus 속은 건강한 사람에게는 질병 관련 문제를 야기하지 않지만, 면역력이 저하된 사람에게는 요로감염증, 균혈증, 심내막염과 같은 질병을 유발할 수 있다고 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: It has been reported that the genus Enterococcus does not cause disease-related problems in healthy people, but can cause diseases such as urinary tract infections, bacteremia, and endocarditis in immunocompromised people.
data.target_sentence: It has been reported that the genus Enterococcus does not cause disease-related problems in healthy people, but can cause diseases such as urinary tract infection, bacteremia, and endocarditis in immunocompromised people.

data.source_sentence: 항생제 내성 외에도 숙주의 특이적 및 비특이적 방어 메커니즘을 저해하는 인자 및 숙주로의 침입과 증식에 관여하는 인자들이 Enterococcus 속의 독성인자로 고려되고 있다.

data.source_sentence: 비만군과 정상군을 비교하였을 때, 장내 미생물의 구성 차이가 나타났으며 장내 미생물의 역할에 따라 에너지 생산과 저장을 조절하여 체중의 증가 및 지방의 축적에 관여를 하는 것으로 입증되었다.

data.source_sentence: 비만으로 인하여 락토박실리우스(Lactobacillus), 베일로넬라(Veillonella) 등의 후벽균(Firmicutes)의 군집이 풍부해졌고 락토박실리우스(Lactobacillus), 베일로넬라(Veillonella)같은 의간균(Bacteroidetes)의 군집이 감소했으나 운동을 통하여 정상 수준의 미생물 군집 균형으로 회복되는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: Due to obesity, the colonies of Firmicutes such as Lactobacillus and Veillonella were enriched, and colonies of Bacteroidetes such as Lactobacillus and Veillonella were increased. decreased, but it was found to be restored to a normal level of microbial community balance through exercise.
data.target_sentence: Due to obesity, colonies of Firmicutes such as Lactobacillus and Veillonella were enriched. data.source_sentence: 단백질과 탄수화물의 균형은 장 건강에 중요한 영향을 미치게 되지만, 단백질의 과다 섭취는 잉여 에너지로서 질소가 세포 내 독소 역할을 하는 부패한 물질을 만든다.
data.mt_sentence: The balance of protein and carbohydrates has a significant impact on gut health, but excessive protein intake creates a putrefying substance in which nitrogen acts as an endotoxin as surplus energy.
data.target_sentence: A balance of protein and carbohydrates has a significant impact on gut health, but excessive protein intake creates a putrefactive substance in which nitrogen acts as an endotoxin as surplus energy.

data.source_sentence: 고강도의 지구력 훈련을 하는 마라톤 선수들에게서 습관성으로 염증성 장질환이 걸린다고 보고 되고 있다.

data.source_sentence: 고강도의 지구력 훈련을 통한 장내 미생물 손상의 원인이 될 수도 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can also cause damage to the gut microbiome through high-intensity endurance training.
data.target_sentence: High-intensity endurance training can also damage your gut microbiome.

data.source_sentence: 종합하자면, 운동 유형 및 장내 영양의 과잉에 따른 장내 미생물의 구성 변화는 장내 미생물의 변형과 교란을 일으키는 요인임과 동시에 장내 미생물을 회복시키는 기능을 하는 것을 시사한다고 할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In summary, it can be said that changes in the composition of intestinal microorganisms due to exercise type and excessive intestinal nutrition are factors that cause deformation and disturbance of intestinal microorganisms and at the same time suggest functioning to restore intestinal microorganisms.
data.target_sentence: In summary, it can be said that changes in the composition of intestinal microbes according to the type of exercise and excessive intake of nutrients are factors that cause the transformation and disturbance of the intestinal microflora, and at the same time suggest the function of restoring the gut microbes.

data.source_sentence: 과거 수십 여년 동안 운동 및 스포츠 과학의 발달과 더불어 대사 질병을 예방·개선하고 스포츠 현장에서 경기력을 높일 수 있는 적절한 운동 및 식이 요법들이 개발되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the past several decades, along with the development of exercise and sports science, appropriate exercise and diet regimens have been developed to prevent and improve metabolic diseases and enhance performance in sports fields.
data.target_sentence: With advances in exercise and sports science over the past few decades, proper exercise and diet have been developed to prevent and ameliorate metabolic diseases and improve performance in sports.

data.source_sentence: 배양 조건 중 배지 최적화는 균체량 증가 및 목적으로 하는 생산 물질의 회수 등의 다양한 변수에 따른 조건들을 고려해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Among the culture conditions, optimization of the medium should consider conditions according to various variables, such as an increase in the amount of cells and recovery of a target production material.

data.source_sentence: Protease 활성의 강도는 투명환의 크기를 측정하여 우수 균주를 선발하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The strength of the protease activity was selected by measuring the size of the transparent ring.
data.target_sentence: The intensity of protease activity was selected by measuring the size of the clear ring.

data.source_sentence: 15개의 실험구를 구성하여 각 성분을 고농도 수준(+1)과 중심점(0), 저농도 수준(-1)으로 설정하였고, 각 실험구의 종속 변수는 protease 생산량(mm)을 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: 15 experimental groups were composed and each component was set at a high concentration level (+1), a central point (0), and a low concentration level (-1), and the protease production (mm) was set as the dependent variable for each experimental group.
data.target_sentence: 15 experimental groups were constructed and each component was set at a high concentration level (+1), a central point (0), and a low concentration level (-1). And, as the dependent variable of each experimental group, protease production (mm) was set.

data.source_sentence: 위의 결과들을 바탕으로 protease 최대 생산을 위한 3가지 배지 성분의 최적 농도를 예측하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the above results, the optimal concentrations of the three media components for maximal protease production were predicted.
data.target_sentence: Based on the above results, the optimal concentrations of the three media components for maximal protease production were predicted.

data.source_sentence: 이후 예측된 최적 조건에서의 protease 생산량 분석을 통해 실험 결과의 재현성을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Thereafter, the reproducibility of the experimental results was confirmed through the analysis of the proteinase production under the predicted optimal conditions.
data.target_sentence: Afterwards, the reproducibility of the experimental results was confirmed by analyzing proteinase production under the predicted optimal conditions.

data.source_sentence: 일반 배지와의 비교를 통한 효율성 검증을 위해 추가적으로 Cupp-Enyad의 방법을 이용하여 정량 분석을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Quantitative analysis was additionally performed using Cupp-Enyad's method to verify efficiency through comparison with normal medium.
data.target_sentence: In addition, quantitative analysis was performed using Cupp-Enyad's method, and the efficiency was verified by comparison with the normal medium.

data.source_sentence: SRCM115785는 배양 후 20시간까지 급격하게 성장하는 대수기를 나타내었고, 24시간 이후 점차 성장이 느려지며 정지기에 도달하는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: SRCM115785 showed a logarithmic phase of rapid growth up to 20 hours after incubation, and gradually slowed growth after 24 hours and reached a stationary phase.
data.target_sentence: SRCM115785 showed a logarithmic phase of rapid growth up to 20 hours after incubation, and reached a stationary phase by gradually slowing growth after 24 hours.

data.source_sentence: SRCM115785 균주 또한 균체 성장에 있어서는 이전의 보고들과 동일한 결과가 나타났지만, protease 생산에 있어서는 20시간에서 최대 생산량이 나타나 기존의 균주들과 차이를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: The SRCM115785 strain also showed the same results as the previous reports in terms of cell growth, but in protease production, the maximum production was shown at 20 hours, showing a difference from the existing strains.
data.target_sentence: The SRCM115785 strain also showed the same result as the previous report in terms of cell growth, but showed a difference from the existing strain by showing the maximum production at 20 hours in protease production.

data.source_sentence: 이외에, 다른 Bacillus 속 균주 또한 위와 동일한 보고가 있는 반면, 이와 다른 결과의 보고가 존재하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, other strains of Bacillus also had the same report as above, while other reports of results existed.
data.target_sentence: In addition, other Bacillus strains reported the same as above, but other reports existed.

data.source_sentence: 반응값에 대한 분산 분석을 진행한 결과 결정계수(R-square) 값이 1에 가까운 수치인 0.9193을 나타내었고, p-value 값이 0.05보다 낮은 0.0044으로 가정된 모델에 대한 높은 유의성 및 실험 모형의 적합도를 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of ANOVA on the reaction value, the coefficient of determination (R-square) was 0.9193, which is close to 1, and the high significance and suitability of the experimental model were confirmed for the model assumed to have a p-value value of 0.0044 lower than 0.05.
data.target_sentence: As a result of ANOVA on the response value, the coefficient of determination (R-square) was 0.9193, a value close to 1. The high significance and goodness of fit of the experimental model were confirmed for the model with a p-value of 0.0044 lower than 0.05.

data.source_sentence: Protease 생산에 있어서 각각의 변수들이 미치는 영향을 확인하기 위해 1개의 독립 변수를 최적값에 고정하고 나머지 2개 변수의 농도를 변화시켜 작성 된 3차원 반응 표면도를 Fig. 5에 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to check the effect of each variable on protease production, a three-dimensional response surface diagram prepared by fixing one independent variable to an optimal value and changing the concentration of the other two variables is shown in Fig. 5 is shown.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 5 shows a three-dimensional response surface diagram prepared by fixing one independent variable to an optimal value and changing the concentration of the other two variables to confirm the effect of each variable on protease production.

data.source_sentence: 선별 균주를 대상으로 protease 대량 생산을 위한 산업적 배지 조건을 확립하기 위해 통계학적 분석기법인 반응표면 분석법을 활용하여 배지 최적화를 수행하였고, 그 결과 일반 LB 배지보다 효율적으로 높은 생산량을 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to establish industrial culture medium conditions for mass production of protease for selected strains, culture medium optimization was performed using the response surface analysis method, which showed higher production than general LB culture medium.
data.target_sentence: Medium optimization was performed using a reaction surface assay to establish industrial medium conditions for mass production of proteases for the selected strains, which showed higher yields than general LB medium.

data.source_sentence: ANOVA 분석을 통해 실험 모델의 적합성을 증명하였고, 설계한 최적 배지에서 반복 실험을 진행하여 protease 생산량을 측정한 결과, 예측값과 매우 유사한 값을 나타냄을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The suitability of the experimental model was verified through ANOVA analysis, and as a result of measuring protease production by repeating the experiment in the designed optimal medium, it was confirmed that the value was very similar to the predicted value.
data.target_sentence: The suitability of the experimental model was verified through ANOVA analysis, and the result of measuring the amount of protease production by repeating the experiment in the designed optimal medium was confirmed to be very similar to the predicted value.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구를 통해 protease 생산량 증가를 위한 배지 성분의 최적화를 확립하였고, 이를 바탕으로 산업용 효소로서 protease의 효율적인 활용 방안에 대한 기초자료로 활용될 수 있을 것으로 기대된다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this study, the optimization of medium components for increasing protease production was established, and based on this, it is expected that it can be used as basic data for the efficient use of protease as an industrial enzyme.
data.target_sentence: Through this study, optimization of medium components to increase protease production was established, and based on this, it is expected that it can be utilized as basic data for efficiently using protease as an industrial enzyme.

data.source_sentence: 실험은 한우 번식우 농장에서 실시하였다.

data.target_sentence: Four rainbows were used as test tools for each, and five Korean cattle were released per raincoat.

data.source_sentence: 미네랄 첨가제를 처리한 후 각 우방당 5곳에서 0, 7, 14, 21 및 28일에 우분을 채취하였다.

data.source_sentence: 28일간 결과값을 평균하였을 때, 무첨가구에서 유기물 함량이 가장 높았고, 조회분 함량이 가장 낮았다.

data.source_sentence: 국내 한우 산업이 대규모화됨에 따라 축사 환경 문제가 지속적으로 대두되어 왔다.

data.target_sentence: As Korea's dairy cattle industry grows on a large scale, environmental issues in livestock houses have been continuously raised.

data.source_sentence: 주요 병원성 미생물에는 대장균과 살모넬라 등이 있는데 이는 장병원성, 장출혈성 균으로 장 독소 유발로 설사를 일으키며, 이로 인한 폐사율은 약 70%에 이른다.

data.target_sentence: The major pathogenic microorganisms are E. coli and Salmonella, which are enteropathogenic and enterohaemorrhagic bacteria that induce intestinal toxins and cause diarrhea, with a mortality rate of about 70%.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 축산 농장의 악취 발생 실태를 조사하였는데, 악취 관리를 위해 많은 축산 농가에서 환경 개선제를 사용하고 있어 많은 추가 생산비가 소요된다고 보고하였다.
