data.target_sentence: The AAA reported that as a result of investigating the occurrence of odors in livestock farms, many livestock farms use environmental improvers to manage odors, resulting in high additional production costs.

data.source_sentence: 사료 급여는 오전 8시와 오후 5시에 각각 급여하였으며, 1일 두당 이탈리안라이그라스 5 ㎏, 번식우용 농후사료 2 ㎏을 급여하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Feed was fed at 8 am and 5 pm, respectively, and 5 kg of Italian ryegrass and 2 kg of rich feed for breeding cattle were fed per head per day.
data.target_sentence: Feed was fed at 8 am and 5 pm, respectively, and 5 kg of Italian ryegrass and 2 kg of abundant feed for cattle were fed per person per day.

data.source_sentence: 음수는 신선한 물을 자유로이 섭취할 수 있게 하였으며, 기타 사양 관리는 농장의 관행에 준하여 실시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Drinking water allowed fresh water to be freely consumed, and other feeding management was carried out according to farm practices.

data.source_sentence: 분석을 위하여 시험 0, 7, 14, 21 및 28일차에 우방 5곳에서 우분을 5 ㎏ 채취하여 분석에 이용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For analysis, 5kg of milk powder was collected from 5 friendly places on the 0, 7, 14, 21 and 28 days of the test and used for analysis.
data.target_sentence: For analysis, 5 kg of cow dung was collected from 5 favorable sites on days 0, 7, 14, 21, and 28 of the test and used for analysis.

data.source_sentence: 우분의 화학적 성분을 분석하기 위해 채취된 시료는 65℃ 송풍 건조기에서 48시간 건조시켜 Wiley mill 분쇄기를 이용하여 분쇄 이용하였다.

data.target_sentence: The sample collected for the analysis of the chemical composition of the milk powder was dried in a blow dryer at 65° C. for 48 hours, then pulverized and used using a Wiley pulverizer.

data.source_sentence: 1 ㎜ screen을 통과한 시료를 분석용으로 사용하였다.

data.target_sentence: Samples passed through a 1 mm screen were used for analysis.

data.source_sentence: 우분의 수분 함량은 105℃ 건조기에서 24시간 동안 건조 후 무게를 측정하여 분석하였다.

data.target_sentence: The moisture content of the milk powder was dried in a dryer at 105° C. for 24 hours, and then the weight was measured and analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 유기물 함량은 시료 무게에서 조회분 함량을 뺀 값으로 계산하였다.

data.source_sentence: 우분 추출액은 채취한 우분 20 g과 증류수 180 ㎖를 믹서기에서 30초간 혼합한 후 거즈로 걸러서 제조하였다.

data.target_sentence: The small powder extract was prepared by mixing 20 g of the collected small powder and 180 ml of distilled water in a blender for 30 seconds and then filtering with gauze.

data.source_sentence: 우분 중 미생물 조성을 분석하기 위해 채취한 우분 시료 1 g과 멸균 희석액(0.84% NaCl)으로 10진 희석법에 따라 희석한 후 균수 측정에 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was used for measuring the number of bacteria after diluting 1 g of a cow sample collected to analyze the composition of the microorganisms in the cow cow according to the decimal dilution method with a sterile diluent (0.84% NaCl).
data.target_sentence: 1 g of the collected cow sample was analyzed using a sterile diluent (0.84% NaCl) according to the decimal dilution method to analyze the composition of microorganisms in the cow and used to measure the number of bacteria.

data.source_sentence: 분석 모델에는 기간(day effect), 첨가제(additive effect) 및 각 요인의 상호 효과 (interaction effect)를 포함하여 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The analysis model was analyzed including the day effect, additive effect, and interaction effect of each factor.
data.target_sentence: The analysis model including the day of the week effect, additive effect, and interaction effect of each factor was analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 광물질 첨가제가 한우 번식우 바닥의 건물 함량 변화에 미치는 영향을 조사한 결과는 Fig. 1과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The results of investigating the effect of mineral additives on the change in the dry matter content of the floor of Korean cattle breeding are shown in Fig. equal to 1.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 1 shows the results of investigation of the effect of mineral additives on the change in the dry matter content of the bottom of Korean beef cattle.

data.source_sentence: 광물질 첨가제를 이용하였을 때 건물 함량 변화는 기간에 따른 유의적인 차이가 나타났고, quadratic한 효과를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: When the mineral additive was used, the change in the dry matter content showed a significant difference according to the period, and showed a quadratic effect.
data.target_sentence: When the mineral additive was used, the change in the dry matter content showed a significant difference according to the period, showing a secondary effect.

data.source_sentence: 광물질 첨가제가 한우 번식우 바닥의 유기물 함량 변화에 미치는 영향을 조사한 결과는 Fig. 2와 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The results of investigating the effect of mineral additives on the change of organic matter content in the bottom of Korean cattle breeding are shown in Fig. Same as 2.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 2 shows the results of investigating the effect of mineral additives on the change of organic matter content in the floor of Korean cattle breeding.

data.source_sentence: 광물질 첨가제를 이용하였을 때 유기물 함량은 7, 14 및 28일째 모든 광물질 첨가제 시험구가 유의적으로 낮았고(p<0.05), 그 중 FA 시험구에서 가장 낮게 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: When the mineral additive was used, the organic content was significantly lower in all the mineral additive test groups (p<0/>.05) on days 7, 14 and 28, and among them, the FA test group showed the lowest.

data.source_sentence: 저장 기간에 따른 굴 패각분말 처리 시 한우분에 함유된 미생물상의 변화는 Table 2에 제시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 2 shows the changes in the microbiota contained in Korean beef meal when oyster shell powder was treated according to the storage period.
data.target_sentence: Table 2 shows the changes in the microflora contained in Korean bovine manure when oyster shell powder was treated according to the storage period.

data.source_sentence: 4일에 측정한 효모균을 제외한 나머지 기간에서는 모든 처리구에서 통계적 유의성이 인정되지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: Statistical significance was not recognized in all treatment groups in the remaining period except for yeast measured on the 4th day.
data.target_sentence: Statistical significance was not recognized in all treatment groups of the remaining period except for yeast measured on day 4.

data.source_sentence: 이 결과는 굴 패각분말 처리는 유산균, 효모균 및 고초균에 크게 영향을 주지 않는다는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: This result means that oyster shell powder treatment does not significantly affect lactic acid bacteria, yeast bacteria and Bacillus subtilis.
data.target_sentence: This result means that oyster shell powder treatment does not have a significant effect on lactic acid bacteria, yeast bacteria and Bacillus subtilis.

data.source_sentence: 우리의 결과는 한우분에서 측정한 0일과 2일에서는 고초균 수가 가장 많았고 그 다음은 유산균과 호모균 순으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: Our results showed that the number of Bacillus subtilis was the highest on days 0 and 2 measured in Korean beef meal, followed by lactic acid bacteria and homobacteria.
data.target_sentence: As a result, the number of Bacillus subtilis in domestic small manure was the highest on days 0 and 2, followed by lactic acid bacteria and homobacteria.

data.source_sentence: 4일과 8일에서는 유산균 수가 가장 많았고 고초균 수, 호모균 수 순서로 나타나 앞의 결과와 반대의 결과를 보여주었다.
data.mt_sentence: On days 4 and 8, the number of lactic acid bacteria was the highest, followed by the number of Bacillus subtilis and the number of homobacteria, showing the opposite result to the previous result.
data.target_sentence: On days 4 and 8, the number of lactic acid bacteria was the highest, followed by Bacillus subtilis and homobacteria, showing the opposite result from the previous results.

data.source_sentence: AAA에서는 퇴비 내에서 다양한 미생물이 상호 공존을 통해 토양에 환원될 경우 토양 내 미생물의 대사 산물에 의한 효소 활성이 증대되어 작물에 유익한 영양분을 제공한다고 보고한 바 있다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA reported that when various microorganisms in the compost coexist and are reduced to the soil, the enzyme activity by the metabolites of the microorganisms in the soil increases, thereby providing beneficial nutrients to crops.
data.target_sentence: AAA reported that when various microorganisms in compost coexist and are reduced to soil, enzyme activity by metabolites of microorganisms in soil increases, providing beneficial nutrients to crops.

data.source_sentence: 전체적으로 살모넬라와 대장균은 굴 패각분말에 처리했을 경우 통계적 유의성은 없었고(p>0.05), 저장기간 동안 두드러진 특징은 관측되지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: Overall, Salmonella and Escherichia coli had no statistical significance when treated with oyster shell powder (p>0.05), and no remarkable characteristics were observed during storage.
data.target_sentence: Overall, Salmonella and Escherichia coli were not statistically significant when treated with oyster shell powder (p>0.05), and no remarkable properties were observed during storage.

data.source_sentence: 흥미로운 점은 저장 기간에 따라 살모넬라와 대장균 수는 감소되는 경향을 보였으며, 이는 퇴비화 되는 과정의 일부분으로 보여진다.
data.mt_sentence: Interestingly, the numbers of Salmonella and E. coli tended to decrease according to the storage period, which is seen as part of the composting process.
data.target_sentence: Interestingly, the populations of Salmonella and E. coli tended to decrease with storage period, which appears to be part of the composting process.

data.source_sentence: 저장 기간에 따라 분석한 건물과 조회분 함량은 대조구보다 굴 패각분말 처리구에서 높았지만, 유기물 함량은 반대의 결과를 보여 주었다.
data.mt_sentence: The dry matter and raw material content analyzed according to the storage period were higher in the oyster shell powder treated group than in the control group, but the organic matter content showed the opposite result.
data.target_sentence: The dry matter and raw material content analyzed according to the storage period were higher in the oyster shell powder treated group than in the control group, but the organic matter content showed the opposite result.

data.source_sentence: 이런 경향은 퇴비화 과정과 밀접한 관련성이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This trend is closely related to the composting process.
data.target_sentence: This trend is closely related to the composting process.

data.source_sentence: 미생물(유산균, 효모균 및 고초균)과 병원성 미생물(살모넬라와 대장균)의 경우 저장 기간에 따라 한우분에 굴 패각분말 처리 시 두드러진 영향을 관측하지못했다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of microorganisms (lactic acid bacteria, yeast and Bacillus subtilis) and pathogenic microorganisms (Salmonella and Escherichia coli), no significant effect was observed when processing oyster shell powder on Korean beef meal depending on the storage period.
data.target_sentence: In the case of microorganisms (lactic acid bacteria, yeast, Bacillus subtilis) and pathogenic microorganisms (Salmonella, Escherichia coli), no significant effect was observed when oyster shell powder was treated with Korean manure depending on the storage period.

data.source_sentence: 결론적으로, 굴 패각분말 1% 처리는 퇴비화 과정에서 미생물보다 한우분의 특성에 긍정적인 영향을 미쳤다.
data.mt_sentence: In conclusion, treatment with 1% oyster shell powder had a more positive effect on the characteristics of Korean beef meal than microorganisms during the composting process.
data.target_sentence: In conclusion, 1% oyster shell powder treatment had a more positive effect on the characteristics of Korean cow dung than microorganisms in the composting process.

data.source_sentence: 생산성 면에서 굴패각 처리를 위해 한우분에 적용 시 유기질 비료로서 가치를 재평가하기 위해서는 첨가 비율, 퇴비화 과정에서 미치는 영향, 악취 저감 등 다른 관전에서의 연구가 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In terms of productivity, in order to re-evaluate the value as an organic fertilizer when applied to Korean beef meal for oyster shell treatment, it is necessary to study other aspects such as the addition ratio, the effect on composting process, and the reduction of odor.
data.target_sentence: In order to re-evaluate the value of organic fertilizer when applied to Korean small manure for oyster shell treatment in terms of productivity, it is necessary to study other aspects such as the addition rate, the effect on the composting process, and the reduction rate. of smell.

data.source_sentence: 바이오매스는 자연에서 얻어진 화학적 에너지로 활용할 수 있으며 곡물, 식물, 동물과 미생물 등의 모든 유기체를 말한다.
data.mt_sentence: Biomass can be used as chemical energy obtained from nature and refers to all organisms such as grains, plants, animals and microorganisms.
data.target_sentence: Biomass can be used as chemical energy obtained from nature and refers to all organisms including grains, plants, animals, and microorganisms.

data.source_sentence: 한편, 바이오매스는 열분해 또는 발효 과정을 거쳐 바이오에너지 연료로 활용할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, biomass can be used as bioenergy fuel through pyrolysis or fermentation process.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, biomass can be used as bioenergy fuel through pyrolysis or fermentation process.

data.source_sentence: 화석 연료의 고갈과 환경 영향 등의 문제 해결을 위한 대체 에너지 중 하나로 평가되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It is evaluated as one of the alternative energy sources for solving problems such as depletion of fossil fuels and environmental impacts.
data.target_sentence: It is evaluated as one of the alternative energy sources to solve problems such as depletion of fossil fuels and environmental impact.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 바이오매스의 반탄화 처리가 가능한 523~573 K의 온도 및 불활성 분위기 조건에서 다양한 바이오매스(톱밥, 볏짚, 쌀겨, 커피박, 폐목재) 내 탄소 함량을 높이는 공정을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the process of increasing the carbon content in various biomass (sawdust, rice straw, rice bran, coffee meal, waste wood) was carried out at a temperature of 523-573 K and inert atmosphere conditions, which can be torrefied of biomass.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the process of increasing the carbon content of various biomass (sawdust, rice straw, rice bran, coffee powder, waste wood) was performed at a temperature of 523-573K and inert atmosphere conditions, where torrefaction of biomass is possible.

data.source_sentence: 반탄화한 바이오매스를 탄소 농도, 연소 거동 등을 조사하여 철강 산업 등에 활용할 수 있는 고체 연료로서의 가능성을 검토하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The possibility of torrefied biomass as a solid fuel that can be used in the steel industry was examined by examining the carbon concentration and combustion behavior.
data.target_sentence: Carbon concentration and combustion behavior were investigated to investigate the potential of torrefied biomass as a solid fuel for use in the steel industry.

data.source_sentence: 지구 온난화의 주된 원인은 CO2 가스이며, 1960년대 이후 지속적으로 CO2의 발생량은 증가하는 추세이다.
data.mt_sentence: The main cause of global warming is CO2 gas, and the amount of CO2 generation has been continuously increasing since the 1960s.
data.target_sentence: The main cause of global warming is CO2 gas, and the amount of CO2 generated has been continuously increasing since the 1960s.

data.source_sentence: 제안된 다양한 방법 중에서 철강 공정에서 바이오매스 적용은 잠재적으로 코크스 제조와 고로 시스템의 GHG(greenhous gases, GHGs) 배출을 상당히 낮출 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Among the various methods proposed, the application of biomass in steel processing can potentially significantly lower the emissions of greenhouse gases (GHGs) from coke production and blast furnace systems.
data.target_sentence: Among the various methods proposed, the application of biomass to the steel process can potentially significantly lower greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions from coke production and blast furnace systems.

data.source_sentence: 바이오매스는 잠재적으로 탄소의 함량을 가지고 있는데, 반탄화 공정을 통하여 바이오매스 내 탄소의 함량을 극대화하여 철강 공정뿐만 아니라 다양한 공정에서 사용이 가능할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Biomass potentially has a carbon content, and it can be used not only in steel processes but also in various processes by maximizing the carbon content in the biomass through a semi-carbonization process.
data.target_sentence: Biomass has a potential carbon content, and can be used in various processes as well as steel processing by maximizing the carbon content of biomass through torrefaction process.

data.source_sentence: 한편, 새로운 대체 에너지 중 하나는 바이오에너지가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Meanwhile, one of the new alternative energy sources is bioenergy.
data.target_sentence: Meanwhile, one of the new alternative energy sources is bioenergy.

data.source_sentence: 바이오에너지는 CO2 중립 연료인 바이오매스를 통해 생성할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Bioenergy can be generated from biomass, a CO2-neutral fuel.
data.target_sentence: Bioenergy can be generated from biomass, a CO2-neutral fuel.

data.source_sentence: 바이오매스는 태양 에너지를 받아 유기물을 합성하는 식물체, 그리고 식물을 식량으로 하는 동물과 미생물 등 생물 유기체를 지칭하며, 화학적 에너지로 전환할 수 있는 친환경 에너지 자원이다.
data.mt_sentence: Biomass refers to plants that synthesize organic matter by receiving solar energy, and living organisms such as animals and microorganisms that use plants as food, and is an eco-friendly energy resource that can be converted into chemical energy.
data.target_sentence: Biomass refers to plants that synthesize organic matter by receiving solar energy and living organisms such as animals and microorganisms that consume plants as food, and is an eco-friendly energy source that can be converted into chemical energy.

data.source_sentence: 화석 연료와 마찬가지로 바이오매스도 탄소를 포함하는 연료이다.
data.mt_sentence: Like fossil fuels, biomass is a fuel that contains carbon.
data.target_sentence: Like fossil fuels, biomass is a fuel that contains carbon.

data.source_sentence: 탄소 기반의 연료는 대기 중으로 GHG인 CO2를 배출한다.
data.mt_sentence: Carbon-based fuels emit GHG, CO2, into the atmosphere.
data.target_sentence: Carbon-based fuels release GHG, CO2 into the atmosphere.

data.source_sentence: 화석 연료와 바이오매스 간의 중요한 차이는 CO2가 방출되는 시간대에 있다.
data.mt_sentence: An important difference between fossil fuels and biomass lies in the time period in which CO2 is released.
data.target_sentence: An important difference between fossil fuels and biomass is the period in which CO2 is released.

data.source_sentence: 대기 중 CO2를 화석 연료로 변환하는 과정은 수백만 년이 걸리기 때문에 연소에서 방출되는 CO2는 새로운 것으로 간주된다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the process of converting atmospheric CO2 into fossil fuels takes millions of years, the CO2 released from combustion is considered new.
data.target_sentence: Since the process of converting atmospheric CO2 into fossil fuels takes millions of years, the CO2 released from combustion is considered new.

data.source_sentence: 광합성 작용을 하기 위해 흡수한 이산화탄소를 다시 공기 중에 배출하는 사이클이 반복된다.
data.mt_sentence: The cycle of releasing carbon dioxide absorbed back into the air for photosynthesis is repeated.
data.target_sentence: The cycle of releasing carbon dioxide absorbed back into the air for photosynthesis is repeated.

data.source_sentence: CO2 중립 연료인 바이오매스를 열 분해 또는 발효 과정을 통해 바이오에너지로 전환하여 에너지원으로 사용할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Biomass, a CO2-neutral fuel, can be converted into bioenergy through thermal decomposition or fermentation and used as an energy source.
data.target_sentence: As a CO2-neutral fuel, biomass can be converted into bioenergy through pyrolysis or fermentation and used as an energy source.

data.source_sentence: 바이오매스 열분해는 산소가 없는 불활성 분위기 상태에서 바이오매스 공급 원료가 열분해가 되는 과정이며, 열 분해 처리를 하는 공정을 반탄 화 공정이라고 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Biomass pyrolysis is a process in which biomass feedstock is pyrolyzed in an inert atmosphere without oxygen, and the process of thermal decomposition is called torrefaction process.
data.target_sentence: Biomass pyrolysis is a process in which biomass feedstock is pyrolyzed in an inert atmosphere without oxygen, and the pyrolysis process is called torrefaction process.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 바이오매스는 높은 수분 및 휘발분과 낮은 탄소 함유량을 가지고 있으므로 철강 공정 내 탄재로서 역할을 하기에는 부족하다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, biomass has high moisture and volatile matter and low carbon content, so it is insufficient to play a role as a carbon material in steel processing.
data.target_sentence: In general, biomass has high moisture and volatility and low carbon content, so it is insufficient to play a role as a carbon material in steel processing.

data.source_sentence: 반탄화 공정은 약 573 K의 온도에서 진행되는 열화학적 공정이며, 반탄화 온도에서 산소-수소 결합체인 헤미셀룰로오스가 분해되며, 이산화탄소 및 일산화탄소, 메탄, 타르 등의 휘발성 가스 (CO, CO2, N2, CH4 및 탄화수소)를 발생하여 분리가 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The torrefaction process is a thermochemical process that proceeds at a temperature of about 573 K. At the torrefaction temperature, hemicellulose, an oxygen-hydrogen bond, is decomposed, and volatile gases such as carbon dioxide and carbon monoxide, methane, and tar (CO, CO2, N2, CH4) and hydrocarbons) are generated and separated.
data.target_sentence: The torrefaction process is a thermochemical process carried out at a temperature of about 573K. At the torrefaction temperature, hemicellulose, an oxygen-hydrogen bond, is decomposed, and volatile gases such as carbon dioxide, carbon monoxide, methane, tar (CO, CO2, N2, CH4) and hydrocarbons ) are created and separated.

data.source_sentence: 탄소-수소 결합체인 셀룰로오스와 탄소-탄소 결합체인 리그닌 성분이 잔류하게 되어 고정 탄소의 함량이 증가하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Cellulose, which is a carbon-hydrogen bond, and lignin, which is a carbon-carbon bond, remain, and the content of fixed carbon increases.
data.target_sentence: Cellulose, which is a carbon-hydrogen bond, and lignin, which is a carbon-carbon bond, remain, and the content of fixed carbon increases.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 불활성 분위기 및 573 K에서 다양한 바이오매스의 반탄화 실험을 진행하여 질량 및 탄소의 함량을 검토하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, mass and carbon content were reviewed by conducting torrefaction experiments of various biomass in an inert atmosphere and 573 K.
data.target_sentence: In this study, mass and carbon content were investigated by performing torrefaction experiments of various biomass in an inert atmosphere and 573 K.

data.source_sentence: 화석 연료를 대체할 수 있는 고 탄소 바이오 연료를 만들어 활용 가능성을 검토하기 위하여, 단일 코크스와 반탄화를 진행한 바이오매스와 코크스를 혼합하여 연소 속도와 온도 측정 실험을 조사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to examine the possibility of using high-carbon biofuels that can replace fossil fuels, combustion rate and temperature measurement experiments were investigated by mixing single coke, torrefied biomass, and coke.
data.target_sentence: To investigate the possibility of using high-carbon biofuels that can replace fossil fuels, combustion rate and temperature measurement experiments were conducted by mixing single coke, torrefied biomass, and coke.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 5가지의 바이오매스 샘플을 사용하여 반탄화 실험을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, torrefaction experiments were conducted using five biomass samples.
data.target_sentence: In this study, torrefaction experiments were performed using five biomass samples.

data.source_sentence: 반탄화 공정 실험을 진행하기 위하여 저항로를 사용하였으며, Fig. 1은 저항로의 전체적인 모식도를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: A resistance furnace was used to conduct the torrefaction process experiment, Fig. 1 shows the overall schematic diagram of the resistance furnace.
data.target_sentence: A resistance furnace was used for the torrefaction process experiment, and the overall schematic diagram of the resistance furnace is shown in Fig. 1.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 사용된 바이오매스 샘플들은 모두 383 K에서 최소 24시간 건조를 진행하였으며, 건조한 바이오매스 샘플들은 10 MPa 압력으로 15 mm x20 mm 사이즈로 펠렛을 제작하였다.
data.mt_sentence: All of the biomass samples used in this study were dried at 383 K for a minimum of 24 hours, and the dried biomass samples were pelleted with a size of 15 mm x 20 mm under a pressure of 10 MPa.
data.target_sentence: All biomass samples used in this study were dried at 383 K for a minimum of 24 hours, and the dried biomass samples were pelleted to a size of 15 mm x 20 mm under a pressure of 10 MPa.

data.source_sentence: 그 후, 저항로 내부의 온도를 573 K까지 온도를 상승시킨 후 2시간 동안 반응을 지켜보았다.
data.mt_sentence: Thereafter, the temperature inside the resistance furnace was raised to 573 K, and the reaction was observed for 2 hours.
data.target_sentence: After that, the temperature inside the resistance furnace was raised to 573K and the reaction was observed for 2 hours.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 철강 공정 내에 코크스를 일부 대체하기 위한 화학에너지의 연로로서 바이오매스 샘플들의 연소 거동을 조사하였으며, 반탄화를 진행한 바이오매스를 코크스와 혼합하여 연소 속도 실험을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the combustion behavior of biomass samples as fuel for chemical energy to partially replace coke in the steel process was investigated, and the combustion rate experiment was conducted by mixing torrefied biomass with coke.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the combustion behavior of a biomass sample, which is a fuel for chemical energy to partially replace coke in the steelmaking process, was investigated, and a combustion rate experiment was performed by mixing torrefied biomass with coke.

data.source_sentence: 코크스와 바이오매스 샘플 직경은 150 μm 이하로 하였고, 바이오매스와 코크스의 혼합 무게비는 1:1로 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The diameter of the coke and biomass sample was 150 μm or less, and the mixing weight ratio of biomass and coke was 1:1.
data.target_sentence: The diameter of the coke and biomass sample was 150 μm or less, and the mixing weight ratio of biomass and coke was 1:1.

data.source_sentence: 연소 실험에 있어서 샘플 장입 방법은 반탄화 실험과 동일하며, Ptwire의 반대편은 저항로 상부에 있는 저울과 연결하여 샘플의 무게 변화를 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the combustion experiment, the sample loading method is the same as that of the torrefaction experiment, and the opposite side of the Ptwire is connected to the scale at the top of the resistance furnace to measure the change in the weight of the sample.
data.target_sentence: In the combustion experiment, the sample loading method is the same as in the torrefaction experiment, and the opposite side of the Ptwire is connected to the scale at the top of the resistance furnace to measure the change in the weight of the sample.

data.source_sentence: 온도 측정 실험은 저항로에서 진행하였으며, Fig. 2는 실험 장비의 모식도를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: The temperature measurement experiment was conducted in a resistance furnace, and Fig. 2 shows a schematic diagram of the experimental equipment.
data.target_sentence: The temperature measurement experiment was performed in a resistance furnace, and the schematic diagram of the experimental equipment is shown in Fig. 2.

data.source_sentence: 알루미나 관 내부에 알루미나 볼을 높이 2 cm, 샘플을 높이 4 cm로 장입 후 T/C를 샘플 층에 위치시켰다.
data.mt_sentence: After loading the alumina ball into the alumina tube to a height of 2 cm and a sample to a height of 4 cm, T/C was placed on the sample layer.
data.target_sentence: After loading the alumina ball into the alumina tube at a height of 2 cm and the sample at a height of 4 cm, T/C was placed on the sample layer.

data.source_sentence: 그후 지르코니아 볼을 높이 4 cm로 장입하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Thereafter, the zirconia balls were charged to a height of 4 cm.
data.target_sentence: Thereafter, the zirconia balls were charged to a height of 4 cm.

data.source_sentence: 상부에 지르코니아 볼을 장입한 이유는 알루미나보다 밀도가 높아 충분한 압력을 가해 주기 위하여 지르코니아 볼을 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The reason why the zirconia balls were charged on the upper part was that they had a higher density than alumina, so zirconia balls were used to apply sufficient pressure.
data.target_sentence: The reason why the zirconia balls are filled on the upper part is because they are denser than alumina and use zirconia balls to apply sufficient pressure.

data.source_sentence: Inlet은 샘플을 담은 알루미나 관 직전에 위치하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The inlet was placed just before the alumina tube containing the sample.
data.target_sentence: The inlet was placed directly in front of the alumina tube containing the sample.

data.source_sentence: 실험은 1373 K에서 진행하였으며, 코크스와 바이오매스 샘플은 1~2 mm 사이즈를 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The experiment was conducted at 1373 K, and the size of the coke and biomass samples was 1 to 2 mm.
data.target_sentence: The experiment was conducted at 1373K, and the size of the coke and biomass samples was 1-2 mm.

data.source_sentence: 상온에서 2시간 동안 N2 가스를 500 ml/min으로 취입하여 불활성 분위기를 유지시킨 후 목표 온도인 1373 K까지 온도를 상승시켰다.
data.mt_sentence: After maintaining an inert atmosphere by blowing N2 gas at 500 ml/min at room temperature for 2 hours, the temperature was raised to a target temperature of 1373 K.
data.target_sentence: After maintaining an inert atmosphere by blowing N2 gas at a rate of 500ml/min at room temperature for 2 hours, the temperature was raised to a target temperature of 1373K.

data.source_sentence: 온도 측정 실험이 종료되면 온도를 내린 후 샘플을 회수하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When the temperature measurement experiment was finished, the temperature was lowered and the sample was recovered.
data.target_sentence: After the temperature measurement experiment was completed, the temperature was lowered and the sample was recovered.

data.source_sentence: Fig.3은 반탄화와 연소 속도, 온도 측정 실험의 총 시간을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 3 shows the total time of torrefaction, combustion rate, and temperature measurement experiments.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 3 shows the total time, combustion rate, and temperature measurement experiments of the torrefaction experiment.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 반탄화 공정을 진행 시 바이오매스 내에 화학적 탄소의 함량을 알아보기 위하여 다양한 바이오매스를 사용하여 실험을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, experiments were conducted using various biomass to determine the content of chemical carbon in biomass during torrefaction process.
data.target_sentence: In this study, experiments were performed using various biomass to determine the chemical carbon content in biomass during torrefaction.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 4는 반탄화 전후의 바이오매스 샘플의 중량 감소를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 4 shows the weight reduction of the biomass sample before and after torrefaction.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 4 shows the weight reduction of the biomass sample before and after torrefaction.

data.source_sentence: 초기 바이오매스 샘플의 중량은 6.5 g이 었지만, 반탄화를 진행한 후 무게는 톱밥의 중량이 4.3 g으로 회수율이 가장 높았고, 쌀겨의 중량은 3.4 g으로 회수율이 가장 낮았다.
data.mt_sentence: The initial weight of the biomass sample was 6.5 g, but after torrefaction, the weight of sawdust was 4.3 g and the recovery rate was the highest, and the weight of rice bran was 3.4 g, and the recovery rate was the lowest.
data.target_sentence: The initial weight of the biomass sample was 6.5 g, but the weight of sawdust after torrefaction was 4.3 g, the highest recovery rate, and the rice bran weight was 3.4 g and the recovery rate was the lowest.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 5는 단일 코크스와 반탄화 전후의 다양한 바이오매스 내의 탄소 함량을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 5 shows the carbon content in a single coke and various biomass before and after torrefaction.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 5 shows the carbon content of single coke and various biomass before and after torrefaction.

data.source_sentence: 반탄화한 후 쌀겨와 볏짚의 탄소 함량이 약 42%이며, 폐목재는 약 68%, 커피박은 72%이며, 톱밥이 약 73%의 함량을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: After torrefaction, the carbon content of rice bran and rice straw is about 42%, waste wood is about 68%, coffee bean is 72%, and sawdust is about 73%.
data.target_sentence: After torrefaction, the carbon content of rice bran and rice straw is about 42%, waste wood is about 68%, coffee bean is about 72%, and sawdust is about 73%.

data.source_sentence: 일 코크스는 약 88%의 탄소 함량을 나타내며, 톱밥이 탄소 함량이 가장 높아 다양한 바이오매스 중 화학에너지 연료로서 활용하기 용이할 것으로 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: One coke showed a carbon content of about 88%, and sawdust had the highest carbon content, so it was confirmed that it would be easy to use as a chemical energy fuel among various biomass.
data.target_sentence: One coke showed a carbon content of about 88%, and sawdust showed the highest carbon content, confirming that it was easy to use as a chemical energy fuel among various biomass.

data.source_sentence: Figs.6과 7은 반탄화 전후의 바이오매스들의 표면을 FE-SEM으로 관찰한 사진을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Figs. 6 and 7 show photos of the biomass surfaces before and after torrefaction with FE-SEM.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 6 and 7 show photos of the biomass surface before and after torrefied with FE-SEM.

data.source_sentence: 반탄화한 바이오매스 샘플들은 반탄화를 진행하기 전에 바이오매스 샘플들과 비교하였을 경우, 톱밥(Fig. 7(a)), 쌀겨(Fig. 7(b)), 볏짚(Fig. 7(c))에서 샘플 표면에 마이크로 균열이 생성되며 10~ 20 μm 정도의 표면 기공이 부분적으로 생성되었다.
data.mt_sentence: When torrefied biomass samples were compared with biomass samples before torrefaction, sawdust (Fig. 7(a)), rice bran (Fig. 7(b)), and rice straw (Fig. 7(c)) ), microcracks were created on the sample surface, and surface pores of about 10-20 μm were partially created.
data.target_sentence: When torrefied biomass samples were compared with biomass samples before torrefaction, sawdust (Fig. 7(a)), rice bran (Fig. 7(b)), and rice straw (Fig. 7(c)) ), microcracks were created on the sample surface and surface pores of about 10-20 μm were partially created.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 철강 공정 내에 코크스를 일부 대체하기 위한 화학에너지의 연료로서 바이오매스 샘플들을 사용하여 실험을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, an experiment was conducted using biomass samples as a fuel for chemical energy to partially replace coke in the steel process.
data.target_sentence: In this study, an experiment was conducted using biomass samples as chemical energy fuels to partially replace coke in the steelmaking process.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 8은 상온에서 1373 K까지 불활성 분위기에서 무게 감소율을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 8 shows the weight loss rate in an inert atmosphere from room temperature to 1373 K.
data.target_sentence: Figure 8 shows the weight loss rate from room temperature to 1373K in an inert atmosphere.

data.source_sentence: 일 코크스를 사용하였을 경우 불활성 분위기로 온도가 상승할 때 무게 감소율이 거의 없지만, 코크스와 반탄화 처리한 바이오매스 샘플들을 혼합하여 사용하였을 경우에 약 673 K에서 무게 감소율이 측정되었다.
data.mt_sentence: When one coke was used, there was little weight loss when the temperature was raised to an inert atmosphere, but when coke and torrefied biomass samples were mixed and used, the weight reduction rate was measured at about 673 K.
data.target_sentence: When one coke was used, there was little weight loss when the temperature was raised to an inert atmosphere, but when coke and torrefied biomass samples were mixed and used, the weight reduction rate was measured at about 673 K.

data.source_sentence: Daniel Nevas 등의 보고에 따르면 673 K 온도에서 바이오매스 내에 산소-수소 결합체인 헤미셀룰로오스가 분해되며, 이산화탄소 및 일산화탄소, 메탄, 타르 등의 휘발성 가스(CO, CO2, N2, CH4 및 탄화수소)가 발생하여 분리된다.
data.mt_sentence: According to reports by Daniel Nevas et al., hemicellulose, an oxygen-hydrogen bond, is decomposed in biomass at 673 K temperature, and volatile gases such as carbon dioxide, carbon monoxide, methane, and tar (CO, CO2, N2, CH4, and hydrocarbons) are generated and separated.
data.target_sentence: According to a report by Daniel Nevas et al., hemicellulose, an oxygen-hydrogen bond, is decomposed in biomass at a temperature of 673 K. Then, carbon dioxide and volatile gases such as carbon monoxide, methane, and tar (CO, CO2, N2, CH4 and hydrocarbons) are generated and separated.

data.source_sentence: 코크스와 혼합된 상태여도 반탄화한 바이오매스의 분해 반응에 의해 무게 감소가 일어났다고 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is judged that the weight reduction occurred due to the decomposition reaction of the torrefied biomass even in a mixed state with coke.
data.target_sentence: It is judged that the weight loss occurred due to the decomposition reaction of torrefied biomass even in a mixed state with coke.

data.source_sentence: 먼저, 단일 코크스의 연소 속도와 비교하여 코크스와 반탄화 처리한 바이오매스의 혼합 샘플들의 연소 속도는 상대적으로 빠른 연속 속도가 관찰되었다.
data.mt_sentence: First, compared to the combustion rate of single coke, the combustion rate of the mixed samples of coke and torrefied biomass was observed to have a relatively high continuous rate.
data.target_sentence: First, compared to the combustion rate of single coke, it was observed that the combustion rate of the coke and torrefied biomass mixture sample had a relatively high continuous rate.

data.source_sentence: 반면, 본 실험에서는 혼합 샘플 내에 바이오매스 성분에 따른 연소 속도는 큰 차이가 없다고 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, in this experiment, it is judged that there is no significant difference in the combustion rate according to the biomass component in the mixed sample.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, in this experiment, it is judged that there is no significant difference in the combustion rate according to the biomass component in the mixed sample.

data.source_sentence: 연소 완료 시점을 비교할 경우, 톱밥, 볏짚, 커피박, 폐목재, 쌀겨 순으로 느렸다.
data.mt_sentence: When comparing the combustion completion times, it was slow in the order of sawdust, rice straw, coffee gourd, waste wood, and rice bran.
data.target_sentence: Comparing the combustion completion time, sawdust, rice straw, gourd gourd, waste wood, and rice bran were the slowest in the order.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 7(d)와 (e)와 같이, 반탄화 후 상대적으로 큰 공극이 생성된 폐목재와 커피박은 반응 면적이 커져서 연소 속도가 빨라진 것으로 판단되며, 기공이 거의 생성되지 않은 톱밥과 볏짚의 연속 속도는 느렸다고 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. As shown in 7(d) and (e), it is judged that the combustion speed of the waste wood and coffee grounds, which have relatively large pores after torrefaction, has increased due to the larger reaction area, and the continuous speed of sawdust and rice straw with few pores. is considered to be slow.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Fig. 7(d) and (e), it is judged that the combustion speed of waste wood and coffee foil, which has relatively large pores after torrefaction, has increased due to the large reaction area. And it is judged that the continuous speed of sawdust and rice straw, which hardly produced pores, was slow.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 원료 물질의 구조와 연소 속도와의 비교를 진행하였으나, 연소 중에 발생하는 가스 성분의 분석과 연소 속도와의 관계를 파악할 필요가 있다고 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the structure of the raw material and the combustion rate were compared, but it is judged that it is necessary to analyze the gas component generated during combustion and understand the relationship between the combustion rate.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the structure of the raw material and the combustion rate were compared, but it is necessary to analyze the gas components generated during combustion and to understand the relationship between the combustion rate.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 10은 목표 온도에 도달 후 건조 공기(Dry air)로 분위기를 변경하여 온도 측정을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 10 indicates temperature measurement by changing the atmosphere to dry air after reaching the target temperature.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 10 is the temperature measurement by changing the atmosphere to dry air after reaching the target temperature.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 코크스와 바이오매스의 배합 비율을 5:5로 진행하여 실험을 진행하였지만, 코크스 배합 비율을 높이면 기존의 코크스 정도의 열효율을 낼 수 있을 것으로 추정된다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, an experiment was conducted by conducting a mixture ratio of coke and biomass at 5:5, but it is estimated that increasing the mixture ratio of coke can produce thermal efficiency of the existing coke.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the experiment was conducted with the mixing ratio of coke and biomass to 5:5, but it is estimated that the thermal efficiency of conventional coke can be achieved by increasing the mixing ratio of coke.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 반탄화 공정을 통해 바이오매스(톱밥, 볏짚, 쌀겨, 커피박, 폐목재) 내의 탄소 함량을 조사하였으며, 고 탄소 바이오 연료를 만들었다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the carbon content in biomass (sawdust, rice straw, rice bran, coffee meal, waste wood) was investigated through torrefaction process, and high carbon biofuel was produced.
data.target_sentence: In this study, high carbon biofuel was produced by investigating the carbon content of biomass (sawdust, rice straw, rice bran, coffee powder, waste wood) through torrefaction process.

data.source_sentence: 반탄화 실험 진행할 때 바이오매스 중 톱밥 내의 탄소 함량이 가장 높다는 것을 확인하였으며, FE-SEM을 통해 탄소 함량이 증가함에 따라 공극 또한 증가한다는 것을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: During the torrefaction experiment, it was confirmed that the carbon content in sawdust was the highest among biomass, and it was confirmed through FE-SEM that the pores also increased as the carbon content increased.
data.target_sentence: The carbon content of sawdust was confirmed to be the highest among biomass during the torrefaction experiment, and it was confirmed through FE-SEM that the pores also increased as the carbon content increased.

data.source_sentence: 상온에서 목표 온도까지 불활성 분위기로 승온 중 단일 코크스는 무게 감량이 거의 없지만, 반탄화 처리한 바이오매스와 코크스를 혼합하였을 경우 약 673 K에서 무게 감소율이 측정되었다.
data.mt_sentence: There was little weight loss in single coke during heating from room temperature to the target temperature in an inert atmosphere. However, when torrefied biomass and coke were mixed, the weight reduction rate was measured at about 673 K.
data.target_sentence: There was little weight loss of a single coke during heating from room temperature to target temperature in an inert atmosphere. However, when torrefied biomass and coke were mixed, the weight loss rate was measured at about 673K.

data.source_sentence: 단일 코크스는 1373 K에서 1413 K까지 온도가 상승하였지만, 반탄화를 진행한 톱밥과 코크스를 혼합하였을 경우 1403 K까지 상승함을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The temperature of single coke rose from 1373 K to 1413 K, but it was confirmed that the temperature rose to 1403 K when torrefied sawdust and coke were mixed.
data.target_sentence: The temperature of single coke rose from 1373K to 1413K, but it was confirmed that the temperature rose to 1403K when torrefied sawdust and coke were mixed.

data.source_sentence: 반탄화 공정을 거친 톱밥이 철강 공정 내 코크스를 일부 대체할 수 있음을 기대할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be expected that sawdust that has undergone the torrefaction process can partially replace coke in the steel process.
data.target_sentence: Sawdust that has undergone torrefaction is expected to partially replace coke in steel processing.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 의 지원을 받아 수행한 연구 과제이다.
data.mt_sentence: This study was carried out with the support of                              .
data.target_sentence: This study was carried out with the support of AAA.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 체계적 문헌 고찰을 이용하여 대변 배양 검사에서 카바페넴 내성 장내세균 속균종(CRE) 혹은 반코마이신 내성 장구균(VRE)의 집락화가확인된 환자를 대상으로 하는 대변 세균총 이식의 안전성 및 탈집락을 위한 유효성을 검토하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Using a systematic literature review, this study examined the safety and effectiveness of fecal total transplantation in patients with confirmed colonies of carbapenem-resistant enterococcal bacteria (CRE) or vancomycin-resistant enterococcal bacteria (VRE) in fecal culture tests.
data.target_sentence: This study investigated the safety and effectiveness of whole fecal transplantation in patients with carbapenem-resistant enterococci (CRE) or vancomycin-resistant enterococci (VRE) colonies identified in stool cultures using a systematic literature review.

data.source_sentence: 이 중 카바페넴 내성 장내세균속균종(carbapenem-resistant Enterobacteriaceae, CRE)과 반코마이신 내성 장구균(vancomycin-resistant enterococci, VRE)은 취 약계층에 감염을 일으켜 합병증 발생, 사망률과 입원 기간, 의료 비용의 증가를 야기시킬 수 있으나 약제 부작용과 새로운 내성 균의 출현 등으로 효과적인 항생제 치료법이 없는 실정이다.
data.mt_sentence: Among them, carbapenem-resistant enterobacteriaceae (CRE) and vancomycin-resistant enterococci (VRE) can cause infections in the vulnerable class, resulting in complications, mortality, hospitalization, and increased medical costs, but new antibiotic-resistant treatments are not effective.
data.target_sentence: Among them, carbapenem-resistant Enterobacteriaceae (CRE) and vancomycin-resistant enterococci (VRE) infect vulnerable groups, resulting in complications, mortality, length of hospitalization, and increase in medical costs. However, there is no effective antibiotic treatment due to drug side effects and the emergence of new resistant bacteria.

data.source_sentence: 한번 집락화가 되면 상당한 기간 동안 균의 음전이 이루어지지 않기 때문에 격리 기간이 길어지게 되어 많은 의료 자원이 요구되며 환자에게도 불편을 초래하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Once colonized, the negative charge of the bacteria is not made for a considerable period of time, so the quarantine period is prolonged, requiring a lot of medical resources and causing inconvenience to patients.
data.target_sentence: Once colonized, the bacteria do not develop a negative charge for a significant amount of time, prolonging the isolation period, requiring a large number of medical resources and causing inconvenience to the patient.

data.source_sentence: 대변 세균총 이식은 건강한 사람의 대변 세균총을 환자에게 이식하는 시술로, 공여자의 정상 대변의 미생물 군집이 환자의 다양한 미생물 군집을 복원함으로써 MDROs (multidrug-resistant organisms)에 의한 장내 집락화를 감소시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: Fecal flora transplantation is a procedure in which the fecal flora of a healthy person is transplanted into a patient, and the microbial community of the donor's normal feces restores the patient's diverse microbial community, thereby reducing intestinal colonization caused by MDROs (multidrug-resistant organisms).
data.target_sentence: Fecal flora transplantation is a procedure in which the fecal flora of a healthy person is transplanted into a patient and the microbiome of the donor's normal feces restores the patient's diverse microbiome to reduce intestinal colonization caused by multidrug-resistant bacteria (MDRO).

data.source_sentence: 동 기술은 신의료기술 평가위원회에서 안전성, 유효성이 있는 기술로 최종 심의가 되어 의료기관 내에서 재발성 또는 기존 항생제 치료에 반응하는 클로스트리디움 디피실 감염 환자 치료에 비급여로 사용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This technology has been finally reviewed by the New Medical Technology Evaluation Committee as a technology with safety and effectiveness, and is being used for non-reimbursable treatment of patients with Clostridium difficile infection who respond to recurrent or existing antibiotic treatment in medical institutions.
data.target_sentence: This technology has finally been verified for safety and effectiveness by the New Medical Technology Evaluation Committee, and is being used in medical institutions for non-covered treatment of patients with Clostridium difficile infection who respond to recurrent or existing antibiotic treatment.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 체계적 문헌고찰을 이용하여 대변 배양 검사에서 카바페넴 내성 장내 세균 속균종(CRE) 혹은 반코마이신 장구균(VRE)의 집락화가 확인된 환자를 대상으로 하는 대변 세균총 이식의 안정성 및 탈집락을 위한 유효성을 검토하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Using a systematic literature review, this study examined the stability and efficacy of fecal total transplantation in patients with confirmed colonies of carbapenem-resistant enterococcal bacteria (CRE) or vancomycin enterococcal bacteria (VRE) in fecal culture tests.
data.target_sentence: In this study, using a systematic literature review, we investigated the safety and efficacy of whole fecal transplantation in patients with carbapenem-resistant enterococci (CRE) or vancomycin enterococci (VRE) colonies identified in stool cultures.

data.source_sentence: 체계적 문헌 고찰은 BBR가 제시한 지침에 따라 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Systematic literature review was conducted according to the guidelines presented by BBR.
data.target_sentence: A systematic literature review was carried out according to the guidelines given by the BBR.

data.source_sentence: 문헌 검색에 사용된 검색어는 대상 환자 및 중재 시술로부터 주요 개념어를 도출하여 검색 전략을 구성하였으며, 검색 시 언어를 제한하지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: For the search terms used in the literature search, a search strategy was constructed by deriving key conceptual words from the target patient and interventional procedure, and the language was not restricted during the search.
data.target_sentence: For the search terms used in the literature search, a search strategy was established by deriving key conceptual words from the target patient and intervention procedure, and there was no language restriction in the search.

data.source_sentence: 국외 데이터베이스는 MeSH 용어와 각 데이터베이스의 색인 구조 특성을 고려하여 선정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The foreign database was selected in consideration of the MeSH term and the index structure characteristics of each database.
data.target_sentence: The external database was selected in consideration of MeSH terminology and the index structure characteristics of each database.

data.source_sentence: 평가자 간 이견이 있는 경우 논의를 통해 조정하고자 하였으나, 평가자 간에 이견은 없었다.
data.mt_sentence: If there was a difference of opinion between the evaluators, an attempt was made to reconcile them through discussion, but there were no differences between the evaluators.
data.target_sentence: If there was a difference of opinion among the evaluators, mediation was attempted through discussion, but there was no difference of opinion among the evaluators.

data.source_sentence: 거의 모든 또는 모든 기준이 충족되지 않아 연구의 결론이 바뀔 것으로 생각되는 경우 ‘-’로 평가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: If it was thought that the conclusion of the study would change because almost all or all of the criteria were not met, it was evaluated as '-'.
data.target_sentence: If it was judged that the conclusion of the study would change because almost all or all of the criteria were not met, it was evaluated as '-'.

data.source_sentence: 문헌에 기술된 공통된 내용과 결과에 영향을 주는 연구 대상의 특성과 함께 안전성 및 유효성에 대한 자료를 추출하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Data on safety and efficacy were extracted along with the common contents described in the literature and the characteristics of the study subjects that affect the results.
data.target_sentence: Data on safety and efficacy were extracted along with common findings described in the literature and the characteristics of study subjects influencing outcomes.

data.source_sentence: 모든 원인에 의한 사망 및 이상반응은 비교 연구 2편에서 중재군은 사망 5% (1명/20명), 중증 이상반응 19.0% (4명/21명), 약물 이상반응 90%, 설사 57%, 비교군은 중증 이상반응 11.8% (2명/17명), 약물 이상반응 76.5%, 설사 20%를 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: All-cause mortality and adverse reactions were as follows: In the second comparative study, in the intervention group, deaths were 5% (1 patient/20 patients), severe adverse events 19.0% (4 patients/21 patients), drug adverse reactions 90%, diarrhea 57% , In the control group, 11.8% of serious adverse reactions (2/17 patients), 76.5% of drug adverse reactions, and 20% of diarrhea were reported.
data.target_sentence: All-cause mortality and adverse events were 5% (1/20), 19.0% (4/21), and drug adverse events in the intervention group in the secondary comparative study. 90%, diarrhea 57%, serious adverse reaction 11.8% in the control group (patient 2/17), drug adverse reaction 76.5%, diarrhea 20% were reported.

data.source_sentence: 단일군 연구 7편중 6편에서 사망 5%~20%, 구토 5%, 변비 10%, 설사 10%~100%, 급성 GvHD 발생 10%, 패혈증 5% 등을 보고하였으며, 1편에서는 발생하지 않았다고 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: 6 out of 7 single-group studies reported death 5% to 20%, vomiting 5%, constipation 10%, diarrhea 10% to 100%, acute GvHD incidence 10%, sepsis 5%, etc. reported.
data.target_sentence: In 6 of 7 single-group studies, 5% to 20% of deaths, 5% to vomiting, 10% to constipation, 10% to 100% diarrhea, 10% to acute GvHD, and 5% to sepsis were reported. And it was reported that it did not occur in one study.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 대변 배양 검사에서 카바페넴 내성 장내 세균속 균종(CRE) 혹은 반코마이신 내성 장구균(VRE)의 집락화가 확인된 환자를 대상으로 대변 세균총 이식을 통해 환자의 장내 세균총을 정상화시키는 데 있어서 대변 세균총 이식의 안전성 및 유효성을 평가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study evaluated the safety and effectiveness of fecal total transplantation in normalizing the patient's intestinal total through fecal total transplantation in patients who were confirmed to have colonies of carbapenem-resistant enterococcal bacteria (CRE) or vancomycin-resistant enterococcal bacteria (VRE).
data.target_sentence: In this study, the safety and efficacy of whole fecal transplant was evaluated in normalizing the patient's entire intestine through colonization of carbapenem-resistant enterococci (CRE) or vancomycin-resistant enterococci (VRE) in patients with confirmed colonies.

data.source_sentence: 시술 관련 이상반응 평가 시, 환자-대조군 연구는 다수가 원인을 불문한 대변 세균총 이식 후 사망 및 이상반응을 보고하여, 대변 세균총 이식에 기인한 이상반응을 분석하기에는 한계가 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: When evaluating treatment-related adverse reactions, many patient-control studies reported deaths and adverse reactions after fecal bacterial gun transplantation, regardless of the cause, and there was a limit to analyzing adverse reactions caused by fecal bacterial gun transplantation.
data.target_sentence: When evaluating treatment-related adverse events, many case-control studies have reported death and adverse events after fecal flora transplantation regardless of the cause, and there are limitations in analyzing adverse reactions caused by fecal flora transplantation.

data.source_sentence: 이는 대변 세균총 이식 방법에 대해 국가적인 승인 및 규제 기관의 지침이 아직 표준화되어 있지 않은 기술이기 때문일 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: This may be because the national approval and regulatory agency guidelines for fecal bacterial gun transplantation methods have not yet been standardized.
data.target_sentence: This may be because national approval and regulatory agency guidelines for fecal flora transplantation methods have not yet been standardized.

data.source_sentence: 대변 세균총 이식은 인체에 이식한 세균총이 생착하여 장기적인 영향을 초래하기 때문에 EU 조직 및 세포 지침(EU Tissue and Cells Directive, EUTCD)에 따라 조직 또는 장기 이식으로 보아야 한다는 주장도 있어서, 동 기술의 안전성 확보는 장기 이식 수준으로 엄격해야 한다는 시각이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: There is also an argument that fecal flora transplantation should be regarded as a tissue or organ transplant in accordance with the EU Tissue and Cells Directive (EUTCD), because the transplanted bacterial flora in the human body engrafts and causes long-term effects. There is a view that it should be strict at the level of organ transplantation.
data.target_sentence: There is also an argument that fecal flora transplantation should be viewed as a tissue or organ transplant according to the EU Tissue and Cells Directive (EUTCD), because the transplanted flora in the human body engrafts and causes long-term effects. Therefore, there is a view that securing the safety of this technology should be strict at the level of organ transplantation.

data.source_sentence: 장내 다제내성균 탈집락화를 위한 대변 세균총 이식은 대변 배양 검사에서 카바페넴 내성 장내 세균 속균종(CRE) 혹은 반코마이신 내성 장구균(VRE)의 집락화가 확인된 환자를 대상으로 환자의 장내 세균총을 정상화시켜 감염증을 치료하기 위한 기술로, 본 연구에서는 대변 세균총 이식의안전성 및 유효성을 평가하고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Fecal flora transplantation for the decolonization of enteric multidrug-resistant bacteria is aimed at patients who have confirmed colonization of carbapenem-resistant enterobacteriaceae (CRE) or vancomycin-resistant enterococci (VRE) in a stool culture test to normalize the patient's intestinal flora to prevent infection. As a treatment technique, this study aimed to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of transplantation of fecal flora.
data.target_sentence: Fecal flora transplantation for the decolonization of enteric multidrug-resistant bacteria is aimed at patients with carbapenem-resistant enterobacteriaceae (CRE) or vancomycin-resistant enterococci (VRE) colonies confirmed in stool culture tests to normalize the patient's intestinal flora to prevent infection. The purpose of this study was to evaluate the safety and efficacy of transplantation of fecal flora as a treatment technique.

data.source_sentence: 안전성은 시술 관련 사망 및 이상반응, 모든 원인에 의한 사망 및 이상반응 지표로, 유효성은 탈집락 관련 지표, 재발률, 다제 내성균 감염 관련 질환 발병 감소율, 삶의 질 지표로 평가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Safety was evaluated as an index of procedure-related mortality and adverse events, all-cause mortality and adverse events, and efficacy was evaluated as an index related to decolonization, recurrence rate, reduction rate of multidrug-resistant bacterial infection-related disease incidence, and quality of life index.
data.target_sentence: Safety is an indicator of procedure-related mortality and adverse events, all-cause mortality and adverse events. Efficacy is decolonization, recurrence rate, reduction in the incidence of multidrug-resistant bacterial infection-related diseases, and quality of life index.

data.source_sentence: 안전성 및 유효성을 입증하기에 문헌적 근거가 충분하지 않아 아직까지는 연구가 더 필요한 기술로 평가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: There is not enough literature evidence to prove safety and efficacy, so it was evaluated as a technology that needs further research.
data.target_sentence: It was evaluated as a technology that requires further research due to insufficient literature evidence to prove its safety and efficacy.

data.source_sentence: 탈집락률의 경우 2편에서 중재군은 38%~80%, 비교군은 10%~25%로, 탈집락 소요 기간은 1편에서 중재군은 평균 3일, 비교군은 평균 50일이 소요되었다고 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of the withdrawal rate, it was reported that the arbitration group took 38% to 80% and the comparison group 10% to 25%, and the withdrawal period took an average of 3 days for the arbitration group and an average of 50 days for the comparison group in the first episode.
data.target_sentence: The withdrawal rate was reported to be 38% to 80% for the intervention group and 10% to 25% for the comparison group, and the withdrawal period was 3 days on average for the intervention group, and 50 days on average for the comparison group in the first episode.

data.source_sentence: 합성 비료와 농약 등의 사용을 줄이기 위하여 특정 목적에 맞는 미생물제제를 사용함으로써 문제점을 해결할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to reduce the use of synthetic fertilizers and pesticides, the problem can be solved by using microorganisms suitable for a specific purpose.
data.target_sentence: In order to reduce the use of synthetic fertilizers and pesticides, the problem can be solved by using microorganisms suitable for a specific purpose.

data.source_sentence: 다양한 종의 식물 생장 촉진 근권 세균 중에서도 Bacillus 속의 많은 종은 다양한 병원균에 대한 생물학적 방제제로서 잠재력을 가지고 있는 것으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Among various species of plant growth promoting rhizosphere bacteria, many species of the genus Bacillus are known to have potential as biological control agents against various pathogens.
data.target_sentence: Among the various species of rhizobacteria, many species of the genus Bacillus are known to have potential as biological control agents against various pathogens.

data.source_sentence: 균주들을 이용하여 항진균 활성, 식물 생장 촉진 활성에 대한 연구가 활발히 진행되고 있으나, 항진균 활성, 식물 생장 촉진 활성, 미네랄 가용화능 및 세포 외 효소 활성을 동시에 가지는 균주들에 대한 연구는 미미한 실정이다.
data.mt_sentence: Although research on antifungal activity and plant growth promoting activity using strains is being actively conducted, studies on strains having antifungal activity, plant growth promoting activity, mineral solubilization ability and extracellular enzyme activity at the same time are insignificant.
data.target_sentence: Although research on antifungal activity and plant growth promoting activity using the strain is being actively conducted, studies on strains having antifungal activity, plant growth promoting activity, mineral solubilization ability and extracellular enzyme activity at the same time are insignificant.

data.source_sentence: 텃밭, 해수욕장 등의 토양 및 뿌리를 수집하여 유용 미생물을 분리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Useful microorganisms were isolated by collecting soil and roots of vegetable gardens and beaches.
data.target_sentence: Useful microorganisms were isolated by collecting soil and roots from vegetable gardens and beaches.

data.source_sentence: 식물 병원성 곰팡이와 유용 미생물 간의 거리를 측정하여 억제율(inhibition rate)로 환산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The distance between the plant pathogenic fungus and the useful microorganism was measured and converted into an inhibition rate.
data.target_sentence: The distance between the plant pathogen and the useful microorganism was measured and converted into the inhibition rate.

data.source_sentence: 분리된 균주를 TSB 배지에 접종하고 30℃에서 2일 동안 배양한 후 원심분리하여 균체를 회수하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The isolated strain was inoculated in TSB medium, incubated at 30° C. for 2 days, and then centrifuged to recover the cells.
data.target_sentence: The isolated strain was inoculated in TSB medium, incubated at 30°C for 2 days, and then centrifuged to recover cells.

data.source_sentence: 대조군으로는 질소원으로 아무것도 첨가하지 않은 배지를 사용하였으며, 600 nm에서 흡광도를 측정하여 분리된 균주의 생장 정도로 ACC deaminase의 생성을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a control, a medium to which nothing was added as a nitrogen source was used, and the generation of ACC deaminase was confirmed to the extent of the growth of the isolated strain by measuring the absorbance at 600 nm.
data.target_sentence: The control group used a medium to which nothing was added as a nitrogen source, and the absorbance was measured at 600 nm to confirm the generation of ACC deaminase up to the growth level of the isolated strain.

data.source_sentence: 질소 고정능 조사는 Um 등의 방법에 따라 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The nitrogen fixation ability was investigated according to the method of Um et al.
data.target_sentence: The nitrogen fixing ability was investigated according to the method of Um et al.

data.source_sentence: Test tube에 NFB 배지를 넣고 전배양된 균주를 접종하여 30℃에서 4일간 배양하면서 배지의 색이 푸른색으로 변할 경우 양성으로 판단하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The NFB medium was put into the test tube, the pre-cultured strain was inoculated, and the color of the medium changed to blue while culturing at 30°C for 4 days, and it was judged to be positive.
data.target_sentence: The NFB medium was placed in a test tube, the pre-cultured strain was inoculated, and the color of the medium changed to blue while culturing at 30° C. for 4 days, and it was determined to be positive.

data.source_sentence: 인산 가용화능 측정은 Pande 등의 방법에 따라 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Phosphoric acid solubilization capacity was measured according to the method of Pande et al.
data.target_sentence: Phosphoric acid solubilizing ability was measured according to the method of Pande et al.

data.source_sentence: 이후 DNS 시약을 첨가하여 100℃에서 10분 동안 열처리 한 다음 얼음에 냉각시킨 후 분광 광도계를 이용하여 540 nm에서 흡광도를 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After adding DNS reagent, heat treatment at 100° C. for 10 minutes, cooling on ice, and measuring absorbance at 540 nm using a spectrophotometer.
data.target_sentence: After the DNS reagent was added, heat treatment was performed at 100° C. for 10 minutes, cooled on ice, and absorbance was measured at 540 nm using a spectrophotometer.

data.source_sentence: 모든 분석은 3회 이상 수행하였으며, 평균 ± 표준 편차(Mean ± SD)로 표현하였다.
data.mt_sentence: All analyzes were performed at least three times and expressed as mean ± standard deviation (Mean ± SD).
data.target_sentence: All analyzes were performed at least 3 times and are expressed as mean ± standard deviation (Mean ± SD).

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서도 Bacillus 속에 속하는 균주들의 식물 생장 촉진 활성과 미네랄 가용화능 및 세포외 효소활성을 측정하고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, we tried to measure the plant growth promoting activity, mineral solubilization and extracellular enzyme activity of strains belonging to the genus Bacillus.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the plant growth promoting activity, mineral solubilization and extracellular enzyme activity of strains belonging to the genus Bacillus were measured.

data.source_sentence: 식물 생장 호르몬 중 대표적인 옥신(auxin)은 세포의 생장과 분화, 뿌리의 성장에 기인하며, 일부 세균들이 식물 근권에서 옥신을 생성하여 식물이 흡수함으로써 생장에 도움이 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Auxin, a representative plant growth hormone, is caused by cell growth, differentiation, and root growth, and some bacteria produce auxin in the plant rhizome, which helps the plant to absorb it.
data.target_sentence: Auxin, a representative plant growth hormone, is caused by cell growth, differentiation, and root growth, and some bacteria produce auxin in the plant's rhizosphere and the plant absorbs it, thereby helping the growth.

data.source_sentence: 옥신 계열 중에서 대표적인 것이 IAA이며, IAA는 다양한 경로를 통하여 생성된다.
data.mt_sentence: IAA is a representative of the Oxin family, and IAA is generated through various channels.
data.target_sentence: IAA is a representative product of the Oxin family, and IAA is generated through various channels.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 식물 생장 호르몬 계열인 IAA의 생성능을 확인하고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study attempted to confirm the production ability of IAA, a plant growth hormone.
data.target_sentence: This study was to confirm the production capacity of IAA, a plant growth hormone.

data.source_sentence: 이처럼 본 연구에서도 IAA 생성능을 가진 균주들이 식물 생장 촉진에 기여할 수 있을 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: As such, in this study, it is judged that strains with IAA-producing ability can contribute to the promotion of plant growth.
data.target_sentence: As such, in this study, it was determined that strains with IAA-producing ability could contribute to plant growth promotion.

data.source_sentence: 이렇게 분해된 산물들은 식물이 생장하는 동안 탄소원과 질소원으로 이용이 되며, 이 과정에서 ACC의 농도가 낮아지고 스트레스 호르몬인 에틸렌의 합성을 저해하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: These decomposed products are used as carbon and nitrogen sources during plant growth, and in this process, the concentration of ACC is lowered and the synthesis of ethylene, a stress hormone, is inhibited.
data.target_sentence: These decomposition products are used as carbon and nitrogen sources during plant growth. In this process, the concentration of ACC is lowered and the synthesis of ethylene, a stress hormone, is suppressed.

data.source_sentence: 결과적으로 IAA와 ACCdeaminase를 생성하는 근권미생물을 이용하여 에틸렌 수준을 조절함으로써 식물의 환경 스트레스를 저해하여 생장 촉진에 도움이 될 수 있을 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result, it is judged that it can help promote growth by inhibiting environmental stress of plants by regulating the level of ethylene using rhizosphere microorganisms that produce IAA and ACCdeaminase.
data.target_sentence: As a result, it is judged that it can help promote growth by suppressing environmental stress of plants by regulating ethylene levels using rhizosphere microorganisms that produce IAA and ACCdeaminase.

data.source_sentence: 질소는 모든 생물에 필수적인 요소이며 단백질, 핵산 및 다양한 생체분자(biomolecules)의 구성 요소이다.
data.mt_sentence: Nitrogen is an essential element for all living things and is a component of proteins, nucleic acids and various biomolecules.
data.target_sentence: Nitrogen is an essential element for all living things and is a building block of proteins, nucleic acids and various biomolecules.

data.source_sentence: 토양에는 미생물과 식물의 성장에 이용되는 철의 함량이 낮기 때문에 식물 주변에 서식하는 근권미생물은 저분자(400−1000 Da)인 siderophore를 생산하여 미생물과 식물의 철 이용률을 높여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the iron content used for the growth of microorganisms and plants is low in the soil, the rhizosphere microorganisms living around plants produce siderophores, which are low molecular weight (400−1000 Da), and increase the iron utilization rate of microorganisms and plants.
data.target_sentence: Since the iron content used for the growth of microorganisms and plants is low in the soil, the rhizosphere microorganisms living around plants create siderophores with low molecular weight (400-1000 Da) to increase iron utilization of microorganisms and plants.

data.source_sentence: 인(P)은 질소에 이어서 식물의 성장과 발달에 필수 요소이다.
data.mt_sentence: Phosphorus (P) is an essential element in plant growth and development following nitrogen.
data.target_sentence: After nitrogen, phosphorus (P) is an essential element for plant growth and development.

data.source_sentence: 분리된 균주 가운데 ANG52와 ANG56을 제외한 나머지 균주에서 인산 가용화능이 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: Among the isolated strains, phosphoric acid solubilizing ability was shown in the remaining strains except for ANG52 and ANG56.
data.target_sentence: Among the isolated strains, except for ANG52 and ANG56, the other strains showed phosphoric acid solubilization ability.

data.source_sentence: 아연은 식물의 적절한 성장과 발달을 위해 소량 필요로 하는 영양소이다.
data.mt_sentence: Zinc is a nutrient that needs a small amount for proper growth and development of plants.
data.target_sentence: Zinc is a nutrient that plants need in small amounts for proper growth and development.

data.source_sentence: 식물에서의 아연 부족은 작물의 수확량, 꽃가루 형성, 뿌리의 발달에 영향을 미쳐 꽃과 열매의 발달이 저하되고 탄수화물과 식물 호르몬의 합성을 감소시켜 작물의 성숙을 지연시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: The lack of zinc in plants affects crop yields, pollen formation, and root development, which degrades flower and fruit development and reduces the synthesis of carbohydrates and plant hormones, delaying crop maturation.
data.target_sentence: Zinc deficiency in plants affects crop yield, pollen formation and root development, which impairs flower and fruit development and reduces the synthesis of carbohydrates and phytohormones, thereby delaying crop maturation.

data.source_sentence: 식물은 아연을 수용성 형태로 흡수하지만 토양에 존재하는 아연은 불용성 형태로 존재하여 식물이 흡수할 수 없기 때문에 아연 결핍증이 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: Plants absorb zinc in a water-soluble form, but zinc present in the soil is insoluble and cannot be absorbed by plants, resulting in zinc deficiency.
data.target_sentence: Plants absorb zinc in a water-soluble form, but zinc present in the soil is insoluble and therefore not absorbed by plants, resulting in zinc deficiency.

data.source_sentence: 문제점을 해결하기 위하여 뿌리 근권 세균 중 아연 가용화능이 있는 미생물은 아연을 가용화하여 식물이 이용할 수 있도록 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to solve the problem, microorganisms with zinc solubilization ability among root myofascial bacteria are made available to plants by solubilizing zinc.
data.target_sentence: To solve this problem, microorganisms with zinc solubilizing ability among root fascia bacteria were used to solubilize zinc to be used in plants.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 결과는 식물이 토양에서 흡수하기 어려운 영양소를 근권 미생물이 가용화하여 식물의 영양소 흡수에 영향을 주어 최종적으로 식물 생장에 도움을 줄 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: These results suggest that the rhizosphere microbes solubilize nutrients that are difficult for plants to absorb from the soil, thereby affecting the plant's nutrient absorption and ultimately helping plants grow.
data.target_sentence: These results suggest that the rhizosphere microbes solubilize nutrients that are difficult for plants to absorb from the soil, affecting plant nutrient absorption and ultimately helping plants grow.

data.source_sentence: 식물 병원균의 생장을 저해하는 것으로 보고가 되고 있는 Bacillus 속 균주들은 세포벽 분해 효소를 생산하고 식물 병원균의 세포벽을 용해하는 작용을 하는 것으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Bacillus genus strains, which have been reported to inhibit the growth of plant pathogens, are known to produce cell wall degrading enzymes and to dissolve the cell walls of plant pathogens.
data.target_sentence: Bacillus sp. strains reported to inhibit the growth of plant pathogens are known to produce cell wall degrading enzymes and to dissolve the cell walls of plant pathogens.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구 결과에서 동정된 Bacillus 속 균주들의 항진균 활성, 식물 생장 촉진 활성, 미네랄 가용화능 및 세포외 효소 활성을 측정함으로써 미생물 제제로의 이용 가능성을 조사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the results of this study, the possibility of use as a microbial agent was investigated by measuring the antifungal activity, plant growth promotion activity, mineral solubility, and extracellular enzyme activity of the identified strains in Bacillus.
data.target_sentence: As a result of this study, the antifungal activity, plant growth promoting activity, mineral solubility and extracellular enzyme activity of the strains identified in Bacillus were measured to investigate the possibility of their use as microbial preparations.

data.source_sentence: 이들 균주 중에서 DDP257은 10종의 다양한 식물 병원성 곰팡이에 대한 항진균 활성을 나타냈고, DDP256, DDP313은 9종에 대하여 항진균 활성을 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Among these strains, DDP257 exhibited antifungal activity against 10 various plant pathogenic fungi, and DDP256 and DDP313 exhibited antifungal activity against 9 species.
data.target_sentence: From these strains, DDP257 showed antifungal activity against 10 various plant pathogenic fungi, and DDP256 and DDP313 showed antifungal activity against 9 species.

data.source_sentence: ANG20은 식물 생장 촉진 활성과 미네랄 가용화능에서 높은 활성을 나타냈다.
data.mt_sentence: ANG20 exhibited high activity in terms of plant growth promoting activity and mineral solubilization activity.
data.target_sentence: ANG20 showed high activity in terms of plant growth promoting activity and mineral solubilizing activity.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 토양 및 근권에 존재하는 Bacillus 속의 식물 생장 촉진 활성, 식물 병원성 곰팡이의 생장 억제 활성, 미네랄 가용화능 및 세포외 효소 활성을 확인해 보고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the plant growth promoting activity of Bacillus genus present in soil and rhizosphere, growth inhibitory activity of plant pathogenic fungi, mineral solubilization ability and extracellular enzyme activity were investigated.
data.target_sentence: In this study, plant growth promoting activity, plant pathogenic fungus growth inhibitory activity, mineral solubilization ability and extracellular enzyme activity were investigated in soil and rhizosphere.

data.source_sentence: 식물 병원성 곰팡이에 대한 항진균 활성에서 DDP257은 10종의 병원성 곰팡이에서 항진균 활성이 모두 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: In terms of antifungal activity against phytopathogenic fungi, DDP257 showed antifungal activity against all 10 pathogenic fungi.
data.target_sentence: In terms of antifungal activity against phytopathogenic fungi, DDP257 showed antifungal activity against all 10 pathogenic fungi.

data.source_sentence: 이후 분리된 균주에 대하여 phosphate, calcite, zinc과 같은 미네랄 가용화능을 확인하였으며, 세포외 효소 활성에서도 대부분의 효소에서 활성이 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: Afterwards, the solubilizing ability of minerals such as phosphate, calcite, and zinc was confirmed for the isolated strain, and most enzymes were also active in extracellular enzyme activity.
data.target_sentence: Afterwards, the solubilizing ability of minerals such as phosphate, calcite, and zinc was confirmed for the isolated strain, and most enzymes also showed activity in extracellular enzyme activity.

data.source_sentence: 이는 Bacillus 속이 다양한 유기물과 항생 물질 및 세포외 효소를 분비함으로써 이러한 결과가 나타난 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is judged that this result appears because Bacillus genus secretes various organic substances, antibiotics and extracellular enzymes.
data.target_sentence: These results are considered to be due to the secretion of various organic substances, antibiotics, and extracellular enzymes in the genus Bacillus.

data.source_sentence: 특히, 산화질소는 미생물 감염을 막는 방어 기전에 필수적인 내인성 물질로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, nitrogen oxide is known as an endogenous material essential for defense mechanisms that prevent microbial infection.
data.target_sentence: In particular, nitric oxide is known as an endogenous substance essential for defense mechanisms to prevent microbial infection.

data.source_sentence: 과도한 아질산 첨가는 돼지에서 상대적으로 낮은 아질산 분해 효소 활성으로 인해 청색증을 유발할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Excessive nitrite addition can cause cyanosis due to the relatively low nitrite activity in pigs.
data.target_sentence: Excessive nitrite addition can cause cyanosis due to the relatively low nitrite activity in pigs.

data.source_sentence: 생균제는 비병원성 유기물질이며 충분한 양을 급여했을 때 장 건강을 증진시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: Probiotics are non-pathogenic organic substances and promote gut health when fed in sufficient amounts.
data.target_sentence: Probiotics are non-pathogenic organic substances and promote gut health when consumed in sufficient amounts.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 돼지 사육시설에서 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study was conducted in a pig breeding facility.
data.target_sentence: This study was conducted in a pig breeding facility.

data.source_sentence: 실험 사료는 NRC(2012)에 제시된 영양소 요구량을 충족하도록 배합하였으며, Table 1에 화학적 조성을 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: The experimental feed was formulated to meet the nutrient requirements presented in NRC (2012), and the chemical composition is shown in Table 1.
data.target_sentence: Experimental diets were formulated to meet the nutrient requirements set forth in the NRC (2012) and the chemical composition is shown in Table 1.

data.source_sentence: 실험 사료는 가루형태로써 물과 함께 자유롭게 채식할수 있도록 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The experimental feed was in the form of a powder, so that it could be freely vegan with water.
data.target_sentence: The experimental feed was in powder form and could be freely vegan with water.

data.source_sentence: 실험 기간에는 백신을 제외한 약품은 일체 사용하지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: During the experiment, no drugs were used except for vaccines.
data.target_sentence: No drugs were used during the experiment, except for vaccines.

data.source_sentence: 총 사료 섭취량은 실험 종료 시점에 남은 사료량의 무게를 측정하여 산출하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The total feed intake was calculated by measuring the weight of the remaining feed amount at the end of the experiment.
data.target_sentence: The total feed intake was calculated by measuring the weight of the remaining feed amount at the end of the experiment.

data.source_sentence: 450 nm에서 흡광도를 측정하고 표준 곡선을 작성하여 함량을 구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Absorbance was measured at 450 nm and the content was calculated by creating a standard curve.
data.target_sentence: The absorbance was measured at 450 nm and a standard curve was created to calculate the content.

data.source_sentence: 채취한 내용물은 아이스박스에 밀봉하여 즉시 실험실로 옮겨 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The collected contents were sealed in an icebox and immediately transferred to the laboratory for analysis.
data.target_sentence: The collected contents were sealed in an icebox and immediately transported to the laboratory for analysis.

data.source_sentence: 제조된 현탁액 1ml는 희석액 9ml에 연속 희석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: 1 ml of the prepared suspension was continuously diluted in 9 ml of the diluent.
data.target_sentence: 1 ml of the prepared suspension was serially diluted in 9 ml of diluent.

data.source_sentence: 희석 중에 공기 유입을 방지하기 위하여 파라핀 오일로 희석액 표면을 코팅하였고 실험은 질소가스로 충진하며 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The surface of the diluent was coated with paraffin oil to prevent air from entering during dilution, and the experiment was conducted by filling it with nitrogen gas.
data.target_sentence: The surface of the diluent was coated with paraffin oil to prevent the inflow of air during dilution, and nitrogen gas was injected to conduct the experiment.

data.source_sentence: 융모 높이와 융와 깊이의 비율은 두 수치를 나누어 산출하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The ratio between the height of the villi and the depth of the villi was calculated by dividing the two values.
data.target_sentence: The ratio of villi height and villi depth was calculated by dividing the two values.

data.source_sentence: 일당 사료 섭취량(ADFI)과 사료 요구율(FCR)은 SNPro 첨가 수준에 따른 유의적인 차이가 나타나지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: The daily feed intake (ADFI) and feed demand rate (FCR) did not show a significant difference according to the SNPro addition level.
data.target_sentence: There was no significant difference between daily feed intake (ADFI) and feed demand rate (FCR) according to the amount of SNPro added.

data.source_sentence: 본 실험 결과 SNPro 0.03% 첨가가 이유자돈(weaning pig) 성장에 긍정적인 영향을 나타내며, 산화아연 대체제로서 활용이 가능한 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of this experiment, the addition of SNPro 0.03% showed a positive effect on the growth of weaning pigs, and it is judged that it can be used as an alternative to zinc oxide.
data.target_sentence: As a result of this experiment, the addition of 0.03% of SNPro showed a positive effect on the growth of weaned pigs, and it is judged that it can be used as an alternative to zinc oxide.

data.source_sentence: 사료 내 SNPro의 첨가 수준에 따른 이유자돈(weaning pig)의 면역 반응은 Fig. 1과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The immune response of weaning pigs according to the level of SNPro in the feed was shown in Fig. equal to 1.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 1 shows the immune response of weaned pigs according to the level of SNPro in the feed.

data.source_sentence: 본 실험 결과 SNPro 0.03% 첨가가 이유자돈(weaning pig) 면역 반응에 긍정적인 영향을 나타내며, 산화아연 대체제로서 활용이 가능한 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of this experiment, it is determined that the addition of SNPro 0.03% positively affects the weight pig immune response and can be used as an alternative to zinc oxide.
data.target_sentence: As a result of this experiment, it was confirmed that the addition of SNPro 0.03% had a positive effect on the immune response of pigs in body weight and could be used as an alternative to zinc oxide.

data.source_sentence: 사료 내 SNPro의 첨가 수준에 따른 장 내의 미생물에 미치는 영향은 Fig. 2와 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The effect of SNPro addition level on the intestinal microbes in the feed is shown in Fig. Same as 2.
data.target_sentence: The effect of SNPro addition levels on the gut microbiota in the feed is shown in Figure 2.

data.source_sentence: 장 내 미생물 총의 불균형으로 인해 질병에 감염될 확률은 급격히 높아진다.
data.mt_sentence: The probability of contracting a disease increases rapidly due to an imbalance in the intestinal microbial gun.
data.target_sentence: An imbalance in the intestinal microflora dramatically increases the chances of getting sick.

data.source_sentence: 사료 내 SNPro의 첨가 수준이 증가함에 따라 이유자돈 공장의 융와 깊이에 영향을 미치는 것으로 조사가 되었으나 융모 형태 및 융모 높이와 융와 깊이에는 효과가 없는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: As the level of SNPro added in the feed increased, it was investigated to have an effect on the fossa depth of weaned piglets, but it was found to have no effect on the villi shape and villi height and chordal depth.
data.target_sentence: It was investigated that as the concentration of SNPro added to the feed increased, it affected the washer depth of weaned pigs, but it did not appear to affect the villi shape, villi height and chord depth.

data.source_sentence: 이유자돈 십이지장, 공장 및 회장 융모의 길이는 사료 내 SNPro 첨가 수준이 증가함에 따라 유의적인 차이가 나타나지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: The length of duodenum, jejunum and ileal villi of weaned pigs did not show any significant difference as the level of SNPro in the feed increased.
data.target_sentence: The length of duodenum, jejunum, and ileal villi of weaned pigs did not show a significant difference as the SNPro concentration in the feed increased.

data.source_sentence: 이유자돈 공장 융와 깊이는 SNPro 첨가 수준이 증가함에 따라 유의적으로 깊게 나타났으나, 십이지장과 회장에서는 유의적인 차이가 나타나지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: The depth of the weaning pig plant's fossa was significantly increased as the level of SNPro added increased, but there was no significant difference in the duodenum and ileum.

data.source_sentence: 기존의 식품 산업은 유해 미생물을 원인으로 한 부패 및 변질이 세균성 식중독 문제를 야기시켰지만, 최근에는 식이 습관, 조리 행위의 변화, 식품 공급의 세계화 및 인구의 고령화 등의 이유로 식중독 발생이 증가하고 있다.

data.source_sentence: E. coli는 Escherichia 속 중의 대표적인 균종으로 장의 정상적인 생리기능을 유지하는 데 주요한 역할을 담당하고 있다.
